 wesan orwenan eðelrihtes , 
 sittan æfter beorg in blæc reaf , 
 wea on wena ; wæccende bidan 
 eall seon sibgedriht somod ætgædere 
 micel mægenes , oþ moyses bebeodan 
 eorl on uhttid ærnum bemum 
 folc somnigean , frec arisan , 
 habban hira hlencan , hycgan on ellen , 
 beran beorht searo , beacn cigean 
 sweot sande near . snelle gemunan 
 weard wigleoð , werod wesan fysan , 
 brudon ofer burh , ( byme gehyrdan ) , 
 flota feldhusum , fyrd wesan on ofost . 
 siððan hi getellan wiþ þæm teonhete 
 on þæm forðherge feþa twelfe 
 mod rof ; mægen wesan onhreran . 
 wesan on an gehwa æðele cynn 
 alesen under lindum leode duguðe 
 on folcgetæl fiftig cista ; 
 habban cista gehwilc cuðes werod 
 garberendra , guðfremmendra , 
 x hund geteled , tireadigra . 
 þæt wesan wiglic werod . wacan nesan gretan 
 in þæt rincgetæl ræswan here , 
 þu þu for geoguþ git nesan mihton 
 under bordhreoðan breostnet wer 
 wiþ flan feond folm werigean , 
 nesan him bealubenne gebidan habban 
 ofer linde lærig , licwunde spor , 
 gylpplegan gar . gamele nesan motan , 
 har heaðorincas , hild onþeon , 
 gif him modheapum mægen swiðrade , 
 acan hi be wæstm wigheap сeosan , 
 hu in leodscipe læstan willan 
 mod mid are , eacan þan mægen cræftan , 
 garbeames fon gretan miht . 
 þu wesan handrofra herian ætgædere , 
 fus forðwegas . fanu up geridan , 
 beam beorhtost ; bidan ealle þu gen 
 hwonne siðboda sæstreamum neah 
 sunnan ofer lindum lyftedoras brecan . 
 ahleop þu for hæleðum hildecalla , 
 bald beadohata , bord up ahebban , 
 hatan þu folctogan fyrd gestillan , 
 þenden modig meðel manig gehyrdan . 
 willan reordigean rices hyrdan 
 ofer hereciste halig stefn , 
 werod wisian wurðmyndum sprecan : 
 " nesan beoð ge þywan forhtran , þiсgan þu faraon bringan 
 sweordwigendra side here , 
 eorl unrim ! him eall willan 
 mihtig drihten þurh min hand 
 toh dæge þes dædlean gyfan , 
 þæt hi lifian lengan nesan motan 
 ægnian mid yrmðum israhela cyn . 
 nesan willað ge andrædan dead feþa , 
 fæge ferhðlocan . fyrst wesan æt ende 
 læn lifes . ge wesan lar god 
 abroden of breost . ic on betera rædan , 
 þæt ge gewurðien wuldor aldor , 
 and ge liffrea lissa biddan , 
 sigorian gesynto , þær ge siðien . 
 þes wesan se ecea abrahames god , 
 frumsceafta frea , se þes fyrd wereð , 
 modig and mægenrof , mid þære micel hand . " 
 hof þe for here hlud stefn 
 lifigendra þeon , þu he toh leode sprecan : 
 " hwæt#2 , ge nu eage toh on lociað , 
 folc leofost , færwundra sum , 
 hu ic self slean and þes swiðre hand 
 grene tacn garsecges deop . 
 yð up færeð , ofost wyrceð 
 wæter wealfæsten weg syndon dryge , 
 hasu herestræta , holm ryman , 
 eald staðolas , þu ic ær nesan gefrignan 
 ofer middangeard mann gefere . 
 fah feld , þu forþ heonan 
 in ece tidan yðe þeссean , 
 sælan sægrund . suðwind forniman , 
 bæðweges blæst . brim wesan areafod , 
 sand sæcir span . ic witan soð gear 
 þæt ge mihtig god milts gecyðde , 
 eorl ærglade . ofest wesan selost 
 þæt ge of feond fæðme weorðen , 
 nu se agend up aræran 
 read stream in randgebeorh . 
 syndon þu foreweallas fæger gestepte , 
 wrætlicu wægfaru , oþ wolcn hrof . " 
 æfter þæm word werod eall arisan , 
 modig mægen . merian stille bidan . 
 hebban herecyste hwit linde , 
 segnas on sande . sæweall astigan , 
 uplang gestandan wiþ israhelum 
 andægne fyrst . wesan seon eorl gedriht 
 an mod , 
 fæst fæðmum freoðowære healdan . 
 nalles hige gehyrdan halig lar , 
 siððan leof leoþ læstan near 
 swegan swiðrode and sances blandan . 
 þu þæt feorþa cyn fyrmest gan , 
 wod on wægstream , wigan on heap , 
 ofer grene grund , iudisc feða 
 on orette on uncuþ gelad 
 for hit mægwinum . swa him mihtig god 
 se dægweorc deop lean forgieldan , 
 siððan him gesælan sigorworca hreð , 
 þæt he ealdordom aginnan sculan 
 ofer cynerice , cneowmaga blæd . 
 habban him toh segne , þu hi on sund stigan , 
 ofer bordhreoðan beacen aræran 
 in þæm garheape , gylden leon , 
 drihtfolca micel , deore cenost . 
 be þæm herewisan hynðo nesan willan 
 be him lifigendum lange þolian , 
 þonne hi toh guðe garwudu ræran 
 ðeoda ænigre . þracu wesan on ore , 
 heard handplega , hægsteald modig 
 wæpnian wælslihtes , wigend unforht , 
 bilswaðu blodig , beadumægnes ræs , 
 grimhelm gegrind , þær iudas for . 
 æfter þære fyrd flotian modgade , 
 rubenes sunu . randas beran 
 sæwicingas ofer sealten mersc , 
 mannian menio ; micel angetrum 
 gan unforht . he hit ealdordom 
 synn aswebban , þæt he siðor for 
 on leof last . him on leodsceare 
 frumbearnes rihtan freobroðor oðþah , 
 eadan and æðele ; he wesan gearu swa þiсgan . 
 þær forþ æfter him folc þryðum 
 sunu simeones sweota cuman ; 
 þridde þeodmægen ( þufas windan 
 ofer garfare ) guðcyste onþrang 
 deawig sceaftum . dægwoma becuman 
 ofer garsecge , god beacnian sum , 
 morgen mæretorht ; mægen forþ gewitan . 
 þu þær folcmægen for æfter oðer , 
 isernhergum . on wisian 
 mægenþrymmum micel , þywan he mære wearð , 
 on forðwegas folc æfter wolcn , 
 cynn æfter cynn . cuðe æghwilc 
 mægburga rihtan , swa him moises beodan , 
 eorl æðele . him wesan on fæder , 
 leof leodfruma , landriht geþiсgan , 
 frod on ferhðe , freomagum leof . 
 cennan cneowsibbe cene mannian 
 heahfæder sum , halig þeon , 
 israela cyn , onriht god , 
 swa þæt orþanc eald reccað 
 þu þu mægburge micel gefrunon , 
 frumcyn feorh , fæderæðelo gehwæs . 
 niwe flod noe oferlað , 
 þrymfæst þeon , mid hit þri sunu , 
 se deopestan drencefloda 
 þær þu geweorþan on woruldrice . 
 habban him on hreðre halig treowe ; 
 forðam he gelædan ofer lagustreamas 
 maðmhorda micel , min gefræge . 
 on feorhgebeorh folde habban 
 eall eorðcynne ece laf , 
 frumcneow gehwæs , fæder and moder 
 tuddorteondra , geteled riman 
 mismicelra þonne mann cunnan , 
 snottor sæleoda . eacan þon sæd gehwilc 
 on bearm scip beorn ferian , 
 þær þu under heofon hæleð bryttigað . 
 swa þæt wise mann word secgað 
 þæt from noe nigoða wære 
 fæder abrahames on folctale . 
 þæt wesan se abraham se him engel god 
 naman niwe asceop ; eacan þon neah and feor 
 halig heap in gehyld bebeodan , 
 werþeoda geweald ; he on wræc libban . 
 siððan he gelædan leofost feorh 
 halig hæs ; heahlond stigan 
 sibgemagas , on seone beorgan . 
 wære hi þær findan , wuldor geseon , 
 halig heahtreowe , swa hæleð gefrunon . 
 þær eft se snottra sunu dauides , 
 wuldorfæst cyning , wittig lar 
 getimbrede templ god , 
 alh halig , eorðcyninga 
 se wisesta on woruldrice , 
 heahst and haligost , hæleðum gefrægost , 
 micel and mærost , þær þu mannian birnan , 
 firas æfter folde , folm gewyrсean . 
 toh þæm meðelstede magan gelædan 
 abraham isaac . adfyr onbran ; 
 fyrst ferhðbana no þywan fægen wesan . 
 willan se lastweard liсgan gesyllan , 
 in bælblyse beorn selost , 
 hit swæs sunu toh sigetibre , 
 ange ofer eorþ yrfelafe , 
 feorh frofor , þe he swa forþ gebidan , 
 leode toh laf , langsum hyht . 
 he þæt gecyðde , þu he se cniht geniman 
 fæstan mid folm , folccuð geteag 
 eald laf , ( ecg grymetode ) , 
 þæt he him lifdagas leofran nesan witan 
 þonne he hyrdan heofoncyninge . 
 up aræmde abraham þu ; 
 se eorl willan slean eaferan sinnan 
 unweaxenne , ecgum reodan 
 magan mid mece , gif he metod lætan . 
 nesan willan him beorht fæder birnan ætniman , 
 halig tiber , acan mid hand befon . 
 þu him styran cuman stefn of heofon , 
 wuldor hleoðor , word æfter sprecan : 
 " nesan slean þu , abraham , þu ongeagn birnan , 
 sunu mid sweord ! soð wesan gecyðed , 
 nu þu cunnian cyning alwihta , 
 þæt þu wiþ waldend wære healdan , 
 fæstan treowe , seon þu freoðo sculan 
 in lifdagum lengest weorðan , 
 awa toh ald unswiciendo . 
 hu þurfan mann sunu micel treowe gewinnan 
 nesan behwylfan mæg heofon and eorþ 
 hit wuldor word , widdra and siddra 
 þonne befæðman mæge folde sceatt , 
 eorþ ymbhwyrft and uprodor , 
 garsecges gin and þes geomor lyft . 
 he að swereð , engel þeon , 
 wyrd waldend and wereda god , 
 soþfæst sigorian , þurh hit sylfes lif , 
 þæt þin cynn and cneowmaga , 
 randwiggendra , riman nesan cunnan , 
 ieldo ofer eorþ , ealle cræftan 
 toh gesecgenne soð word , 
 nymðe hwylc se snottor in sefa weorðe 
 þæt he ana mæge ealle geriman 
 stan on eorþ , steorra on heofon , 
 sæbeorga sand , sealtan yða ; 
 acan hi gesittað be sæ tweonum 
 oþ egipte incaðeode 
 land cananea , leode þin , 
 freobearn fæder , folc selost . " 
 folc wesan afæran , flodegsa becuman 
 gast geomor , geofon deaðe hwopan . 
 wesan beorhhliðu blod besteman , 
 holm heolfre spiwan , hream wesan on yðum , 
 wæter wæpnian ful , wælmist astigan . 
 wesan egypte eft oncyrde , 
 fleon forhtian , fær ongeton , 
 willan herebleaðe ham findan , 
 gylp wearð gnornra . him ongeagn genap 
 atol yða gewealcan , nesan þær ænig becuman 
 here toh ham , acan behindan belucan 
 wyrdan mid wegan . þær ær weg liсgan , 
 merian modgode , mægen wesan adrenced . 
 stream standan , storm up gewitan 
 heah toh heofon , herewopa micel . 
 laðe cyrmdon , ( lyft up geswearc ) , 
 fæge stæfnum , flod blod gewadan . 
 randbyrig wesan rofene , rodor swipode 
 meredeaða micel , modig sweltan , 
 cyning on corðre , cyre swiðrode 
 sæ æt ende . wigbord scinan 
 heah ofer hæleðum , holmweall astigan , 
 merestream modig . mægen wesan on cwealm 
 fæstan gefeterod , forðganges wegan 
 searu æsæled , sand basnian , 
 witod fyrd , hwonne waðema stream , 
 sincalda sæ , sealt yðum 
 æflastum gewunian ece staðulas , 
 nacud nydboda , neosan cuman , 
 fah feðegast , se þu feond geneop . 
 wesan seon hæwene lyft heolfre geblandan , 
 brim berstan blodegesan hwopan , 
 sæmann sið , oðþæt soð metod 
 þurh moyses hand modig ryman , 
 wid wæðde , wælfæðmum swapan . 
 flod famgode , fæge crinсgan , 
 lah land gefeallan , lyft wesan onhreran , 
 wican weallfæsten , wægas berstan , 
 meltan meretorras , þu se mihtig slean 
 mid halig hand , heofonrices weard , 
 on werbeamas . wlanc ðeode 
 nesan mihton forhabban helpendra pað , 
 merestreames mod , acan he manig gesceod 
 gyllende gryre . garsecg wedd , 
 up ateon , on slupan . egesa standan , 
 weallan wælbenna . witrod gefeallan 
 heah of heofon handweorc god , 
 famigbosma flodwearde slean , 
 unhleowan wegan , ald mece , 
 þæt se deaðdrepe drihte swefan , 
 synfullra sweot . sawol linnan 
 fæstan befarene , flodblac herian , 
 siððan hi on bugan brun ypping , 
 modewæga micel . mægen eall gedreas 
 þe gedrencte wesan dugoð egypta , 
 faraon mid hit folc . he onfond hraðe , 
 siððan grund gestigan god andsaca , 
 þæt wesan mihtig mereflodes weard ; 
 willan heorufæðmum hild gesceadan , 
 yrre and egesfull . egyptum wearð 
 se dægweorc deop lean gesceod , 
 forðam se here ham eft nesan cuman 
 eall ungrundes ænig toh laf , 
 se sið hira secgan motan , 
 bodigean æfter burh bealospella micel , 
 hordwearda hryre , hæleða cwene , 
 acan þu mægenþreatas meredeað geswealh , 
 spelbodan eacan . se þu spedan agan , 
 ageat gylp wer . hi wiþ god winnan ! 
 þanan israhelum ece ræd 
 on merehwearfe moyses sægan , 
 heahþungen wer , halig sprecan , 
 deop ærende . dægword nemnað 
 swa git werðeode , on gewrit findað 
 dom gehwylc , þær þu him drihten bebeodan 
 on þæm siðfate soð word , 
 gif onlucan willan lifes wealhstod , 
 beorht in breost , banhuses weard , 
 ginfæsten god gast cægon . 
 run bið recenian , rædan forþ gæð , 
 hafað wislicu word on fæðme , 
 willan meagollice mod tæcan 
 þæt we gesne nesan syn god þeodscipes , 
 metod miltsian . he we micel onlyhð , 
 nu we boh betera secgað 
 lengra lifwynna . þes wesan lænan dream , 
 womm awyrgan , wreccum alyfan , 
 earm anbid . eðellease 
 þes gystsele gihðum healdað , 
 murnað on mod , manhus witan 
 fæstan under folde , þær bið fyr and wyrm , 
 open ece scræf . yfel gehwilc 
 swa nu regnþeofas romana dælað , 
 ieldo oððe ærdeað . eftwyrd cymð , 
 mægenþrymma micel ofer middangeard , 
 dæg dæd fah . drihten self 
 on þæm meðelstede manig demeð , 
 þonne he soðfæstra sawol lædeð , 
 eadig gast , on uprodor , 
 þær wesan sunnan and lif , eacan þon lissa blæd ; 
 dugoð on dream drihten herigað , 
 werod wuldorcyning , toh wid feorh . 
 swa reordian ræde gemyndig 
 mannian mildost , miht swiðed , 
 hlud stefn ; herian stille bidan 
 witod willan , wundor ongeton , 
 modig muðhæl ; he toh mænegum sprecan : 
 " micel wesan þes menigu , mægenwisa trum , 
 fullesta micel , se þes faru lædeð ; 
 hafað we on cananea cyn gelyfan 
 burh and beah , brad romana ; 
 willan nu gelæstan þæt he lange hettan 
 mid aðsware , engel drihten , 
 in fyrndagum fæderyncynne , 
 gif ge gehealdað halig lar , 
 þæt ge feond gehwone forþ ofergangað , 
 gesittað sigerice be sæ tweonum , 
 beorsele beorn . bið ge blæd micel ! " 
 æfter þæm word werod wesan on sal , 
 singan sigebyman , ( segnas standan ) , 
 on fæger swegan ; folc wesan on land , 
 habban wuldor beam werud lædan , 
 halig heap , on hild god . 
 lif gefegon þu hi oðlæded habban 
 feorh of feond dom , þiсgan þu hi hit frecne geneðdon , 
 wer under wæterian hrofas . geseon hi þær weall standan , 
 ealle him brim blodig þynсan , þurh þu hira beadosearo wegan . 
 hreðdon hildespelle , siððan hi þæm here wiðforon ; 
 hebban hereþreatas hlud stefn , 
 for þæm dædweorce drihten herian , 
 wer wuldor singan ; wif on oðer , 
 folcsweota micel , fyrdleoð golan 
 acol stefn , eallwundra fela . 
 þu wesan eðfynde afrisc meowle 
 on geofon staðe gold geweorðod . 
 hand hebban halswurðunge , 
 bliðe wesan , bot geseon , 
 hedan herereafes , hæftan wesan onsæled . 
 onginnan sælafe segnum dælan 
 on yðlafe , eald madmas , 
 reofan and randas . heo on rihtan sceþþan 
 gold and godweb , iosepes gestreon , 
 wer wuldorgesteald . werigend liсgan 
 on deaðstede , drihtfolca micel . 
 
 for þæm nedfere næni wyrþeþ 
 þances snotera , þonne him þurfan su 
 toh gehicgenne ær hit heonengange 
 hwæt#2 hit gast god oþþe yfel 
 æfter deaþ heonan deman weorþan . 
 
 ic wesan halgungboc ; healdan he dryhten 
 þu me fæger þus frætewum beleсgan . 
 þureð toh þance þus hettan me wyrcean , 
 toh loue and toh weorþ , þæm þu sunnan gesceppan . 
 gemyndi wesan he miht gehwylcre 
 se þu he on folde gefremian mæg , 
 and him geþancie þeod waldend 
 se þu he on gemynd madma manig 
 wyle gemearcian metod toh lacu ; 
 and he sculan æce lean ealle findan 
 se þu he on folde fremaþ toh ryhte . 
 
 þonne gemiltsað þu , næs . , mund qui regit , 
 ðeoda þrymcyningc thronum sedentem 
 wifcynn butan ende 
 saule þinne 
 geunnan þu on lif auctor pacis 
 sibb gesælða , salus mundi , 
 metod se mære magna uirtute , 
 and se soðfæsta summi filius 
 fon on fultuman , factor cosmi , 
 se of æþele wesan uirginis partu 
 clæne acennan christus in orbem , 
 metod þurh marian , mundi redemptor , 
 and þurh se halig gast . uoca frequenter 
 biddan helpes he , clemens deus , 
 se onsendan wesan summo de throno 
 and þære clæne clara uoce 
 þu gebyrd bodade bona uoluntate 
 þæt heo sculan cennan christum regem , 
 eall cyning cyningc , casta uiuendo . 
 and þu þu soðfæstan supplex rogo , 
 fultum biddan friclo uirginem almum , 
 and þær æfter toh omnes sancti 
 bliðmod biddan , beatus etan iustus , 
 þæt hi ealle þu unica uoce 
 þingian toh þeodne thronum regentem , 
 æcum drihten , alta polorum , 
 þæt he þin saule , summus iudex , 
 onfon freolice , factor aeternus , 
 and he gelædan lucan perhennem , 
 þær eadig animæ sanctæ 
 romana restað regnian caelorum . 
 
 hwæt#2 ! ic swefnian cyþan secgan wylle , 
 hwæt#2 me gemætan toh midd niht 
 siððan reordberend restan wunedon . 
 þynсan me þæt ic geseon sylliс treow 
 on lyft lædan , sunnan bewindan , 
 beam beorhtost . eall þæt beacen wesan 
 begeotan mid gold . gimm standan 
 fæger æt folde sceat , swilce þær fife wesan 
 uppe on þæm eaxlgespanne . behealdan þær engel dryhten ealle 
 fæger þurh forðgesceaft . nesan wesan þær huru fracodes gealga , 
 acan he þær behealdan halig gast , 
 mann ofer molde , and eall þes mære gesceaft . 
 syllic wesan se sigebeam , and ic synn fah , 
 forwunded mid womm . geseon ic wuldor treow , 
 wædum geweorðode , wynn scinan , 
 gyrwan mid gold ; gimm habban 
 bewrigene weorðlice wealdende treow . 
 hwæðre ic þurh þæt gold ongytan magan 
 earm ærgewin , þæt hit ærest onginnan 
 swætan on þu swiðran healf . eall ic wesan mid sorh gedrefan , 
 forht ic wesan for þære fæger gesiht . geseon ic þæt fus beacen 
 wendan wædum and bleo : hwilum hit wesan mid wæt besteman , 
 beswyled mid swat gangan , hwilum mid sincan gyrwan . 
 hwæðre ic þær licgan lange hwil 
 behealdan hreowcearig hælend treow , 
 oððæt ic gehyrdan þæt hit hleoðrode . 
 onginnan þu word sprecan wudu selesta : 
 " þæt wesan gear iu ( ic þæt gyte gemunan ) 
 þæt ic wesan aheawan holtes on ende , 
 astyrian of stefn minum . genaman me þær strang feond , 
 gewyrсean him þær toh wæfersyne , hatan me hira wergas hebban . 
 beran me þær beorn on eaxl , oððæt hi me on beorgan asettan . 
 gefæstnian me þær feond genoh . geseon ic þu frea mancynn 
 efstan ellen mycle— þæt he me willan on gestigan . 
 þær ic þu nesan durran ofer dryhten word 
 bugan oððe berstan , þu ic bifian geseon 
 eorþ sceat . ealle ic miht 
 feond gefyllan , hwæðre ic fæstan standan . 
 ongyrede he þu geong hæleð— þæt wesan god ælmihtig— 
 strang and stiðmod . gestigan he on gealga hean , 
 modig on manig gesiht , þu he willan mancyn lysan . 
 bifian ic þu me se beornan ymbclypte . nesan durran ic hwæðre bugan toh eorþ , 
 fealle toh folde sceat , acan ic sculan fæstan standan . 
 rod wesan ic aræran . ahebban ic riсe cyning , 
 heofon hlaford . hyldan me nesan durran . 
 þurhdrifan hi me mid deorc næglum— on me syndon þu dolg gesiene , 
 open inwidhlemmas . nesan durran ic hira nænig sceððan . 
 bysmeredon hi wit butu ætgædere . eall ic wesan mid blod besteman , 
 begeotan of se guma side , siððan he habban hit gast onsendan . 
 feala ic on þæm beorgan gebidan habban 
 wrað wyrd . geseon ic weruda god 
 þearle þenian . þystre habban 
 bewrigen mid wolcn wealdende hræw , 
 scirne sciman , sceadu forþ gan , 
 winnan under wolcn . wepan eal gesceaft , 
 cwiðdon cyning fyllan . crist wesan on rode . 
 hwæðere þær fus feorran cwoman 
 toh þæm æðelinge . ic þæt eall behealdan . 
 sar ic wesan mid sorh gedrefan , hnigan ic hwæðre þæm secg toh hand , 
 eaðmod ellen mycle . geniman hi þær ælmihtig god , 
 ahebban he of ðam hefian wite . forlætan me þu hilderincas 
 standan steame bedrifan ; eall ic wesan mid strælum forwundian . 
 aledon hi þær limwerigne , gestandan him æt hit lices heafod , 
 behealdan hi þær heofenes dryhten , and he he þær hwil restan , 
 meðe æfter ðam micel gewinnan . onginnan him þu moldern wyrcan 
 beorn on bana gesiht ; сeorfan hi þæt of beorht stane , 
 gesettan hi ðæron sigorian wealdend . onginnan him þu sorhleoð galan 
 earm on þu æfentid . þu hi willan eft siðian , 
 meðe fram þæm mære þeodne . restan he þær mætan weorod . 
 hwæðere we þær greotan god hwil 
 standan on staðole , siððan stefn up gewitan 
 hilderinca . hræw colian , 
 fæger feorgbold . þu we munan fyllan onginnan 
 ealle toh eorþ . þæt wesan egeslic wyrdan ! 
 bedelfan we munan on deop seaþe . hwæðre me þær dryhten þegn , 
 freond gefrunon , 
 gyrwan me gold and seolfor . 
 nu þu miht gehyran , hæleð min se libban , 
 þæt ic bealuwara weorc gebidan habban , 
 sar sorh . wesan nu sælan cuman 
 þæt me weorðiað wid and side 
 mann ofer molde , and eall þes mære gesceaft , 
 gebiddan him toh þes beacn . on me birnan god 
 þrowian hwil . forðam ic þrymfæst nu 
 hlifian under heofenum , and ic hælan mæg 
 æghwylс an , þær þu him bið egesian toh me . 
 iu ic wesan weorþan wite heardost , 
 leode laðost , ærþan ic him lifes wegan 
 riht gerymde , reordberend . 
 hwæt#2 , me þu geweorðode wuldor ealdor 
 ofer holtwudu , heofonrices weard , 
 swilce swa he hit modor eacan , marian self , 
 ælmihtig god for ealle mann 
 geweorðode ofer eall wifian cynn . 
 nu ic þu hatan , hæleð min se libban , 
 þæt þu þes gesiht secg mann , 
 onwreon word þæt hit wesan wuldor beam , 
 se þu ælmihtig god on þrowian 
 for mancynn manig synn 
 and adomes ealdgewyrhtum . 
 deað he þær byrigde , hwæðere eft dryhten arisan 
 mid hit micel miht mann toh helpan . 
 he þe on heofenas astag . hider eft fundian 
 on þes middangeard mancynn sec 
 on domdæge dryhten self , 
 ælmihtig god , and hit engel mid , 
 þæt he þonne willan deman , se agan dom geweald , 
 an gehwylc swa he him ærur heran 
 on þes læn lif geearnaþ . 
 nesan mæg þær ænig unforht wese 
 for þæm word þu se wealdend cwyð . 
 frineð he for þære mænige hwær se munan wesan , 
 se þu for dryhten naman deaðes willan 
 biter onbyrigan , swa he ær on ðam beam dydan . 
 acan hi þonne forhtiað , and fea þencaþ 
 hwæt#2 hi toh criste cweðan onginnan . 
 nesan þurfan þær þonne ænig anforht wese 
 þu him ær in breost bereð beacnian sellan , 
 acan þurh þe rode sculan romana gesecan 
 of eorðwege æghwylc sawel , 
 seon þu mid wealdende wunian þenceð . " 
 gebiddan ic me þu toh þan beam bliðe mod , 
 ellen mycle , þær ic ana wesan 
 mætan werian . wesan modsefa 
 afysed on forðwege , feala eall gebidan 
 langunghwila . wesan me nu lifes hyht 
 þæt ic se sigebeam sec motan 
 ana oft þonne ealle mann , 
 well weorþian . me wesan willian toh ðam 
 micel on mod , and min mundbyrd wesan 
 gerihtan toh þære rode . nagan ic riсe feala 
 freond on folde , acan hi forþ heonan 
 gewitan of weorold dream , sœ̄сan him wuldor cyning , 
 lifian nu on heofenum mid heahfæder , 
 wunian on wuldor , and ic wennan me 
 dæg gehwylc hwanne me dryhten rod , 
 þu ic heran on eorþ ær sceawian , 
 on þysson lænan lif gefetige 
 and me þonne gebringan þær wesan blis micel , 
 dream on heofon , þær wesan dryhten folc 
 settan toh simble , þær wesan singal blis , 
 and me þonne asettan þær ic siððan motan 
 wunian on wuldor , well mid þæm halig 
 dream brucan . seon me dryhten freond , 
 se þu heran on eorþe ær þrowian 
 on þæm gealgtreowe for guma synn . 
 he we onlysan and we lif forgifan , 
 heofonliс ham . hyht wesan geniwad 
 mid bled and mid bliss þæm þu þær bryne þolodan . 
 se sunu wesan sigorfæst on þæm siðfate , 
 mihtig and spedig , þu he mid manigeo cuman , 
 gast weorod , on god romana , 
 anweald ælmihtig , engel toh bliss 
 and eall ðam halig þæm þu on heofon ær 
 wunedon on wuldor , þu hira wealdend cuman , 
 ælmihtig god , þær hit eðel wesan . 
 
 sorh cymeð 
 manig and mislic in mannian dream . 
 eorl oðer mid æfþancum 
 and mid teonwordum tæleð behindan , 
 spreceð fæger beforan , and þæt facen swa þiсgan 
 hafað in hit heorte , hord unclæne . 
 byð þonne se womm gewita weoruda dryhten . 
 forðam se witiga cweðan : 
 " nesan syl þu me ætsomne mid þæm synfull 
 in wite forwyrd , weoruda dryhten , 
 nesan me on lif forleosan mid þæm ligewyrhtum , 
 þæm þu ful smeðe sprecan habbað , 
 and in gastcofan grimman geþoht , 
 gehatað holdlice , swa hyra hyht nesan gæð , 
 wære mid weler . " wea bið in mod , 
 siofa synn fah , sar geblonden , 
 gefyllan mid facn , þiсgan he fæger word 
 utan ætywe . ænlice beoð , 
 swa þe beon berað buta ætsomne 
 arlicne anleofan , and ætterne tægel 
 hafað on hindan , hunig on muðe , 
 wynsum wist . hwilum wundian 
 sar mid stingan , þonne se sælan cymeð . 
 swa bioð gelice þu leas mann , 
 þu þu mid tunge treowe gehatan 
 fæger word , facenlice þencaþ , 
 þonne hi æt nihsta nearu beswican , 
 hafað on gehat hunigsmæc , 
 smeðne sybcwide , and in siofan innan 
 þurh deofol cræftan dyrne wund . 
 swa wesan nu þes middangeard mane geblonden , 
 wanað and weaxeð . wacað se eald , 
 dweleð and drefeð dæg and niht 
 milts mid mane , mægene getryweð , 
 ehteð æfest , inwit saweð , 
 nið mid geneahe . nænig oðer 
 freoð in fyrhðe nimþe fearh hwylc , 
 þæt he soþlice sybbe healdan , 
 gastlice lufu , swa him god bebeodan . 
 forðam eallunga hyht geceoseð , 
 weorold wynsum , se þu wis nesan bið , 
 snottor , searocræftig sawol ræde . 
 witon toh þæm betera , nu we bot cunnan , 
 hycgan and hyhtan , þæt we heofon sunnan 
 uppe mid engel aginnan motan 
 gast toh geoc , þonne god willan 
 eorþ lifes ende gewyrcan ! 
 
 pater noster qui es in cælis . 
 fæder manncynn , frofor ic þu biddan , 
 halig drihten , þu þu on heofon wesan . 
 sanctificetur niman tuum . 
 þæt su halgian , hygecræftum fæstan , 
 þu nama nu þe , nerian crist , 
 in ure ferhðlocan fæstan gestaðelod . 
 adueniat regn tuum . 
 cuman nu toh mann , miht wealdend , 
 þu romana toh we , rihtwis dema , 
 and þin geleafa in lifdæge 
 fiat uolontas twiwa sicut in cælo etan in terra . 
 on ure mod mære þurhwunian . 
 and þu willian mid we weorðe læstan 
 on eardung eorþ rices , 
 swa hluttor wesan in heofonwuldor , 
 wynn gewlitegod wifcynn toh weorold forþ . 
 panem nostrum cotidianum da nobis hodie . 
 syl we nu toh dæge , drihten guma , 
 heofena heahcyning , hlaf yrnan , 
 se þu onsendan sawol toh hæle 
 on middaneard mannian cynn ; 
 þæt wesan se clæne crist , drihten god . 
 etan dimitte nobis debita nostra . 
 forgyf we , guma weard , gyltas and synn , 
 and ure leahtras alet , lices wundian 
 and mandæde , swa we milde wiþ þu , 
 ælmihtig god , oft abylgeað , 
 sicut etan nos dimittimus debitoribus nostris . 
 swa swa we forlætað leahtras on eorþe 
 þæm þu wiþ we oft agyltað , 
 and him womdæde witan nesan þencað 
 for earnunge ecan lifes . 
 etan no nos inducas in temptationem . 
 nesan lædan þu we toh wite in wea sorh 
 nesan in costunge , crist nerigende , 
 þywan læs we arleas eall þinne mildsa 
 þurh feondscipe fremde weorðan . 
 sed libera nos wifcynn malo . 
 and wiþ yfele gefreo we eacan nu þe 
 feond gehwilc ; we in ferhðlocan , 
 þeon engel , ðanc and wuldor , 
 soð sigedrihten , secgað georne , 
 se þu þu we milde miht alysan 
 fram hæftnyde hellewite . 
 amen . 
 weorðe þæt . 
 
 wesan ðeos burch breome geond breotenrice , 
 steppa gestaðolad , stan ymbutan 
 wundor gewæxen . weor ymbeornad , 
 ea yðum stronge , and ðer inne wunað 
 feola fisс kyn on flod gemonge . 
 and þær gewexen wesan wudafæstern micel ; 
 wuniad in ðem wycum wilde deor manig , 
 in deop dæl deore ungerim . 
 wesan in ðere byri eacan bearn gecyðed 
 þu arfesta eadig cudberch 
 and þes clene cyning heafud , 
 osuualdes , engel leon , and aidan bisceop , 
 eadberch and eadfrið , æðele gefere . 
 wesan ðer inne midd hi æðelwold bisceop 
 and breoma bocere bedu , and boisil abbot , 
 þu clene cudberte on gecheðe 
 lerde lust , and he hit lar wel geniman . 
 eardiæð æt ðem eadig in in ðem minstre 
 unarimeda reliquia , 
 þær monia wundor gewurðað , þes þu writan seggeð , 
 midd ðene drihnes wer dom bideð . 
 
 wesan on ealddagum israheala folc 
 þurh moysen , mære lareow , 
 anlyht and gelared , swa he lifes frea , 
 heofna heahcyning , heran on lif 
 þurh hit sylfes word settan for leode , 
 rinc toh ræde , and him runian gescead 
 self asecgan , hu he se soþ wegan 
 leof leodscipe læran sculan . 
 þu se leode fruma lar fylgean 
 heofena heahcyninges , and þu hæleþ samod , 
 swa hi on leodscipe lærede wesan ; 
 gif hi wancule weorc onginnan , 
 hi se of heofon hearm toh lean 
 asendan sigorian god , and hi sona toh him 
 fryþa wilnodan and þær findan raþe , 
 gif hi leohtras hira letan gewyrpan . 
 feala wesan mægena þu se mære þeodan 
 on þæm herescype healdan and wyrсean , 
 þendan hi lifes frea lufian willan ; 
 acan him se ende wearð earm and þrealic , 
 þu hi besyrwan silf dryhten , 
 on beam settan and toh byrgenn 
 gedemdon ; he þær bedigled wesan , 
 and þywan þryddan dæge þeod ætywan . 
 we þæt gehyrdan hæleþ mænige 
 on bocstæf breme and writan , 
 þæt hi fæsten feower healdan 
 and þonne offredan unmæne neotan , 
 þæt wesan lamb oþþe styrc , leof toh tacn 
 þu for weorold wesan womm bedælan . 
 acan arisan onginnan rices ealdor 
 of byrgenn , blæd gefyllan , 
 and mid heofenwarum ham geseсan , 
 eard mid engel , and we eall se 
 hyht and gehateð , gif we hit willian 
 þurh riht sefa ræde fyligan . 
 na þær in cumeð atele gefyllan , 
 womm wesan , acan scal on wyrdan sceacan . 
 nu we herian sceolan heran for lif 
 deoren dædfruman , and him gear geriman 
 ælmesdædum ure gefyllan , 
 and on fæsten , swa se frod iu 
 moyses mælan , and we þu mearc sceolan 
 heoldan higefæste mid anglum , 
 swa hi gebrefde we beornan on rome , 
 gregorius , guma papa . 
 we þæt forma sceolan fæsten heowan 
 on þære ær wucan lengtenes , 
 on þæm monaþ þu munan martius 
 geond romwara romana nemneð , 
 and þær twelfe sceolan torht dihtan 
 runian geræde in se rican hofe , 
 heofon heahcyninges , herian mid sang , 
 wlanc weorþian wuldor brytta . 
 ofer þu eastertid oþer fæsten 
 ys toh bremenne brytena leode 
 mid gelica lof , þu gelesen hafað 
 on þære wucan þu æfter cumeð 
 þæm sunnandæg þu geond sid wang 
 pentecostenes dæg preost nemnað , 
 on þæm monaþ , se þu me þinceð , 
 þu munan iunius gear nemnan . 
 þonne wesan þæt þrydde þingian gehwelces 
 fæsten on folde fyr bearn 
 dihtan gelica on þæm deore hofe 
 toh brymenne beorht sang 
 on þære wucan þu ærur byð 
 emnihtes dæge æled beorn , 
 on þæm monaþ , min gefræge , 
 þu munan september genemneð . 
 we þæt feorþe sceolen fæsten gelæstan 
 on þære wucan þu bið ærur full 
 dryhten gebyrde , and we mid deoren scylan 
 word and weorc wuldor cyninge 
 in þu ilca tidan eall gemynd 
 þeodne deman þingian gehwilc , 
 efne swa swa ær , and se arwesan 
 leof leode frea lifes biddan . 
 on þes fæsten wesan se feorþa dæg 
 and sixta samod seofoþa getinge 
 toh gelæstanne lifes ealdor 
 and toh bremenne bocian geryne 
 emb þu nigoþan tyd ; nan wesan on eorþe , 
 butan he unhæl on geþreatige , 
 þu motan , hætan , oþþe wæt ærur þingan , 
 se þu we bocian don þeodlic demeð . 
 gif þu þonne secgan suþan cymen 
 brytta franca , þæt þu gebannan sceole 
 heran on eorþe ænig healdan , 
 se þu moyses iu mælan toh leode , 
 na þu se andfeng æfre gewyrþe , 
 acan þu þæt self healdan þæt þu suþan cuman 
 from romana rices hyrdan , 
 gregoriæ , guma papa . 
 þus he gesette self and dyhte 
 þu þenung , þeodlareow , 
 fæstendtida ; we þæm forþ nu git 
 geond engel land est filiað . 
 swa he æt þæm setl self gedemde , 
 sanct petres preost siððan 
 lange lifes tyd leordun þæt self , 
 þæt þu oþrum nesan sculan æfre filian . 
 eacan we feowertig dæg fæsten healdan 
 ær þæm ærist ure dryhten , 
 þæt nu lengtentid leode nemnað , 
 and hit ærest onginnan eorl se god , 
 mære moyses , ær he on munt styge ; 
 he þæt fæsten healdan feowertig dæg 
 and nyhta samod , swa he nahtes anbat 
 ær he þu deore æ dryhten anfenge . 
 him þær gesellan self dryhten 
 breme bocian cræftan , bæle behlæned , 
 of hit halig hand gescrifene , 
 hettan he leode se leoran and tæcan 
 elda orþanc eall toh tacn , 
 þæt we mid fæsten magan freogan gewinnan 
 and þu deop dryhten gerynu , 
 þu þu leoran sceolan leode gehwylc , 
 gif we þære duguþ hwæt#2 dryhten sylleð . 
 eft helias , eorl se mære , 
 him on westen witan geþigede , 
 þær him symbelbread somod mid wæter 
 dryhten engel sum dihtan togeanes , 
 and se gestrangud wearð styþum gyfle 
 toh gefæstenne feowertig dæg 
 and nihtian samod , swa he nahtes anbat 
 ær he on horeb dun hali feran . 
 witon þæt gerine rihte gehicgan , 
 þæt se mære þicgan miht nesan habban 
 toh astigenne stæppon on ypplen 
 ær him þæt symbel weorþan sellan fram engel . 
 we wesan on westen wuldor bliss 
 on þæm ænete eall gefea ; 
 nu wesan helpes tidan , halig dryhten , 
 hu we munt þinne mære gestygan . 
 wesan for engel tellan eorþbugendum 
 þu þu dryhten word dæd lærað . 
 we þu andlifene ofost þycgen 
 and se deore wist , dryhten lar ; 
 witon fæstan swa fyren dæd 
 on forhæfenesse heran for lif , 
 þæt we se munt mægen mærþa gestigan 
 swa se eald dydan elias iu . 
 wesan toh hicganne hu se halig gewitan 
 of þes wangstede wuldor neosian ; 
 he fyren scryd feower mære 
 wlangum wicgum on wegan ferian 
 on neorxnawong , þær we nergend crist 
 hatan hafað ham mid bliss , 
 gif we þæt fæsten heran fyren gelæstað 
 and se uplican æþel secað . 
 nu wesan æt nihsta þæt we nergend crist , 
 halig heofenes weord , heolp and læran . 
 he he dyppan lætan deore þweal , 
 fulwiht bæðe , fyren bedælan , 
 and he feowertig dæg firsude mettas , 
 eacan nihtian swa feala nanuht gyltig , 
 leode toh lar , þæt hi on lengten sceolan 
 efen feowertig dæg fæsten hewan . 
 he costude þær cristes gewinn 
 on þæm ænete eald and fretan , 
 geseon mære frea mann geliс 
 and þu wenan onginnan , womm gemyndig , 
 þæt he stræla hit stellan miht 
 on þæm lichoman ; næs se leahtra nan , 
 acan on hinder gewitan hearmes brytta , 
 and þær engel hyra ealdor sohtan . 
 higesynnig munan , gif þu susl weard 
 costian durran , þonne he crist dydan , 
 wereda wulderfrean , womm leas , 
 nesan mæg he se inne ahwæt scotian 
 gif he myrcels nabban manes æt ege , 
 acan he on hinder scriþan , and þu halig 
 engel ærfæste æghwær helpað , 
 gif þu dryhten heran dæd fylgan . 
 habban we nu mearcian hu þu mære iu 
 feowertig dæg fæsten hewdon , 
 and we bebeodað þurh beornan god 
 þæt mannian gehwilc þu for molde wunað 
 ær þæm æreste ure dryhten 
 efen feowertig dæg fæsten hewe 
 oþ þu nigoþan tidan , and he na brucan 
 flæsces oþþe fyrn , þæ læs þu he fah wese . 
 sceolan sacerd singan mæsse , 
 dæghwamlice dryhten biddan 
 on þæm fæsten þæt he freond wese 
 folc gynd folde , and þu fyrn sceolan 
 þæm sacerdan secgan gehwilce 
 and þu dymnissa dæd betan 
 word and weorc , wuldor ealdor 
 þurh ælmesdæde eall gegladian . 
 þonne wesan þurfan micel þeod mænium 
 þæt þu sacerdos self nesan gyltan , 
 nesan on leahtrum hira ligegen toh fæstan . 
 hwæt mæg þyngian þreale hwilc 
 wiþ hit arwesan , gif he him ærur hæfð 
 biter onbolgen , and se bot nesan deð , 
 acan þu æbyligþe ealdere wroht , 
 dæghwamlice dæd niwað gewinnan 
 gif se sacerd he silf nesan cunnan 
 þurh dryhten ege dugeþum healdan , 
 nu þu , folc mann , fyrn nesan gyme 
 þu halgian mann heran gefremme , 
 acan þu lar sculan lust fremman 
 ryhthicgennde þu he toh ræde tæchð , 
 drincan he him þæt drof oððe þæt dæghluttre 
 wæter of weсgan , þæt wesan wuldor lar . 
 acan ic secgan mæg , sorh hremig , 
 hu þu sacerd sacu niwiað , 
 dæghwamlice dryhten gremiað 
 and mid æfest ælс forlædað 
 þu him fylian wyle folc mannian ; 
 sona hi on mergan mæsse syngað 
 and forþegide , þurste bædan , 
 æfter tæppere teon geond stræt . 
 hwæt#2 ! hi leaslice leogan ongynnað 
 and se tæppere tyhtan gelome , 
 secgaþ þæt he synleas syllan motan 
 ostre toh etan and æþelu wyn 
 emb morgentyd , se þu me þingeð 
 þæt hund and wulf healdað þu ilca 
 wise on weorold and nesan wigliað 
 hwæne hi toh mos fon , mæða bedælan . 
 hi þonne sittan sadian aginnað , 
 sinnan semað , syllað gelome , 
 cweðað goddlife guma gehwilcum 
 þæt wine dreng welhwa motan , 
 siððan he mæsse hafað , meþig þicgan , 
 etan ostre eacan and oþer 
 fisc of flod 
 
 welund him be wurma wræc cunnade . 
 anhydig eorl earfoþe dreogan , 
 habban him toh gesiþþe sorh and longaþ , 
 wintercealde wræc , wea oft onfond , 
 siððan he niðhad on nede leсgan 
 swoncre seonobende on syllan monn . 
 se ofergan , þes swa mæg ! 
 beadohilde nesan wesan hyrian broþor deaþ 
 on sefa swa sar swa hyrian sylfre þingan : 
 þæt heo gearolice ongietan habban 
 þæt heo eacen wæs— æfre nesan magan 
 þriste geþencan , hu ymb þæt sculan . 
 se ofergan , þes swa mæg ! 
 we þæt mæðhilde monge gefrignan 
 wurdon grundleas geat friсgan , 
 þæt hi seon sorglufu slæpan ealle binom . 
 se ofergan , þes swa mæg ! 
 ðeodric agan þritig wintra 
 mæringa burg— þæt wesan monegum cuþ . 
 se ofergan , þes swa mæg ! 
 we geascodan eormanrices 
 wylfen þenсean ; agan wid folc 
 gotena rices . þæt wesan grim cyning . 
 sæt secg manig sorh gebunden , 
 wea on wenan , wyscan geneahhe 
 þæt se cynerice ofercuman wære . 
 se ofergan , þes swa mæg ! 
 siteð sorgcearig sæl bidæled , 
 on sefa sweorceð , self þinceð 
 þæt su endeleas earfoða dælan . 
 mæg þonne geþencan þæt geond þes weorold 
 witig dryhten wendan geneahhe , 
 eorle monegum are gesceawað , 
 wislicne blæd , sum wea dælan . 
 þæt ic bi me self secgan willan , 
 þæt ic hwil wesan heodeninga scieppan , 
 dryhten dyre . me wesan deor noma . 
 agan ic fela wintra folgað til , 
 hold hlaford , oþþæt heorrenda nu , 
 leoðcræftig monn londryht geþiсgan , 
 þæt me eorl hleo ær gesellan . 
 se ofergan , þes swa mæg ! 
 
 mildheortness and don mihtig drihten 
 singan and secg , and soð ongitan 
 on unwemme weсgan , hwanne þu me wylle toh . 
 ic mid unbealuwe eall heorte 
 þurh þin hus midde halig gan . 
 nesan settan ic me for eage yfele wise ; 
 ealle ic feogean facn wyrcend , 
 næs me wyngesið wiþerweard heorte . 
 ic awyrgan fram me wendan and cyrde ; 
 nyllan ic hira andgit ænig habban , 
 þu tælnessa teonan geneahhige 
 wiþ hira þæm nihsta nið ahofan ; 
 þær ic ehtan eall mid niðe . 
 oferhydegum eage , unsædre heorte , 
 nyllan ic mid þæm mann min mete ðicgean . 
 ofer geleaffull eorðbugende 
 eage min georne sceawedun , 
 hwær ic tirfæste treowe findan , 
 þu me simble mid sittan and gan ; 
 he me holdlice heran ðegnade . 
 nesan eardað on midle min hus , 
 þu oferhygd up ahebban 
 oþþe unriht cweþan ellen willan . 
 ic on morgenne ofslean manes wyrhta 
 ealle þu unriht ellen worhtan 
 and fyren fela fremman habbað ; 
 ealle ic þu of drihten drifan ceaster . ## þu min gebed , mære drihten , 
 gehyran , heofenes weard , and gehlyde min 
 toh þu becuman , þeod reccend . 
 na þu andwlitan æfre þinne 
 awendan fram me , wuldor ealdor ; 
 gif ic geswenced su , þu swæs toh me 
 þu eare onhyld and me ofestlice 
 gehyran , heofenes weard , helpys bena . 
 forðam dæg min dreosan syndan 
 smece gelice , and forspyrcende synd 
 min mearhcofan , se þu me þinceð , 
 swilce hi on cocerpannan coc gehyrstan . 
 ic wesan hege gelic , þæm þu hraðe weornað , 
 þonne hit byð amawyn mann folm ; 
 wesan min heorte eacan heard geswenced , 
 forðam ic ær forgitan , þæt ic etan sculan 
 min swete hlaf ; forðam me wesan swære stefn 
 hefig gnornian heorte getenge , 
 ætfeolen eacan min ban flæsc minum . 
 ic weorþan wesan pellicane gelic , 
 se on westen wunað ; witan ic eacan swiðe geare , 
 þæt ic nemnan eam nihthrefne gelic , 
 þu on scræf eardað , and ic spearuwan swa some 
 gelice gewearð , anlicum fugele . 
 hwæt#2 , me eall dæg edwitspræce on 
 min feond fæstan brohtan , 
 and þe me heredan ; hi me hræþ æfter 
 full swyþ eft swerigean onginnan . 
 forðam ic anlic ætt æscean hlaf , 
 and ic min drincan menсgan wiþ tear , 
 for andwlitan yrre þin ; 
 feor þu me ahebban and gehnæctest eft . 
 dæg min gedruran swa se deorcian scua , 
 and ic hege gelic , swa hit hraðe weornað . 
 þu on ecnes wunian awa , drihten ; 
 wunað þu gemynd , þenden weorold standeð . 
 arisan nu , mihtig god , miltsian sione ; 
 nu wesan hire helpan heahsæl cuman . 
 forðam se þancunga þin scealcas 
 ambyhtmæcgas ealle hæfdan , 
 forðam þu þu stiðlice stan and eorþ 
 eall ætgædere ær miltsadest . 
 forðam neodlice on naman þin 
 ealle eorðbuend egsan habbað , 
 and þu wuldor ongitað wise cyning . 
 eft timbrade ece drihten 
 and gesette sion þurh hit sylfes miht , 
 þær wesan gesyne hit seon soð spedan . 
 oft he þearfendra ben ðance gehyrdan , 
 and he nesan forhogode hira hold gebed . 
 þe wislice awriten standað 
 and on cneoressum cyðed syndan , 
 þæt he folc gesceppan ; fæger drihten 
 herað holdlice hror geþanc . 
 forðam he fæstlice forþ locade 
 of hit þæm hean halig setl ; 
 drihten geseon of heofenum heran on eorþ . 
 he þu gehyrdan heahgnornunge 
 se þu gebindan biter wesan , 
 and þe bealdlice birnan alysan 
 þær þu ofslegene sliþe wær . 
 þonne byð on sione secgan soð nama drihten , 
 and hit lof swilce , leode bearn , 
 on hierusalem gleawast and mærust . 
 cumað folc siððan feorran togædere 
 and rice eacan , þæt hraðe drihten 
 ful holdlice hyran siððan . 
 he him andwyrdeð eall sona 
 on weсgan weorold , þær hit gewis mægen 
 fæstan standeð : " ic þu feaw dæg 
 min mættra mod secg , 
 þæt þu me magan on midle min dagena 
 sona gecigean , gif þu self wylt . " 
 wesan þin an gear awa toh feorh . 
 æt fruma þu , drihten , gewyrсean 
 eorþe frætwe and upheofen ; 
 þæt wesan heahgeweorc hand þinne . 
 sweotule þu forweorðað and þu self wunian ; 
 eall forwisnað wædum anlice , 
 and þu hi onwendan , swa munan wrigels deð , 
 and hi beoð toh weorold wendan siððan . 
 þu þonne buan se ilca , se þu ær wære ; 
 nesan beoð winter þu wiht þu sæmra . 
 birnan þinne scealca heran buan niman , 
 and þær eardedan ealle þrage , 
 and hira sylfra cynn siððan toh feorh 
 on weorold weorold well gereссan . ## bletsian , min sawol , bliðe drihten , 
 and eall min innera hit se ecean naman . 
 bletsian , min sawol , beald dryhten , 
 nesan wylt þu ofergeottul æfre weorðan 
 eall god , þu he þu ær dydan . 
 he þin mandæde miltsade eall 
 and þin adl ealle gehælan . 
 he alysan þu lif leof of forwyrde , 
 fyllan þinne willan fæger mid god . 
 he þu gesigefæste soð milts 
 and þu mildheort mod getrymede ; 
 wesan þu edneowe earn gelician 
 on geogoðe nu gleaw weorþan . 
 hafian þu milde mod , miht strang , 
 drihten , dom eall þu deop heran 
 and ful treaflice teonan þolian . 
 he hit weg dydan wise and cuðe 
 moyse þæm mære on mænige tidan , 
 swilce hit willan eacan wer israhela . 
 mildheort þu wesan and mihtig , mod geþyldig , 
 ece drihten , swa þu wifcynn wære ; 
 wesan þu milde mod mann cyðed . 
 nelle þu oþ ende yrre habban , 
 nesan on ecnes þu awa belgan . 
 na þu be gewyrhtum , wealdend , ure 
 womm wyrhta willan we don , 
 nesan æfter ure unriht ahwær gyldan . 
 forðam þu æfter heahweorce heofenes þin 
 mildheortnysse , mihtig drihten , 
 lust cyðdest , þæm þu lufedan þu . 
 swa þes folde fæðme bewindeð 
 þes eastrodor and æfter westan , 
 he betweonan þæm teonan and unriht 
 we fram afyrde æghwær simble . 
 swa fæder ðenceð fæger hit bearn 
 milde weorðan , swa we mihtig god , 
 þæm þu he lufiað , liðe weorðeð , 
 forðam he ealle сinan ure þearf . 
 gemunan , mihtig god , þæt we synt molde and dust ; 
 beoð mann dæg mawenum hege 
 æghwær anlice , eorþ blostma , 
 swa hit lifdagas lænan syndan . 
 þonne he gast ofgifeð , siððan he gærsbedd sculan 
 wunian widefyrh , nesan him munan siððan witan 
 ahwær elles ænig stow . 
 þu mildheortnes , mihtig drihten , 
 þurh eall weorold weorold wislic standeð , 
 deorust and gedefust ofer ealle þu þu ondrædað him . 
 swa hit soðfæstnyss swilce standeð 
 ofer þær bearn birnan þu hit bebod healdað , 
 and se gemynd mycle habbað , 
 þæt heo hit wisfæst word wynn efnan . 
 on heofenhame halig drihten 
 hit heahsetl hror timbrade , 
 þanan he eorðricum eall wealdeð . 
 ealle hit engel eсe drihten 
 bletsian beald , hira bliðne frea , 
 mægyn and miht , þu hit mære word 
 habbað and healdað and hyсgan fremmað . 
 bletsian drihten eall hit bearn mægen 
 and hit ðegna ðreat , þu þæt þence nu , 
 þæt hi hit willan wyrcean georne . 
 eall hit ongeagn geweorc eсe drihten 
 on hit agen stede eacan bletsian , 
 þær him hit egsian , anweald , standeð ; 
 bletsian min sawel bliðe drihten . ## bletsian , min sawol , bliþe drihten ; 
 þu wesan , min drihten god , dæd swyþ , 
 meahtum mære ofer mannian birnan . 
 þu þu weorðlice wliteandette 
 god gegyrwan ; wesan nu gleawlice 
 swa limwædum sunnan gyrwan . 
 heofan þu aðenedest hydan gelice , 
 se weardiað ufan wæter ðryðe . 
 he wolcen eacan wyrсean and settan , 
 þæt he miht eaðe upp astigan , 
 se fot tredeð fiðru wind . 
 he hit engel deð æðele gast 
 and hit from ðegnas fyr beornan . 
 he gefæstnude folde staðelas , 
 eorþ eardas ; nesan seon æfre nu 
 on weorold world weorðeð ahylded . 
 he nywolnessa neoðan swa swa ryfte 
 him toh gewæde woruhte swilce ; 
 standað ofer mann munt on wæter . 
 þu him þrea þin þearle ondrædað , 
 fleoð forhtlice þunor broga 
 þinne stefn strang egsan . 
 beorg and feld ba astigan 
 on se stede þu þu gestaðeludest him , 
 and on se stow standað fæstan ; 
 nesan magan hi ofer gemære micel gegangan , 
 þæt hi ðysse eorþe awyht habban . 
 oft of denu yrnað deop willa , 
 and of midle munt swilce 
 wæter awealleð , wid floweð . 
 of þæm eorþ deor ealle drincað , 
 bidað assa eacan on þurste ; 
 ofer þan heofonfugelas healdað eardas , 
 sendað of þæm stan stefn mycle . 
 beorg onfoð blæd and wæstm , 
 ufan eorðwæstme ealle growað , 
 swilce of wæstm weorc þinne 
 eall eorþ cið ufan byð gefyllan . 
 swilce þu of folde fodder neat 
 lætest alædan , on þæm hi lif healdað ; 
 wyrtian þu gewyrсean toh wrað mannian . 
 eacan þu him of eorþe ut alædan 
 hlaf toh helpan ; heorte mannian 
 must and windrinc micel blissað . 
 elh andwlitan eacan gescyrpeð 
 and hlaf trymeð heorte mann . 
 swilce þu gefyllan fæger blæd 
 telga treowwæstme ; tydrað ealle , 
 þu on libanes lædað on beorgan 
 cwic cederbeam , þu þu cuðlice 
 self gesettan ; on þæm swilce nu 
 mid hira sped spearwa nystlað . 
 uphebbean hus hira ongeagn wesan 
 latteow on land ; oft laðne beorgan 
 on hean munt heortas wuniað ; 
 erinaces fleoð oft on stan . 
 spiht he gewyrсean on þu mære tidan ; 
 sunne hire setlgang sweotule healdeð . 
 þystru þu gesettan on þearle niht , 
 on þære ealle wildeor wid toeornað . 
 and leon hwelp lange swilce 
 grymetigað gnorne ; georne secað , 
 þæt him grædig æt god gedeme . 
 siððan up cumeð æðele sunne , 
 hi of siðum eft gesamniað 
 and hi on hol hydað hi georne . 
 mægenweorc on morgen munan onginneð 
 and þæt geendað on æfynne . 
 micel wærun þin weorc , mihtig drihten , 
 ealle þu þu mid snyteru self wyrсean ; 
 wesan þes eorþ eacan eall gefyllan 
 þinne gesceafta , scyppend mære . 
 hit wesan micel sæ and on gemære wid , 
 þær wesan unrim on eall cwycra 
 mycelra and mætra ; ofer ðæne mægene oft 
 scip scriðende scrinde fleotað . 
 draca þu þes dæd þin 
 geheowadest , hettan siððan 
 hit bysmere brad healdan ; 
 ealle toh þu , ece drihten , 
 ætes on eorþ eacan wilniað . 
 and him gesomnadum swilce wylle 
 þin þu halig hand ontynan , 
 ealle hi gefyllan fæger god . 
 gif þu þin ansyn fram him æfre awendan , 
 þonne hi gedrefan deop weorðað , 
 and him gast weorðeð georne afyrran ; 
 swilce teonlice geteoriað , 
 on hira ongeagn dust æfter hweorfað . 
 onsendan þin sylfes gast , sona weorþað 
 geedniwad , and þu eacan scyppest 
 eorþ ansyn ealle swilce . 
 wuldor seon wid weruda drihten 
 and on weorold weorold wunian siððan , 
 blissian on hit weorc beald drihten . 
 he on þes eorþ ealle locað , 
 deð hi for hit egsan ealle beofian ; 
 gif he mid hit miht munt hrineð , 
 hi ful ricene reocað sona . 
 ic on minum lif lust drihten 
 singan soþlice and secg eacan , 
 þenden ic wunian on worulddreamum . 
 wese him herenes min æt heorte weðe , 
 ic min drihten deoren lufian . 
 and þu fyrenfullan frecne forweorðaþ , 
 þu on ðysse eorþ synt , ealle sniome , 
 þæt hio nesan wunian on worldlife . 
 bletsian , min sawol , bliðe drihten . ## andetað drihten and hit eсe naman 
 cegað cymlice , and cwyce secgeað 
 hit wundorweorc ofer ealle werðeode . 
 singað him swilce and salletað , 
 secgað hit wundor eall wid mære . 
 hergeað hit naman niode swilce ; 
 heorte hygeclæne hlutor blissað 
 þæm þu soþlice secað dryhten . 
 secað ge drihten , and ge siððan beoð 
 teonan gehwylc ful trum æghwær ; 
 secað hit ansyn simble georne . 
 gemunað ge on mod , hu he manig wundor 
 wyrсean wræclice , wundur unlytel , 
 and hit muþ eacan mære dom . 
 hwæt#2 , he abrahames cynn , þu hit esne wesan , 
 geweorðude ofer werþeoda , 
 and iacobes birnan , se he gear geceosan . 
 he wesan ure drihten dæd spedig ; 
 earun hit dom deore and mære 
 geond þes eorþ æghwylс dælan . 
 he se on weorold wearð gemyndig , 
 þæt he word cweðan on gewitnes , 
 þæt heo on þusende þæt sceoldan healdan , 
 þære cneoris cwyc se þu libban . 
 þæt he mid aðsware toh abrahame 
 and toh isaace eacan geseсan , 
 and gleawlice iacobe beodan , 
 þæt awa toh feorh israheles cyn 
 hit gewitnes wel gehealdan . 
 and him þu mid soð sægan cweðan : 
 " ic eowrum cynn khananea land 
 on agen æht yrfe gesylle . " 
 næs þæt mære cynn micel on riman , 
 acan on þæm folc feaw wær ænig , 
 oððæt bigenga beorn onwocan ; 
 cynn æfter cynn cennan wær , 
 oðþæt hio oðer folc egsan geðiwdan . 
 nesan lætan he him mannian miht sceððan 
 and he þearle for him þrea gifan kyning . 
 nesan sceolon ge min þu halig hrinan nesan gretan 
 nesan on min witigan wergðe settan . 
 cuman þu ofer eorþ ermðu and hungor , 
 wurdon wid mann wædlan hlaf . 
 he him snoterne beforan sendan ærest 
 ful wis wer toh scealce , 
 and þu bebohtan birnan iacobes 
 ioseph on geoguþ ; þær he gram ærest 
 habban toh hæftan , oþþæt he halig god 
 þurh hit word wisdom ahebban . 
 sendan him soð cyning sweotule are , 
 alysan he lungre and he þæm leode þu 
 toh ealdorman eall settan . 
 he settan he on hit hus toh hlafwearde , 
 eall him hit æht anweald betæсan , 
 þæt he hit ealdorman ealle læran , 
 swa he hit sylfes mod settan habban , 
 and þu yldestan ealle læran , 
 þæt heo wisdom word oncneowan . 
 þær israhel becuman on egypta , 
 and se god iacob siððan 
 eft eardude eorþ khanaan . 
 he þæt eadig folc ehtan swiðe , 
 and hio ofer hira feond fæstan getrymede . 
 hira heorte he onginnan hwyrfan ærest , 
 þæt heo hit folc feodan swiðe 
 and hit esnum eacan inwit fremede . 
 þu he him se mære moyses sendan , 
 hit sylfes scealc , samod ætgædere 
 and aaron eacan , se he ær geceosan . 
 he settan on hi self soð wisdom 
 word and weorc wundortacen 
 and forebeacna , þæt hio fromlice 
 cyðdan cneomagum cyst god , 
 oðþæt heo geforan folc khananea . 
 he hi mid þystru onginnan þrean æt frymþe , 
 forðam hio word hira wel nesan oncneowan . 
 and hira wæter swilce wendan toh blod , 
 on ðam hira fisceas frecne forwurdan . 
 sendan on hira eorþe ealle swilce 
 toscean teonlice , þu teolum hus 
 on cyning cofa cwyce eardedan . 
 he self cweðan ; sona cwoman 
 mysci manig , mid wær gnætt , 
 fleohcynnes feala flugan on gemære . 
 settan him regn reþe swilce , 
 hatan of heofenum hagol beornan , 
 se liсgan forgifan land egypta . 
 siððan forwurdan hira wingeard 
 and ficbeamas ; furþor nesan mihton 
 blæd bringan nesan bearwa treow . 
 he þu siððan cweðan ; sona cwoman 
 gangan gærshoppa and gram ceaferas ; 
 nesan miht þu on molde munan geriman , 
 þu þær on folde fretan wæstm . 
 siððan he æfter slean æghwylc frumbearn 
 þu on egyptum wesan ahwær acennan , 
 and frumcynnes hira frea swilce . 
 and hit þæt god folc gold and seolfor 
 geweorþade and hi wislice 
 leof lædan ; næs se leode þe 
 ænig untrum yldra nesan gingra . 
 wurdon him egyptas æfter bliðe , 
 siððan hi on for folc sceawedan , 
 forðam him þær egesian angryslic standan . 
 he hi wolcn bewreah , wrað ahreddan , 
 hettan him neod nihtian gehwylc 
 fyren beam beforan wisian . 
 flæsces hi biddan , fugol coman , 
 of garsecge ganetas fleoge , 
 and hi heofonhlafe halig gefyllan . 
 hettan him of stane stream flowan , 
 wæter on willan ; na him gewættan fot , 
 þu hi on iordane gengdan æfter . 
 acan he wesan se word wel gemyndig , 
 halig heofenes weard , þu he hleoðrade 
 toh abrahame , hit agen hysse . 
 and hit folc lædan fæger on bliss 
 and hit se geceosan heap clæne on wynn . 
 sellan þæm leode land anweald 
 on agen æht oðer þeon 
 and hi folc gewinnan fremde gesittan . 
 þær hi heoldan halig dom 
 and hit soþfæst word swilce georne , 
 and hit æbebod awa toh feorh . ## ic andettan ecum drihten , 
 georne ðam gleaw , forðam ic he god witan ; 
 forðam he hit mildheortnysse mann cyðde , 
 on ðysse weorold wis gestandeð . 
 hwylc mæg æfre miht drihten 
 asprecan and aspyrian , oððe spedlice 
 eall hit lofmægen leode gehyran 
 and hit gehyrnesse heran oncnawan gewinnan 
 eadig beoð æghwær , þu þu wifcynn wyllað 
 soð dom self efnan , 
 on ealle tidan æghwæs healdan 
 hira soþfæstness simble mid dæd . 
 gemunan we , drihten , on modsefa 
 forþ hycgende folc þin , 
 and we mid hælu heran geneosa . 
 and we tidlice tela sceawian , 
 ceose mid gecorenum , þenden we cwic lifgen , 
 þæt we mid þinne ðeode þær blissian 
 and þæt yrfe þu æghwær herian . 
 we gefyrnedan mid ure fædera ær , 
 and we unsoðfæste ealle wesan 
 and unriht æghwær worhtan . 
 fæder ure fæstan nesan oncneowan 
 ealle þu wundor þu þu on egyptum 
 wyrсean wræclice , wundor unlytel ; 
 nesan hi gemyndig miltsian þinne , 
 þu þu him on se mægþ manig cyðdest . 
 hi bysmredan , þu hi on brad wæter 
 on se reada sæ randas beran , 
 þær þu hi alysan , lifes ealdor , 
 and hi generian on naman þin , 
 þu þu þin miht mycle cyðdest . 
 þær þu read sæ ricene geðywdest , 
 and þær wesan þu wareðas drige , 
 and hi betweonum wæterian weall lædan , 
 swa hi on westen wesan on drigum . 
 swa hi alysan lifes ealdor 
 of hira feond fæcne hand , 
 and of feogendra folm swilce , 
 and hira feond flod adrenсan , 
 þæt se æfre nesan cuman on spellboda . 
 siððan hi hit wordon wel gelyfdan 
 and him lofsangum lust cwemdan , 
 and se eft hraðe ealle forgietan , 
 weorc wræclicra ; na hi wel siððan 
 hit geæhtunge ahwær heoldan . 
 hi on westen wrað ongunnan 
 gitsung beginnan and gramlice 
 hira god þær geare costedan . 
 he him been sniome bringan and sellan , 
 sendan on hira muþ mete toh geniht . 
 onginnan hi on þæm wiсe wrað swilce 
 mære moyses micel bysmrian 
 and aaron mid eacan se halig . 
 þu eorþ togaan and eall forswelgan 
 on deop forwyrd dathanes weorod 
 and abirones eall ætgædere . 
 þær fyr abarn frecne swilce 
 on hira gemetinge , and þær maansceaðan 
 þu synful sniome forbærnan . 
 hi on choreb swilce cealf ongunnan 
 him toh godgylde georne wyrcean , 
 onwendan hira wuldor on se wyrsa had 
 hæðenstyrces hi etendes . 
 god hi forgietan , þu hi of gram ær 
 feond folm frecne generian , 
 þu on egyptum æðele wundur 
 and on chananea cyme wyrсean 
 and recen wundur on þæm reada sæ . 
 þu hi willan toweorpan wuldor aldor , 
 þær hira moyses mægene nesan helpan ; 
 he þæt folc forstandan feond mægene ; 
 forðam he him hit yrre of acyrde , 
 þæt he hi nesan toweorpan geond werþeoda . 
 nesan hi for awyht eorþe cystan 
 þu selestan geseon woldan , 
 nesan hit word eacan woldan gelyfan ; 
 acan hi granedan and gram spræcan , 
 noldan hit word wel gehyran . 
 he hit hand ahebban and hi hraðe willan 
 on þæm westen wid todrifan 
 and hira swæs cynn sendan on wid land . 
 hi belphegor biddan are , 
 etan dead lacan , swa hit gedefe nesan wesan . 
 and hi bysmredon beald drihten 
 on hira gemetincge mægene ealle , 
 and þær healicne on hryre gefremedan . 
 hi se feondætes finees awerede , 
 þu he on þæm folc feondgyld gebrecan ; 
 he se hælan gehleat and helpan findan 
 of cynn gehwa and on cneoris . 
 eacan hi gefremedan oðer bismer , 
 þær hi wiðercwyde wæter habban ; 
 þær moyses wearð mægene gebysgad 
 for hira yfel , swa he oft wesan , 
 on hit gast gram ; nesan miht him god willan 
 mid hit weler wis getæcean . 
 noldan hi toworpan wrað þeon , 
 swa him drihten ær dema sægan , 
 acan hi wiþ manfull mengdan þeon 
 and leornedan lað weorc god 
 and sceuccgyldum swyþ guldan ; 
 him þæt eall gewearð toh æswyce . 
 ongunnan hira birnan blotan feond , 
 sceuccum onsæcgean sunu and dohter ; 
 agutan blod swilce bearn feala , 
 þu unscyldige ealle wærun , 
 siððan hi gecuran chananea god . 
 þanan eorþe wearð eall mid blod 
 mane mengan , misdæd fah . 
 eall hi forheoldan heahweorc god ; 
 forðam him yrre wearð ece drihten 
 and he hit yrfe eall forhogode . 
 he hi on handgeweald hæðenum sellan 
 and hira weoldan , þu him wyrrest ær 
 on feondscipe fæstan gestandan . 
 hira costedan cuþ feond 
 and under hand hynþu þoledan ; 
 hi alysan oft lifes ealdor . 
 hi he on geþeaht oft abylgdan ; 
 wesan on unriht oft gehynde . 
 swa he furðum oncnawan , þæt hira fynd ehtan , 
 he hira ben beald gehyrdan . 
 þonne he hit wordgebeot well gemunan ; 
 hreowan he sona , þonne hi hynþu drugan , 
 æfter hit miltsian menigu god . 
 siððan he him sellan sona milts , 
 þær hi on geseon ealle ætgædere , 
 þu ehtend him ær gestodan . 
 don we hal nu , halig drihten , 
 and we , se god god , georne gesamnian 
 of widwegum , þær we wea dreogað , 
 þæt we þinne naman nede motan 
 se halgestan heran andettan 
 and we on lof þin lungre weorðan 
 ofer werðeode wuldor geherian . 
 wese israhela god aa gebletsad 
 on weorold weorold , wealdend drihten , 
 and þæt fæger becweðe folc æghwylc ; 
 wese swa , wese swa þurh eall wid ferhð . ## ic andettan eсe drihten , 
 se goodan god , forðam ic he gleaw witan ; 
 wesan hit mildheortnes micel toh weorold . 
 secg þæt nu þe , þæt hi self god 
 alysan , lifes weard , laðum of hand , 
 and hi of sidfolcum gesamnade . 
 fram uppgange ærest sunne 
 oþþæt heo gewiteð on westrodur 
 and fram sæ norþan swycedan geond westen ; 
 nesan magan ceaster wegan cuþ mitta , 
 þu hi eardung on genaman . 
 habban hi hungor and þurst heard wyrdan , 
 þæt him frecne on feorh aðolude . 
 and hi þu on þære costunge cleopedan toh dryhten , 
 and he hi of þæm earfeðum eall alysan . 
 hi þu gelædan lifes ealdor , 
 þær hi on riht wegan ricene eodan , 
 oðþæt hi cuðlice on becwoman 
 toh hira cestre eardungstowe . 
 forðam hi mildheortness mihtig drihten 
 ealle andettað , and eacan sæcgeað 
 micel wundur his mannian bearn . 
 forðam he gesedeð sawol idel , 
 and þu hungrian heran mid god 
 fæstan gefylleð toh feorh siððan , 
 þu þu heran on ðystrum þrage sittan 
 and on deaðes scua deorc lifdan , 
 gebindan bealuwe feter 
 on wædle wracu and on isern . 
 forðam hi dydan drihten sprecan 
 æghwæs ægype , and hit geðeaht swilce 
 se heahstan him hæfdan on bismer . 
 hira heorte wesan hean on gewinn 
 and untrum ealle wær , 
 næfdan þu on folde fultuman an . 
 hi on costunge cleopedan toh drihten , 
 and he hi of þæm earfoðum eall alysan . 
 and he hi of þæm þystru þanan alædan 
 and of deaðes scua deorc generian 
 and hira bendas toweorpan bitter sneome . 
 forðam hi mildheort mod mihtig drihten 
 ealle andettan , and eacan cweþan 
 micel wundur hit ofer mannian birnan . 
 forðam he æren dor eaðe gescæneð 
 and isern steng ana gebigeð . 
 he hi of unriht ealle swilce 
 þæm wrað weсgan wis alædeð , 
 þær hi wesan on woo ær wrað besmitene . 
 hi onhysctan æghwylс mete , 
 mod mægen hira , oþ unmiht , 
 þæt hi wiþ deaða duru drencyde wær . 
 þu hi on costunge cleopedan toh drihten , 
 and he hi of þæm earfoþe eall alysan . 
 he him wisfæstlic word onsendan , 
 þurh þæt hi hrædlice hælan wesan 
 and of hira forwyrde wurdan generian . 
 forðam hi nu andettan ecum drihten , 
 þæt he milde wearð mannian cynn ; 
 micel ys hit wundur ofer mannian birnan . 
 hi him sculan lac lof lust bringan , 
 and hit weorc wynsum wid sæcgean . 
 þu þu sæ seceað , mid scip liðað , 
 wyrceað weorc manig on wæterðryþum . 
 hi drihten weorc digul geseon 
 and hit wundrian wearn on wætergrundum . 
 gif he self cwyð , sona ætstandað 
 ystige gast ofer egewylmum , 
 beoð hira yþian up astigene . 
 þu toh heofenum up heah astigan , 
 niþer gefeallað under neowulne grund ; 
 oft þu on yfele eft aþindað . 
 gedrefan þu deop syndan , 
 heard onhrerede heran anlicast , 
 hu druncen hwylc gedwæs spyrige ; 
 ealle hira snytru beoð yfele forglendred . 
 hi on costunge cleopedan toh drihten , 
 and he hi of earfeðum eall alysan . 
 he ystan mæg eaðe oncyrran , 
 þæt him wind hweoðu weorðeð smylte , 
 and þu yðe eft swygiað , 
 bliþe weorðað , þu þu brim weþað . 
 and he hi on hælu hyþe gelædan , 
 swa he hira willan wyste fyrmest , 
 and he hi of earfoðum eall alysan . 
 hi andettan ealle drihten , 
 hu he milde wearð mannian cynn ; 
 mære synd hit wundur ofer mannian birnan . 
 forðam he on circe cristen folc 
 hean ahebbað , and him hælu and lof 
 on sotelum soðfæstra secgean toh weorold . 
 he on westen wynn stream 
 soþfæst settan , þær he sarig folc 
 geðewde þurste þu blissade . 
 he þe weaxendan wendan eorþ 
 on sealten mersc for synndædum 
 þær eardendra , þu hire on lifdan . 
 westen he gewyrсean on wid merian , 
 and swilce eorþ eacan butan wæter 
 on utgang æþelian burna . 
 þær he hungrium ham staðelude , 
 and þær gesettan swilce ceaster , 
 þær hi eard niman awa siððan . 
 hi wingeard wyrcean onginnan , 
 sæd seowan , siððan growan 
 lungre land hira aloden wæstm . 
 þu he bletsade , and hi brad þu 
 weoxan weorðlice , wid greowan ; 
 næs hira neat nan geyfelad . 
 oft hi fea wurdan feond geswenсan 
 fram þære costunge þu him becuman æfter , 
 sar and yfel , þu hi siððan begietan . 
 siððan hi forhogedan halig lar ; 
 hira ealdorman ealle wesan 
 sar beswicene , swicedan oftust 
 and on weg werig wendan hwilum of . 
 þær he þearfendra þu miltsude , 
 and hi of wædle wea alysan , 
 settan hira staðol sceapum anlice . 
 siððan þæt soþfæst geseoð , sniome æfter 
 bliðe weorðað , beatan geþenceað , 
 þæt unriht gehwylc eft oncyrreð 
 and hit sylfes muð simble hemneð . 
 hwylc wesan wis nu wel snotera , 
 þu þes mid gehygd healdan cunnan , 
 and milde mod mihtig drihten 
 full gleawlice ongitan siððan gewinnan ## ys min heorte gearu , halig drihten , 
 gearu wesan min heorte , þæt ic god cweme , 
 sealmas singan soþ drihten . 
 arisan nu , wuldur min , þæt ic wynlice 
 on psalterio þu singan motan , 
 and ic þu on hleoðre hearpe swilce 
 on ærmergen eacan gecweme . 
 ic þu andettan , ece drihten , 
 on folc gehwa fæger word , 
 and ic þu on ðeodum on þanc motan 
 sealmas singan swyþ geneahhe . 
 wesan þu mildheort mod micel oþ heofenas 
 ahebban healice ofer hæleða birnan ; 
 ys þu soðfæstnes settan oþ wolcen . 
 ahebban þu wesan ofer heofenas , halig drihten ; 
 wesan wuldur þin wid swilce 
 ofer þes eorþ ealle mære , 
 and þin þu geceosan wese clæne and alysan . 
 don me þu swyðre hand swilce hal 
 and me gehyran , hælynd drihten , 
 þu on halig spreceð heran on eorþ : 
 " and ic blissian , buan gedælan , 
 þu selegesceotu , þu on sycimam nu 
 and on metibor mære standað . 
 min wesan galaad , gearu mannases , 
 wesan effrem hit ongeagn broður 
 efne heah strengðu heafod min . 
 ic me toh cyninge cennan iudas , 
 syndan me moabitingas mæg swilce ; 
 ic idumea ealle cennan 
 and min gescy þider sendan þence ; 
 syndan me fremde cynn fæstan underþeodan . " 
 hwylc gelædeð me on lifes burh 
 fæstan getrymede , þæt ic forþ þanan 
 on idumea wese eft lædan gewinnan 
 hwæt#2 , þu wesan se self god , þu we synnig iu 
 adrifan fram dom ; nesan don þu æfre swa , 
 þæt þu of ure mægene mod acyrre . 
 syl we on earfoðum æþele fultuman ; 
 forðam hælu byð heran on eorþ 
 mannian gehwilc mægene idel . 
 we sculan mægenes gemetan mihtig drihten 
 soþfæst syllan , and he sona mæg 
 ure feond gedon fracuþe toh nawihte . ## nelle ic lof þin , lifian god , 
 geswigian , þiсgan þu me synfull 
 inwitfulra muðas on ganian . 
 hio þu innwit feala ywdan on tunge , 
 and me wrað wearn word sprecan , 
 fæcne firenlicu , and afuhtan me 
 ealle earwunga ungemete swiðe . 
 hi me wiþ lufu laþu dæd 
 torn telnysse teodan mænige ; 
 ic him wifcynn gebiddan ungemete georne . 
 hi me yfel settan wifcynn wiþ goode 
 and feounge for minre lufu . 
 gesettan him synnfulle simble toh ealdor , 
 standan him on þu swyþeran hand swilce deoful . 
 gangan of dom gehwa deop gehyned , 
 and him hit gebed hweorfan toh fyren . 
 gewurðe him weste eall hit onwunung 
 and on his eardungstowe næfre gewurþe 
 þæt þær on gewunian awiht lifigendes . 
 wese him dæg deorc and dimm and feaw , 
 and hit bisceophad brucan feond . 
 weorðan hit agen birnan ealle steopcild 
 and hit wif weorþ widuwe hreowlic . 
 syn hit birnan swilce toboren wid , 
 and he ut weorpan earm þearfa , 
 þonne hi toh hit hus hleowes wilnian . 
 ealle hit æht unholde fynd 
 romana reðemann rycene gedælan , 
 and hit feoh onfon fremde hand . 
 nesan him ahwær wese ænig fultuman , 
 nesan hit steopcildum standan toh helpan . 
 gangan ealle hit birnan on ece forwyrd , 
 and on an cneow eall gewyrðe 
 hit nama nyhsta nede adilgad . 
 eall þæt unriht þu hit ealdor ær 
 manes gefremedan , on gemynd cuman 
 and on ansyn ure drihten ; 
 nesan adilgian wese deorc fyren , 
 þu hit modur ær mane fremman . 
 wese hi wiþ drihten dæd swilce , 
 and he adilgie dom eall 
 of ðysse eorþ awa toh feorh . 
 næs him milde gemynd on modsefa , 
 and he þearfendra ðriste ehtan ; 
 simble þæt on heorte hycgan geornust , 
 hu he mid searuwe swilce acwellan . 
 he willan wergðu wyrcean georne , 
 and he seon ylce on eft gesette ; 
 nyllan he bletsunge biddan nesan tilian , 
 forðam hio him wesan afyrran of ferhðcofan . 
 he he gegyrwan mid gram wyrgðu , 
 swa he he wædum wræstum geteon , 
 and se hit innað ywde swilce 
 wan wæter gelic and wynele , 
 se þu ban byrst beteð and hæleð . 
 wese he hrægle gelic þu heran hraðe ealdað , 
 and gyrdelse , þu he munan gelome gyrdan . 
 þes wesan weorc þær þu oft wrað me 
 trage tældan ; tynan he dryhten 
 þæm þu sar sprecan sawol minre . 
 and þu , min drihten god , don me þin nu 
 mycle mildheortness for þin þæm mære naman , 
 swa þu oft þu milde mod manig cyðdest . 
 alysan me , lifes weard , forðam ic wesan lama þearfian ; 
 wesan me heorte on heard gedrefan . 
 ic wesan scua gelic swyþ ahylded , 
 oðlæded god swa se gærshoppa . 
 me synt cneow swilce cwic unhal 
 for fæsten ; wesan min flæsc swilce 
 for fæger elh frecne onwendan ; 
 wesan ic toh edwitstæfe eall weorþan . 
 swa hi me geseon , sona hi wegdan , 
 hrerdan hira heafod ; helpan min , drihten god , 
 and me hal gedon , hælynde crist , 
 for þinne þære myclan mildheortnysse . 
 þæt hi soð witan , þæt seon þu sylfes hand 
 and þu þes gedon , drihten usser . 
 weorðan þu awyrgan , wesan þu gebletsad ; 
 and þu þu me mid unriht ænig styrian , 
 and hi þær sceand self agan ; 
 wese þu esne on þu ungemete bliðe . 
 syn þe butan are ealle gegyrwan 
 þu me tælnysse teonan ætfæstan , 
 and him seon abrogden swa of brechrægle 
 hira sylfra sceamu swyþust eall . 
 ic on minum muðe miht drihten 
 ealle andettan , and eacan swilce 
 he on midle mannian herian . 
 he self gestandan on þe swyðran hand , 
 þær he þearfendra þingian teolode ; 
 he min sawol swilce gehealdan 
 wiþ ehtendra egsan grima . ## hefig gefylleð ; 
 heafod he gebreceð hæleða mæniges 
 and swa geweorðeð wid geond eorþ . 
 þu þu on weсgan weorðað , wæter æt hlimme 
 deop ondrincað ; beoð þywan dædfromran , 
 and forðam hira heafod hebbað siððan . ## ic andytte þu , ece drihten , 
 mid hyсgan ealle heorte minre 
 for gesamnuncge se soðfæstra 
 and on gemetingum micel drihten weorc . 
 swilce ic hit willan wylle georne 
 swyþ secean , samed andettan , 
 hu hit mægenþrymnes mycellic standeð 
 and hit soðfæstnyss wunað simble ece . 
 he gemynd dydan mære wundrian ; 
 mildheort he wesan and modig ; mihtig drihten 
 syleð eall mete þæm þu hit ege habbað . 
 and he on weorold wearð gemyndig 
 hit gewitnes , þu he wel swilce 
 myhtum micel and mærweorcum 
 fæger gefyllan and toh hit folc cweðan , 
 þæt he him willan yrfe ellþeodigra 
 on agen æht eall gesyllan . 
 ys hit handgeweorc hyсgan soðfæstra , 
 ryhte dom , þu he ræran wyle ; 
 wærun hit bebod ealle treowfæste , 
 on eall weorulda weoruld wurdan soþfæst 
 and on rihtnysse ræde getrymede . 
 he alysinge leof folc 
 soð onsendan and him swilce bebeodan , 
 þæt hi on ecnes wifcynn siððan 
 hit gewitnes well geheoldan 
 and hit se halig naman hæfdan mid egsan . 
 þæt byð secg gehwa snytru on frymþ , 
 þæt he god egesa gleaw healdan , 
 and þæt byð andgit good eall swilce 
 þu he wyllað well wyrcean and healdan . 
 herenes drihten heran sculan wunian , 
 on weorold weorold wynn standan . ## eadig byð se wer se þu him ege drihten 
 on ferhðcleofan fæstan gestandeð , 
 and hit bebod healdeð beald mid willan . 
 he on eorþ byð eadig and spedig , 
 and hit cneoris byð cyn gebletsad . 
 him wuldur and wela wunað æt hus , 
 byð hit soþfæstnys swilce mære , 
 þenden þes weorold wunian ænig dælan . 
 sunnan wesan on leode leof acyðed , 
 þæm þu on ðystrum þrage lifdan 
 and hira heorte heoldan mid rihte ; 
 milde wesan on mod mihtig dryhten , 
 and he ys soþfæst simble æt þearf . 
 glæd munan gleawhydig , god and mildheort , 
 seteð soð don þurh hit sylfes word , 
 se on ecnes eadig standeð . 
 byð on eceum gemynd æghwylc se 
 þu hit soð and rihtan simble healdeð , 
 nesan him on hlystan micel ondrædeð 
 awiht on ealdor yfel siððan . 
 byð hit heorte gearu hyht toh drihten 
 trymman and tyhtan , þæt him teonan nesan mæg 
 fæcne ætfæstan feond ænig , 
 acan he ealle forseon æghwær georne . 
 se þu hit æht ealle tostredeð 
 and þearfendum þu gedæleð , 
 hit soðfæstnyss wunað simble oþ ende ; 
 byð hit horn wendan heran on wuldur . 
 swa þæt synfull gesyhð , sona yrsað , 
 toþ torn þolað , teon grimetað , 
 þearle þindeð , oþþæt þonne byð , 
 þæt fyrenfulra lust fæcne forweorðeð . ## herigean nu cniht hælynd drihten , 
 and naman dryhten neod herigan . 
 wese nama dryhten neod gebletsad 
 of ðyssan forþ awa toh weorold . 
 fram upgang ærest sunne 
 oðþæt heo wendan on westrodur 
 ge sculan dryhten naman dæd herigean . 
 he wesan ofer ealle ingeþeode 
 se heahsta hæleða cynn , 
 wesan ofer heofenas eacan ahebban hit wuldur . 
 hwylc ys anlic ure dryhten , 
 þæm halig god , þu on heofonrice 
 eadig eardað , ofer ealle gesyhð , 
 þu eadmedu æghwær begangæð 
 on eorðwege , up on heofenum gewinnan 
 he of eorþ mæg se unagan 
 weccan toh willan , and of woruftorde 
 se þearfendan þriste areccan , 
 and he on ealdordom upp asettan 
 hit folc fruma on fæger lif . 
 se þu eard seteð unwæstmbære 
 on modor hus manig bearn ; 
 hio ofer hire sunu symblað and blissað . ## þu ut gan israheles cynn 
 and of ægyptum ealle foran 
 iacobes hus of grama folc , 
 þu elreordig ealle wesan . 
 þu wesan weorþan werude iudea , 
 þæt heo hælan gehlutan halig siððan ; 
 hæfdan ealdurdom ofer israhelas , 
 miht mære and micel romana . 
 swa heo sæ geseon , he hio sniome fleon , 
 for him iordanen gengan on hinder . 
 hæfdan þær beorg bliðe sælan 
 and ramm þu restan gelice ; 
 wesan geswyru swiðe on bliss , 
 swa on sceapum beoð sceone lamb . 
 hwæt#2 wesan þu , sæ swiþ gewinnan forhwan fleon þu swa gewinnan 
 oððe þu , iordanen , for hwy gengan on bæcling gewinnan 
 beorg wesan bliðe , gebærdon swa ramm ; 
 wurdan gesweoru on seledreame , 
 swa on sceapum beoð sceone lamb . 
 for ansyn ecan dryhten 
 þes eorþe sculan eall abifigan 
 and for iacobes god gear forhtigean . 
 he wendeð stan on wid merian , 
 and clifu cyrreð on cwic swilce 
 wæter wellan mid hit gewealdendre hand . 
 nalæs we , nalæs we , nergend dryhten , 
 acan we naman þin neod secgeað 
 wuldur wid geond woruldricu , 
 for þin þære myclan mildheortnysse 
 and for þinne soþfæstness samed ætgædere , 
 þywan læs þæt æfre cweðan oðer þeon : 
 " hwær wesan hira ongeagn god ahwær nu þe gewinnan " 
 ys ure se halig god on heofondreame 
 uppe mid engel , and he eall gedeð , 
 swa hit willian byð , on woruldrice . 
 þu wesan deofulgild deorc hæþen 
 gold and seolfor , þu heran gear mann 
 worhtan wigsmiðas wræste mid folm . 
 þu muð habbað , and nesan magan hwæþere 
 wiht hleoðrian nesan word sprecan ; 
 beoð onforan eage , nesan magan feor geseon . 
 eare habbað swilce and open nosu , 
 nesan magan eþian , awyht gehyran . 
 hand hi habbað , nesan hio hwæðere magan 
 gegrapian god awiht , 
 and fot habbað , nesan magan feala gangan . 
 nesan cleopigað hi care , þiсgan þu hi ceolan habban , 
 nesan him hluttur gast on hracan eardað . 
 acan heo wesan þæm wyrcendum wel gelice 
 and æghwylcum , þu him on treowað . 
 israhela hus ærest on drihten 
 helpan gehogedan , hold begietan 
 fæle fultuman ; he hi wiþ feond gehealdan . 
 aarones hus eacan on dryhten 
 leof gelyfdan ; he him liðe wearð 
 and him fultuman gestandan fæstan æt þearf . 
 þu þu wifcynn wegan egsan dryhten , 
 hio hyht hira habban on drihten , 
 he him fultuman fæstan gestandeð 
 and him scyldend byð simble æt þearf . 
 weorð þu ure gemyndig , mihtig dryhten , 
 and þin bletsunge bringan ofer we ; 
 þu gebletsudest birnan israheles , 
 aarones hus eacan gebletsadest ; 
 þu gebletsadest bliðe mod 
 ealle þu þu on þu egsan hæfdan , 
 mycle and mætan ofer middangeard . 
 gemænigfealdige þes mihtig dryhten 
 ofer ge ealle and ofer agen birnan . 
 wesað ge fram god gear gebletsade , 
 þæm þu heofon wyrсean , hruse swilce ; 
 heofon healdeð halig dryhten , 
 sellan þes molde mannian bearn . 
 næfre þu , dryhten , dead heriað , 
 nesan ealle þu þu heonan hell seceað . 
 acan we lifian leof dryhten 
 bald bletsigað , nesan se blinnað nu 
 of ðyssan forþ awa toh weorold . ## ic lufian þu , libban drihten , 
 forðam þu min gebed ben gehyrdan . 
 and þu þu eare toh me eadmodlice 
 hold ahyldest and gehyrdan me , 
 þu ic þu on dæg minum dyrne cigan . 
 þær me ymbsellan swylde deaðes , 
 and me frecne ætfeah fyrhtu hell . 
 me costung and sar cnyssedan geneahhe , 
 þonne ic naman drihten nyde cigan . 
 eala þu libban god , alysan min nu 
 sawol on gesyntum ; ic toh soþ witan , 
 þæt þu wære mildheort , mihtig dryhten , 
 and ure god æghwæs soþfæst ; 
 miht we þin milde weorðan . 
 drihten gehealdeð dom þu lytel ; 
 ic hean gewearð , he me hraðe lysan . 
 gecyr min sawol clæne on þin 
 rædæs restan , romana drihten ; 
 þu me wel dydan on woruldlife . 
 forðam þu min sawol self generedyst , 
 and hi of deop deaþ gelædan ; 
 eage min wiþ tear æghwær gehealdan 
 and fot min wiþ færslide ; 
 ic gelician leof drihten 
 on lifigendra land nu þe . ## ic þæt gelyfan , forðam ic lutan sprecan ; 
 ic wesan eadmede ungemete swiðe . 
 swilce ic self cweðan , þu me swa ðuhte 
 on modseofan minum geþanc , 
 þæt wesan ealle mann ungemete leas . 
 hwæt#2 mæg ic toh god gyldan dryhten 
 for eall þæm god þu he me ærur dydan gewinnan 
 ic heran hælu calic habban befon , 
 and naman dryhten neod cigan . 
 beorht ys and fæger beacen dryhten 
 on hit gesiht swylt halig . 
 eala , ic wesan þu ongeagn esne , dryhten , 
 and þu swilce wesan scealc ombehte 
 and þinne þeowan sunu on þu acennan . 
 þu me tobrecan bendas grimman , 
 þæt ic þu lac lof lust secg . 
 ic min gehatan halig dryhten 
 on hit getynum tid gyldan , 
 þu ymb dryhten hus deore syndan , 
 þær hit eage folc eall sceawiað , 
 and on hierusalem georne midd . ## ealle þeon eсe drihten 
 mid hygecræfte herigan word , 
 and he eall folc on efn æðele herigan . 
 forðam hit mildheortnyss wesan micel ofer we 
 torhtlice trymman , til mancynn , 
 and soðfæstnys swilce dryhten 
 wunað ece awa toh feorh . ## ic andettan ecum dryhten 
 þæm god god ; ic he gleaw witan ; 
 ys hit mildheortnys micel toh weorold . 
 þæt israela cwæðan ealle nu þe , 
 þu he wesan se god god , and gearu standeð 
 hit mildheortnys mære toh weorold . 
 cweðan aarones hus eacan þæt self ; 
 he ys se god god , and gearu standeð 
 hit mildheortnys mære toh weorold . 
 cweðan ealle þæt unforcuðe , 
 þu him on standeð egsian dryhten ; 
 forðam he ys se god god , and gearu standeð 
 hit mildheortnys mære on weorold . 
 ic on costunge cigan toh dryhten , 
 and he me gehyrdan on heah brædu . 
 nu me fultuman wesan fæle dryhten , 
 nesan me ege mann for ahwæðer . 
 nu me fultuman ys fæle dryhten , 
 ic fracuþe forseon feond min . 
 god ys on dryhten georne toh þenceanne , 
 þonne on mannan wese mod toh treowianne . 
 god ys on dryhten georne toh hyhtanne , 
 þonne on ealdorman ahwær toh treowianne . 
 ealle me ymbsellan side þeon , 
 and ic wesan on dryhten naman deore hælan . 
 me ymbstodan strang manig , 
 and me god nama on him georne gehælan . 
 þu hi me ymbsellan samod anlice 
 swa beon biter , oððe þu bærnan eacan 
 þorn þyre þicce fyr , 
 þær me nama dryhten neod scylde . 
 ic wesan heard cnyssed and ic me helpan findan , 
 þæt ic fæstan nesan feallan , acan ic me frofor begietan , 
 þu me dryhten onfon , swa hit gedefe wesan . 
 me wesan strengðu strang stiþ on dryhten 
 and herenes heah , and he me eacan 
 ys wifcynn toh weorold worden on hælu . 
 wifcynn byð bliss stefn beorht hyrian 
 on soðfæstra swæs muðe . 
 dydan gedefe mægen dryhten swyðre , 
 and me seon swyðre swilce drihten 
 ahebban hrædlice æt heahþearfe . 
 nesan sweltan ic mid sar , acan ic gesund lifian 
 and weorc god wid secg . 
 se clænsude , se þu him clæne wesan ; 
 dryhten ælmihtig nyllan toh deaðe me 
 on ecnes æfre gesyllan . 
 undoð me sniome duru soðfæstra eacan , 
 þær ic gangan inn , god andettan ; 
 soþfæst on þu duru seceað inngang . 
 ic þu andettan , ece dryhten , 
 forðam þu me gehyrdan æt heahþearfe 
 and me þu geweorþan wis on hælu . 
 se sylfan stan þu he swiðe ær 
 wyrhta awurpan , nu se weorþan wesan 
 hwommona heagost ; halig dryhten 
 toh weall wrað wis teofrade ; 
 þæt wesan ure eage eall wundorlic . 
 þes ys se dæg þu he drihten we 
 wisfæst gewyrсean wer cneoris , 
 eall eorðtudrum eadig toh bliss . 
 eala þu dryhten god , don me hal ; 
 eala þu dryhten min , don we gesund . 
 gebletsad wesan , se þu cuman ofer bearn gehwylc 
 on dryhten naman dæd mære ; 
 we ge æt god hus gearu bletsiað , 
 nu we drihten god deore onlyhte . 
 wutan we toh symbeldæge settan georne , 
 and se gelome lust healdan 
 oþ wigbedes wræste horn . 
 þu wesan min dryhten god , and ic dæd þu 
 eсe andettan ; 
 þu wesan min hælend god , and ic herian þu . 
 ic þu andettan eсe dryhten , 
 forðam þu me gehyrdan æt heahþearfe , 
 and þu weorþan me wis toh hælu . 
 eacan ic andettan eceum dryhten , 
 forðam he ys se god god , and ic ful geare witan , 
 þæt þu mildheortnyss ys micel toh weorold . ## eadig beoð on weсgan , þu þu unwemme 
 on hira dryhten æ deore gangað . 
 eadig beoð swilce , þu þu wifcynn wyllað 
 hit gewitnes wise smeah , 
 and he mid ealle innancund 
 heorte hordcofan helpan biddað . 
 nesan magan manwyrhtan mægene feran 
 on hit mære wegan , mihtig drihten . 
 þu þin bebod beald hettan 
 ealle eorðbuend ellen haldan . 
 ic se la wisce , þæt weg min 
 on þin willan weorþan gereссan , 
 þæt ic þu ongeagn bebod ellen healdan . 
 nesan beon ic þonne on ealdor æfre gescynded , 
 gif ic on ealle þin bebod ellen locian . 
 ic þu andettan , ece dryhten , 
 mid minre heorte hold geþanc 
 on þan þu ic geleornian and gelæstan mæg , 
 þæt ic þin dom dæd healdan . 
 and ic þin soþfæstness swilce motan 
 on hyсgan healdan , þæt þu huru me 
 on ðyssum ealdor an nesan forlætan . 
 on hwinan mæg se iunga on god wegan 
 rihtran þu rædran rædan gemittan , 
 þonne he þin wise word gehealdan gewinnan 
 ic þu mid eall innancund 
 heorte sec ; nesan þu huru me 
 fram þin bebodum feor adrifan . 
 forðam ic on minre heorte hydan georne , 
 þæt ic þinne sprecan spedan gehealdan , 
 þywan læs þu ic gefremme fyren ænig . 
 þu wesan gebletsud , bliþe dryhten ; 
 læran me mid lufu , hu ic læstan well 
 and ic þin soþfæstness sweotule cunnan . 
 ic on minum weler word secg 
 eall þin muðes magan dom . 
 and ic on weсgan swilce wynn gangan , 
 þær ic þin gewitnes witan ful clæne , 
 swa ic eall wela willum brucan . 
 swa ic on þin soþfæstness soð getreowe , 
 þæt ic nesan weorðe word þinne 
 eall ofergittul awa toh feorh . 
 ic on þinne soþfæstness simble meteode , 
 þæt ic þin wislicu word gehealdan . 
 gild þin esne god dæd ; 
 ic on lifdagum lust healdan 
 þinne word wær mid wisdom . 
 onwreon þu min eage , þæt ic wel mæge 
 on þinne æ eall sceawian 
 wundur wræclicu , þu þu worhtyst ær . 
 ic wesan on eorþ earm bigenga ; 
 nesan don þu me dyrne þin þu deore bebod . 
 þæt sawul min simble wilnað , 
 þæt ic þu soþfæst word gesund motan 
 on ealle tidan ellen healdan . 
 þu oferhydige ealle þreadest , 
 þu þu awyrgan witan gearuwe 
 and þin bebod efnan noldan . 
 afyr þu fram me facen and edwit , 
 oððe ic oferhydige awiht wylle ; 
 forðam ic þin gewitnes wylle sec . 
 acan nu ealdormann ealle ætgædere 
 sittan on seldum , swyþ sprecan , 
 and wiþ me wrað word scirdan ; 
 hwæþere þu esne ellen teolode , 
 þæt he þin soð word snotur began . 
 me wesan þu gewitnys weorþ and getreowe , 
 and ic hi on mod metegie georne 
 and me toh frofor witan , þæt ic forþ heonun 
 hit soþfæstness sec georne . 
 ætfealh min sawul flor geneahhige ; 
 don me æfter þin word wel gecwician . 
 ic þu weg min wise secg , 
 and þu me gehyrdan hold mod ; 
 læran me on lif , hu ic lengest mæge 
 þin soþfæstness sellan gehealdan . 
 þu me soþfæstness wegan swilce getacnian , 
 þæt ic on þin wundor me wel begangan . 
 min sawel aslep , þu me sorh begietan 
 for langung ; lætan me nu þu 
 on þin word weorðan trum . 
 afyr fram me unriht weg ,
