 and gegaderian glowan singan 
 on se mannian midle geong 
 on tympanis togenum streng , 
 and on cirice crist , drihten god 
 beald bletsian birnan israela . 
 þær benniamines synt birnan on geogoðe 
 and ealdormann eacan of iudan , 
 þu latteow wesan forþ þær leode , 
 and ealdor eacan of zabulone 
 and neptalim niode swilce . 
 bebeodan þin mægene ; þu wesan mihtig god ; 
 and þu weorc on we mid wisdom 
 getryme on þin templ tid halgian ; 
 þæt ys on hierusalem , þider þu gyfe lædað 
 of feorwegum folde kynincgas . 
 on wudu þu wildeor word þreatian 
 and fearr gemot under folc ; 
 nesan beoð ut fram þu æfre atynde , 
 þu þu seolfor beoð sincan gecoste . 
 toweorpan þu þu ðeoda ## don me hal , god , forðam hreoh wæter 
 toh minum feorh inn floweð and gangeð ; 
 wesan ic on lama ofleсgan , hafað lytel spedan . 
 cuman ic on sæ hricg , þær me sealtan wæter 
 hreoh and hopig holm besencte . 
 þær ic werigmod winnan and cleopian , 
 þæt me gram syndan goma has ; 
 byð me æt þæm wesan eagon wiðgangen ; 
 hwæðere ic on god min gearewe gewene . 
 hira wesan mycle micel þonne ic me habban 
 on heafod nu hær feax , 
 þu me earwunga ealle feogeað . 
 ofer me syndon þu þu me ehtan , 
 fæst folm forþ gestrangad 
 feond min , and ic forþ agef 
 unrihtlice þu þu ic nesan reafude ær . 
 þu witan , wuldor god , þæt ic wesan unwis hyg , 
 nesan wesan þu bemiðene min scylde . 
 nesan sceolon æt me ænig habban 
 sceame sceandlice þu þin siðes heran 
 ful bealdlice bidað , drihten . 
 þu wesan mægena god ; nesan sculan æt me 
 ænig unare ahwær findan , 
 þu þu israela god ahwær seceað . 
 forðam ic edwit for þu oft aræfnade 
 and me hleorsceame heard becwoman , 
 and ic framþe wearð fæderenbroðrum , 
 wesan unmæge gyst modorcildum . 
 forðam me þin hus heard ellenwod 
 æt ormæte and me eacan fela 
 þinne edwita on gefeallan . 
 þonne ic minum feorh fæsten gesette , 
 eall hi me þæt on edwit eft oncyrdan . 
 gif ic min gewædian on witehrægl 
 cyme cyrde , cwædan hi siððan , 
 þæt ic him wæfersyn wære eall . 
 me wiðerwearde wesan ealle , 
 þu him sittan sundor on port ; 
 sprecan me wrað , þu þu win drincan . 
 ic þonne min gebed toh þu , mihtig drihten , 
 tid sendan tela liciendlic , 
 and þu me þonne on mænigeo miltsian þinne 
 gehyran me hlutor hælu þin . 
 alysan me of lama , þu læs ic weorþan lange fæstan , 
 and me feond afyrr , frea ælmihtig ; 
 ado me of deop deorc wæter , 
 þu læs me besencen sealtan flod . 
 nesan me huru forswelgan sægrund deop 
 nesan me se seaþ supan mid muðe . 
 gehyran , drihten , me , forðam gedefe wesan 
 þu milde mod mann fremsum , 
 and for mænigeo miltsian þinne 
 geseon on me swilce , drihten . 
 nesan acyr þu æfre fram þin cniht þu clæne gesyhð , 
 forðam me feond toh feohtað geneahhe ; 
 gehyran me hrædlice and me helpan fremman . 
 behealdan min sawol and hi hrædlice 
 alysan and wiðfere laþu feond . 
 arscame ; 
 for þinne ansyn ealle syndon 
 þu feond me fæcne wurdon . 
 min heorte gebidan hearmedwit feala 
 and yrmðu manig eacan aræfnede ; 
 nabban eorl se ænig sorh ; 
 frefrend ic sœ̄сan , findan ic nesan miht . 
 hi min mete mengdan wiþ gealla 
 and þu gedrugadne drenctan mid eced . 
 wese hira beodan for him wendan on grin 
 and on edlean yfel and on æwisce . 
 syn hira eage eacan adimmad , 
 þæt hi geseon nesan magan siððan awiht ; 
 weorðe hira bæc swilce abeged eacan . 
 ageot ofer hi þu þæt gram yrre , 
 and æbylignes eacan yrre þin 
 hi forgripan gramhicgende . 
 wese wiс hira weste and idel ; 
 nesan on hira eðele nesan su þinc oneardiend . 
 forðam hi eall ehtan onginnan , 
 þu þu him earfoðu ænig giefan , 
 and me wea ecton min wundian sar . 
 asettan him þu unriht toh þu hi geearnedan , 
 and mid unriht ær gewyrсean , 
 and hi on þu soþfæst weorc siððan nesan gangan . 
 syn hi adilgad of gedefe eacan 
 se lifigendra leof boc ; 
 nesan wesan hi mid soðfæstum siððan awritene . 
 ic me self eam sarig þearfian , 
 and me andwlita onfon ecean drihten , 
 se me holdlice hælan sona . 
 nu ic naman drihten neod herian 
 and he mid lofsange lædan swilce . 
 ic þæm leof god lician swyþor 
 þonne æðele cealf , þiсgan þu him upp agan 
 horn on heafod oððe heard cleo . 
 geseoð þæt and gefeoð , sarie þearfa , 
 seceað drihten and ge sawel leofað . 
 forðam þu þearfendan þriste drihten 
 gehyreð holdlice ; nyllan he gehæfte eacan 
 on hira neod na forhycgan . 
 herian he swilce heofan and eorþ , 
 side sæflodas and þu him syndon on . 
 forðam sione god simble hæleð ; 
 beoð mænige burh mid iudeum 
 eft getimbrade , þær hi eard nimað . 
 þær hi yrfestol eft gesittað 
 and hira eþel begytað esnas drihtenes , 
 and hit naman neod lufiað , 
 þær eardiað awa toh feorh . ## wesan , drihten god , deore fultuman ; 
 behealdan , drihten , me , and me hraðe siððan 
 gefultuma æt feorhþearfe . 
 þonne beoð gescende and sceamu dreogað , 
 þu þu min fynd fæcne wesan 
 and min sawol sœ̄сan mid niðe . 
 hi on hinderlincg hweorfað and cyrrað ; 
 ealle hira scamian , þu me yfel hogedon . 
 and hira æfstu eacan ealle sceamien , 
 þu me word cweþan : " wegan la , wegan la ! " 
 habban þu mid wynn weorðe bliss , 
 þu þu secean simble drihten , 
 and simble cweðan : " su þu miht , drihten ! " 
 and þin hælu hold lufigean . 
 ic wesan wædla and worldþearfa ; 
 gefultuma me , god , frea ælmihtig . 
 þu me fultuman wesan fæstan , drihten , 
 wesan alysend min ; nesan læt þu awiht . ## ic on þu , god drihten , gearuwe gewene ; 
 nesan weorðe ic on ealdor æfre gescended ; 
 þu me sniome alysan þurh þin þu swiþeran miht . 
 ahyld me þu eare toh hold mod , 
 and me lust alysan and me lungre weorð 
 on god drihten georne þeccend 
 and on trum stow , þæt þu me tela hæle . 
 forðam þu me , god , wære gear trymmend , 
 freoða fultumiend ; alysan me feond nu , 
 and me of folm afere firenwyrcendra , 
 þu þin æ efnan nellað ; 
 syndon unriht ealle wyrcende . 
 forðam þu me wesan fæle geþyld fæstan , drihten 
 wære me on geoguþ hyht gleaw æt frymþ . 
 ic of modur hrife mundbyrd on þu 
 þriste habban ; þu wesan þeccend min ; 
 on þu ic singge nu simble and geneahhie . 
 ic wesan swa forebeacen folc manig , 
 and þu me wesan fultuman strang fæstan æt þearf . 
 su min muð and min mod mægene gefyllan , 
 þæt ic þu lof mæge lust singan 
 and wuldur þu wid mærsian 
 and þu eall dæg æghwær herian . 
 nesan aweorpan þu me , wuldor ealdor , 
 þonne me yldan tidan on gesige ; 
 þonne me mægen and mod mylte on hreðre , 
 nesan forlætan þu me , lifian god . 
 oft me feala cweþan feond yfele , 
 and sætendan sawol minre 
 and on an þeссean eodan togædere . 
 cweþað cuðlice : " wuton cunnian , 
 hwanne he god lætan swa swa gymeleas ; 
 þonne we he forgripan and hit gear ehtan ; 
 siððan he nesan habban helpend an . " 
 nesan ofgif þu me huru , god ælmihtig ; 
 beseon þu me , soð god , simble on fultuman . 
 beoð gedrette , eacan gescende , 
 þu min sawol ær swyþust tældun ; 
 byð þæm scand and sceamu þu me syrwedan yfel . 
 ic me simble on god swiðe getreowige , 
 ofer eall þu lof lengest hihte . 
 min muð sægeð þin mægenspede 
 and þu soþfæst weorc swyþust mæreð , 
 sægeð þu eall dæg ece hælu . 
 forðam ic nesan ongitan gram ceapunga , 
 acan ic on þin þu myclan miht gangan . 
 ic þin soðfæstnesse gemunan simble , drihten ; 
 þu me arian , god , ærest læran 
 of geoguðhade ; nu ic wesan gomel winter . 
 wifcynn ic wundor þu weorþlic sægan , 
 and ic þæt wiþ oryldu awa fremman ; 
 nesan forlætan þu me , lifian god , 
 oððæt ic þin earm eall asecgan 
 stiþe strencðe þes cneoris , 
 eall þæm teohhe , þu nu toweard ys , 
 þin mihtes þri , and þæt mære soð , 
 þæt þu on heofenum , god , heah gewyrсean 
 wundur wræclicu ; nesan þu , wuldor cyning , 
 ænig æfre gelic , ece drihten . 
 oft þu me ætywdest earfoðes feala 
 on costunge cuþ mannian , 
 and me yfel feala oft oncnyssedest ; 
 þonne þu yrre þu eft oncyrdest 
 and me of neowelnes eft neoðan alysan 
 þes eorþ , þu we on buiað . 
 þær þu þu soþfæst weorc sniome tobræddest , 
 þonne þu gehwyrfdest and helpan min , 
 and me getrymedest þæt ic tela miht ; 
 forðam ic þu andettan , ece drihten , 
 and þu on sealmfatum singan be hearpe , 
 israela god , ece and halig . 
 min weler gefeoð , wynn lofiað , 
 þonne ic þu singan , sigorian wealdend , 
 and min sawel eacan , þu þu self lysan . 
 swilce min tunge tid mæran 
 þu soþfæst weorc ; scende wesan ealle 
 þu me yfel toh ær geseсan . ## syl don þinne , drihten , kyning ; 
 sunu cynincges syl , þæt he soð healdan . 
 deman þu þu folc deore mid soð , 
 healdan þin þearfa hold mid dom . 
 onfon beorg eacan beorht sibb 
 on þin folc fæger bliss 
 and geswyru eacan soþ dæd . 
 on hit soðfæstnesse swilce demeð 
 on folc fyrhte þearfa , 
 swilce he þearfena birnan þriste hæleð . 
 he þu hermcweðend hyneð and bygeð , 
 se mid sunne wunað swilce mid spiht , 
 þurh eall weorold weorold wunað him ece . 
 he þonne astigeð , swa se strang ren 
 fealleð on flys heran , and swa fæger dropian 
 þu on þes eorþ upon dreopað . 
 on hit agen dæg ypped weorðeþ 
 syb soðfæstnes swiðe genihtsum , 
 oþþæt byð ahebban hluttor mona . 
 he þonne wealdeð wer cneoris 
 be sæ tweonum , sidu rice , 
 and fram streamracum styreð him eall 
 oþ þes eorþ utgemæru . 
 he sigelwearas seceað ealle 
 and hit feond folde liccigeað . 
 cumað of tharsis tires eadig 
 and of ealandum utan kynincgas ; 
 þu him eardgyfu æðele bringað 
 of arabia , eacan of saba ; 
 ealle him leode lacu cwemað . 
 he weorðiað weorold kyning 
 þu on eorðwege ealle syndan ; 
 ealle þeod he weorðiað georne . 
 forðam he alyseð lungre þearfa , 
 þæt him se welig nesan mæg wiht onsittan , 
 and se wædlan , þu on weorold næfð 
 ahwær elles ænig fultuman . 
 he helpeð þearfa , swilce eacan wædlan , 
 and he þearfigendra sawol gehæleð . 
 he of mansceatte and of mane eacan 
 sniome hira sawol softe alysan ; 
 ys hit nama for him neod gebyrhted . 
 he lyfað leode , him byð lungre sellan ; 
 of arabia gold eorl lædað ; 
 he weorþiað wer cneoressa 
 and he eall dæg eacan bletsiað . 
 þonne æðele getrym eorþ weardað , 
 bið se beorht ahebban ofer beorg up ; 
 ofer libanum licgeað hit yþian , 
 and on burh beon blostma fæger 
 swa on eorþ heg ute on land . 
 þonne byð hit nama ofer eall niða birnan 
 and toh wid feorh weorðeð gebletsian ; 
 ær sunne hit nama soþfæst standeð , 
 byð hit setl ær swilce þonne mona . 
 and him byð eorþe cynn eall gebletsad ; 
 ealle he þeod þriste heriað . 
 wese israhela ece drihten 
 and hira sylfra god simble gebletsad , 
 se þu wundor micel wyrceð ana ; 
 seon hit miht nama mod gebletsad 
 on ecnes awa toh worlde . 
 and þes eorþ seon eall gefyllan , 
 þurh hit wuldor miht . wese swa , wese swa ! ## hu god wesan ece god mid israhelum , 
 þæm þu mid heorte hycgeað rihte ; 
 me fornean syndon losian nu þe 
 ealle on folde fot gang . 
 forðam ic fæstlice fyrenwyrcende 
 oft elnade ; noldun earm mid him 
 sibb secean , sœ̄сan fyren . 
 forðam hira deaðes byð deorc endestæf , 
 nesan hira wite bið wislic trymnes . 
 nesan synd hi on micel mannian gewinn , 
 and hi mid mannian nesan beoð mægene beswungene . 
 forðam hi oferhygd niman ungemete swyþ , 
 þurh þæt hira unriht wearð eall untynan . 
 þanan forþ becuman fæcne unriht , 
 swa swa hit of gelynde lungre cuman , 
 and hi on heorte hogedon and þenсean , 
 hu hi fyrmest facen and unriht 
 on hean hus hraðost acweþan . 
 hwæt#2 , hi on heofon settan hyсgan hyra muþ , 
 and hira tunge teon ofer eorþ . 
 forðam min folc hider fæger hweorfeð , 
 þær hi full dæg findað sona . 
 and þonne cweþan : " hu weorðeð þes cuð god 
 oþþe þes gewitness weorðeþ on heah gewinnan " 
 þi nu fyrenfulle folde æht 
 and þes weorold wela wynn niman . 
 þu ic on mod cweðan minum sona , 
 þiсgan þu ic on me ingcan an nesan witan , 
 hu ic min heorte healdan mid soð , 
 and min hand þwean , þær ic hettan nytan , 
 and ic wesan eall dæg eacan swingan , 
 wesan me leawfinger be leoht dæg . 
 gif ic self cweþan and sæcge eacan , 
 swa þu birnan weorðað geboren siððan , 
 þu ilca ic ær foreteode . 
 ic se wendan , þæt ic mid wisdom 
 full gleawlice ongitan miht , 
 hu þes gewinnan willan gangan , 
 oþþæt ic on hit hus halig gangan 
 and ic þu nihsta ongitan neod siððan . 
 hwæðere þu him for inwite yfel befeolan , 
 aweorpan hi wrað , þu hi wendan ær , 
 þæt hi wesan alysan , laðum wiðferede . 
 nu syndon hi gewordene wrað tolysan , 
 and semninga sneome forweorþan 
 for unriht þu hi ær don , 
 swa fram slæpan hwylc swærum arisan . 
 and hi on burh drihten beald habbað 
 hira ansyn , and þu hi eaðe miht 
 toh nawihte forniman sneome . 
 ys minre heorte hige hluttor and clæne , 
 wærun min æder ealle tolysan , 
 and ic toh nawihte wesan nyde gebiged , 
 swa ic þæt be owihte ær nesan witan . 
 ic wesan anlic mid þu an neat 
 and ic simble mid þu siððan hwæðere . 
 þu min swyþran hand self geniman , 
 and me mid þin willan well gelædan , 
 and me þu mid wuldor wela geniman . 
 hwæt#2 mæg me wiðerhabban on heofonrice gewinnan 
 hwæt#2 willan ic fram þu wyrcean ofer eorþe gewinnan 
 me wesan heorte and flæsc heard geteorad ; 
 ys me heorte gehygd hyldu drihten 
 and ece dælan awa toh weorold . 
 forðam þu forweorþað , þu hira wynn toh þu 
 habban noldan , nesan hira hyсgan settan ; 
 huru þu forleosest þu forhealdað þu . 
 min wesan ætfele mihtig drihten ; 
 good wesan swilce , þæt ic on god drihten 
 min hyht settan , healdan fæstan . 
 and ic eall þu lof eft asecgan 
 sione dohtor on hire sylfre duru . ## for hwinan þu we , ece god , æfre willan 
 æt ende fram þu ahwær drifan gewinnan 
 wesan þu yrre strang and egesian micel 
 ofer þu ongeagn eowan sceap . 
 gemunan þu mannweorod , þæt þu , mihtig god , 
 æt fruma ærest fæger gewyrсean . 
 þu þin yrfe æþelu gyrdan 
 self alysan and sione burh , 
 on þæm ilca þu eard geniman ; 
 hebban þu þin hand and hyn hira oferhygd ; 
 feala wyrgnessa wrað feond 
 þin þæm halig hefig brohtan ; 
 gylpað gramhydige , þu þu geo ehtan 
 and on þinne wiс wuniað midle . 
 settan hira tacn , soþ nesan ongietan , 
 swa hi on weсgan wyrcean sculan 
 wundorbeacen , swa hi on wudu dydan . 
 hi mid æxum duru ellen curfan , 
 and mid twyecgum teoledan georne 
 þæt hi mid adesa ealle towurpan . 
 þu hi þæt þu fæger hus fyr forbærndan 
 and on eorðstede eacan gewemdan , 
 þæt þin naman geweorþan niode cennan . 
 cwædan on heorte : " wutan cuman ealle 
 and ure mæg mid we ; wutun þider gemot habban 
 and symbeldagas swilce drihten 
 on eorðwege ealle towurpan . 
 nesan we sweotul tacn we geseoð ænig , 
 nesan we on ænig wise witega habbað , 
 þæt we andgytes micel æfre secgen . " 
 willan þu hu lange , wealdend drihten , 
 edwit þolian yfel feond 
 and naman þinne nu bysmriað 
 þu wiþerweardan wraþ wiþ ende gewinnan 
 for hwinan awendan þu wuldor ansyn 
 æfre fram we , eacan þu swyðran hand 
 of þin sceat self wiþ ende gewinnan 
 usser god kynincg , gear þu wyrсean , 
 ær weorold wære , wise hælu 
 on þes eorþe efenmidre . 
 þu on þin mægenes miht sped 
 sæ gesettan , swilce gebrecan 
 þæt draca heafod deop wæter . 
 þu se myclan draca miht forcuman 
 and hit þæt heard heafod gescændest , 
 sellan siglhearwum siððan toh mos . 
 þu self eacan toslitan wyllas 
 and hlynnende hlud stream 
 on æthane ealle adrigdest . 
 þu dæg settan and deorc niht , 
 swilce þu gesettan sunne and spiht ; 
 ealle þu gewyrсean eorþ gemære , 
 sumor þu and lencten swilce gewyrсean . 
 wesan þu gemyndig mannian bearn , 
 se gesceafta þu þu gesceope þu ; 
 fynd ætwitað fæcne drihten , 
 unwis folc nesan witan þinne wyrðne naman . 
 nesan syl þu unscyldigra sawol deore 
 þu þu andettað earm þearfa ; 
 þær þu on ealdor nesan forgit , ece drihten . 
 geseon þu nu self , god , soð wesan gecyðed , 
 nu þu gewitnes ys wel gefyllan , 
 hu deorc beoð dæg on eorþ 
 þæm þu unriht æghwær wyrceað . 
 nesan byð se eadmoda æfre gecyrran , 
 þiсgan þu wædla and þearfian he wyle 
 naman þinne neod herian . 
 arisan , drihten god , deman þin nu 
 eald intinga ; eacan wesan gemyndig , 
 hu þu unwis edwita fela 
 þurh eall dæg oft aspræcon . 
 nesan forgit huru god mannian 
 soð stefn , þu þu seceað þu ; 
 fyllan þu oferhydigan , þe þu feogeað þu , 
 and eft toh þu ealle stigað . ## we þu andettað , eсe drihten , 
 and þu andettað ealle þeod 
 and naman þinne neod ciegen . 
 ic þu wundur eall wræclic sæcge , 
 swa ic fæstlicast mæg befon word , 
 and eacan soð simble deman . 
 eorþ wesan meltan and hire eardend mid ; 
 ic þonne hire swyre simble getrymme . 
 ic toh yfel cweðan oft nalæs seldan : 
 " nelle ge unriht ænig fremman 
 and agyltan , þæt hi nesan gulpan se . 
 nesan ahebbað ge toh heah eowre hygeþancas , 
 nesan ge wiþ god æfre gramword sprecan . " 
 forðam eastan nesan cymeð guma ænig , 
 nesan of westwegum wer cneoris , 
 nesan of þes weste wid moru ; 
 forðam him wesan dema drihten self . 
 sum he gehyneð , sum ahefeð sniome ; 
 forðam se wine steap on waldendes hand 
 fæger gefyllan wesan ; se onfehð þu he unnan . 
 þonne he of þes on þæt þonne oncerreð , 
 nyllan he þu dærstan him don unbryce ; 
 forðam sculan ealle drincan synfull , 
 þu on þes folde fyren wyrceað ; 
 ic þonne weorold gefea wynn healdan , 
 and iacobes god georne singan . 
 eall fyrenfulra fyhtehornas 
 ic bealdlice gebrecan sniome ; 
 swyþ beoð ahafene þu soðfæstan . ## god wesan gear cuð mid iudeum , 
 and hit æþelu nama mid israelum . 
 wesan on sibb hit stow soþ behealdan , 
 and he on sione swilce eardað . 
 þær he hornbogan heard gebendeð , 
 and sweord and sceld æt gescotfeohta . 
 þu wræclice wundor onlyhtest 
 fram þæm eceum hider æðele beorg ; 
 ealle synt yrre , þu þu unwis 
 hira heorte hige healdað mid dysig ; 
 hi slæpan hira swæfun unmurne ; 
 nesan þær wiht fundan , þu þu wela sohtan , 
 se þu hi on hand hæfdan god . 
 for þinne þrea þriste onginnan , 
 iacobes god , georne slepan , 
 þu þu on hors hwilum wesan ; 
 wesan þu egesian micel ; hwylc mæg æfre þu , 
 gif þu yrre buan , ahwær wiðstandan gewinnan 
 þonne þu of heofenum don hider on eorþe 
 mid gescote sendan , þonne hio swyþ beofað ; 
 þonne toh dom drihten ariseð , 
 þæt he on eorþ don ealle hal 
 þu he mildheort meteð and findeð . 
 forðam þu mann þenсean mægen andetteð , 
 and þonne þu laf lust þence , 
 þæt ic þu symbeldæg settan and gyrwan . 
 gehatað nu drihten , and him hraðe gildan 
 eowrum þæm god god georne ; 
 ealle þu on ymbhwyrfte ahwær syndan , 
 him gyfe bringan god and clæne . 
 toh þæm egsan sculan æghwylc habban , 
 þu wer gast wealdeð and healdeð ; 
 eorðcynincgum se ege standeð . ## ic mid stefn onginnan styrman toh drihten , 
 and he me gehyrdan and behealdan sona . 
 ic on earfoðdæge eсe drihten 
 sœ̄сan mid hand swyþ geneahhe , 
 and ic on niht for him neod gan ; 
 næs ic on þæm siþ beswican awiht . 
 and ic swiðe wiðsoc sawol minre 
 fæle frofor ; þu ic fæstan god 
 gemyndgade , þær ic habban mæstne hyht . 
 swiðe ic begangan wesan and min sylfes gast 
 wesan hwonlice ormod worden , 
 wesan eage min eacan mid wæcceum 
 werded swyþ ; nesan sprecan ic word feala . 
 þu ic eald dæg eft geþenсan , 
 habban me ece gear ealle on mod . 
 ic þu mid heorte onginnan hycggean niht ; 
 wesan min gast on me georne gebysgad . 
 þu ic self cweðan : " ic toh soð witan , 
 nele þes ece god æfre toweorpan 
 nesan we witnian for hit weldædum , 
 oððe wiþ ende æfre toh weorold 
 hit milde mod mann afyrran 
 on woruldlife wer cneoris . 
 nesan byð æfre god ungemyndig , 
 þæt he miltsian mannian cynn , 
 oþþe on yrre æfre willan 
 hit milde mod mann dyrne . " 
 and ic selfa cweðan : " nu ic sona onginnan 
 þes geunwendnes wenan ærest 
 þær hean hand halig drihten , 
 weorc wræclicra word gemyndig , 
 þæt he æt fruma wundor fæger gewyrсean . " 
 þu ic metegian onginnan mænigra weorc , 
 hu ic me on eall þæm eaðust gehealdan ; 
 on eall þin weorc ic wesan smeagean , 
 swilce ic on þin gehylde self begangan . 
 ys weruda god on weсgan halig ; 
 hwylc wesan mihtig god butan ure se mære god gewinnan 
 þu wesan ana god , þu æghwylc miht 
 wundor gewyrcean on woruldlife . 
 eft þu þin miht mænige cyðdest 
 folc on folde ; þu wiðferedes eacan 
 israhela birnan of ægyptum . 
 hwæt#2 , þu , wuldor god , wæter sceawedon 
 and þu geseon sealtan yþian ; 
 forht wurdan flod gedrefan , 
 wesan swegan micel sealtera wæterian . 
 sellan weorðlice wolcnas stefn 
 þurh þin stræle strang foran ; 
 wesan þunurradstefn strang on hweol . 
 þonne ligette lixan cwoman , 
 eall ymbhwyrft eorþ onhrerdan . 
 wærun weg þin on wid sæ 
 and þin stigan ofer strang wæter ; 
 nesan bið þær eþe þu spor on toh findanne . 
 folc þu þu ferian swa fæle sceap 
 þurh moyses mihtig hand 
 and aarones ealle gesund . ## gehealdan þu , min folc , min fæstan æ ; 
 ahyldað eowre eare , þæt ge holdlice 
 min muðes word miht gehyran . 
 ic on anlicnessum ærest ontynan 
 min sylfes muð , secggean onginnan , 
 þu on worldricum wesan æt frymþ . 
 ealle þu we oncneowan , cuð ongietan , 
 and ure fæder we æror sægan . 
 noldan hi þu swiðe hira synn dyrne , 
 acan yld gehwylc oðer cyðde . 
 sægan lof simble leof drihten 
 and hit þu myclan miht , menigu wundur , 
 þu he gewyrсean wer cneoris . 
 he aweссan gewitnes 
 on iacobe goode and strang , 
 and israhelum æ gesette . 
 þu he fæstan bebeodan fædera ussum , 
 þæt hi hira bearn budun and sægdun , 
 and cinn oðer cyðden and mæran . 
 gif birnan wære geboren þæm fæder , 
 him sculan se yldra eall gesæcgan , 
 þæt hi gleaw hyht toh god hæfdan , 
 and hit weorðlicu weorc gemunan , 
 and god bebod georne heoldan . 
 nesan wesan hi on facn fædera gelice ; 
 þæt wesan earfoðcynn yrre and reðe ; 
 nabban hira heorte hige gestaðelod ; 
 nesan toh wenanne , se willan god 
 hira gast mid him gyme awiht . 
 effremes birnan ærest ongunnan 
 of boga stræle biter sendan , 
 se hi on wig dæge wendan æfter . 
 nesan heoldan hi halig drihten 
 gewitnes , nesan hit weorc æ 
 awiht wislice woldan begangan . 
 eall goddæda hi forgiten habban , 
 and þær wundrian , þu he wyrсean ær , 
 þær hira yldran on locadan . 
 he on ægypta agen land 
 him wyrсean for wundur mære 
 and on campotanea eacan mid soð . 
 he sæ toslitan , sealtan yþian 
 gefæstnade , and hi foran þurh . 
 him wisian wolcen unlytel 
 dæg æghwylce , swa hit drihten hettan , 
 and him ealle niht oðer beacen 
 fyr leoma folcnede healdan . 
 he on westen wid ædre 
 him of stane lætan , strang burna . 
 of þæm wæter cwoman weorude toh helpan , 
 swyþ wynlice wæterian þryðe . 
 þu hi hira firen furþur ehtan , 
 and he on yrre eft gebrohtan , 
 hira heafodweard hold on land . 
 hi þu on heorte hogedon toh niðe , 
 and geornlice god costadan , 
 bædan hira feorh foddur giefan , 
 and gramlice be god spræcan : 
 " acan we se nesan wenað , þæt we witig god 
 mæge bringan toh beodan gegearwian 
 on þes westen wid and sidu , 
 þiсgan þu he of stane stream lætan 
 wæter on willan wynn flowan , 
 nesan we hwæðere wenað , þæt he wiht mæge 
 mid hlaf þes folc heran afedan . " 
 siððan þæt gehyrdan halig drihten , 
 he yldan þu git and eft gesprecan ; 
 wesan gegleded fyr on iacobe 
 and hit yrre birnan on israhelas , 
 forðam þu hi nesan willan word drihten 
 lust gelyfan , lar forhogedon . 
 hettan he þu wid duru wolcen ontynan 
 heah of heofenum and hider rignan 
 mannian toh mos mannian cynn , 
 sellan him heofenes hlaf hider on folde , 
 and engel hlaf etan mancynn , 
 and hwæten habban toh geniht . 
 and awehte þu wind of heofenum , 
 auster ærest and þu affricum . 
 him þu eacan feallan ufan flæsc toh geniht ; 
 swa sand sæ oððe þiss sweart dust 
 coman gefiðrade fugelas swilce . 
 and on midde þu wiс manig feollan 
 and ymb hira selegescotu swiðe geneahhe . 
 swiðe ætan and sæd wurdan , 
 and hira lust lifdan hwil ; 
 nesan hi bescyrede sceattes willan . 
 þu git hi on muðe hira mete habban , 
 þu him on becuman yrre drihten 
 and hira mænige mane swultan , 
 æðele israhela eacan forwurdan . 
 in eall hi þes ihtan synn , 
 and noldan hit wundor wel gelyfan . 
 hi hira dagena tidan dædun idel 
 and hira gear gancg eacan unnytt . 
 þonne he hi sar slean , þonne hi sœ̄сan he , 
 and ær sunnan toh him lust cwoman . 
 siððan hi ongietan , þæt wesan god hira 
 fæle fultuman , freond æt þearf ; 
 wesan heah god hira alysend , 
 hi he lufedan leas muðe , 
 nesan se on heorte hogedan awiht . 
 næs him on hreðre heorte clæne , 
 nesan hi on gewitnes wis habban , 
 on hira fyrhþe fæst geleafa . 
 he þonne wesan mildheort and manðwære 
 hira fyrendædum , nyllan hi toh flymum gedon . 
 he þu manig fram him mangewyrhtan 
 yrre awendan , eall nesan willan 
 þurh hat hyсgan hæleðum cyþan . 
 and he gemunan þæt hi wær molde and flæsc 
 gast gangan , næs se geancyr eft . 
 hi he on westen word and dæd 
 on yrre mod eft gebrohtan , 
 aweahtan he on eorþ oft butan wæter . 
 oft hi grimlice god costodan 
 and israhela god eacan abulgan . 
 na gemynd hæfdan , hu hit seon mycle hand 
 on gewindæge werian and ferian . 
 he ægypti egesa geþywde 
 mid feala tacnian and forebeacna 
 in campotaneos ; þæt wesan cuð wer . 
 þær he wæterstreamas wendan toh blod ; 
 nesan magan wæter drincan wiht ænig . 
 settan him heard wite , hund fleoge , 
 and hi ætan eacan yfel tostan ; 
 hæfdan hi eallunga ut awyrpan . 
 sellan erucan , yfel wyrm , 
 lætan hira wyrtian wæstm forslitan , 
 and hira gram gewinnan hæfdan gærshoppa . 
 hira wingeard wraþ hægl 
 nede forniman ; nænig motan 
 hira hror hriman æpla gedigean . 
 sellan hira neotan eacan swilce hægl , 
 and hira æht ealle fyr . 
 he æbyligðe on hi bitter and yrre , 
 sarlic sendan oþ sawlhord 
 and þæt wiþ yfele engel sendan . 
 he him wegan wyrсean wrað yrre , 
 nesan he hira sawol deað swiðe nesan sparude 
 and hira neotan niðcwealm forswelgan . 
 he þu on þæm folc frumbearna gehwylc 
 on ægiptum eall acwellan 
 and frumwæstme folc chames . 
 þu he hit folc geniman swa fæle sceap , 
 lædan geliccast leof eowan 
 þurh westen weg uncuðe . 
 and he hi on hihte hold lædan ; 
 næs him on fyrhtu feond egsian , 
 acan ealle þu yþian forniman . 
 he hi þu gelædan on leof burh 
 and halig , þe hit hand begietan . 
 and he manig for him mære þeon 
 aweorpan of wiсe , sellan him weste land , 
 þæt hi mid tan getugan rihte . 
 þu israelas æht gesætan 
 hror folc , þu hi hean god 
 gebysmredan , nyllan hit bebod 
 fæstan healdan . 
 hi awendan aweg , nalæs wel dydan , 
 swa hira fæder beforan heoldan , 
 and on wiðermede wendan and cyrdan . 
 swa hi hit yrre oft aweahtan , 
 þonne hi oferhydig up ahofan , 
 and him wohgodu worhtan and grofun . 
 þu þæt gehyrdan halig drihten , 
 he hi forhogode , and hraðe siððan 
 israhela cynn egsan geðyde . 
 and he þu swa gelome wiðsoc snytruhuse , 
 wesan hit ongeagn hus , þær he eard geniman 
 ær mid mann , mihtig habban . 
 he hi þu on hæftnyd hean gesellan 
 and hira fæger folc on feond hand . 
 sellan þu hit swæs folc sweord under ecge , 
 and hit yrfe eacan eall forhogode . 
 hira geoguþ eacan grimman liсgan 
 fyr fæðmade ; fæmne nesan wær 
 geong begrette , þiсgan þu hi gram swultan . 
 wær sacerd hira sweord abrotene ; 
 nesan þæt hira widwan wepan mostan . 
 þu wearð aweссan wealdend drihten , 
 swa he slæpan softe restan 
 oððe swa weorð munan wine druncen . 
 he þu hit feond slean and him ætfæste eacan 
 ece edwit awa toh feorh . 
 and he georne wiðsoc iosepes hus , 
 nesan þon ær geceosan effremes cynn , 
 acan he geceosan iudan him geswæs frumcynn 
 on sione burh , þær him wesan simble leof . 
 he þu anhornan eall gelician 
 hit halig hus heran on eorþ 
 getimbrade ; hettan þæt tela siððan 
 on worldrice wunian ece . 
 and him þe dauid geceosan , deoren esne , 
 and geniman he æt eowan ute be sceapum , 
 fostur feormade ; he him onfencg hraðe . 
 he þonne fedeð folc iacobes 
 and israhela yrfelafe . 
 and he hi þonne butan facn fedeð siððan , 
 and hit folm siððan hi forþ lædeð . ## cuman on þin yrfe , ece drihten , 
 fremde þeon , þu þu fæle hus , 
 ealh halig yfele gewemdan . 
 settan hierusalem samod anlicast 
 swa in æppelbearu an cytan ; 
 swilce hi settan swylt þin esnum , 
 sellan flæsc hira fugol toh mos , 
 halig liс hund and deore . 
 hi þær bearn blod on burh lætan 
 swa munan geotan wæter ymb hierusalem ; 
 blodig lah , nahtan byrgendas . 
 we synd gewordene wer cneoris 
 eall edwitstæf ymbsittendum , 
 þu we ahwær neah nu þe syndon . 
 hu willan þu , wuldor god , wrað yrre þu 
 on ende fram we æfre oncyrran gewinnan 
 wesan nu onbærned biter þu yrre 
 on þin folc fyr hat . 
 ageot yrre þu on þæt romana 
 and on cneowmagas þu nesan cunnan þu , 
 nesan naman þinne neod cigeað . 
 forðam hi iacob gear ætan , 
 and hit wicstede weste gelome . 
 nesan gemunan þu toh oft , miht wealdend , 
 ealdor unriht þu we oft fremman , 
 acan we hraðe begytan hyldo þin , 
 forðam we ðearfende þearle syndon . 
 gefultuma we , frea ælmihtig , 
 and alysan we , lifian god ; 
 weorð ure synn sefte and milde 
 for naman þin neod and aare . 
 þywan læs æfre cweðan oðer þeod , 
 hæðen herigeas , " hwær cuman ge halig god gewinnan " 
 and we þæt on eage oftust weorpan , 
 þær mannian wese micel ætgædere . 
 wrecan ongeagn blod esna þinne , 
 þæt wesan sarlice ageotan , þær þu geseon toh ; 
 geong for þu gnornendra care 
 þær þu on feter fæstan wær . 
 æfter ðines earm æðele mægene 
 gegangan þu deaða birnan þu hi demað nu . 
 gyldan nu gramhydigum , swa hi geearnedan , 
 on sceotan hira seofonfeald wracu , 
 forðam hi edwit on þu ealle habban . 
 we þu folc wærun and fæle sceap 
 eowdes þin ; we þu andettað , 
 and þu toh weorold wuldur sæcgeað 
 and þu on weorold weorold word heriað . ## þu þu israela æðele cynn 
 reccest and rædan , þu nu recen behealdan , 
 þu þu ioseph swa sceap grama wiðlæddest . 
 þu þu self nu sittan ofer cherubin , 
 æteow for effraim eacan mannasse 
 and beniamin , nu we biddað þu . 
 awece þin miht and mid wuldor cuman , 
 and we hal don heran on eorþ . 
 gehweorfan we , mægena god , and we milde æteow 
 þinne andwlitan ; ealle we beoð hal . 
 eala þu , mægena god , mære drihten , 
 hu lange yrsast þu on þin esnes gebed gewinnan 
 tyhtan we and fedan tear hlaf , 
 and we drincan gefan deorc tear 
 mannian gehwylc on gemetan riht . 
 þu we asettan on sarcwide 
 ure neahmannum ; nu we cunnion , 
 hu we mid fraceðum fynd bysmriað . 
 gehweorfan we , mægena god , and we milde æteow 
 þinne andwlitan ; ealle we beoð hal . 
 þu of ægyptum ut alædan 
 wræstne wingeard , weorpan þeon 
 and se ilca þær eft asettan . 
 þu him wegan beforan wyrсean riht , 
 and hit wyrttruma wræstne settan , 
 þanan eorþ wearð eall gefyllan . 
 hit se brad scua beorg þeссean , 
 and hit tan astigun god cedderbeam . 
 ealle þu telga þu him of hlidað , 
 þu æt sæstreamas sealtan gebræddest , 
 and hi toh flod forþ aweaxað . 
 forhwan þu toweorpan weallfæsten hit gewinnan 
 wealdeð hit winbyrig eall þæt on weсgan færð . 
 he utan of wudu eoferas wrotað , 
 and wilde deor westað and frettað . 
 gehweorfan nu , mægena god , milde and spedig 
 þin ansyn ufan of heofenum ; 
 gewitan and beseon wingeard þes , 
 þæt he mid rihte ræde gangan , 
 se þin seon swiðre settan æt frymþ , 
 and ofer mann sunu , þu þu hit miht ær 
 under þu getrymedest , tires wealdend . 
 fyr onbærneð , folm þurhdelfeð ; 
 fram ansyn egsan ðines 
 ealle þu on ealdor yfele forweorðað . 
 seon þu seon swiðre hand ofer soð wer 
 and ofer mann sunu ; þu hit miht þu 
 geagnadest , ealle getrymedest , 
 weoruda drihten ; nesan gewitað we fram þu . 
 acan þu we wel cwician , wealdend mihtig ; 
 we naman þinne neod cigeað . 
 gehweorfan we , mægena ## gif þu , israhel , wifcynn wylt ellen gehyran . 
 gif þu , israhel , me an gehyrdan , 
 nesan byð god on þu niwe metan , 
 nesan þu fremede god self gebiddest . 
 ic wesan þu god , þu gear þu 
 of ægypta eorþe alædan . 
 ontynan þinne muð and ic he tela fyllu ; 
 nele min folc min stefn æfre gehyran , 
 nesan me israhel behealdan hold mod . 
 acan hi lifian hettan lust heorte 
 swa him leofust wesan , leode þeod , 
 æfter hira willum wynn micel . 
 þær min ongeagn folc , israhela cynn , 
 me mid gehygd hyran cuðan , 
 oþþe on weg min woldan gangan , 
 þonne ic hira fynd fyllan and hynde , 
 and þæt mycle mægen min hand 
 hira ehtendas ealle forniman . 
 him fynd god fæcne leogað ; 
 byð hira yfele tidan awa toh feorh . 
 he hi fedan mid fætt lynde , 
 hwæte and hunige , þæt him halig god 
 sellan of stane , oþþæt hi sæd wesan . ## god mihtig standan god on gemange , 
 and he hi on midle mægene tosceadeð . 
 hu lange deman ge dom unriht , 
 and ge onfoð ansyn synnwyrcendra gewinnan 
 demað steopcildum dom soð 
 and eadmedum eacan þæt self , 
 wædla and ðearfum wel soðfæstum . 
 ge of firenfull fæcne hand 
 þearfa and wædlan þriste alysað . 
 nesan ongeatan hi nesan gear wistan , 
 acan hi on ðystrum þrage eodan ; 
 ealle abeofedan eorþ staþelas . 
 ic ærest cweðan : " ge synd uppe god , 
 ealle uphea , and æðele birnan . 
 ge þonne sweltað samod mid mann , 
 swa ealdormann on gefealleð . " 
 arisan drihten , nu ! deman eorðware , 
 forðam þu wesan erfeweard eall ðeoda . ## hwylc wesan þu gelic , ece drihten gewinnan 
 nesan swigian þu , nesan þu silf bewere . 
 forðam þin feond fæcne forwurdan , 
 þu þu fæstan ær feodan , drihten , 
 and hira heafod wiþ þu hofe swiðe . 
 hi on þin folc him facengeswipere 
 syredan and feredan , and toh swican hogedon , 
 and ehtunga ealle habban , 
 hu hi þin halig heran yfeladan . 
 cwædan cuðlice : " wutun cuman ealle 
 and hi towyrpan geond werþeoda , 
 þæt nesan su gemyndig mannian ænig , 
 hu israhela naman ænig nemnan . " 
 forðam hi on þeссean ealle ymbsætan , 
 and gewitnes wiþ þu wise gesettan . 
 selegesceotu synd onsægd in idumea 
 and ismæhelita , eacan synt moabes , 
 ammon and ammalech , agareni , 
 swilce gebal and gram manig 
 fremde þeod mid eardiend folc on tyrum . 
 cuman samod mid ðam swilce assur ; 
 ealle on weg æghwær syndon 
 on leodstefn loðes bearn . 
 don him nu swa þu dydan dæg madiane 
 and sisare , swilce iabin ; 
 ealle þu niman ændor wylle 
 and cisone clæne hlimme ; 
 wurdan þu earm eorþe toh meohxe . 
 settan hira ealdormann swa þu oreb dydan , 
 zeb and zebee and salmanaa , 
 and hira ealdor eall swilce ; 
 ealle þu on on ær gecweþan , 
 þæt hi halignes god heran gesettan . 
 settan hi nu , min god , samod anlice 
 swa se wægnes hweol oþþe wind healm , 
 and swa færincga fyr wudu byrneð , 
 oððe swa lig freteð lungre morhæð , 
 swa þu hi on yrre ehtan and drefan , 
 þæt hi on hrernesse hræþ forweorðað . 
 gedon þæt hira ansyn awa sceamige , 
 þonne hi naman þinne neod seceað . 
 ealle beoð georette , eacan gescende , 
 and on weoruldlife weorþað gedrefan , 
 þonne hi naman þinne neod seceað . 
 þu ana wesan ofer ealle heah 
 eorðbuende , ece drihten . ## synd me wiс þin weorðe and leof , 
 mægena drihten ; wifcynn ic on mod se 
 willum habban , þet ic him wunude onn . 
 heorte min and flæsc hyhtað georne 
 on se lifian leof drihten ; 
 him eacan spedlice spearuwa hus begyteð , 
 and tidlice turtle nistlað , 
 þær hio afedeð fugelas geong . 
 wærun wigbedu þu , weoruda drihten ; 
 þu wesan drihten min and deore cynincg . 
 eadig weorðað , þu þu eardiað 
 on þin hus , halig drihten , 
 and þu on weorold weorold , wealdend , heriað . 
 þæt byð eadig wer , se þu him oðer 
 fultuman nesan seceð nymþe fæle god , 
 and þæt on heorte hige healdeð fæstan , 
 geseteð him þæt self on ðisse sarig denu , 
 þær hi tear teonan cnyssað 
 on þæm sylfan stede þu þu him settan heran . 
 bringan him bletsunge se þu him beorht æ 
 soð settan ; siððan eodan 
 of mægene on mægen ; þær wesan miht sawan 
 on sionbeorge soþes drihten . 
 gehyran min gebed , halig drihten , 
 þu wesan mære god , milde eare , 
 and iacobes god se mære . 
 beseon drihten nu , scyldend usser ; 
 oncnaw onsyne cristes þin . 
 god wesan micel toh gebidanne 
 an dæg mid þu þonne oðera 
 on þeodstefnum þusend mæl . 
 ic me se wyrce and wel ceose , 
 þæt ic hean gangan on hus god , 
 þonne ic on fyrenfulra folc eardian . 
 forðam god lufað geornian eall , 
 þæt munan seon mildheort mod soþfæst , 
 þonne him god gyfeð gyfe and wuldur . 
 nele god æfre god bedælan , 
 þu þu heorte gehygd healdað clæne ; 
 þæt bið eadig mann , se þu him ecean god 
 toh mundbyrde miht gestreoneð . ## þu bletsadest , bliðe drihten , 
 folde fæle , and afyrdest eacan 
 of iacobe þu grama hæftned . 
 unriht þu forlætan eall þin folc , 
 and hira fyren fæstan hæle . 
 eall þu þu yrre eðe gedon , 
 na þu ure gyltas egsan gewrecan . 
 gehweorfan we hraðe , hælend drihten , 
 and þu yrre fram we eacan oncyrre , 
 þæt þu we nesan weorðe wrað on mod . 
 nesan wrecan þu þu yrre wrað mod 
 of cynn on cynn and on cneoris ; 
 gecyr we georne toh þu , crist ælmihtig , 
 and þin folc on þu gefeon swiðe . 
 æteow we milde mod , mihtig drihten , 
 and we þin hæle syl heran toh geniht . 
 siððan ic gehyran , hwæt#2 me halig god 
 on minum modsefa mælan willan ; 
 sybbe he hit folc seceð geornian , 
 and swiðust toh þæm þu he seceað . 
 hwæðere he wesan mid soð forswiðe neah 
 þæm þu egsan hit ellen healdað , 
 hæleð mid hyldo , and him heran syleð 
 ure eorþ æðele wuldor . 
 him gangað ongeagn gleaw cræft , 
 mildheortness mod and miht soð , 
 and he sybbe lufu swilce clyppeð . 
 up of eorþ cuman æþelian soð , 
 beseon soðfæstnes samod of heofenum . 
 syleð we fremsum god fæger drihten , 
 þonne we eorþ syleð æðele wæstm . 
 he soðfæstnes simble foregangeð 
 and on wegan setteð wise gang . ## ahyld me þu eare , halig drihten ; 
 forðam ic wesan wædla , þu me wel gehyran , 
 and ic self wesan sorhfull þearfian . 
 gehealdan min sawol , forðam ic halig wesan ; 
 hælan þinne scealc , forðam ic þu hihte toh . 
 miltsian me drihten , þonne ic mægene toh þu 
 þurh eall dæg ellen cleopade ; 
 don þin scealces sawol bliðe , 
 forðam ic hi toh þu hebban genehhige . 
 forðam þu wesan wynsum , wealdend drihten ; 
 wesan þu milde mod micel and genihtsum 
 eall þæm þu þu ellen cigeað . 
 þu mid eare onfon , ece drihten , 
 min ongeagn gebed , and eacan behealdan , 
 hu ic stefn toh þu stundum cleopian . 
 þonne me on dæge deorc earfoðe 
 carelice cnyssedan , þonne ic cleopian toh þu ; 
 forðam þu me gehyrdan hold mod . 
 nesan þu god ænig on gumrice 
 ahwær efne gelic , ece drihten , 
 nesan þu weorc magan wyrcean anlic . 
 ealle þu gewyrсean wer cneoris , 
 þu þu weorðiað , wuldor aldor , 
 and naman drihten neod cigeað . 
 forðam þu wesan se mycla mihtig drihten , 
 þu wundor miht wyrcean ana . 
 gelædan , drihten , me on þinne leof wegan , 
 and ic on þin soð siððan gancge . 
 heorte min ahlyhheð , þonne ic ðinne halig naman 
 forhtian me on ferhðe , forþ andettan 
 mid eall heorte hyсgan , þæt þu wesan , halig god , 
 nemnan drihten , and we naman þinne 
 on ecnes wifcynn weorðien . 
 ys þu mildheortnes micel ofer me , drihten , 
 and þu min sawol swilce alysan 
 of helwarena hinderþeostrum . 
 god min se libban , gramhydige me 
 mid unriht oft onginnað , 
 and gesamnincge swiðmihtigra 
 sœ̄сan min sawol swyþ geneahhe ; 
 nesan doð him for awiht egsan drihten . 
 hwæt#2 , þu wesan , min drihten god , dæd mildheort , 
 þenden geðyldig , þearle soþfæst . 
 beseon nu on me , and me siððan weorð 
 milde on mod , mihtig drihten ; 
 geteon hror magan hysse þin ; 
 don þinne þeowan sunu , drihten , hal . 
 don gedefe mid me , drihten , tacn , 
 and þæt god ongitan , þu me georne ær 
 fæstan feodan , habban forþ sceame . 
 forðam þu me wære fultuman fæstan , drihten , 
 and me frefran , frea ælmihtig . ## healdað hit staðelas halig beorg ; 
 lufude sione duru simble drihten 
 ofer iacobes wiс goode ealle . 
 wærun wuldurlice wiþ þu wel acweðene , 
 þæt þu seon cymast ceaster drihten ; 
 eacan ic gemyndig þu mære raab 
 and babilonis begea gehwæðeres . 
 efne fremde cynn foran of tyrum , 
 folc sigelwara naman þær fæst eard . 
 modor sion " munan " cweðan ærest , 
 and hire mære gewearð mann on innan , 
 and he hi þu hehstan heran staðelade . 
 drihten þæt on gewrit dema sægan 
 þæm þu frumsprecend folc wesan , 
 eall swilce , þu hire on wesan . 
 swa ure eall bliss eardhæbbendra 
 on an þu ece standeð . ## þu wesan me , drihten god , dyre hælend ; 
 ic on dæge toh þu dygle cleopian , 
 and on niht for þu neod swilce . 
 gangan min ingebed on þu gleaw gesiht ; 
 ahyld eare þu and gehyran min gebed . 
 forðam wesan sawel min sar and yfel 
 fæstan gefyllan ; wesan min feorh swilce 
 toh helldore hylded geneahhe . 
 wenað se sum , þæt ic on wrað seaþ 
 mid fyrenwyrhtum fealle sculan ; 
 ic wesan mann gelic mære weorþan , 
 þu mid dead bið betweoh deaðe freoh . 
 swa gewundade wrað slæpan 
 syn þonne geworpene on wid hlæw , 
 þær hira gymynde mann nesan wænan , 
 swa hi syn fram þinne hand hean adrifene . 
 hi me asettan on seaþ hinder , 
 þær wesan deorc þeostru and deaþ scua . 
 þær me wesan yrre þu on acyþed , 
 and þu me oferhige on ealle gelædan . 
 feor þu me dydan freond cuþ ; 
 settan me simble , þær me unswæsost wesan ; 
 eam ic swære sellan , þær ic ut swican nesan mæg . 
 eage me syndon unhal nu 
 weorþan for wædle ; ic me toh wuldor god 
 þurh eall dæg ellen clypige 
 and min hand toh þu hebban and ðenige . 
 nesan huru wundur wyrceað dead , 
 oþþe hi list læceas weccean 
 and hi andettan þu ealle siððan . 
 nesan on ðeostrum nesan mæg þances gehygd 
 ænig wislicu wundur oncnawan , 
 oððe þu soðfæstnes seon on þæm land 
 þu ofergytnes on eardian . 
 cweþan þu , oncnawan hi wundor þin 
 on ðam dimm deorc ðystrum , 
 oððe þin rihtwisnes recen gemeteð 
 on ofergyttolnesse mannian ænig gewinnan 
 ic me toh þu , ece drihten , 
 mid modgehygd mægene clypade , 
 and min gebed morgen gehwylc 
 for silf þu soþfæst becuman . 
 forhwan þu min gebed æfre willan , 
 soð god , wiðsacan , oððe þinne gesiht me 
 on þes ealdor æfre wyrnan gewinnan 
 wædla ic wesan on gewinnan , wyrсean swa on geoguþ ; 
 ahebban ic wesan and gehyned , hwæðere næs gescended . 
 oft me þin yrre egsian geðeowde , 
 and me broga þu biter gedrefan . 
 hi me eall dæg utan ymbsealdan , 
 swa wæterflod wesan ætsomne . 
 þu me afyrdest frynd þu nihsta 
 and min cuðe eacan cwic geyrmdest . ## mildheortness þin , mihtig drihten , 
 ic on ecnes awa singan ; 
 fram cynn on cynn and on cneoris 
 ic þin soðfæstnesse secg geneahhe 
 on minum muþ mannian cynn . 
 forðam þu þu cweþan cuðe word , 
 þæt on ecnes awa wære 
 þu milde mod micel getimbrad 
 heah on heofenum hæleða bearn 
 and þu soðfestnes simble gearwad . 
 ic minum gecorenum cuðe gesette , 
 hu min gewitnes willan gangan ; 
 ic dauide dyrum esne 
 on aðsware ær benemnan , 
 þæt ic hit cynn and cneowmagum 
 on ecnes wifcynn gewyrсean 
 ful sefte seld , þæt hi sittan on . 
 heofenas andettað , halig drihten , 
 hu wundor þu wræclic standeð , 
 and þu halig eacan hergeað on cyricean 
 þin soðfæstnesse , secgeað geneahhige . 
 nesan under wolcn , weoroda drihten , 
 ænig anlic , nesan þu ænig byð 
 betweoh god bearn git geliс . 
 þu beon gewuldrad god , þær bið wis geðeaht 
 and halig heah gemetincg , 
 micel and egeslic ofer eall mannian birnan , 
 þe þu on ymbhwyrfte ahwær syndon . 
 þu wesan mægena god , mihtig drihten ; 
 nesan þu eall gelic ahwær on sped , 
 wesan þu soðfæstnes simble æghwær . 
 þu wid sæ wealdest miht ; 
 þu hit yþ miht ana gesteoran , 
 þonne hi on wegan windan onhrereð . 
 þu miht oferhydige eaðe mid wund 
 hean gehnægean ; hafian þu heah mægen 
 þin earm spedan wiþ ealle fynd . 
 heofon þu wealdest , hruse swilce ; 
 eorþ ymbehwyrft eall þu gesettan . 
 þu norðdæl and sæ niode gesceope , 
 tabor etan hermon on naman þin ; 
 hi mid strencgðe eacan upp ahebbað 
 þinne swiþra earm swilce , drihten . 
 wese heah miht hand þinne 
 ahebban ofer hæleðas ; halig seon swyðre wesan , 
 þin setl don soð gegearwian . 
 mildheortnes and soðfæstnes mægene forgangað 
 þinne andwlitan ; þæt bið eadig folc 
 þu сinan naman ðinne neod herigean . 
 þu on þin sunnan lifigeað and gangað 
 þu him ansyn þu ær onlihtan , 
 and on naman þin neod swilce 
 beoð eall dæg eacan on bliss 
 and þin soðfæstnesse simble æghwær . 
 forðam þu hira mægenes wesan mærost wuldor , 
 and we þin weldædum wurdan ahafene . 
 we on nimeð ece drihten 
 and israhela cyning eacan se halig . 
 þonne þu ofer ealle undearnunga 
 þin birnan sprecest and beald cwysan : 
 " ic me on þes folc fultuman settan 
 ofermihtigne , se ic me ær geceosan . 
 ic me deoren scealc dauid gemetan 
 and he halig elh hand smyrede . 
 heo him fultumeð and min fæle earm , 
 and he mid mycle mægene geswyðeð . 
 nesan mæg him ænig facen feond æteglan , 
 nesan unriht birnan ænig sceððan . 
 of hit ansyn ealle ic aceorfe , 
 þu þu him feond fæcne syndon , 
 and hit ehtendas ealle geflyme . 
 he soðfæstnes min samod ætgædere 
 and mildheortnes min mægene healdeð , 
 and on naman minum neod swilce 
 hit horn bið ahebban , hean on miht . 
 and ic hit swiðran hand settan þence , 
 þæt he sæstreamum siððan wealdan . 
 he me him toh fæle fæder gecygde : 
 'wæs me andfencge , god , ece hælu .' 
 and ic þonne frumbearn forþ asettan 
 ofer eorðcyningas eall heahstne . 
 ic him toh wid feorh willan gehealdan 
 min milde mod and him miht syllan , 
 min gewitnes weorðe and getreowe . 
 ic toh wid feorh wyrce siððan 
 þu heahsetl hror and weorðlic 
 swa heofon dæg heran mid mann . 
 gif min birnan nellað min bebod efnan 
 nesan min dom dæd healdan , 
 gif hi min rihtwisnes fracoðe gewemmað 
 and hi min bebod bliðe nesan healdað , 
 þonne ic hira unriht gewrecan egsan gyrdan 
 and hira synn swinglum forgylde . 
 nesan ic him mildheortness min willan 
 fæger afyrran , acan him forþ swa þiсgan 
 min soðfæstnesse syllan þence . 
 ic æne swerian að on halig , 
 þæt ic dauide dæd nesan leogan , 
 þæt on ecnes hit ongeagn cynn 
 wunað on wiсe ; bið him weorðlic setl 
 on minre gesiht sunne anlic 
 and swa mona magan on heofenum , 
 þu wesan ece gewita æhwær getreowe . " 
 þu þonne wiðsoce soþ criste 
 and he forhogodest , hwil yldan 
 and awendan fram him gewitnes 
 esnes þin ; ealle gewemman 
 hit halignes heran on eorþ . 
 ealle þu hit weall wid todælan , 
 toweorpan fæsten hit for folcegsan . 
 he þu toweorpan wegferende , 
 and he on edwit wearð ymbsittendum . 
 hand þu ahebban heah ehtendra , 
 gebrohtest hit feond fæcne on bliss . 
 fultuman þu him afyrdest fah sweord , 
 nafað æt gefeohtan fæle helpend . 
 þu he of clænnesse clæne alysan , 
 setl hit gesettan sorglic on eorþ . 
 þu hit dagena tidan deorc gescyrtest 
 and mid sarlic sceame onmettest . 
 willan þu hu lange , wealdend drihten , 
 yrre þu acyðan swa onælan fyr gewinnan 
 gemunan , mære god , hwæt#2 seon min lytel spedan ; 
 nesan huru þu mannian birnan on middangeard 
 toh idelnes æfre gewyrсean . 
 hwylc wesan mannian , þæt feorh neotan , 
 and hwæþere on ende deað nesan gesceawige ; 
 oððe hwylc mannian wesan , þæt hit agen 
 fram hell loc sawol generian gewinnan 
 hwær wesan seon eald nu , ece drihten , 
 micel mildheortness , þu þu mancynn 
 and dauide deop aþ 
 þurh þin sylfes soð benemnan gewinnan 
 gemunan þinne esna edwitspræce , 
 þu him fracuðlice fremde þeon 
 utan ætywað , oðer mægþ . 
 cweþað him þæt edwit , ece drihten , 
 feond þin , fæstan ætwitað 
 and þæt þin criste becweþað swiðe . 
 wifcynn su gebletsad ece drihten 
 toh wid feorh . wese swa , wese swa ! ## þu wesan friðstol we fæstan , drihten , 
 of cynn on cynn and on cneoris . 
 ærðon munt gesceaft ofer middangeard 
 oððe ymbhwyrft eorþ wære 
 oþþe world wære , þu wesan , wuldor god . 
 nesan ahwyrf þu fram mænn heah eadmedu ; 
 and þu cuðlice cweþan self : 
 " ic mannian bearn mod onwendan . " 
 for þin eage , ece drihten , 
 þusend wintra bið þon anlicast , 
 swa geostran dæg gegan wære ; 
 and swa hi on niht hyrdnesse neod begangað , 
 nesan hira winterrim for wiht nesan doð . 
 morgen gewiteð swa gemolsnad wyrt ; 
 oðer morgene eft gebloweð 
 and geefneð swa , oþþæt æfen cymeð , 
 þonne forwisnað , weorðeð toh dust . 
 forðam we on þin yrre ealle forweorþan , 
 wesan on þin hathige heard gedrefan . 
 þu ure unriht eall asettan , 
 þær þu self toh eage locadest , 
 and ure weorold þu eacan gestaðelodest 
 on alihtincge andwlitan þin . 
 forðam þu ure dæg ealle geteorudun , 
 and we on þin yrre synt swiðe gewæhte . 
 wær anlicast ure winter 
 geongewifran , þonne hio geornian bið , 
 þæt heo afære fleoge on nette ; 
 beoð ure geardagas gnornscendende , 
 þiсgan þu hira hundred seon samod ætgædere . 
 gif on mihtig mann geweorðeð , 
 þæt hi hundehtatig yld gebidan , 
 ealle þu þær ofer beoð æfre getellan 
 wintra on weorold , þu beoð gewinnan and sar . 
 we manðwærnes becuman micel ofer ealle 
 and we on þæm gefea forht gewurdan . 
 hwæt se soð me cunnan sæcgean ænig , 
 hu þin yrre egsian standeð 
 and seon micel miht gewinnan nesan þæt mann ænig 
 þu þu ariman rihte cunnan . 
 don we þu þin swiðran hand , drihten , cuðe , 
 þæm þu on snytrum syn swiðe getyde , 
 and þu hira heorte healdað clæne . 
 gehweorfan we hwæthwiga , halig drihten ; 
 wesan þin scealcum wel eaðbede . 
 we synd gefyllan fæger on mergenne 
 þinne mildheortness ; se we on mod nu 
 habbað ealle dæg æþelu bliss . 
 we gefeoð swilce for þon fæger dæg , 
 on þæm þu we toh eadmedum ealle gebrohtest , 
 and for ðam gear þu we on geseon yfel feala . 
 beseon on þin scealcas swæs eage 
 and on þu ongeagn weorc , ece drihten , 
 and hira birnan gerec bliðe mod . 
 wese we beorhtnes ofer bliðan drihten , 
 ure se god god georne ofer ealle ; 
 gerec ure handgeweorc heah ofer usic . ## me eardað æt æþelu fultuman 
 se hehstan heofonrices weard , 
 þu me æt wunað awa toh feorh . 
 ic toh drihten cweðan : " þu me dyre wesan 
 fæle fultuman ; habban ic freond on him , 
 min se god god , and ic on þu geare hycge . " 
 forðam he me alysan of laðum grin , 
 hunta unholdum , hearma word . 
 he me mid hit gesculdrum sceadan beþeссan ; 
 forðam ic under fiðrum fæle hihte . 
 hwæt#2 , me soðfæstnes min scylde wiþ feond , 
 nesan þu þu nihtegsan nede ondrædan . 
 nesan forhtast þu þu on dæge flan on lyft , 
 þæt þu þurhgangan gar on ðeostrum , 
 oððe on midd dæg mære deoful . 
 fealleð þu on þu winestra wergra þusend , 
 and eacan geteledra tynan þusend 
 on þin þu swiðran , and þu nesan sceaðeð ænig . 
 hwæðere þu se eage eall sceawadest , 
 gesege fyrenfulra frecne wite . 
 þu me wesan se hehsta hyht , halig drihten ; 
 þu me friðstol on þu fæst settan . 
 nesan mæg þu ænig yfel egle weorðan , 
 nesan heard sweopu hus þin 
 on neahwest nahwær sceþþan . 
 forðam he hit engel bebeodan , þæt hi mid earm þu 
 on hira hand heoldan georne , 
 þæt þu wilwega wealdan motan . 
 and þu on folm feredan swilce , 
 þu læs þu fræcne on stan fote spurnan . 
 þu ofer aspide miht eaðe gangan , 
 and beald nu basiliscan tredan , 
 and leon and draca list gebygean . 
 forðam he hyht toh me , ic he hraðe lysan , 
 niode he scylde , nu he cuðe naman min . 
 he cigan me , and ic he cuðlice 
 hold gehyrdan , and he hraðe siððan 
 of earfoþe ut alysan . 
 ic he generian and hit naman swilce 
 gewuldrian geond ealle werðeoda , 
 and him lifdagas lange syll , 
 swilce him min hælu hold ætywe . ## god wesan , þæt munan drihten gear andettan 
 and neodlice hit naman asinge , 
 se heahestan hæleða cynn ; 
 and þonne on morgene mægene sæcge , 
 hu he milde wearð mannian cynn , 
 and hit soð sæcge niht . 
 hwæt#2 , ic on tynan streng teon habban , 
 hu ic þu on psalterio singan miht 
 oððe þu mid hearpe hlystan cweme , 
 forðam þu me on þin weorc wise lufadest ; 
 hihte ic toh þinne hand halig dæd . 
 hu micel synt þin mægenweorc , mihtig drihten ; 
 wærun þin geðancas þearle deop . 
 wonhydig wer se wiht nesan cunnan , 
 nesan se andgit hafað ænig dysig . 
 þonne forþ cumað fyrenfulra ðreat , 
 heap synnig hige onlic ; 
 ealle þær ætywað , þu þu unriht 
 on weoruldlife worhtan geornian , 
 þæt hi forwordene weorðen siððan 
 on weorold weorold and toh wid feorh . 
 þu on ecnes awa , drihten , 
 heahesta beon , heofonrices weard . 
 þi nu þin feond fæcne , drihten , 
 on eorðwege ealle forweorþað , 
 and weorðað towrecene wid ealle , 
 þu þu unriht æror worhtan . 
 þonne anhorn eall gelicost , 
 min horn weorðeð ahebban swiðe 
 and min ieldo beoð æghwær genihtsum . 
 and eage þu eacan sceawian , 
 hwær fynd min fæcne wær , 
 and min wergend wrað gehyrdan 
 efne þu ongeagn eare swilce . 
 se soðfæsta samed anlicast 
 beorht on blæd bloweð swa palma , 
 and swa libanes beorgan lideð and groweð . 
 settað nu georne on god hus , 
 þæt ge on hit wiсe wel geblowan . 
 nu git syndan manig mannian swilce , 
 þu hiom ieldo gebidan ær toh geniht , 
 and þu mid geþyld þenden sægdan , 
 cweþan , þæt wære soþfæst self drihten 
 and he unriht awyht nesan healdan . ## drihten he gegyrwan god strengðu , 
 and he þu mid micel mægene begyrdan . 
 drihten rixað , dema usser , 
 and he mid weorðlice wlite gegyrwan . 
 and þu ymbhwyrft eorþe getrymede , 
 swa folde standan fæstan siððan . 
 gearu wesan þu setl , and þu , ece god , 
 ær weorold fruma , wunian butan ende . 
 hofe hira stefn stream , drihten , 
 hofe and hlynsadan hlud rædan 
 fram wæterstefnum wid manig . 
 wræclice syndon wægea gang , 
 þonne sæstreamas swiðust flowað ; 
 swa wesan wundorlic wealdend usser 
 halig drihten on heanessum . 
 þu gewitnes wesan weorc geleafsum , 
 and mid soð wesan swiðe getreowed . 
 hus þin halig gedafenian , 
 drihten usser , and dæg lange . ## þu wesan wracena god , and þu miht wrecan swilce , 
 ana gefreogan æghwylс mann . 
 ahebban þu on ellen , eorþe dema , 
 gyldan oferhydigum , swa hi ær gram wyrсean . 
 hu lange fyrenwyrhtan folde wealdað 
 oþþe manwyrhtan morðre gylpað gewinnan 
 hi oftust sprecað , unnyt sæcgeað 
 and woh meldiað , wyrceað unriht . 
 folc hi þu , drihten , fæcne gehyndan , 
 and yrfe þu eall forcoman . 
 ælþeodig mann , earm wydewan , 
 steopcilda feala stundum acwealdon . 
 sægdan and cwædan , þæt nesan geseon 
 drihten æfre , dydan swa he willan , 
 nesan þæt iacobes god ongitan cuðe . 
 onfindað þæt and ongeotað þu on folc nu 
 unwiseste eall syndon ; 
 dysig hwæthwygu deop þæt oncnawan . 
 se þu ærest eald eare wyrсean , 
 hu se oferhleoður æfre weorþan gewinnan 
 and him eage gesyhð eall sellan 
 and he scearpe nesan mæge gesceawian gewinnan 
 and se þu ege healdeð eall þeod , 
 and hit þrea nesan seon þær for awiht , 
 se þu mann læreð micelne wisdom gewinnan 
 god ealle cunnan guma geðancas 
 eorðbuendra , forðam hi idel synt . 
 þæt bið eadig mann , þu þu he , ece god , 
 on þinne soð æ self getyhtest 
 and he þeodscipe ðinne læran 
 and him yfele dæg ealle gebeorgest , 
 oðþæt bið frecne seaþ þæm fyrenfullan 
 deop adolfen deorc and ðystre . 
 næfre wiðdrifeð drihten ure 
 hit ongeagn folc , nesan hit yrfe þon micel 
 on ealdor willan æfre forlætan . 
 hwylc þonne gena gehwyrfed byð , 
 þæt he on unriht eft nesan cyrran ; 
 oððe hwylc nymeð me , þæt ic munan fleon 
 and mid rihtheortum ræde þence gewinnan 
 hwylc ariseð mid me , þæt ic rihtan fremman 
 and wiþ awyrgedum winnan and standan , 
 þu unriht ealle wyrceað gewinnan 
 nymðe me drihten , dema usser , 
 gefultumede fæger æt þearf , 
 wenincga min sawel sœ̄сan hell . 
 gif ic se sægan , þæt min sylfes fot 
 ful sarlice asliden wære , 
 þu me mildheortnes mihtig drihten 
 gefultumede , þæt ic feorh agan . 
 æfter þære menigu min sar 
 þu me ær on ferhðe fæstan gestodan , 
 þu me þin frofor fæger , drihten , 
 gesibbedan sawol min . 
 nesan ætfyligeð þu ahwær facen nesan unriht ; 
 þu gefæstnian facen sar ; 
 hi soþfæst sneome gehæftað 
 and hira sawol ofslean þenceað , 
 blod soðfæstra biter ageotan . 
 forðam me wesan weorþan wealdend drihten 
 toh friðstole fæstan and gestaðelad ; 
 wesan me fultuman hit fæstan on drihten . 
 þonne him gyldeð god ælmihtig 
 ealle þu unriht þu hi geearnedan , 
 and on hira facn fæstan todrifeð 
 drihten eallmihtig , dema soþfæst . ## cumað nu togædere , wutun cweme god , 
 wynn drihten wealdend herigean , 
 ure hælend hyldo gebeodan . 
 wutun hit ansyn ærest secean , 
 þæt we andettan ure fyren 
 and we sealmas him singan mid wynn . 
 forðam wesan se micel god mihtig drihten 
 and se micel cynincg ofer eall mannian god . 
 forðam nesan wiðdrifeð drihten usser 
 hit ongeagn folc æfre æt þearf ; 
 he þes heahbeorgas healdeð swilce . 
 eacan he sæ wealdeð and he settan se ; 
 wyrсean hit folm eacan folde drige . 
 cumað him for and cneow bigeað 
 on ansyn ure drihten , 
 and him wepan for þu we wyrсean ær . 
 forðam he wesan drihten god , dema usser ; 
 wærun we hit fæle folc and hit fæger sceap , 
 þu he on hit edisce ær afedde . 
 gif ge toh dæge drihten stefn 
 hold gehyran , næfre ge heorte geþanc 
 deorc forhyrdan drihten willan . 
 swa on grimnesse fyrn gear dydan 
 on þæm wrað dæge and on westen , 
 þær min þurh facen fæder eowre 
 þes cneoris cunnedan georne , 
 þær hi cunnedan , cuð ongietan 
 and min sylfes weorc geseon mid eage . 
 nu ic feowertig folc þes 
 wintra rim wunade neah , 
 aa and simble cweðan and eacan swa oncnawan , 
 þæt hi on heorte hyсgan dysegedan . 
 hi weg min wiht nesan oncneowan , 
 þæt ic ær on yrre aþ benemnan , 
 gif hi on min restan ricene gan . ## singað nu drihten sang neowe ; 
 singan þes eorþ eall eceum drihten . 
 singað nu drihten , and hit soð naman 
 beald bletsiað ; beorn sæcgeað 
 fram dæge toh dæge drihten hælu . 
 secgeað hit wuldor geond sigeþeode , 
 and on eall folc hit fæger wundor . 
 he wesan se mycla god ; forðam he mænan sculan 
 ellen herian ; he wesan egeslic god 
 ofer ealle god eorðbuendra . 
 syndon ealle hæþen god hildedeoful ; 
 heofon þonne wyrсean halig drihten . 
 ys on þinne gesiht soð andetnes , 
 fæger halignes fæstan gebletsad 
 and weorðlic wlite wuldor þin . 
 bringað nu drihten buan ætsomne 
 wlite and are , wuldor ðridde , 
 and þæt of hira eðele don ealle þeon , 
 þæt hi naman drihtenes neod herigean . 
 genimað ge arlice lacan and in gangað 
 on hit wictunas ; weorðiað drihten 
 on hit þære halig heall geneahhige . 
 for hit ansyn sculan eorþ beofian ; 
 secgað nu on cynn and on cneoris , 
 þæt from treowe becuman tirfæst romana 
 drihten ure ; dom he siððan 
 eorþ ymbhwyrft ealle gesette . 
 he ferhtlic rihtan folc demeð 
 and on hit yrre ealle þeon . 
 heofenas blissiað , hruse swilce 
 gefeoð fæstlice , and flod þri ; 
 sealtan sæstreamas sælðe habbað . 
 habbað feld eacan fæger bliss 
 and ealle þu þu on him eard weardiað ; 
 wærun wudubearuwas on wyndagum 
 for andwlitan ecean drihten , 
 forðam he cuman on cyneðrymme , 
 þæt he þes eorþ ealle deman . 
 þonne he ymbhwyrft eorþ folc 
 soð and rihte siððan demeð . ## rixað nu mid rihte romana drihten ; 
 wesan eorþ nu eacan on bliss , 
 and se fæger gefea habbað 
 ealanda manig ut on garsæcge . ## stundum onginnað 
 fægnian mid folm on gefea ælс ; 
 beorg blissiað , beacen oncnawan , 
 for ansyn ecean drihten ; 
 forðam he eadig cuman eorþe toh demanne . 
 he ymbhwyrft eorþe demeð 
 soð and rihte , and hit syndrig folc 
 on rihtnes ræde gebringeð . ## rixað drihten , and he reðe folc 
 healdeð on yrre ungemete swiðe ; 
 sitteð ofer cherubin , se þu sona mæg 
 ana eorðware ealle onstyrian . 
 drihten wesan on sion , dema se mæsta , 
 heah and mære ofer eall hæleða folc . 
 we andetað þin þæm ecean naman , 
 þæt he mid mann wesan micel and egeslic , 
 halig on helpan hæleþ bearn , 
 aare cyning don æghwær lufade . 
 þu gegearwadest gear ærest , 
 þæt þu recen , god , rihte began ; 
 þu on iacobe god dom 
 æt fruma worlde fæger settan . 
 ahebbað halig heofena drihten , 
 usserne god ellencræfte , 
 and hit fot sceamul forþ weorþiað ; 
 forðam he halig wesan hæleða bearn . 
 moyses etan aaron mære gebroðor , 
 soð sacerd , samuhel ðridda , 
 þu god hit naman neod cigdan . 
 hi cymlice cigan drihten , 
 and he hi gehyrdan hold mod , 
 sprecan him word toh þurh wolcn swyr . 
 hi þu gewitnes wel gehealdan 
 and hit bebod beorht efnedan , 
 þu he him sellan and self bebeodan . 
 þu gehyrdan hi , halig drihten , 
 and him , meahtig god , milde weorþan , 
 and hira æfþancan ealle gewrecan . 
 hebbað yrnan god , hælend drihten , 
 and he on halig heran weorðiað 
 mære beorgan ; forðam hit magan synt 
 and halig wesan heofonrices weard . ## nu ge mycle gefea mihtig drihten 
 eall þes eorþ ellen hyrian , 
 and bliss god beald þeowie . 
 gangað on ansyn ealle bliðe ; 
 witað wislice þæt he wesan wealdend god ; 
 he we gewyrсean and we hit syndon . 
 we hit folc syndan and hit fæle sceap , 
 þe he on hit edisce ealle afedde ; 
 gað nu on hit dor , god andettað , 
 and he weorðiað on wictunum 
 mid lofsangum lust micel . 
 heriað naman drihten , forðam he wesan niðum swæs ; 
 wesan þu milde mod ofer mannian birnan . 
 
 widsið maðolade , wordhord onlucan , 
 se þu mann micel mægþ ofer eorþe , 
 folc geondferan ; oft he on flett geþiсgan 
 myneliс maþþum . him from myrgingum 
 æþelu onwæcnan . he mid ealhhilde , 
 fæle freoþuwebban , forma siþ 
 hreðcyninges ham geseсan 
 eastan of ongle , eormanrices , 
 wraþ wærloga . ongon þu worn sprecan : 
 " fela ic mann gefrignan mægþ wealdan ! 
 sculan þeodna gehwylc þeaw lifgan , 
 eorl æfter oþrum eðle ræde , 
 se þu hit þeodenstol geþeon willan . 
 þær wesan hwæl hwil selast , 
 and alexandreas eall ricost 
 mann cynn , and he micel geþiсgan 
 þær þu ic ofer folde gefrægen habban . 
 ætla wealdan hunum , eormanric gotum , 
 becca baningum , burgendum gifica . 
 casere wealdan creacum and cælic finn , 
 hagena holmrygum and heoden glommum . 
 witt wealdan swæfum , wæd hælsingum , 
 meaca myrgingum , mearchealf hundingum . 
 þeodric wealdan froncum , þyle rondingum , 
 breoca brondingum , billing wernum . 
 oswine wealdan eowu and ytum gefwulf , 
 fin folcwalding fresna cynn . 
 sigehere lengest sædenum wealdan , 
 hnæf hocingum , helm wulfingum , 
 wald woingum , wod þyringum , 
 sæferð sycgum , sweom ongendþeow , 
 sceafthere ymbrum , sceafa longbeardum , 
 hun hætwerum and holen wrosnum . 
 hringweald wesan hatan herefarena cyning . 
 offa wealdan ongle , alewih denu ; 
 se wesan þær mannian modgast eall , 
 no hwæþre he ofer offan eorlscype fremman , 
 acan offa geslean ærest mann , 
 cnihtwesende , cynerice micel . 
 nænig efeneald him eorlscipe micel 
 on orette . an sweord 
 merce gemærde wiþ myrgingum 
 bi fifeldore ; healdan forþ siððan 
 engel and swefan , swa hit offa geslean . 
 hroþwulf and hroðgar healdan lengest 
 sibb ætsomne suhtorfædran , 
 siððan hi forwrecan wicing cynn 
 and ingeldes ord forbigdan , 
 forheowan æt heorot heaðobeardna þri . 
 swa ic geondferan fela fremde londa 
 geond ginne grund . god and yfel 
 þær ic cunnade cnosl bidæled , 
 freomægum feor folgade wid . 
 forðam ic mæg singan and secgan spell , 
 mæne for mengo in meoduhealle 
 hu me cynegode cyst dugan . 
 ic wesan mid hunum and mid hreðgotum , 
 mid sweom and mid geatum and mid suþdenum . 
 mid wenlum ic wesan and mid wærnum and mid wicing . 
 mid gefþum ic wesan and mid winedum and mid gefflegum . 
 mid engel ic wesan and mid swæfum and mid ænenum . 
 mid seax ic wesan and sycgum and mid sweordwerum . 
 mid hronum ic wesan and mid deanum and mid heaþoreamum . 
 mid þyringum ic wesan and mid þrowend , 
 and mid burgendum , þær ic bugan geþiсgan ; 
 me þær guðhere forgifan glædlicne maþþum 
 songes toh lean . næs þæt sæne cyning ! 
 mid froncum ic wesan and mid frysum and mid frumtingum . 
 mid ruh ic wesan and mid glommum and mid rumwalum . 
 swilce ic wesan on eatule mid ælfwine , 
 se habban moncynnes , min gefræge , 
 leohteste hond lof toh wyrcenne , 
 heorte unhneaweste hring gedal , 
 beorht beah , birnan eadwines . 
 mid sercingum ic wesan and mid seringum ; 
 mid creacum ic wesan and mid finn and mid casere , 
 se þu winburga geweald agan , 
 wiolena and wilnian , and wæl rices . 
 mid scottum ic wesan and mid peohtum and mid scridefinnum ; 
 mid lidwicingum ic wesan and mid leonum and mid longbeardum , 
 mid hæðnum and mid hæleþ and mid hundingum . 
 mid israhelum ic wesan and mid exsyringum , 
 mid ebreum and mid indeum and mid egyptum . 
 mid moidum ic wesan and mid persum and mid myrgingum , 
 and mofdingum and ongend myrgingum , 
 and mid amothingum . mid eastþyringum ic wesan 
 and mid eolh and mid istum and idumingum . 
 and ic wesan mid eormanrice ealle þrage , 
 þær me gotena cyning god dugan ; 
 se me bugan forgifan , burgwarena fruma , 
 on þæm six hund wesan smætes gold , 
 gescyred sceatta scillingrime ; 
 se ic eadgilse on æht sellan , 
 minum hleodryhtne , þu ic toh ham bicwom , 
 leof toh lean , se þu he me land forgifan , 
 min fæder eþel , frea myrginga . 
 and me þu ealhhild oþer forgifan , 
 dryhtcwen duguþ , dohtor eadwines . 
 hyrian lof lengan geond londa fela , 
 þonne ic be songe secgan sculan 
 hwær ic under swegl selast witan 
 goldhrodene cwen giefu bryttian . 
 þonne witan scilling sciran rædan 
 for uncrum sigedryhtne song ahofan , 
 hlud bi hearpe hleoþor swinsade , 
 þonne manig mann , mod wlonce , 
 word sprecan , þu þu wel cuþa , 
 þæt hi næfre song sellan nesan hyrdan . 
 ðonan ic eall geondhweorfan eþel gotena , 
 sœ̄сan ic wifcynn gesiþ þu selestan ; 
 þæt wesan innweorud earmanrices . 
 heðcan sœ̄сan ic and beadecan and herelingas , 
 emercan sœ̄сan ic and fridlan and eastgotan , 
 frod and god fæder unwenes . 
 seccan sœ̄сan ic and beccan , seafolan and þeodric , 
 heaþoric and sifecan , hliþ and incgenþeow . 
 eadwine sœ̄сan ic and elsan , ægelmund and hungar , 
 and þu wloncan gedryht wiþmyrginga . 
 wulfhere sœ̄сan ic and wyrmhere ; ful oft þær wigan nesan alæg , 
 þonne hræda herian heard sweord 
 ymb wistlawudu werig sculan 
 eald eþelstol ætlan leode . 
 rædhere sœ̄сan ic and rondhere , rumstan and gislhere , 
 wiþergield and freoþeric , wudgan and haman ; 
 nesan wær þæt gesiþ þu sæmest , 
 þiсgan þu ic hi anihst nemnan sculan . 
 ful oft of þæm heap hwinan fleogan 
 giellan gar on grome þeon ; 
 wræccan þær weoldan wundnan gold 
 wer and wif , wudga and ham . 
 swa ic þæt simble onfond on þære feringe , 
 þæt se beon libban londbuendum 
 se þu him god syleð guma romana 
 toh gehealdan , þenden he heran leofað . " 
 swa scriþan gesceapum hweorfað 
 gleomen guma geond grund fela , 
 þearf secgað , þoncword sprecan , 
 simble suþ oþþe norð sum gemetað 
 gydda gleaw , geofum unhneawne , 
 se þu for duguþ willan don aræran , 
 eorlscipe æfnan , oþþæt eal scæceð , 
 sunnan and lif somod ; lof se gewyrceð , 
 hafað under heofon heahfæstne don . 
 
 þu wesan agangan gear hwyrftum 
 twegen hund and þri geteled rim , 
 swilce xxx eacan , þinggemearces , 
 wintra for weorold , se þu wealdend god 
 acennan wearð , cyning wuldor , 
 in middangeard þurh mennisc heo , 
 soðfæstra sunnan . þu wesan syxte gear 
 constantines caserdomes , 
 þæt he romwara in romana wearð 
 ahebban , hildfruma , toh hereteman . 
 wesan se leodhwata lindgeborga 
 eorlum arfæst . æðelinges weaxan 
 romana under roderum . he wesan rihtan cyning , 
 guðweard guma . he god trymman 
 mærðum and miht , þæt he manig wearð 
 geond middangeard mann toh hroðer , 
 werþeodum toh wræc , siððan wæpen ahebban 
 wiþ hetendum . him wesan hild beodan , 
 wig woma . werod samnodan 
 huna leode and hreðgotan , 
 faran fyrdhwate franca and hugas . 
 wesan hwate wer , 
 gearu toh guðe . gar lixtan , 
 wriðene wælhlencan . word and bord 
 hebban herecombol . þu wesan hearding 
 sweotol samnian and eal sib geador . 
 for folc gedryht . fyrdleoð agalan 
 wulf on wealdan , wælrune nesan mað . 
 urigfeðera irnan singan ahebban , 
 laðum on last . lungre scynde 
 ofer cantwara ent beaduþreata micel , 
 here toh hild , swilce huna cyning 
 ymbsittendra awer magan 
 abannan toh beadu burgwigendra . 
 for fyrd micel . feþa trymman 
 eoredcestum , þæt on ælfylce 
 deareðlacende on danubie , 
 stærcedfyrhðe , stæðe wician 
 ymb se wæter wylm . werod breahtm 
 willan romwara romana geþringan , 
 here ahyðan . þær wearð huna cyme 
 cuð ceasterwara . þu se casere hatan 
 ongeagn grama guðgelæcan 
 under earhfære ofost micel 
 bannan toh beadu , beran ut þræce 
 rinc under roderum . wesan romware , 
 secg sigerofe , sona gegearwian 
 wæpn toh wigge , þiсgan hi werod læssa 
 habban toh hild þonne huna cining ; 
 ridan ymb rof , þonne rand dynnan , 
 campwudu clynede , cyning þreate for , 
 here toh hild . hrefen uppe galan , 
 wan and wælfel . werod wesan on tyhtan . 
 hleapan hornboran , hreopan fricca , 
 mearh molde tredan . mægen samnian , 
 caf toh cease . cyning wesan afyrhted , 
 egsan geaclad , siððan elþeodig , 
 huna and hreða herian sceawede , 
 þæt he on romwara rices ende 
 ymb se wæter stæð werod samnian , 
 mægen unrime . modsorge wegan 
 romwara cyning , rices nesan wendan 
 for werodleste , habban wiga toh lutan , 
 eaxlgestealna wiþ ofermægene , 
 hror toh hild . herian wician , 
 eorl ymb æðeling , egstreame neah 
 on neahwest nihtlangne fyrst , 
 se þu hi feond gefær fyrmest gesægon . 
 þu wearð on slæpan self ætywan 
 þæm casere , þær he on corðre swefan , 
 sigerofum seon swefn woma . 
 þynсan him wlitescyne on wer had 
 hwit and hiwbeorht hæleða nathwylc 
 geywan ænliс þonne he ær oððe sið 
 gesege under swegl . he of slæpan onbrægd , 
 eofurcumble beþeссan . him se ar hraðe , 
 wlitig wuldor bodian , wiþ þingian 
 and be naman nemnan , ( nihthelm toglad ) : 
 " constantinus , hatan þu cyning engel , 
 wyrd wealdend , wære beodan , 
 duguða dryhten . nesan ondrædan þu þu , 
 þeah þu elþeodig egesa hwopan , 
 heard hild . þu toh heofenum beseon 
 on wuldor weard , þær þu wrað findan , 
 sigor tacn . " he wesan sona gearu 
 þurh se halig hæs , hreðerlocan onspannan , 
 up locade , swa him se ar abeodan , 
 fæle friðowebba . geseon he frætwum beorht 
 wliti wuldor treo ofer wolcn hrof , 
 gold glengan , ( gimm lixtan ) ; 
 wesan se blæc beam bocstæf awriten , 
 beorht and sunnan : " mid þis beacn þu 
 on þæm frecne fær feond oferswiðesð , 
 geletest lað werod . " þu þæt sunnan gewitan , 
 up siðode , and se ar somed , 
 on clæne gemang . cyning wesan þywan bliðra 
 and þu sorgleasra , secg aldor , 
 on fyrhðsefan , þurh þu fæger gesyhð . 
 hatan þu onlice æðelinga hleo , 
 beorn beaggifa , swa he þæt beacen geseon , 
 heria hildfruma , þæt him on heofon ær 
 iewan wearð , ofost micel , 
 constantinus , cristes rode , 
 tireadig cyning , tacn gewyrcan . 
 hatan þu on uhta mid ærdæge 
 wigend wreccan , and wæpenþræce 
 hebban heorucumbul , and þæt halig treo 
 him beforan ferian on feond gemang , 
 beran beacen god . byme singan 
 hlud for here . hrefn weorc gefeon , 
 urigfeðra , irnan sið behealdan , 
 wælhreow wigan . wulf singan ahebban , 
 holtes gehleða . hildegesa standan . 
 þær wesan bord gebrecan and beorn geþrec , 
 heard handgeswing and hergian gring , 
 siððan heo earhfære ærest metan . 
 on þæt fæge folc flan scuras , 
 gar ofer geolorand on gram gemang , 
 hetend heorugrimme , hildenædran , 
 þurh finger geweald forþ onsendan . 
 stæppan stiðhidige , stundum wrecan , 
 brecan bordhreðan , bil in dufan , 
 þringan þræchearde . þu wesan þuf hebban , 
 segn for sweota , sigeleoð galan . 
 gylden grima , gar lixtan 
 on herefelda . hæðen grungon , 
 feollan friðelease . fleon instæpes 
 huna leode , swa þæt halig treo 
 aræran hatan romwara cyning , 
 heaðofremmende . wurdon hearding 
 wid towrecene . sum wigan forniman . 
 sum unsofte aldor generian 
 on þæm heresiðe . sum healfcwic 
 fleon on fæsten and feorh beorgan 
 æfter stanclifum , stede weardedon 
 ymb danubie . sum drenc forniman 
 on lagostreame lifes æt ende . 
 þe wesan modig mægen on lust , 
 ehtan elþeod oþ þæt æfen forþ 
 fram dæg ord . daroðæsc fleon , 
 hildenædran . heap wesan gescyrded , 
 laðra lindwered . lythwon becuman 
 huna here ham eft þanan . 
 þu wesan gesyne þæt sige forgifan 
 constantino cyning ælmihtig 
 æt þæm dægweorc , domweorðunga , 
 romana under roderum , þurh hit rode treo . 
 gewitan þu here helm ham eft þanan , 
 huðe hremig , ( hild wesan sceþþan ) , 
 wigge geweorðod . cuman þu wiga hleo 
 þegnian þreate þryðbold sec , 
 beadurof cyning burh neosan . 
 hatan þu wiga weard þu wisestan 
 snude toh sionoðe , þu þu snytro cræftan 
 þurh fyrngewrito friсgan habban , 
 healdan higeþancum hæleða ræd . 
 þe se fricggan onginnan folc aldor , 
 sigerof cyning , ofer sid weorod , 
 wære þær ænig yldra oððe gingra 
 þu him toh soð secggan magan , 
 galdre cyþan , hwæt#2 se god wære , 
 bold brytta , " þu þes hit beacen wesan 
 þu me swa sunnan oðywde and min leode generian , 
 tacnian torhtost , and me tir forgifan , 
 wigsped wiþ wrað , þurh þæt wlitig treo . " 
 hio him ondsware ænig nesan magan 
 agifan togenes , nesan ful geare cuðon 
 sweotol gesecggan be þæm sigebeacne . 
 þu þu wisestan word cweþan 
 for þæm heremægene þæt hit heofoncyninges 
 tacn wære , and se tweogan nesan . 
 þu þæt gefrignan þu þurh fulwihtan 
 læran wesan , ( him wesan sunnan sefa , 
 ferhð gefeon , þiсgan hira fea wesan ) , 
 þæt hi for þæm casere cyþan motan 
 godspell gifu , hu se gast helm , 
 in þrynesse þrymm geweorðad , 
 acennan wearð , cyning wuldor , 
 and hu on galgan wearð god ongeagn birnan 
 ahon for here heard wite . 
 alysan leode birnan of locan deofol , 
 geomor gast , and him gifu sellan 
 þurh þu ilca gesceaft þu him geywan wearð 
 self on gesiht , sigor tacn , 
 wiþ þeod þræce . and hu se þridda dæge 
 of byrgenn beorn wuldor 
 of deaðe arisan , dryhten eall 
 hæleða cynn , and toh heofon astigan . 
 þus gleawlice gastgerynum 
 sægan sigerofum , swa fram siluestre 
 læran wesan . æt þæm se leodfruma 
 fulwihtan onfon and þæt forþ gehealdan 
 on hit dagana tidan , dryhten toh willan . 
 þe wesan on sæl sinc brytta , 
 niðheard cyning . wesan him niwe gefea 
 befeolan in fyrhðe , wesan him frofor micel 
 and hyht nihst heofonrices weard . 
 onginnan þu dryhten æ dæg and niht 
 þurh gast gifu georne cyþan , 
 and he soþlice silf getengde 
 goldwine guma in god þeowdom , 
 æscrof , unslaw . þu se æðeling findan , 
 leodgebyrga , þurh larsmiðas , 
 guðheard , garþrist , on god boc 
 hwær ahon wesan here beorhtme 
 on rode treo rodor waldend 
 æfstum þurh inwit , swa se eald feond 
 forlæran ligesearwum , leode fortyhte , 
 iudea cyn , þæt hi god silf 
 ahon , hergian fruma . se hi in hynðum sculan 
 toh wid feorh wergðu dreogan ! 
 þu wesan cristes lof þæm casere 
 on firhðsefan , forþ gemyndig 
 ymb þæt mære treo , and þu hit modor hettan 
 feran foldwege folc þreate 
 toh iudeum , georne sec 
 wiga þreate hwær se wuldor beam , 
 halig under hruse , hydan wære , 
 æðelcyning rod . elene nesan willan 
 se siðfates sæne weorðan , 
 nesan se wilgifan word gehyrwan , 
 hiere sylfre sunu , acan wesan sona gearu , 
 wif on willsið , swa hire weoruda helm , 
 byrnwiggendra , bebiddan habban . 
 onginnan þu ofstlice eorl mengu 
 toh flote fysan . fearoðhengestas 
 ymb geofenes stæð gearu standan , 
 sælan sæmearas , sunde getenge . 
 þe wesan orcnæwe ides siþfæt , 
 siððan wæges helm werod geseсan . 
 þær wlanc manig æt wendelsæ 
 on stæðe standan . stundum wrecan 
 ofer mearcpaðu , mægen æfter oðer , 
 and þu gehlodon hildesercum , 
 bord and ord , byrnwigendum , 
 wer and wif , wæghengestas . 
 lætan þu ofer fifelwæg famig scriðan 
 bronte brimþisan . bord oft onfon 
 ofer earhgeblond yða swengas ; 
 sæ swinsade . nesan hyrdan ic sið nesan ær 
 on egstreame ides lædan , 
 on merestræte , mægen fægerra . 
 þær magan gesion , se se sið behealdan , 
 brecan ofer bæðweg , brimwudu snyrgan 
 under swellingum , sæmearh plegean , 
 wadan wægflotan . wigan wesan bliðe , 
 collenferhðe , cwen siðes gefeon , 
 siððan toh hyðe hringedstefnan 
 ofer lagofæsten liþan habban 
 on creca land . ceolas lætan 
 æt sæfearoðe , sande bewrecene , 
 ald yðhofu , oncrum fæstan 
 on brim bidan beorn geþing , 
 hwonne heo se guðcwen guma þreate 
 ofer eastwegas eft geseсan . 
 þær wesan on eorle eðgesyne 
 bregdan byrne and bill gecost , 
 geatolic guðscrud , grimhelm manig , 
 ænlic eoforcumbul . wesan æscwigan , 
 secggas ymb sigecwen , siðes gefysde . 
 fyrdrinc from faran on lust 
 on creca land , casere boda , 
 hilderincas , hyrstum gewerede . 
 þær wesan gesyne sincgim lucan 
 on þæm hereþreate , hlaford gifu . 
 wesan seon eadhreðige elene gemyndig , 
 þriste on geþanc , þeodnes willan 
 geornan on mod þæt hio iudeas 
 ofer herefeldas heap gecoste 
 lindwigendra land geseсan , 
 secg þreate . swa hit siððan gelimpan 
 ymb lytel fæc þæt þæt leodmægen , 
 guðrofe hæleþ toh hierusalem 
 cuman in þu ceaster corðra micel , 
 eorl æscrofe , mid þu æðele cwen . 
 hatan þe gebeodan burgsittendum 
 þæm snoterestum side and wid 
 geond iudeas , guma gehwylc , 
 meðelhegende , on gemot cuman , 
 þu þu deoplicost dryhten geryno 
 þurh rihte æ reccan cuðon . 
 þe wesan samnian of sidwegum 
 mægen unlytel , þu þu moyses æ 
 reccan cuðon . þær on riman wesan 
 þri þusend se leode 
 alesen toh lar . onginnan þu leoflic wif 
 wer ebrea word negan : 
 " ic þæt gearolice ongiten habban 
 þurg wittig wordgeryno 
 on god boc þæt ge geardagum 
 weorþ wesan wuldorcyning , 
 dryhten dyre and dædhwæte . 
 hwæt#2 , ge ealle snytro unwislice , 
 wrað wiðweorpon , þu ge wergdon þan 
 þu ge of wergðe þurh hit wuldor miht , 
 fram ligcwale , lysan þenсean , 
 of hæftnede . ge mid horu speowdon 
 on se ondwlitan þu ge eage sunnan , 
 fram blindnes bot gefremian 
 edniowunga þurh þæt æðele spald , 
 and fram unclæne oft generian 
 deofol gast . ge toh deaþ se 
 deman onginnan , se þu of deaðe self 
 weorold awehte on wer corþre 
 in þæt ær lif eowres cynn . 
 swa ge modblinde mengan onginnan 
 liсgan wiþ soð , sunnan wiþ þystru , 
 æfst wiþ are , inwitþancum 
 wroht webbedan . ge seon wergðu forðam 
 sceðþeð scyldfullum . ge þu sciran miht 
 deman onginnan , and gedweolan libban , 
 þeostru geþanc , oþ þes dæg . 
 gangan nu snude , snytro geþencaþ , 
 wer wisfæste , word cræftig , 
 þu þu eowre æ æðele cræftig 
 on ferhðsefan fyrmest habban , 
 þu me soþlice secgan cunnan , 
 ondsware cyþan for eowic forþ 
 tacnian gehwilc þu ic him toh sec . " 
 eodan þu on geruman reonigmode 
 eorl æcleawe , egesa geþreade , 
 gehðum geomor , georne sœ̄сan 
 þu wisestan wordgeryno , 
 þæt hio þære cwene oncweðan magan 
 swa til swa trages , swa hio him toh sœ̄сan . 
 hio þu on þreate þusend mannian 
 findan ferhðgleawra , þu þu fyrngemynd 
 mid iudeum gearwian cuðon . 
 þringan þu on þreate þær on þrymm bidan 
 in cynestole casere mæg , 
 geatolic guðcwen gold hyrstan . 
 elene maþelian and for eorlum sprecan : 
 " gehyrað , higegleawe , halig run , 
 word and wisdom . hwæt#2 , ge wittig 
 lar onfon , hu se liffruma 
 in cildes had cennan weorþan , 
 miht wealdend . be þæm moyses singan , 
 and þæt word cweðan weard israhela : 
 'eow acennan bið cniht on degle , 
 miht mære , swa se modor nesan bið 
 wæstm geeacnod þurh wer friсgan .' 
 be ðam dauid cyning dryhtleoð agalan , 
 frod fyrnweota , fæder salomones , 
 and þæt word gecweþan wigona baldor : 
 'ic frumþa god for sceawian , 
 sigorian dryhten . he on gesiht wesan , 
 mægena wealdend , min on þu swiðran , 
 þrymm hyrdan . þanan ic nesan wendan 
 æfre toh ald onsion min .' 
 swa hit eft be ge essaias , 
 wittig for weorodum , word mælan , 
 deophycggende þurh dryhten gast : 
 'ic up ahebban eafora gingne 
 and birnan cennan , þæm ic blæd forgifan , 
 halig higefrofre , acan hi hyrwan me , 
 feogean þurh feondscipe , nagan foreþances , 
 wisdom gewitt ; and þu weregan neotan , 
 þu munan dæg gehwa drifeð and þirsceð , 
 ongitaþ hira goddend , nales gnyrnwræcum 
 feogað frynd hira þu him fodder gifað , 
 and me israhela æfre nesan willan 
 folc oncnawan , þiсgan ic feala for him 
 æfter woruldstundum wundrian gefremian .' 
 hwæt#2 , we þæt gehyrdan þurh halig bec 
 þæt ge dryhten gifan don unscyndne , 
 meotod miht spedan , moyse sægan 
 hu ge heofoncyninge hyran sculan , 
 lar læstan . ge se lungre aþreotan , 
 and ge þæm ryhte wiðroten habban , 
 onscunedon se sciran scippend eall , 
 dryhten dryhten , and gedwola fylgan 
 ofer rihtan god . nu ge raþe gangan 
 and findan gen þu þu fyrngewritu 
 þurh snytro cræftan sellan cunnan , 
 æriht ge , þæt me ondsware 
 þurh sid sefa secgan cunnan . " 
 eodan þe mid mengo modcwanige , 
 collenferhðe , swa him se cwen beodan . 
 findan þu d forþsnottera 
 alesen leodmæga , þu þu leornungcræft 
 þurh modgemynd micel habban , 
 on sefa snytro . heo toh salu eft 
 ymb lytel fæc laðode wesan , 
 ceaster weard . hio se cwen onginnan
