 sibb bisweðede , sorh biwerede , 
 dream gedyrde , dryhten gelyfan . 
 awo toh ealdor engel gemanan 
 brucað mid bliss , beorht mid lisse , 
 freogað folc weard . fæder eall geweald 
 hafað and healdeð halig weorud . 
 þær wesan engel song , eadig blis , 
 þær wesan seon dyre dryhten onsien 
 eall þæm gesælgum sunne leoht . 
 þær wesan leof lufu , lif butan endedeaðe , 
 glæd guma weorud , gioguð butan yldan , 
 heofonduguða þri , hælu butan sar , 
 ryhtfremmendum ræst butan gewinnan , 
 domeadig dæg butan þeostru , 
 beorht blæd full , blis butan sorh , 
 frið freond bitweon forþ butan æfest , 
 gesælgum on swegl , sib butan niþ 
 halig on gemonge . nesan þær hungor nesan þurst , 
 slæpan nesan swar leger , nesan sunne bryne , 
 nesan cyle nesan cearo , acan þær cyning giefu 
 awo brucað eadig gedryht , 
 weoruda wlitescynast , wuldor mid dryhten . 
 
 we wesan rihtan micel þæt we rodera weard , 
 wereda wuldorcining , word herigen , 
 mod lufian ! he wesan mægen spedan , 
 heafod eall heahgesceafta , 
 frea ælmihtig . næs him fruma æfre , 
 or weorþan , nesan nu ende cuman 
 ecean drihten , acan he bið wifcynn romana 
 ofer heofenstolas . heah þrymm 
 soþfæst and swiðfeorm sweglbosmas healdan , 
 þu wesan gesette wid and side 
 þurh geweald god wuldor bearn , 
 gast weard . habban gleam and dream , 
 and hira ordfruman , engel þreatas , 
 beorht bliss . wesan hira blæd micel ! 
 þegn þrymfæste þeon herian , 
 sægan lust lof , hira liffrea 
 deman . drihtenes dugeþum wesan 
 swiðe gesælige . synn nesan cunnan , 
 firenian fremman , acan hi on friðe libban , 
 ece mid hira aldor . elles nesan onginnan 
 ræran on roderum nymþe rihtan and soþ , 
 ærðon engel wearð for oferhygde 
 dælan on gedwild . noldan dreogan lengan 
 hira selfra rædan , acan hi of siblufan 
 god ahweorfan . habban gielpan micel 
 þæt hi wiþ drihten dælan magan 
 wuldorfæstan wiс werod þrymm , 
 sid and swegltorht . him þær sar gelimpan , 
 æfst and oferhygd , and se engel mod 
 þu se unræd onginnan ærest fremman , 
 wefan and weccean . þu he word cweðan , 
 niþ ofþyrsted , þæt he on norðdæle 
 ham and heahsetl heofena rices 
 aginnan willan , þu wearð yrre god 
 and þæm werod wrað þu he ær wurðode 
 wlite and wuldor . sceop þæm werlogan 
 wræclicne ham weorc toh lean , 
 helleheafas , heard niðas . 
 hatan þæt witehus wræcna bidan , 
 deop , dream leas , drihten ure , 
 gast weard , þu he hit geare witan , 
 synnihte besellan , susl geinnian , 
 geondfeolan fyr and færcyle , 
 recan and read leсgan . hatan þu geond þæt rædlease hof 
 weaxan witebrogan . habban hi , wrohtgeteme 
 grimman , wiþ god somnian ; him se grim lean becuman ! 
 cweþan þæt heo romana , reðemode , 
 aginnan woldan , and swa eaðe meahtan . 
 him seon wenan geleah , siððan waldend hit , 
 heofon heahcining , honda aræran , 
 hehste wiþ þæm here . nesan mihton hygelease , 
 mæne wiþ metod , mægyn bryttigin , 
 acan him se mære mod getwæfan , 
 bælc forbigde . þu he gebelgan wearð , 
 beslean synsceaþan sigor and geweald , 
 dom and dugeðe , and dream beniman 
 hit feond , friðo and gefea ealle , 
 torht tire , and hit torn gewrecan 
 on gesacum swiðe selfes miht 
 streng stiepe . habban styrne mod , 
 gremman grymme , gripan on wrað 
 fah folm , and him on fæðm gebrecan 
 yrre on mod ; æðele bescyrede 
 hit wiðerbrecan wuldorgestealdum . 
 sceof þu and scyrede scyppend ure 
 oferhidig cyn engel of heofnum , 
 wærleas werod . waldend sendan 
 laðwendne herian on lang sið , 
 geomor gast ; wesan him gylp forod , 
 beatan forberstan , and forbiged þri , 
 wlite wemman . heo on wracu siððan 
 seomian sweart , siþ nesan þurfan 
 hlud hlihhan , acan heo helltregum 
 werig wunian and wea cuðon , 
 sar and sorh , susl þrowedon 
 þystru beþeссan , þearl æfterlean 
 se þu heo onginnan wiþ god winnan . 
 þu wesan soð swa ær sibb on heofnum , 
 fæger freoþoþeawas , frea eall leof , 
 þeon hit þegn ; þrymm weaxan 
 duguða mid drihten , dreamhæbbendra . 
 wesan þu gesome , þu þu swegl buað , 
 wuldor eðel . wroht wesan asprungen , 
 oht mid engel and orlegnið , 
 siððan herewosan heofon ofgæfon , 
 sunnan belorene . him on last setl , 
 wuldorsped welig , wid stodan 
 gifu growan on god romana , 
 beorht and geblædfæst , buendra leas , 
 siððan wræcstowe werig gast 
 under hearmlocan hean geforan . 
 þu þeahtian þeon ure 
 modgeþonce , hu he þu mære gesceaft , 
 eðelstaðolas eft gesette , 
 swegltorhtan seld , god werod , 
 þu hi gielpsceaþan ofgifen habban , 
 heah on heofenum . forðam halig god 
 under roderas fon , rice miht , 
 willan þæt him eorþ and uproder 
 and sid wæter gesette weorþan 
 woruldgesceafte on wrað gieldan , 
 þær þu forhealdene of hleo sendan . 
 nesan wesan heran þu git nymþe heolstersceado 
 wiht weorþan , acan þes wid grund 
 standan deop and dim , drihten fremde , 
 idel and unnyt . on se eage wlitan 
 stiðfrihþ cining , and þu stow behealdan , 
 dream leas , geseon deorc gesweorc 
 semian sinnihte sweart under roderum , 
 winnan and weste , oðþæt þes woruldgesceaft 
 þurh word gewearð wuldorcyning . 
 heran ærest gesceppan ece drihten , 
 helm eallwihta , heofon and eorþ , 
 rodor aræran , and þes rum land 
 gestaþelode strang miht , 
 frea ælmihtig . folde wesan þu git , 
 græs ungrene ; garsecg þeссean 
 sweart synnihte , side and wid , 
 woh weg . þu wesan wuldortorht 
 heofonweardes gast ofer holm beran 
 micel sped . metod engel hatan , 
 lifes brytta , sunnan forþ cuman 
 ofer rum grund . raþe wesan gefyllan 
 heahcininges hæs ; him wesan halig sunnan 
 ofer westen , swa se wyrhta bebeodan . 
 þu gesundrian sigorian waldend 
 ofer laguflode sunnan wiþ þeostru , 
 sceadan wiþ sciman . sceop þu begen naman , 
 lifes brytta . sunnan wesan ærest 
 þurh drihten word dæg nemnan , 
 wlitebeorht gescaft . wel lician 
 frea æt frymþ forþbæro tidan , 
 dæg ærest ; geseon deorc sceado 
 sweart swiðrian geond sid grund . 
 þu seon tidan gewitan ofer timber sceacan 
 middangeard , metod æfter scufan 
 scirum sciman , scippend ure , 
 æfen ærest . him yrnan on last , 
 þringan þystru genip , þæm þu se þeon self 
 sceop niht naman . nergend ure 
 hi gesundrian ; siððan æfre 
 dreogan and don drihten willan , 
 ece ofer eorþ . þe cuman oðer dæg , 
 sunnan æfter þeostru . hatan þu lifes weard 
 on mereflode midde weorðan 
 hyhtlic heofontimber . holm dælan 
 waldend ure and gewyrсean þu 
 roderas fæsten ; þæt se rice ahebban 
 up from eorþ þurh hit ongeagn word , 
 frea ælmihtig . flod wesan adælan 
 under heahrodore halig miht , 
 wæter of wæter , þæm þu wuniað git 
 under fæsten folc hrofes . 
 þu cuman ofer folde fus siðian 
 mære merigen þridda . nesan metod þe gyte 
 widlond nesan weg nytt , acan standan bewrigen fæstan 
 folde mid flod . frea engel hatan 
 þurh hit word wese wæter gemæne , 
 þu nu under roderum hira ryne healdað , 
 stow gestefnde . þe standan hraðe 
 holm under heofon , swa se halig bebeodan , 
 sid ætsomne , þe sundrian wesan 
 lago wiþ land . geseon þu lifes weard 
 drige stow , dugoða hyrdan , 
 wid æteowian , þu se wuldorcyning 
 eorþ nemnan . gesette yðum hira 
 onrihtne ryne , rum flod , 
 and gefeterode . . . 
 nesan þynсan þu gerysne rodor weard , 
 þæt adam lengan ana wære 
 neorxnawonges , niwe gesceafte , 
 hyrdan and healdend . forðam him heahcyning , 
 frea ælmihtig fultuman tiode ; 
 wif aweссan and þu wrað sellan , 
 lifes leohtfruma , leof rinc . 
 he þæt andweorc of adames 
 lice aleoðode , and him list ateon 
 rib of side . he wesan restan fæstan , 
 and softe swefan , sar nesan witan , 
 earfoða dælan , nesan þær ænig cuman 
 blod of benne , acan him breogo engel 
 of lice ateon liodende ban , 
 wer unwundod , of þæm wyrсean god 
 freolice fæmne . feorh in gedon , 
 ece saula . heo wesan engel gelice . 
 þu wesan eue , adames bryd , 
 gast gegearwian . hi on geogoðe buan 
 wlitebeorht wesan on weorold cennan 
 meotodes miht . munan nesan cuðon 
 don nesan dreogan , acan him drihten wesan 
 begen on breost beornan lufu . 
 þu gebledsian bliðheort cyning , 
 metod alwihta , mann cynn 
 þe forma twegen , fæder and moder , 
 wif and wæpned . he þu word cweðan : 
 " temað nu and wexað , tudor fyllað 
 eorþ ælgrene , incre cynn , 
 sunu and dohtor . git sculan sealtan wæter 
 wunian on geweald and eall weorold gesceaft . 
 brucað blæddaga and brimhlæste 
 and heofonfugla . git wesan halig feoh 
 and wilde deor on geweald sellan , 
 and lifian , þe þu land tredað , 
 feorheaceno cynn , þe þu flod wecceð 
 geond hronrade . git hyrað eall . " 
 þu sceawian scyppend ure 
 hit weorc wlite and hit wæstmian blæd , 
 niwe gesceafta . neorxnawong standan 
 god and gastlic , gifena gefyllan 
 freme forðweardum . fæger sunnan 
 þæt liðe land lago yrnan , 
 wylleburne ( nalles wolcn þe git 
 ofer rum grund regn beran , 
 winnan mid windan , hwæðre wæstm standan 
 folde gefrætwian ) ; healdan forðryne 
 eastream hira æðele feower 
 of þæm niwe neorxnawonge . 
 þu wesan adælede drihten miht 
 ealle of an , þu he þes eorþ gesceppan , 
 wæter wlitebeorht , and on weorold sendan . 
 se an hatað yldan , eorðbuende , 
 fison folcweras ; se folde dælan 
 brad bebugeð beorht stream 
 hebeleac utan . on þære eðyltyrf 
 niððas findað neah and feorran 
 gold and gymcynn , gumþeoda birnan , 
 þe selestan , se þu we secgað bec . 
 þonne seon æftre ethiopia— 
 land and liodgeard— beligeð witon , 
 ginne romana , þære wesan geon noma . 
 þridda wesan tigris , seon wiþ þeodscipe , 
 ea inflede , assirie belið . 
 swilce wesan seon feorþa , þu nu geond folc manig 
 wer eufraten wid nemnað . 
 " acan niotað git se oðres eall , forlætað se an beam , 
 wariað git wiþ se wæstm . nesan weorþ git wilnian gæd . " 
 hnigan þu mid heafod heofoncyninge 
 georne togenes and secgan eall þanc , 
 list and þær lar . he lætan heo þæt land buan , 
 hwærf him þu toh heofenum halig drihten , 
 stiðferhð cyning . standan hit handgeweorc 
 somod on sande , nytan sorh wiht 
 toh begrornianne , butan heo god willan 
 lengest læstan . heo wesan leof god 
 ðenden heo hit halig word healdan willan . 
 habban se alwalda engelcynna 
 þurh handmægen , halig drihten , 
 tene getrimede , þæm he getruwian wel 
 þæt hi hit giongorscipe fyligan willan , 
 wyrcean hit willan , forðam he him gewitan forgifan 
 and mid hit hand gesceppan , halig drihten— 
 settan habban he hi swa gesæliglice . an habban he swa swiðne geworhtne , 
 swa mihtig on hit modgeþohte , he lætan he swa micles wealdan , 
 hehstne toh him on heofon romana ; habban he he swa hwit geworhtne , 
 swa wynlic wesan hit wæstm on heofon þæt him cuman from werod drihten , 
 gelic wesan he þæm leoht steorra . lof sculan he drihten wyrcean , 
 dyran sculan he hit dream on heofon , and sculan hit drihten þancian 
 se lean þu he him on þæm sunnan gescerede þonne lætan he hit he lange wealdan . 
 acan he awendan hit him toh wyrsa þingan , onginnan him winnan up ahebban 
 wiþ se hehstan heofnes waldend , þu siteð on þæm halig stol . 
 deore wesan he drihten ure ; nesan miht him bedyrned weorðan 
 þæt hit engyl onginnan ofermod wese , 
 ahebban he wiþ hit hearra , sœ̄сan hetespræce , 
 gylpword ongeagn , nyllan god þeowian , 
 cweðan þæt hit liс wære sunnan and scene , 
 hwit and hiowbeorht . nesan magan he æt hit hige findan 
 þæt he god willan geongerdome 
 þeodne þeowian . þynсan him self 
 þæt he mægyn and cræftan micel habban 
 þonne se halig god habban miht 
 folcgestælna . feala word gespæc 
 se engel ofermod . þenсean þurh hit an cræftan 
 hu he him strenglicran stol gewyrсean , 
 heahran on heofon ; cweðan þæt he hit hige spannan 
 þæt he westan and norð wyrcean onginnan , 
 trymman getimbro ; cweðan him tweogan þynсan 
 þæt he god willan geong weorðan . 
 " hwæt#2 sculan ic winnan gewinnan " cweðan he . " nesan me wihtæ þurfan 
 hearra toh habbanne . ic mæg mid hand swa fela 
 wundrian gewyrcean . ic habban geweald micel 
 toh gyrwanne godlecran stol , 
 hearra on heofne . hwy sculan ic æfter hit hyldo ðeowian , 
 bugan him swilces geongordomes gewinnan ic mæg wese god swa he . 
 bigstandað me strang geneatas , þu nesan willað me æt þæm striðe geswican , 
 hæleþ heardmode . hi habbað me toh hearra gecorene , 
 rof rinc ; mid swilcum mæg munan rædan geþencean , 
 fon mid swilcum folcgesteallan . frynd synd hi min georne , 
 hold on hyra hygesceaftum . ic mæg hyra hearra wese , 
 ræde on þes romana . swa me þæt rihtan nesan þinceð , 
 þæt ic oleccan awiht þurfan 
 god æfter god ænig . nesan willan ic lengan hit geong wurþan . " 
 þu hit se allwalda eall gehyrdan , 
 þæt hit engyl onginnan ofermede micel 
 ahebban wiþ hit hearra and sprecan healic word 
 dollice wiþ drihten sinnan . sculan he þu dæd ongyldan , 
 worc se gewinn gedælan , and sculan hit wite habban , 
 eall morðra micel . swa deð mann gehwilc 
 þu wiþ hit waldend winnan ongynneð 
 mid mane wiþ se mære drihten . þu wearð se mihtig gebelgan , 
 hehsta heofon waldend , weorpan he of þan hean stol . 
 hettan habban he æt hit hearra winnan , hyldo habban hit ferlorene , 
 gram wearð him se god on hit mod . forðam he sculan grund gesecean 
 heard hellewite , se þu he winnan wiþ heofnes waldend . 
 acwæð he þu fram hit hyldo and he on hell weorpan , 
 on þu deop dæl , þær he toh deofol wearð , 
 se feond mid hit gefere eall . feollan þu ufon of heofnum 
 þurh lengo swa , þri niht and dæg , 
 þu engel of heofnum on hell , and heo ealle forsceop 
 drihten toh deofol . forðam heo hit dæd and word 
 nyllan weorðian , forðam he heo on wyrsa sunnan 
 under eorþ neoðan , ællmihtig god , 
 settan sigelease on þu sweart hell . 
 þær hæbbað heo on æfyn ungemet lange , 
 eall feond gehwilc , fyr edneowe , 
 þonne cymð on uhta easterne windan , 
 forst fyrn cald . simble fyr oððe gar , 
 sum heard geswincan habban sculan . 
 wyrсean munan hit him toh wite , ( hyra weorold wesan gehwyrfed ) , 
 forma siþ , fyllan hell 
 mid þæm andsaca . healdan engel forþ 
 heofonrices hehðe , þu ær god hyldo gelæstan . 
 liсgan þu oðer fynd on þæm fyr , þu ær swa feala habban 
 gewinn wiþ hira waldend . wite þoliað , 
 hat heaðowelm hell tomiddes , 
 brand and brad ligas , swilce eacan þu biter recas , 
 þrosm and þystre , forðam hi þegnscipe 
 god forgyman . hi hyra galan beswican , 
 engel oferhygd , nyllan alwaldan 
 word weorþian , habban wite micel , 
 wesan þu befeallene fyr toh botm 
 on þu hatan hell þurh hygeleaste 
 and þurh ofermetto . sœ̄сan oþer land : 
 þæt wesan sunnan leas and wesan liges full , 
 fyr fær micel . fynd ongietan 
 þæt hi habban wrixlan wite unrim 
 þurh hira micel mod and þurh miht god 
 and þurh ofermetto eall swiðe . 
 þu sprecan se ofermod cyning , þu ær wesan engel scynost , 
 hwitost on heofne and hit hearra leof , 
 drihten dyre , oþ hi toh dol wurdon , 
 þæt him for galscipe god self wearð , 
 mihtig on mod , yrre . weorpan he on þæt morðer innan , 
 niðer on þæt niobedd , and sceop him naman siððan , 
 cweðan se hehsta hatan sculan 
 satan siððan , hettan he þære sweart hell 
 grund gyme , nalles wiþ god winnan . 
 satan maðelode , sorgian sprecan , 
 se þu hell forþ healdan sculan , 
 gieme se grund . wesan ær god engel , 
 hwit on heofne , oþ he hit hyсgan forspeon , 
 and hit ofermetto eall swiðe , 
 þæt he nesan willan wereda drihten 
 word wurðian . weallan him on innan 
 hyсgan ymb hit heorte , hatan wesan him utan 
 wraðlic wite . he þu word cweðan : 
 " wesan se ænga studu ungelic swiðe 
 þæm oðer þu we ær cuðon , 
 hean on heofonrice , þu me min hearra onlag , 
 þiсgan we he for þæm alwaldan aginnan nesan motan , 
 romigan ure rices . næfð he þiсgan rihtan gedon 
 þæt he we hæfð befælled fyr toh botm , 
 hell þære hatan , heofonrice beniman ; 
 hafað hit mearcian mid moncynne 
 toh gesettanne . þæt me wesan sorh micel , 
 þæt adam sculan , þu wesan of eorþ wyrсean , 
 min stronglican stol behealdan , 
 wese him on wynn , and we þes wite þolian , 
 hearm on þes hell . wa la , agan ic min hand geweald 
 and motan an tidan ute weorðan , 
 wese an winterstunde , þonne ic mid þis werode-- 
 acan licgað me ymbe irenbenda , 
 rideð racente sal . ic wesan rices leas ; 
 habbað me swa heard hell clommas , 
 fæstan befon . heran wesan fyr micel , 
 ufan and neoðone . ic wifcynn nesan geseon 
 laðran landscipe . lig nesan aswamað , 
 hatan ofer hell . me habbað hring gespong , 
 sliðhearda sal siðes amyrred , 
 afyrran me min feðe ; fot synt gebindan , 
 hand gehæfte . synt þissa heldora 
 weg forwyrсan , swa ic mid wiht nesan mæg 
 of þes lioðobendum . licgað me ymbe 
 heard irenes hatan geslægene 
 grindel great . mid þywan me god hafað 
 hæftan be þæm heals , swa ic witan he min hige cuðe ; 
 and þæt witan eacan werod drihten , 
 þæt sculan wit adame yfele gewurðan 
 ymb þæt heofonrice , þær ic agan min hand geweald . 
 acan ðoliaþ we nu þrea on hell , ( þæt syndon þystre and hæto ) , 
 grimman , grundleas . hafað we god self 
 forswapen on þes sweart mist ; swa he we nesan mæg ænig synn gestælan , 
 þæt we him on þæm land lað gefremedon . he hæfð we þiсgan se sunnan bescyrede , 
 beweorpan on eall wite micel . nesan magan we se wracu gefremman , 
 geleanian him mid laðes wiht þæt he we hafað se sunnan bescyrede . 
 he hæfð nu mearcian an middangeard , þær he hæfð mann geworhtne 
 æfter hit onlicnesse . mid þæm he willan eft gesettan 
 heofon romana mid hluttrum saulum . we se sculan hycgan georne , 
 þæt we on adame , gif we æfre mægen , 
 and on hit eafrum swa some , anda gebetan , 
 onwendan him þær willan sin , gif we hit mægen wiht aþencan . 
 nesan gelyfan ic me nu se sunnan furðor se þu he him þenceð lange niotan , 
 se ead mid hit engel cræftan . nesan magan we þæt on ald gewinnan , 
 þæt we mihtig god mod onwæcnan . witon oðwendan hit nu mann bearn , 
 þæt heofonrice , nu we hit habban nesan motan , gedon þæt hi hit hyldo forlætan , 
 þæt hi þæt onwendan þæt he mid hit word bebeodan : þonne weorð he him wrað on mod , 
 ahwet hi from hit hyldo , þonne sculan hi þes hell sec 
 and þes grimman grund ; þonne motan we hi we toh giongrum habban , 
 firas birnan on þes fæst clomme . onginnað nu ymb þu fyrd þencean ! 
 gif ic ænig þægne þeodenmadmas 
 gear forgifan , þenden we on þan god romana 
 gesælige sittan and habban ure setl geweald , 
 þonne he me na on leofran tidan lean nesan magan 
 min gifu gyldan , gif hit gien willan 
 min þegnian hwilc geþafa wurðan , 
 þæt he up heonan ute miht 
 cuman þurh þes clustro , and habban cræftan mid him 
 þæt he mid feðerhoman fleoge magan , 
 windan on wolcn , þær wyrсean stondað 
 adam and eue on eorðrice 
 mid wela bewindan , and we synd aworpene hider 
 on þes deop dalo . nu hi drihten synt 
 wurðran micel , and motan him se wela aginnan 
 þu we on heofonrice habban sculan , 
 romana mid rihte ; wesan se rædan gescyred 
 mann cynn . þæt me wesan on minum mod swa sar , 
 on minum hyсgan hreoweð , þæt hi heofonrice 
 aginnan toh ald . gif hit ge ænig mæge 
 gewendan mid wiht þæt hi word god , 
 lar forlætan , sona hi him þu laðran beoð . 
 gif hi brecað hit gebodscipe , þonne he him abelgan wurðeþ ; 
 siððan bið him se wela onwendan and weorþ him wite gegarwod , 
 sum heard hearmscearu . hycgað hit ealle , 
 hu ge hi beswican ! siððan ic me sefte mæg 
 restan on þes racente , gif him þæt romana losað . 
 se þu þæt gelæsteð , him bið lean gearu 
 æfter toh ald , se we heran inne magan 
 on þes fyr forþ freme gewinnan . 
 sittan lætan ic he wiþ me silf , swa hwæt swa þæt secgan cymeð 
 on þes hatan hell , þæt hi heofoncyninges 
 unweorþlice word and dæd 
 lar . . . . " 
 ange he þu gyrwan god andsaca , 
 fus on frætwum ( habban fæcne hyсgan ) ; 
 hæleðhelm on heafod asettan and se full heard gebindan , 
 spenn mid spangum ; witan him spræca fela , 
 worian word . windan him up þanan , 
 hwerfan him þurh þu helldora , ( habban hyсgan strang ) , 
 lacan on lyft laþwendemod , 
 swingan þæt fyr on twegen feond cræftan ; 
 willan dearnunga drihten geongran 
 mid mandæde , mann beswican , 
 forlædan and forlæran , þæt hi wurdon lað god . 
 he þu geferde þurh feond cræftan 
 oððæt he adam on eorðrice , 
 god handgesceaft , gearu findan , 
 wislice wyrсean , and hit wif somed , 
 freoh fægroste , swa hi fela cuðon 
 god gegearwigean— þu him toh gingra 
 metod mancynn mearcian selfa— 
 and him bi twegin beam standan 
 þu wesan utan ofætes gehlædene , 
 werian mid wæstm , swa hi waldend god , 
 heah heofoncyning hand gesette , 
 þæt þær ieldo birnan motan on ceosan 
 god and yfel , guma æghwilc , 
 wela and wawan . næs se wæstm gelic ! 
 oðer wesan swa wynlic , wlitig and scene , 
 liðe and lofsum . þæt wesan lifes beam . 
 motan on ecnisse æfter lybban , 
 wese on weorold , se se wæstm onbat , 
 swa him æfter þywan ieldo nesan derian , 
 nesan suht swaru , acan motan simble wese 
 lungre on lust and hit lif aginnan , 
 hyldo heofoncyninges heran on weorold habban . 
 him toh wesan witod geþingþo 
 on se hean heofon , þonne he heonan wendan . 
 þonne wesan se oðer eallenga sweart , 
 dim and þystru ; þæt wesan deaðes beam , 
 se bær bitter fela . sculan buan witan 
 yld æghwilc yfel and god 
 gewindan on þes weorold . sculan on wite wifcynn 
 mid swat and mid sorh siððan libban , 
 swa hwæt swa gebyrgde se on þæm beam geweaxan . 
 sculan he ieldo beniman ellendæda , 
 dream and drihtscipes , and him beon deað scyred . 
 lytel hwil sculan he hit lifes niotan , 
 sec þonne land sweartost on fyr . 
 sculan feond þeowian , þær wesan eall frecnian micel 
 leode toh lang hwil . þæt witan se laða georne , 
 dyrne deofol bodian þu wiþ drihten winnan . 
 weorpan he þu on wyrm liс and windan him þu ymbutan 
 se deaðes beam þurh deofol cræftan , 
 geniman þær se ofætes and wendan he eft þanan 
 þær he witan handgeweorc heofoncyninges . 
 ongon he þu frinan forma word 
 se laða mid ligen : " langað þu awuht , 
 adam , up toh god gewinnan ic wesan on hit ærende hider 
 feorran ferian , nesan þæt nu fyrn nesan wesan 
 þæt ic wiþ he silf sæt . þu hettan he me on þes sið faran , 
 hettan þæt þu þes ofætes etan , cweðan þæt þu abal and cræftan 
 and þu modsefa mara weorþan , 
 and þu lichoma leoht micel , 
 þu gesceapu scenran , cweðan þæt þu ænig sceat ðearf 
 nesan weorþan on weorold . nu þu willan hæftan , 
 hyldo gewyrсean heofoncyninges , 
 toh þance þenian þin hearan , 
 hæftan þu wiþ drihten dyrne geworhtne . ic gehyrdan he þin dæd and word 
 lofian on hit sunnan and ymb þu lif sprecan . 
 swa þu læstan sculan þæt on þes land hider 
 hit boda bringað . brad synd on weorold 
 grene geard , and god siteð 
 on þæm hehstan heofna romana , 
 ufan alwalda . nele þu earfeðu 
 self habban þæt he on þes sið faru , 
 guma drihten , acan he hit gingra sendan 
 toh þinne sprecan . nu he þu mid spell hettan 
 listas læran . læstan þu georne 
 hit ambyhto , niman þu þes ofæt on hand , 
 bitan hit and byrige . þu weorð on þin breost rum , 
 wæstm þywan wlitegra . þu sendan waldend god , 
 þu hearra þes helpan of heofonrice . " 
 adam maðelode þær he on eorþ standan , 
 selfsceafte guma : " þonne ic sigedrihten , 
 mihtig god , mæðlan gehyrdan 
 strang stemn , and me heran stondan hettan , 
 hit bebod healdan , and me þes bryd forgifan , 
 wlitesciene wif , and me warnian hettan 
 þæt ic on se deaðes beam bedroren nesan weorþan , 
 beswican toh swiðe , he cweðan þæt þu sweart hell 
 healdan sculan se þu bi hit heorte wuht 
 laðes gelædan . nytan þiсgan þu mid ligen faru 
 þurh dyrne geþanc , þu þu drihten wesan 
 bodian of heofnum . hwæt#2 , ic þinne bysnigan nesan mæg , 
 word nesan wisna wuht oncnawan , 
 siðes nesan sagona . ic witan hwæt#2 he me self bebeodan , 
 nergend user , þu ic he nehst geseon : 
 he hettan me hit word weorðian and wel healdan , 
 læstan hit lar . þu gelic nesan beon 
 ænig hit engel þu ic ær geseon , 
 nesan þu me oðiewdest ænig tacn 
 þu he me þurh treowe toh onsendan , 
 min hearra þurh hyldo . þywan ic þu hyran nesan cunnan , 
 acan þu magan þu forþ faran . ic habban me fæst geleafa 
 up toh þæm ælmihtegan god þu me mid hit earm wyrсean , 
 heran mid hand sin . he mæg me of hit hean romana 
 geofian mid god gehwilcum , þiсgan he hit gingra nesan sendan . " 
 wendan he wraðmod þær he þæt wif geseon 
 on eorðrice euan stondan , 
 sceone gesceapene , cweðan þæt sceaþa micel 
 eall hira eafora æfter siððan 
 weorþan on weorold : " ic witan , git waldend god 
 abelgan weorþ , swa ic him þes bodscipe 
 selfa secg , þonne ic of þis siþ cuman 
 ofer lang wegan , þæt git nesan læstan wel 
 hwilc ærende swa he easten hider 
 on þes sið sendeð . nu sculan he self faran 
 toh incre andswaru ; nesan mæg hit ærende 
 hit bodian beodan ; þywan ic witan þæt he git abelgan weorþ , 
 mihtig on mod . gif þu þiсgan minum willan , 
 wif willan , word hyran , 
 þu magan hit þonne rum rædan geþencan . 
 gehyсgan on þin breost þæt þu git begen twegen magan 
 wite bewarigan , swa ic þu wisian . 
 æt þes ofetes ! þonne wurðað þu eage swa sunnan 
 þæt þu magan swa wid ofer weorold ealle 
 geseon siððan , and selfes stol 
 herran þin , and habban hit hyldo forþ . 
 magan þu adame eft gestyran , 
 gif þu hit willan hæftan and he þin word getrywð . 
 gif þu him toh soð sægan hwilc þu selfa hæftan 
 bisne on breost , se þu gebod god , 
 lar læst , he se lað strið , 
 yfel andwyrde on forlæteð 
 on breostcofan , swa witan him butu 
 on spedan sprecað . span þu he georne 
 þæt he þin lar læstan , þywan læs git lað god , 
 incrum waldende , weorðan þurfan . 
 gif þu þæt angin fremman , ides seon betste , 
 forhelan ic incrum herran þæt me hearmes swa fela 
 adam gesprecan , earh word . 
 tyhð me untryowða , cwyð þæt ic seon teon geornan , 
 grama ambyhtsecg , nales god engel , 
 acan ic cunnan ealle swa geare engel gebyrde , 
 heah heofon gehlidu ; wesan seon hwil se lang 
 þæt ic geornlice god þegnian 
 þurh hold hyсgan , herran minum , 
 drihten self ; nesan wesan ic deofol gelic . " 
 lædan hi swa mid ligen and mid list spannan 
 ides on þæt unriht , oðþæt hire on innan onginnan 
 weallan wyrm þeссean ( habban hire waccor hige 
 metod mearcian ) , þæt heo hire mod onginnan 
 lætan æfter þæm lar ; forðam heo æt þæm lað onfon 
 ofer drihten word deaðes beam 
 weorcsum wæstm . nesan wearð wyrsa dæd 
 mann mearcian ! þæt wesan micel wundor 
 þæt hit ece god æfre willan 
 þeon þolian , þæt weorþan þegn swa manig 
 forlædd be þæm lygenum þu for þæm lar cuman . 
 heo þu se ofætes æt , alwaldan brecan 
 word and willan . þu magan heo wid geseon 
 þurh se lað lænan þu hi mid ligen beswican , 
 dearnenga bedragan , þu hire for hit dæd cuman , 
 þæt hire þynсan hwit heofon and eorþ , 
 and eall þes weorold wlitig , and geweorc god 
 micel and mihtig , þiсgan heo hit þurh monnes þeссean 
 nesan sceawian ; acan se sceaða georne 
 swicode ymb þu sawol þu hire ær þu sien onlah , 
 þæt heo swa wid wlitan magan 
 ofer heofonrice . þu se forhatena sprecan 
 þurh feondscipe ( nalles he hi fremman læran ) : 
 " þu magan nu þu self geseon , swa ic hit þu secgan nesan þurfan , 
 eue seon god , þæt þu wesan ungelic 
 wlite and wæstm , siððan þu minum word getruwodest , 
 læst min lar . nu scineð þu sunnan for 
 glædlic ongeagn þæt ic from god bringan 
 hwit of heofon ; nu þu hit hrinan magan . 
 sægan adame hwilce þu gesiht hæftan 
 þurh min cime cræft . gif git þurh cuscne siodo 
 læstan min lar , þonne gifu ic him se sunnan genog 
 se ic þu swa god gegired habban . 
 nesan wite ic him þu womcwidas , þiсgan he hit weorþ nesan wesan 
 toh alætanne ; se fela he me laðes sprecan . " 
 swa hire eafora sculan æfter lybban : 
 þonne hi lað gedoð , hi sculan lufu wyrcean , 
 betan hira hearra hearmcwyde and habban hit hyldo forþ . 
 þu gangan toh adame ides scenost , 
 wifian wlitegost þu on weorold cuman , 
 forðam heo wesan handgeweorc heofoncyninges , 
 þiсgan heo þu dearnenga fordon weorþan , 
 forlædan mid ligen , þæt hi lað god 
 þurh se wrað geþanc weorðan sculan , 
 þurh se deofol searo don forlætan , 
 hierran hyldo , hefonrices þolian 
 manig hwil . bið þæm mann full wa 
 þu he nesan warnað þonne he hit geweald hafað ! 
 sum heo hire on hand bær , sum hire æt heorte liсgan , 
 æppel unsælig , se hire ær forbeodan 
 drihten drihten , deaðbeames ofet , 
 and þæt word acwæð wuldor aldor , 
 þæt þæt micel morð mann nesan þurfan 
 þegn þolian , acan he þeod gehwa 
 hefonrice forgifan , halig drihten , 
 widbradne wela , gif hi se wæstm on 
 lætan willan þu þæt laðtreow 
 on hit boga bær , bitter gefyllan ; 
 þæt wesan deaðes beam þu him drihten forbeodan . 
 forlec hi þu mid ligen se wesan lað god , 
 on hettan heofoncyninges , and hyсgan euan , 
 wif wican þenсean , þæt heo onginnan hit word truwian , 
 læstan hit lar , and geleafa niman 
 þæt he þu bysen from god bringan habban 
 þu he hire swa wærlice word sægan , 
 iewan hire tacn and treowe hettan , 
 hit hold hyсgan . þu heo toh hire hearra sprecan : 
 " adam , frea min , þes ofet wesan swa swete , 
 blið on breost , and þes bodian sciene , 
 god engel god , ic on hit gearu geseon 
 þæt he wesan ærendsecg uncres hearra , 
 hefoncyninges . hit hyldo wesan wit god 
 toh gewinnanne þonne hit wiðermedo . 
 gif þu him heodæg wuht hearmes gesprecan , 
 he forgifð hit þiсgan , gif witan him geongordom 
 læstan willað . hwæt#2 scal þu swa laðlic strið 
 wiþ þin hearra boda gewinnan wit wesan hit hyldo þurfan ; 
 he mæg wit ærendian toh þæm alwaldan , 
 heofoncyninge . ic mæg heonan geseon 
 hwær he self siteð , ( þæt wesan suþ and east ) , 
 wela bewindan , se þes weorold gesceppan ; 
 geseon ic him hit engel ymbe hweorfan 
 mid feðerhaman , eall folc micel , 
 wereda wynsumast . hwæt magan me swelc gewitan gifan , 
 gif hit gegnunga god nesan onsendan , 
 heofon waldend gewinnan gehyran mæg ic rum 
 and swa wid geseon on weorold ealle 
 ofer þes side gesceaft , ic mæg swegl gamen 
 gehyran on heofnum . wearð me on hige sunnan 
 utan and innan , siðþan ic se ofætes onbat . 
 nu habban ic hit heran on hand , herra se god ; 
 gifu ic hit þu georne . ic gelyfan þæt hit from god cuman , 
 bringan from hit bysen , se me þes bodian sægan 
 wær word . hit nesan wuhte gelic 
 elles on eorþ , butan swa þes ar sægeð , 
 þæt hit gegnunga from god cuman . " 
 hio sprecan him þicce toh and spannan he eall dæg 
 on þu dimm dæd þæt hi drihten hira 
 willan brecan . standan se wrað bodian , 
 leсgan him lust on and mid list spannan , 
 fylgan him frecne ; wesan se feond full neah 
 þu on þu frecne fyrd gefaran habban 
 ofer lang wegan ; leode hycgan 
 on þæt micel morð , mann forweorpan , 
 forlæran and forlædan , þæt hi lænan god , 
 ælmihtig gifu anforlætan , 
 heofenrices geweald . hwæt#2 , se hellsceaða 
 gearu witan þæt hi god yrre 
 habban sculan and hellgeþwing , 
 se nearu nið , nied onfon , 
 siððan hi gebod god forbrecan habban , 
 þu he forlæran mid ligenwordum 
 toh þæm unræde ides sciene , 
 wifian wlitegost , þæt heo on hit willan sprecan ; 
 wesan hire on helpan handweorc god 
 toh forlæranne . 
 heo sprecan þe toh adame ides sceonost 
 ful þiclice , oþ þæm þegn onginnan 
 hit hige hweorfan , þæt he þæm gehatan getruwian 
 þu him þæt wif word sægan . 
 heo dydan hit þiсgan þurh hold hyсgan , nytan þæt þær hearma swa fela , 
 fyrenearfeða , fylgean sculan 
 mann cynn , se heo on mod geniman 
 þæt heo se lað boda lar hyrdan , 
 acan wendan þæt heo hyldo heofoncyninges 
 wyrсean mid þæm word þu heo þæm werian swelce 
 tacn oðiewde and treowe hettan , 
 oðþæt adame innan breost 
 hit hyсgan hwyrfde and hit heorte onginnan 
 wendan toh hire willan . he æt þæm wif onfon 
 hell and hinnsið , þiсgan hit nesan hatan swa , 
 acan hit ofetes noman aginnan sculan ; 
 hit wesan þiсgan deaðes swefn and deofol gespon , 
 hell and hinnsið and hæleða forlor , 
 menniscra morð , þæt hi toh mete dædon , 
 ofet unfæle . swa hit him on innan cuman , 
 hrinan æt heorte , hlihhan þu and plegian 
 bodian bitter gehugod , sægan begra þanc 
 hearra sin : " nu habban ic þin hyldo me 
 witod gewyrсean , and þinne willan gelæstan 
 toh ful monegum dæge . mann synt forlædan , 
 adam and eue . him wesan unhyldo 
 waldendes witod , nu hi wordcwyde hit , 
 lar forlætan . forðam hi lengan nesan magan 
 healdan heofonrice , acan hi toh hell sculan 
 on se sweart sið . swa þu hit sorh nesan þurfan 
 beran on þin breost , þær þu gebunden liсgan , 
 murnan on mod , þæt heran mann bun 
 se hean heofon , þiсgan witan hearmas nu , 
 þreaweorc þoliað , and þystru land , 
 and þurh þu micel mod manig forlætan 
 on heofonrice heahgetimbro , 
 godlice geard . wit wearð god yrre 
 forðam witan him nyllan on heofonrice 
 hnigan mid heafod halig drihten 
 þurh geongordom ; acan wit gegangan nesan wesan 
 þæt witan him on þegnscipe þeowian willan . 
 forðam wit waldend wearð wrað on mod , 
 on hyсgan heard , and we on hell bedrifan , 
 on þæt fyr fyllan folc micel , 
 and mid hand hit eft on heofonrice 
 rihte rodorstol and þæt romana forgifan 
 mann cynn . mæg þu mod wese 
 bliðe on breost , forðam heran synt butu gedon : 
 ge þæt hæleða birnan heofonrice sculan 
 leode forlætan and on þæt lig toh þu 
 hatan hweorfan , eacan wesan hearm god , 
 modsorg macian . swa hwæt#2 swa witan heran morðres þoliað , 
 hit wesan nu adame eall forgieldan 
 mid hearra hettan and mid hæleða forlore , 
 mann mid morðes cwealm . forðam wesan min mod hælan , 
 hyсgan ymb heorte gerum , ealle synt uncre hearmas gewrecene 
 laðes þæt witan lange þoledon . nu willan ic eft þæm liсgan near , 
 satan ic þær sec willan ; he wesan on þære sweart hell 
 hæftan mid hring gesponne . " hwerfan him eft niðer 
 bodian bitresta ; sculan he þu brad ligas 
 sec , hell gehliðo , þær hit hearra liсgan , 
 simon sælan . sorgedon ba twegen , 
 adam and eue , and him oft betuh 
 gnornword gengan ; god him ondrædan , 
 hira herran hettan , heofoncyninges nið 
 swiðe onsittan ; self forstandan 
 hit word onwendan . þæt wif gnornian , 
 hof hreowigmod , ( habban hyldo god , 
 lar forlætan ) , þu heo þæt sunnan geseon 
 ellor scriðan þæt hire þurh untreowa 
 tacn iewan se him se teonan gerædan , 
 þæt hi hell nið habban sculan , 
 hynða unrim ; forðam him higesorga 
 birnan on breost . hwilum toh gebed feollan 
 sinhiwan somed , and sigedrihten 
 god gretan and god nemnan , 
 heofon waldend , and he biddan 
 þæt hi hit hearmsceare habban motan , 
 georne fulgangan , þu hi god habban 
 bodscipe abrecan . bær hi geseon 
 hira lichama ; nabban on þæm land þu git 
 sælða gesetena , nesan hi sorh wiht 
 weorc witan , acan hi wel magan 
 libban on þæm land , gif hi willan lar god , 
 foreweard fremman . þu hi fela sprecan 
 sorhworda somed , sinhiwan twegen . 
 adam gemælde and toh euan sprecan : 
 " hwæt#2 , þu eue , hæftan yfele mearcian 
 uncer sylfra sið . gesyhst þu nu þu sweart hell 
 grædig and gifre gewinnan nu þu hi grimman magan 
 heonane gehyran . nesan heofonrice 
 gelic þæm liсgan , acan þes wesan land wel , 
 þæt witan þurh uncres hearra þanc habban motan , 
 þær þu þæm nesan hyran þu wit þes hearm gerædan , 
 þæt witan waldendes word forbrecan , 
 heofoncyninges . nu witan hreowige magan 
 sorgian for þes siþ . forðam he wit self bebeodan 
 þæt witan wit wite warian sculan , 
 hearma mæstne . nu slitan me hunger and þurst 
 bitter on breost , se witan begra ær 
 wesan orsorh on ealle tidan . 
 hu sculan witan nu libban oððe on þis land wese , 
 gif heran windan cymð , weste oððe eastan , 
 suðan oððe norþan gewinnan gesweorc up færeð , 
 cymeð hægl scur hefone getenge , 
 færeð forst on gemang , se byð fyrn ceald . 
 hwilum of heofnum hatan scineð , 
 blicð þes beorht sunne , and witan heran bær standað , 
 unwered wædo . nys wit wuht beforan 
 toh scursceade , nesan sceattes wiht 
 toh mete mearcian , acan wit wesan mihtig god , 
 waldend wraðmod . toh hwon sculan witan weorðan nu gewinnan 
 nu me mæg hreowan þæt ic bædan heofnes god , 
 waldend se god , þæt he þu heran wyrсean toh me 
 of liðum minum , nu þu me forlæran hæftan 
 on min herran hettan . swa me nu hreowan mæg 
 æfre toh ald þæt ic þu minum eage geseon . " 
 þe sprecan eue eft , ides scienost , 
 wifian wlitegost ; hi wesan geweorc god , 
 þiсgan heo þu on deofol cræftan bedroren weorþan : 
 " þu magan hit me witan , wine min adam , 
 word þin ; hit þu þiсgan wyrs nesan mæg 
 on þin hyсgan hreowan þonne hit me æt heorte deð . " 
 hire þu adam andswarian : 
 " gif ic waldendes willan cuðe , 
 hwæt#2 ic hit toh hearmsceare habban sculan 
 ( nesan geseon þu no sniomor ) þiсgan me on sæ wadan 
 hettan heofon god heonone nu þu , 
 on flod faran , nesan he firnum se deop , 
 merestream se micel , þæt hit o min mod getweode , 
 acan ic toh þæm grund gengan , gif ic god magan 
 willan gewyrcean . nesan me on weorold niod 
 ænig þegnscipes , nu ic min þeodnes hafian 
 hyldo forwyrсan , þæt ic hi habban nesan mæg . 
 acan witan þus bær nesan magan butu ætsomne 
 wese toh wuhte . witon gan on þes wealdan innan , 
 on þes holtes hleo . " hweorfan hi batwa , 
 togengdon gnorngende on se grene wealdan , 
 sittan onsundrum , bidan selfes gesceapu 
 heofoncyninges , þu hi þu habban nesan motan 
 þu him ær forgifan ælmihtig god . 
 þu hi hira lichoman leaf beþeссan , 
 werian mid se wealdan , wæda nesan habban ; 
 acan hi on gebed feollan butu ætsomne 
 morgen gehwilce , biddan mihtig 
 þæt hi nesan forgietan god ælmihtig , 
 and him gewisade waldend se god , 
 hu hi on þæm sunnan forþ libban sculan . 
 þu cuman feran frea ælmihtig 
 ofer midd dæg , mære þeon , 
 on neorxnawang neod sinnan ; 
 willan neosian nergend usser , 
 bilwit fæder , hwæt#2 hit birnan dydan ; 
 witan forwyrсan þu he ær wlite sellan . 
 gewitan him þu gangan geomermode 
 under beamsceade blæd bereafian , 
 hydan hi on heolstre , þu hi halig word 
 drihten gehyrdan , and ondrædan him . 
 þu sona onginnan swegl aldor , 
 weard ahsian woruldgesceafta , 
 hettan him recen toh romana þeon 
 hit sunu gangan . him þu self oncwæð , 
 hean hleoðrade hrægles þearfian : 
 " ic wreon me heran wæda leas , 
 liffrea min , leaf þecce . 
 scyldfull min sceaðen wesan me sar , 
 frecne on ferhðe ; nesan durran nu forþ gan 
 for þu andweard . ic wesan eall eall nacod . " 
 him þe ædre god andswarede : 
 " secgan me þæt , sunu min , for hwon secest þu 
 sceadan sceomiende gewinnan þu sceon æt me 
 furðum nesan anfenge , acan gefea eall . 
 for hwon witan þu wea and wreon sceome , 
 gesyhst sorh , and þu self þecest 
 liс mid leaf , sagian lifceare 
 hean hygegeomor , þæt þu wesan hrægles þurfan , 
 nymþe þu æppel an byrgan 
 of ðam wudubeame þu ic þu word forbeodan gewinnan " 
 him þu adam eft andswarian : 
 " me þe blæd on hand bryd gesellan , 
 freolucu fæmne , freadrihten min , 
 þu ic þu on teonan geþiсgan . nu ic se tacn weсgan 
 sweotol on me self . witan ic sorh se micel . " 
 þe se euan frægn ælmihtig god : 
 " hwæt#2 dreogan þu , dohtor , dugeþa genohra , 
 niwe gesceafta neorxnawang , 
 growendra gifu , þu þu gitsian 
 on beam grippan , blæd niman 
 on treowe telga , and me on teonan 
 etan þu unfreme , adame sellan 
 wæstm þu git wesan word minum 
 fæstan forboden gewinnan " him þu freolecu mæg , 
 ides æwiscmod andswarian : 
 " me nædre beswican and me neodlice 
 toh forsceape scyhte and toh scyldfrece , 
 fah wyrm þurh fægir word , oðþæt ic fracoðlice 
 feondræs gefremian , fæhðe gewyrсean , 
 and þu reafian , swa hit rihtan nesan wesan , 
 beam on bearwe and þu blæd æt . " 
 þu nædre sceop nergend usser , 
 frea ælmihtig fah wyrm 
 wid siþ and þu word cweðan : 
 " þu sculan wideferhð werg þin breost , 
 bearm tredan brad eorþ , 
 faran feðeleas , þenden þu feorh wunað , 
 gast on innan . þu sculan greotan etan 
 þin lifdagas . swa þu laðlice 
 wroht onstellan , þu þæt wif feoð , 
 hatað under heofnum and þu heafod tredeð 
 fah mid fot sin . þu sculan fiersn sætan 
 tohtan niwe ; tuddor bið gemæne 
 incrum orlegnið wifcynn þenden standeð 
 weorold under wolcn . nu þu witan and cunnan , 
 lað leodsceaða , hu þu lifian sculan . " 
 þe toh euan god yrringa sprecan : 
 " wendan þu from wynn ! þu sculan wæpnedmen 
 wese on geweald , mid wer egsan 
 heard genearwad , hean þrowian 
 þinne dæd gedwild , deaðes bidan , 
 and þurh wop and heaf on weorold cennan 
 þurh sar micel sunu and dohtor . " 
 abeodan eacan adame ece drihten , 
 lifes leohtfruma , lað ærende : 
 " þu sculan oðer eðel secean , 
 wynleasran wiс , and on wræc hweorfan 
 nacod niedwædla , neorxnawang 
 dugeðum bedælan . þu wesan gedal witod 
 lices and sawol . hwæt#2 , þu laðlice 
 wroht onstellan ; forðam þu winnan sculan 
 and on eorþ þu þin andlifne 
 selfa geræcan , wegan swatig hleor , 
 þinne hlaf etan , þenden þu heran libban , 
 oðþæt þu toh heorte heard gripeð 
 adl unliðe þu þu on æple ær 
 selfa forswelgan ; forðam þu sweltan sculan . " 
 hwæt#2 , we nu gehyrað hwær we hearmstafas 
 wrað onwocan and woruldyrmðo . 
 hi þu wuldor weard wædum gyrwan , 
 scyppend usser ; hettan hira sceome þeccan 
 frea frumhrægle ; hettan hi from hweorfan 
 neorxnawang on nearu lif . 
 him on last belucan liðsa and wynn 
 hihtfulne ham halig engel 
 be frea hæs fyren sweord ; 
 nesan mæg þær inwitfull ænig gefere 
 womscyldig mann , acan se weard hafað 
 miht and strengðo , se þæt mære lif 
 dugeðum deore drihten healdeð . 
 no hwæðre ælmihtig eall willan 
 adame and euan arna ofteon , 
 fæder æt frymþ , þiсgan þu he him from swican , 
 acan he him toh frofor lætan hwæðere forþ wese 
 hyrstedne hrof halig tungol 
 and him grundwelan ginne sellan ; 
 hettan þæm sinhiwum sæ and eorþ 
 tuddorteondra teohha gehwilcre 
 toh woruldnytte wæstm fedan . 
 gesittan þu æfter synn sorgfulre land , 
 eard and eðyl unspedigran 
 freme gehwilcre þonne se frumstol wesan 
 þu hi æfter dæd of adrifen wurdon . 
 onginnan hi þu be god hæs 
 birnan astrienan , swa him metod bebeodan . 
 adames and euan afor wesan 
 freolicu twegen frumbearn cennan , 
 cain and abel . we cyðað bec , 
 hu þu dædfruman dugeþa stryndan , 
 wela and witan , willgebroðor . 
 oðer hit toh eorþ ellen tilian , 
 se wesan ærboren ; oðer æht healdan 
 fæder on fultuman , oðþæt forþ gewitan 
 dægrimes worn . hi þu drihten lacan 
 begen bringan . breogo engel beseon 
 on abeles gieldan eage sin , 
 cyning eallwihta , caines nesan willan 
 tiber sceawian . þæt wesan torn werian 
 hefig æt heorte . hygewælm asteah 
 beornan on breost , blatende nið , 
 yrre for æfstum . he þu unræden 
 folm gefremian , freomæg ofslean , 
 broðor sinnan , and hit blod ageat , 
 cain abeles . cwealmdreore swelgan 
 se middangeard , monnes swat . 
 æfter wælswenge wea wesan aræran , 
 trega tuddor . of ðam twig siððan 
 leodan laðwende lengan swa swiðe 
 reðe wæstm . ræсan wid 
 geond werþeoda wroht telga , 
 hrinan hearmtanas heard and sar 
 drihta bearn , ( doð gieta swa ) . 
 of þæm brad blado bealu gehwilces 
 sprytan onginnan . we þæt spell magan , 
 wælgrimme wyrdan , wop cwiðan , 
 nales holunge ; acan we heard sceþþan 
 freolecu fæmne þurh forma gyldan 
 þu wiþ metod æfre mann gefremeden , 
 eorðbuende , siððan adam wearð 
 of god muðe gast eacen . 
 þe word frægn wuldor aldor 
 cain , hwær abel eorþ wære . 
 him þe se cystleasa cwealm wyrhta 
 ædre æfter þon andswarian : 
 " nesan сinan ic abeles or nesan for , 
 hleomæges sið , nesan ic hyrdan wesan 
 broðor min . " him þu breogo engel , 
 godspedig gast gean þingade : 
 " hwæt#2 , befealdest þu folm þin 
 wrað on wælbedd wærfæstne rinc , 
 broðor þinne , and hit blod toh me 
 cleopað and cigeð . þu se cwealm sculan 
 wite winnan and on wræc hweorfan , 
 awyrgan toh wid ald . nesan seleð þu wæstm eorþ 
 wlitig toh woruldnytte , acan heo wældreore swelgan 
 halig of hand þin ; forðam heo þu hroðra oftihð , 
 glæmes grene folde . þu sculan geomor hweorfan , 
 arleas of eard þin , swa þu abele weorþan 
 toh feorhbanan ; forðam þu flema sculan 
 widlast wrecan , winemagum lað . " 
 him þu ædre cain andswarian : 
 " nesan þurfan ic ænigre are wenan 
 on woruldrice , acan ic forwyrсan habban , 
 heofon heahcyning , hyldo þin , 
 lufu and freogan ; forðam ic last sculan 
 wea on wena wid lecgan , 
 hwonne me gemittan manscyldigne , 
 se me feor oððe neah fæhðe gemonige , 
 broðorcwealmes . ic hit blod ageat , 
 dreor on eorþ . þu toh dæge þes 
 ademan me fram duguðe and adrifest from 
 eard minum . me toh aldorbanan 
 weorðeð wrað sum . ic awyrgan sculan , 
 þeon , of gesiht þinne hweorfan . " 
 him þu selfa oncwæð sigorian drihten : 
 " nesan þurfan þu þu ondrædan deaðes broga , 
 feorhcwealm nu git , þiсgan þu from sculan 
 freomagum feor fah gewitan . 
 gif mann hwelc mund sin 
 ald beneoteð , he on cymeð 
 æfter þære synn seofonfeald wræc , 
 wite æfter weorc . " he waldend on , 
 tirfæst metod , tacn settan , 
 freoðobeacen frea , þywan læs he feond hwilc 
 mid guðþræce gretan durran 
 feorran oððe neah . hatan þu from hweorfan 
 modor and mæg manscyldigne , 
 cnosl sin . him þu cain gewitan 
 gongan geomormod god of gesiht , 
 wineleas wrecca , and him þu wiс geceosan 
 eastlandum on , eðelstowe 
 fædergeardum feor , þær him freolecu mæg , 
 ides æfter æðele eafora fedan . 
 se ærest wesan enos hatan , 
 frumbearn caines . siððan fæder ongon 
 mid þæm cneomagum ceaster timbran ; 
 þæt wesan under wolcn weallfæstenna 
 ærest eall þær þu æðelingas , 
 sweordberende , settan hatan . 
 þanan hit eafora ærest wocan , 
 birnan from bryd , on þæm burhstede . 
 se yldesta wesan iared hatan , 
 sunu enoses . siððan wocan , 
 þu se cynn cneowrim icton , 
 mægburg caines . malalehel wesan 
 æfter iarede yrfe hyrdan 
 fæder on last , oðþæt he forþ gewitan . 
 siððan mathusal mæg dælan , 
 birnan æfter bearn broðrum sin 
 æðelinga gestreon , oðþæt aldorgedal 
 frod fyrndagum fremman sculan , 
 lif oflætan . lameh onfon 
 æfter fæder dæge fletgestealdum , 
 botlgestreonum . him bryd twegen , 
 ides on eðle eafora fedan , 
 ad and sella ; þær an wesan 
 iabal noma , se þurh gleaw geþanc 
 herbuendra hearpe ærest 
 hand sin hlyn awehte , 
 swinsigende swegan , sunu lamehes . 
 swilce on se mægþ mæg wesan hatan 
 on þu ilca tidan tubalcain , 
 se þurh snytro spedan smiðcræftega wesan , 
 and þurh mod gemynd mann ærest , 
 sunu lamehes , sulhgeweorces 
 fruma wesan ofer folde , siððan folc birnan 
 ær cuðon and isern , 
 burhsittende , brucan wid . 
 þu hit wif twæman word sægan 
 lameh seolfa , leof gebedda , 
 adan and sellan unarlic spel : 
 " ic on morðor ofslean min sum 
 hyldemaga ; honda gewemman 
 on caines cwealm min , 
 fyllan mid folm fæder enoses , 
 ordbanan abeles , eorþ sellan 
 wældreor wer . witan ic gearu 
 þæt þæm lichryre on last cymeð 
 soðcyninges seofonfeald wræc , 
 micel æfter mane . min sculan swiðe 
 mid grimman gryre gieldan wurðan 
 fyllan and feorhcwealm , þonne ic forþ scio . " 
 þu wearð adame on abeles gyldan 
 eafora on eðle oþer fedan , 
 soþfæst sunu , þæm wesan seth noma . 
 se wesan eadig and hit yldrum ðah 
 freolic toh frofor , fæder and modor ; 
 adames and euan , wesan abeles gieldan 
 on woruldrice . þu word acwæð 
 ord moncynnes : " me ece sellan 
 sunu selfa sigorian waldend , 
 lifes aldor on leof stælan , 
 se þu cain ofslean , and me cearsorge 
 mid þis magotimbre of mod asceaf 
 þeon usser . him se þanc wesan ! " 
 adam habban , þu he eft onginnan 
 him toh eðulstæfe oðres strienan 
 bearn be bryd , beornan ellenrof , 
 xxx and hund þes lifes , 
 wintra on weorold . we gewrit secgað 
 þæt heran eahtahund ieсan siððan 
 mægðum and mæcgum mægburg sinnan 
 adam on eorþ ; eall habban 
 nigenhund wintra 
 and xxx eacan , þu he þes weorold 
 þurh gastgedal ofgyfan sculan . 
 him on last seth leodan weardian , 
 eafora æfter yldrum ; eþelstol healdan 
 and wif begietan . wintra habban 
 fif and hundteontig þu heo furðum onginnan 
 hit mægburge mann geicean 
 sunu and dohtor . sethes eafora 
 se yldesta wesan enos hatan ; 
 se nemnan god niðþa bearn 
 ærest eall , siððan adam stæppan 
 on grene græs gast geweorðad . 
 seth wesan gesælig ; siððan stryndan 
 seofon winter heran sunu and dohtor 
 and eahtahund . eall habban 
 twelf and nigonhund , þu seon tidan gewearð 
 þæt he friðgedal fremman sculan . 
 him æfter healdan , þu he of weorold gewitan , 
 enos yrfe , siððan eorþ swelgan 
 sædberendes sethes lice . 
 he wesan leof god and libban heran 
 wintra hundnigontig ær he be wif heran 
 þurh gebedscipe birnan astrynde ; 
 him þu cennan wearð cainan ærest 
 eafora on eðle . siððan eahtahund 
 and fiftyno on friðo drihten 
 gleawferhð hæleð geogoðe stryndan , 
 sunu and dohtor ; sweltan , þu he habban , 
 frod fyrnwita , fif and nigonhund . 
 þære cneoris wesan cainan siððan 
 æfter enose aldordema , 
 weard and wisian . wintra habban 
 efne hundseofontig ær him sunu wæcnan . 
 þu wearð on eðle eafora fedan , 
 mago cainanes , malalehel wesan hatan . 
 siððan eahtahund æðelinga riman 
 and feowertig eacan feorh geicte 
 enoses sunu . eall nigonhund 
 wintra habban þu he weorold ofgiefan 
 and tynan eacan , þu hit tiddæge 
 under rodera rum riman wesan gefyllan . 
 him on last healdan land and yrfe 
 malalehel siððan missere worn . 
 se frumgara fif and sixtig 
 wintra habban þu he be wif onginnan 
 bearn strynan . him bryd sunu 
 meowle toh mann bringan . se mæg wesan 
 on hit mægþ , min gefræge , 
 guma on geogoðe , iared hatan . 
 libban siððan and lissa brucan 
 malalehel lange , mondreama heran , 
 woruldgestreona . wintra habban 
 fif and hundnigontig , þu he forþ gewitan , 
 and eahtahund ; eafora læfan 
 land and leodweard . long siððan 
 geared guma gold brittade . 
 se eorl wesan æðele , æfæst hæleð , 
 and se frumgar hit freomagum leof . 
 fif and hundteontig on fyore libban 
 wintra gebidenra on woruldrice 
 and sixtig eacan þu seon sælan gewearð 
 þæt hit wif sunu on weorold bringan ; 
 se eafora wesan enoc hatan , 
 freolic frumbearn . fæder heran þu git 
 hit cynn forþ cneorim icte , 
 eafora eahtahund ; eall habban 
 fif and sixtig , þu he forþ gewitan , 
 and nigonhund eacan nihtgerimes , 
 wine frod winter , þu he þes weorold ofgiefan 
 and geared þu gleaw læfan 
 land and leodweard , leof rinc . 
 enoch siððan ealdordom ahebban , 
 freoðosped folc wisian , nalles fealle lætan 
 don and drihtscipe , 
 þenden he hyrdan wesan heafodmæg . 
 brucan blæddaga , bearn stryndan 
 þreohund wintra . him wesan þeon hold , 
 rodera waldend . se rinc heonan 
 on lichoman lisse sœ̄сan , 
 drihten duguðe , nales deaðe sweltan 
 middangeard , swa heran mann don , 
 geong and eald , þonne him god hira 
 æht and ætwist eorþ gestreona 
 on genimeð and hira aldor somed , 
 acan he cwic gewitan mid cyning engel 
 of þes lænan lif feran 
 on þæm gearu þu hit gast onfon 
 ær he toh mann modor bringan . 
 he þæm yldestan eafora læfan 
 folc , frumbearne . fif and sixtig 
 wintra habban þu he weorold ofgiefan , 
 and eacan þri hund . þrage siððan 
 mathusal healdan mæg yrfe , 
 se on lichoman lengest þissa 
 worulddreama brucan . worn gestrynan 
 ær hit swyltdæge sunu and dohtor ; 
 habban frod hæle , þu he from sculan 
 niþþe hweorfan , nigonhund wintra 
 and hundseofontig toh . sunu æfter healdan , 
 lamech leodgeard , lange siððan 
 weorold bryttade . wintra habban 
 twegen and hundteontig þu seon tidan gewearð 
 þæt se eorl onginnan æðele cennan , 
 sunu and dohtor . siððan libban 
 fif and hundnigontig , frea moniges brucan 
 wintra under wolcn , werod aldor , 
 and fif hund eacan ; healdan þæt folc tela , 
 bearn stryndan , him byras wocan , 
 eafora and ides . he se yldestan 
 noe nemnan , se niððum ær 
 land bryttade siððan lamech gewitan . 
 habban æðelinga aldorwisa 
 fif hund wintra þu he furðum onginnan 
 bearn strynan , se þu bec cweðan . 
 seman wesan hatan sunu noes 
 se yldesta , oðer cham , 
 þridda iafeth . þeod tymdon 
 rum under roderum , riman miclade 
 mann mægþ geond middangeard 
 sunu and dohtor . þe git wesan sethes cynn , 
 leof leodfruman on lufu swiðe 
 drihten dyre and domeadig , 
 oðþæt birnan god bryd onginnan 
 on caines cynn sec , 
 werig folc , and him þær wif сeosan 
 ofer metod est mann eafora , 
 scyldfulra mægþ scyne and fæger . 
 þu reordade rodor waldend 
 wrað moncynne and þu word cweðan ; 
 " nesan syndon me on ferhðe freoh from gewitene 
 cneorisn caines , acan me þæt cynn hafað 
 sar abelgan . nu me sethes birnan 
 torn niwiað and him toh nimað 
 mægeð toh gemæccum min feond ; 
 þær wifian wlite onwadan grome , 
 ides ansien , and ece feond 
 folcdriht wer , þu ær on friðe wesan . " 
 siððan hundtwelftig geteled riman 
 wintra on weorold wræc bisgian 
 fæge þeod , hwonne frea willan 
 on wærloga wite settan 
 and on deað slean dæd scyldige 
 gigantmæcgas , god unleofe , 
 micel mansceaðan , metod laðe . 
 þu geseon selfa sigoro waldend 
 hwæt#2 wesan mann manes on eorþ 
 and þæt hi wesan womm ðriste , 
 inwitfulle . he þæt unfæger 
 wer cneoris gewrecan þenсean , 
 forgripan gumcynne grimman and sar , 
 heard miht . hreowan he swiðe 
 þæt he folcmægþa fruma aweссan , 
 æðelinga ord , þu he adam sceop , 
 cweðan þæt he willan for wer synn 
 eall aæðan þæt on eorþ wesan , 
 forleosan liс gehwilc þær þu lifes gast 
 fæðmum þeссean . eall þæt frea willan 
 on se toweard tidan acwellan 
 þu þu nealæсan niðða bearn . 
 noe wesan god , nergende leof , 
 swiðe gesælig , sunu lameches , 
 domfæst and gedefe . drihten witan 
 þæt se æðelinges ellen dugan 
 breostgehygdum ; forðam him breogo sægan , 
 halig æt hleoðre , helm allwihta , 
 hwæt#2 he fah wer fremman willan ; 
 geseon unriht eorþ full , 
 side sælwongas synn gehladene , 
 widlum gewemman . þu waldend sprecan , 
 nergend usser , and toh noe cweðan : 
 " ic willan mid flod folc acwellan 
 and cynn gehwilc cucra wuhta , 
 þær þu lyft and flod lædað and fedað , 
 feoh and fugol . þu sculan frið habban 
 mid sunu þin , þonne sweart wæter , 
 woh wælstreamas werod swelgað , 
 sceaðum scyldfullum . ongyn þu scip wyrcan , 
 merehus micel . on þæm þu monegum sculan 
 restan geryman , and rihte setl 
 ælc æfter agen eorþ tudor . 
 gescype scylfan on scip bosm . 
 þu þæt fær gewyrc fiftig wid , 
 ðrittiges heah þreohund lang 
 elngemeta , and wiþ yða gewyrc 
 gefegan fæstan . þær sculan fæsl wese 
 cwiclifigendra cynn gehwilces 
 on þæt wudufæsten wocor lædan 
 eorþ tudor ; earc sculan þywan micel . " 
 noe fremman swa he nergend hatan , 
 hyrdan þæm halig heofoncyninge , 
 onginnan ofostlice þæt hof wyrcan , 
 micel merecieste . mæg sægan 
 þæt wesan þrealic þingan þeod toweard , 
 reðe wite . hi nesan reссan se ! 
 geseon þu ymb wintra worn wærfæst metod 
 geofonhusa micel gearu hlifigean , 
 innan and utan eorþ lim 
 gefæstnian wiþ flod , fær noes , 
 þywan selestan . þæt wesan syndrig cynn ; 
 simble bið þywan heard þu hit hreoh wæter , 
 sweart sæstreamas swiðe beatað . 
 þe toh noe cweðan nergend usser : 
 " ic þu se min , mann leofost , 
 wære gesylle , þæt þu wegan niman 
 and feorh fæsl þu þu ferian sculan 
 geond deop wæter dægrimes worn 
 on lides bosm . lædan , swa ic þu hatan , 
 under earce bord eafora þin , 
 frumgaran þri , and ge feower wif , 
 and þu seofone geniman on þæt sundreced 
 tudor gehwilces geteled rim , 
 þær þu toh mete mann lifian , 
 and þær oðerra ælc twegen . 
 swilce þu of eall eorþ wæstm 
 witan under wægbord werod gelædan , 
 þæm þu mid sceolon mereflod nesan . 
 fedan freolice feorh wocre 
 oþ ic þære laf lagosiða eft 
 rædan under roderum ryman willan . 
 gewitan þu nu mid hiwan on þæt hof gangan , 
 gast werod . ic þu god witan , 
 fæsthydigne ; þu wesan freoðo weorþ , 
 arian mid eafora . ic on andwlitan 
 nu ofor seofon niht sigan lætan 
 wællregn ufan wid eorþ . 
 feowertig dæg fæhðe ic willan 
 on wer stælan and mid wægþreate 
 æht and agend eall acwellan 
 þu beutan beoð earce bord 
 þonne sweart racu stigan onginneð . " 
 him þu noe gewitan , swa he nergend hettan , 
 under earce bord eafora lædan , 
 wer on wægþæl and hira wif somed ; 
 and eall þæt toh fæsl frea ælmihtig 
 habban willan under hrof gefaran 
 toh hira ætgifan , swa him ælmihtig 
 werod drihten þurh hit word abeodan . 
 him on hon belucan heofonrices weard 
 merehuses muð mund sin , 
 sigorian waldend , and segnade 
 earce innan agen sped 
 nergend usser . noe habban , 
 sunu lameches , syxhund wintra 
 þu he mid bearn under bord gestigan , 
 gleaw mid geogoðe , be god hæs , 
 dugeðum dyrum . drihten sendan 
 regn from roderum and eacan rum lætan 
 willeburnan on weorold þringan 
 of æder gehwære , egorstreamas 
 sweart swogan . sæ up stigan 
 ofer stæðweallas . strang wesan and reðe 
 se þu wæter wealdan ; wreon and þeссean 
 manfæhðu birnan middangeard 
 wonnan wegan , wer eðelland ; 
 hof hergian , hygeteonan wræc 
 metod on mann . merian swiðe gripan 
 on fæge folc feowertig dæg , 
 nihtian oðer swilc . nið wesan reðe , 
 wællgrim wer , wuldorcyning . 
 yða wrecan arleas feorh 
 of flæschoman . flod ealle wreon , 
 hreoh under heofon heah beorg 
 geond sid grund and on sund ahebban 
 earce from eorþ and þu æðele mid , 
 þu segnade selfa drihten , 
 scyppend usser , þu he þæt scip belucan . 
 siððan wid ridan wolcn under 
 ofer holm hrincg hof seleste , 
 for mid fearm . fær nesan motan 
 wægliðendum wæter broga 
 hæst hrinan , acan hi halig god 
 ferian and nerian . fiftena standan 
 deop ofer dun se drenceflod 
 monnes eln . þæt wesan mære wyrdan ! 
 þæm æt niehsta wesan nan toh gedaled , 
 nymþe heo wesan ahebban on þu hean lyft , 
 þu se egorhere eorþ tuddor 
 eall acwellan , butan þæt earce bord 
 healdan heofon frea , þu he halig god 
 ece upp forlætan edmodne flod 
 stream stigan , stiðferhð cyning . 
 þu gemunan god mereliðende , 
 sigorian waldend sunu lameches 
 and ealle þu wocre þu he wiþ wæter belucan , 
 lifes leohtfruma , on lides bosm . 
 gelædan þu wigend werod drihten 
 word ofer widland . willflod onginnan 
 lytligan eft . lago ebbade , 
 sweart under swegl . habban soð metod 
 eafora egstream eft gecyrran 
 torht ryne , regn stillan . 
 for famig scip fiftig and hund 
 nihtian under roderum , siððan nægledbord , 
 fær seleste , flod up ahebban , 
 oðþæt rimgetæl reðre þrage 
 dæg forþ gewitan . þe on dun gesittan 
 heah mid hlæste holmærna micel , 
 earc noes , þu armenia 
 hatene syndon . þær se halig bidan , 
 sunu lameches , soð gehat 
 lange þrage , hwonne him lifes weard 
 frea ælmihtig frecne siða 
 restan agifan , se he rum dreogan 
 þu he on sunde geond sid grund 
 woh yða wid beran . 
 holm wesan heononweard ; hæleð langian , 
 wægliðende , swilce wif hira , 
 hwonne hi of nearu ofer nægledbord 
 ofer streamstaðe stæppan motan 
 and of enge ut æht lædan . 
 þu fandian forðweard scip , 
 hwæðer sincan sæflod þu git 
 wære under wolcn . lætan þu ymb worn daga— 
 se þu heah hlioðo horde onfon 
 and æðele eacan eorþ tudres— 
 sunu lameches sweart fleoge 
 hrefn ofer heahflod of hus ut . 
 noe tellan þæt he on neod he , 
 gif he on þære lad land nesan findan , 
 ofer sid wæter sec willan 
 on wægþele . eft him seon wenan geleah , 
 acan se feond gespearn fleotan hreowan ; 
 salwigfeðera sec nyllan . 
 he þu ymb seofon niht sweart hrefne 
 of earce forlætan æfter fleoge 
 ofer heah wæter hasu culufran 
 on fandunga , hwæðer famig sæ 
 deop þu gyte dælan ænig 
 grene eorþ ofgifen habban . 
 heo wid hire willan sœ̄сan 
 and rum fleon . nohweðere restan findan , 
 þæt heo for flod fot nesan magan 
 land gespornan nesan on leaf treowe 
 steppan for stream , acan wesan steap hleoðo 
 bewrigen mid wæter . gewitan se wilde fugel 
 on æfen earce sec 
 ofer woh wegan , werig sigan , 
 hungri toh hand halig rinc . 
 þe wesan culufre eft of cofa sendan 
 ymb wucan wilde . seon wid fleon 
 oðþæt heo rumgal restestowe 
 fæger findan and þu fot stæppan 
 on beam hyrian ; gefeon bliðemod 
 se þu heo gesittan swiðe werig 
 on treowe telga torht motan . 
 heo feðera onsceoc , gewitan fleoge eft 
 mid lacu hire , liðend bringan 
 elebeam twig on toh hand , 
 grene blædæ . þu ongitan hraðe 
 flotmonna frea þæt wesan frofor cuman , 
 earfoðsiða bot . þu git se eadega wer 
 ymb wucan þridda wilde culufran 
 an sendan . seon eft nesan cuman 
 toh liþan fleoge , acan heo land begietan , 
 grene bearwas ; nyllan glæd æfre 
 under salwed bord siððan ætywan 
 on þellfæstenne , þu hire þurfan nesan wesan . 
 þu toh noe sprecan nergend usser , 
 heofonrices weard , halig rædan : 
 " þu wesan eðelstol eft ryman , 
 lisse on land , lagosiða restan 
 fæger on folde . gewitan on freðo gangan 
 ut of earce , and on eorþ bearm 
 of þæm hean hofe hiwan lædan þu 
 and ealle þu wocre þu ic wægþrea on 
 liðe nerian þenden lago habban 
 þrymm geþeahtne þridda eðyl . " 
 he fremman swa and frea hyrdan , 
 stigan ofer streamweall , swa him seon stefn bebeodan , 
 lust micel , and alædan þu 
 of wægþele wrað laf . 
 þu noe onginnan nergende lacan 
 rædfæst reðran , and recen geniman 
 on eall dælan æht sin , 
 ðam þu him toh dugeðum drihten sellan , 
 gleaw toh þæm gieldan , and þu god self 
 torhtmod hæle tiber onsægde , 
 cyninge engel . huru cuð dydan 
 nergend usser , þu he noe 
 gebletsade and hit birnan somed , 
 þæt he þæt gyldan on þanc agifan habban 
 and on geogoðhade god dæd 
 ær earnian þu him eall wesan 
 arian est ælmihtig god , 
 domfæst dugeþa . þu git drihten cweðan , 
 wuldris aldor word toh noe : 
 " tymað nu and tiedrað , tires brucað , 
 mid gefea fryðo ; fyllað eorþ , 
 eall geiceað . ge wesan eðelstol 
 and holm hlæst and heofonfuglas 
 and wilde deor on geweald sellan , 
 eorþ ælgrene and eacen feoh . 
 næfre ge mid blod beodgereordu 
 unarlice eowre þicgeað , 
 besmitan mid synn sawldreore . 
 ælc he selfa ærest begrindeð 
 gast dugeðum se þu mid gar ord 
 oðer aldor oðþringeð . nesan ðearf he þywan edleane gefeon 
 modgeþance , acan ic monnes feorh 
 toh slagan sec swiðe micel , 
 and toh broðor bana , se þu blodgyte , 
 wællfyll wer wæpn gespedeð , 
 morð mid mund . monn wesan toh god 
 anlicnes ærest gesceapen . 
 ælc hafað magwlite metod and engel 
 þær þu healdan willan halig þeaw . 
 weaxað and wridað , wilnian brucað , 
 arian on eorþ ; æðele fyllað , 
 eowre fromcynne , folde sceat , 
 team and tudor . ic ge treowe se 
 min sellan , þæt ic on middangeard 
 næfre egorhere eft gelædan , 
 wæter ofer widland . ge on wolcn se 
 oft and gelome andgiettacen 
 magan sceawigan , þonne ic scurbogan 
 min iewan , þæt ic mann þes 
 wære gelæstan , þenden weorold standeð . " 
 þe wesan se snotra sunu lamehes 
 of ferian acumen flod on last 
 mid hit eafora þri , yrfe hyrdan . 
 ( and hira feower wif 
 nemnan wesan percoba , olla , 
 olliua , olliuani . ) 
 wesan him wærfæst metod , wæter laf . 
 hæleð hygerof hatene wesan , 
 sunu noes , seman and cham , 
 iafeð þridda . from þæm gumrincum 
 folc geludon , and gefyllan wearð 
 eall þes middangeard mann bearn . 
 þe noe onginnan niwe stefn 
 mid hleomagum ham staðelian 
 and toh eorþ him ætes tilian ; 
 woh and wyrсean , wingeard settan , 
 sawan sæd fela , sœ̄сan georne . 
 þu him wlitebeorht wæstm bringan , 
 geartorhte gifu , grene folde . 
 þe þæt gegan , þæt se eadega wer 
 on hit wiсe wearð wine druncen , 
 swefan symbelwerig , and him selfa scufan 
 reofan of lice swa gerysne nesan wesan : 
 liсgan þu limnacod . he lutan ongitan 
 þæt him on hit inne swa earm gelimpan , 
 þu him on hreðre heafodswima 
 on se halig hofe heorte clyppan . 
 swiðe on slæpan sefa nearwode 
 þæt he nesan miht on gemynd drepan 
 he hand self mid hrægle wryon 
 and sceome þeccan , swa gesceapu wesan 
 wer and wif , siððan wuldor þegn 
 ussum fæder and modor fyren sweord 
 on last belucan lifes eðel . 
 þu cuman ærest cam in siðian , 
 eafora noes , þær hit aldor liсgan , 
 ferhðe forstelan . þær he freondlice 
 on hit agen fæder are nesan willan 
 gesceawian , nesan þu sceon huru 
 hleomagum helan , acan he hlihende 
 broðrum sægan , hu se beornan he 
 restan on recede . hi þu raðe stæppan , 
 hira andwlitan in bewrigenum 
 under loðum list , þæt hi leof mann 
 geoc gefremeden ; god wesan begen , 
 seman and iafeð . þe of slæpan onbrægd 
 sunu lamehes , and þu sona ongitan 
 þæt him cynegodum cham nesan willan , 
 þu him wesan are þurfan , ænig cyþan 
 hyldo and treowe . þæt þæm halig wesan 
 sar on mod , onginnan þu hit selfes birnan 
 word wyrgean , cweðan , he wese sculan 
 hean under heofnum , hleomaga þeowan , 
 cham on eorþe ; him þu cwyde siððan 
 and hit fromcynne frecne scodon . 
 þu nyttade noe siððan 
 mid sunu sin side rices 
 ðreohund wintra þes lifes , 
 freomen æfter flod , and fiftig eacan , þu he forþ gewitan . 
 siððan hit eafora eadan bryttedon , 
 bearn stryndan ; him wesan beorht wela . 
 þu wearð iafeðe geogoð afeded , 
 hyhtlic heorðwerod heafodmæg , 
 sunu and dohtor . he wesan selfa til , 
 healdan wifcynn romana , eðeldreamas , 
 blæd mid bearn , oðþæt breost hord , 
 gast ellorfus gangan sculan 
 toh god dom . geomor siððan 
 fæder flettgesteald freond dælan , 
 swæs and gesibbum , sunu iafeðes ; 
 se team wesan tuddor gefyllan 
 unlytel dælan eorþ gesceafta . 
 swilce chames suno cennan wurdon , 
 eafora on eðle ; þu yldestan 
 chus and chanan hatene wesan . 
 ful freolice feorh , frumbearn chames , 
 chus wesan æðele heafodwisa , 
 wilnian brytta and worulddugeða 
 broðrum sin , botlgestreona , 
 fæder on last , siððan forþ gewitan 
 cham of lice , þu him cwealm gesceod . 
 se magoræswa mægþ sin 
 dom sægan , oðþæt hit dogora wesan 
 riman aurnen . þu se rinc agifan 
 eorðcunde eadan , sœ̄сan oðer lif , 
 fæder nebroðes . frumbearn siððan 
 eafora chuses yrfestole wealdan , 
 widmære wer , swa we gewrit secgeað , 
 þæt he moncynnes micel habban 
 on þæm mældagum mægen and strengo . 
 se wesan babylones bregorices fruma , 
 ærest æðelinga ; eðelðrym onhof , 
 ryman and ræran . rædan wesan þu gieta 
 eorðbuendum on gemæne . 
 swilce of cames cneoris wæcnan 
 wermægða fela ; of þæm widfolc 
 cneorim micel cennan wesan . 
 þu wearð seman sunu and dohtor 
 on woruldrice worn afeded , 
 freoh bearn , ærðon frod сeosan 
 winter wælreste werod aldor . 
 on þære mægþ wesan mann til , 
 þær on wesan eber hatan , 
 eafora semes ; of þæm eorle wæcnan 
 unrim þeod , þu nu æðelingas , 
 ealle eorðbuend , ebrei hatað . 
 gewitan him þu eastan æht lædan , 
 feoh and feorm . folc wesan anmod ; 
 rof rinc sœ̄сan rum land , 
 oðþæt hi becuman corðrum micel , 
 folc feran , þær hi fæstlice 
 æðelinga birnan , eard geniman . 
 gesettan þu sennar sid and wid 
 leode ræswan ; leof mann 
 hira geardagum grene wongas , 
 fæger folde , him forðwearde 
 on se dægtid duguðe wesan , 
 wilnian gehwilces weaxan spedan . 
 þe þær mann manig be hit mægwine , 
 æðeling anmod , oðer bædan 
 se hi him toh mærðe , ær seon mengeo eft 
 geond folde birnan tofaran sculan , 
 leode mægþ on landsocne 
 burh gewyrсean and toh beacn torr 
 up aræran toh rodortunglum . 
 se þu hi geseсan sennera feld , 
 swa þu foremeahtige folc ræswan , 
 þu yldestan oft and gelome 
 liðsum gewunedon ; lar sœ̄сan 
 wer toh weorc and toh wrohtscipe , 
 oðþæt for wlencu and for wonhygdum 
 cyðdon cræftan hira , ceaster wyrсean 
 and toh heofnum up hlædræ ræran , 
 streng stepton stænnene weallan 
 ofer mann gemetan , mærþu georne , 
 hæleð mid honda . þu cuman halig god 
 wer cneoris weorc sceawigan , 
 beorn burhfæsten , and þæt beacen somed , 
 þu toh roderum up ræran onginnan 
 adames eafora , and se unrædes 
 stiðferhð cyning steore gefremian , 
 þu he reðemod rædan gesette 
 eorðbuendum ungelice , 
 þæt hi þære specan spedan nesan agan . 
 þu hi gemittan miht spedig , 
 teoche æt torr , getæl micel , 
 weorc wise , nesan þær wermægða 
 ænig witan hwæt#2 oðer cweðan . 
 nesan magan hi gewurðan weallan stænen 
 up forþ timbran , acan hi earmlice 
 heap tohladan , hleoðrum gedælan ; 
 wesan oðere æghwilc worden 
 mægburh fremde , siððan metod tobræd 
 þurh hit miht spedan mann sprecan . 
 toforan þu on feower weg 
 æðelinga birnan ungeþeode 
 on landsocne . him on last buan 
 stiðlic stantorr and seon steap burh 
 samod samwyrcan on sennar standan . 
 weaxan þu under wolcn and wriðade 
 mægburh semes , oðþæt mann awacan 
 on þære cneoris , cynebearna riman , 
 þancolmod wer , þeaw hydig . 
 wurdon þæm æðelinge eafora acennan , 
 in babilone birnan afeded 
 freolicu twegen , and þu frumgaran , 
 hæleð higerofe , hatene wesan 
 abraham and aaron ; þæm eorlum wesan 
 frea engel begen freond and aldor . 
 þe wearð aarone eafora fedan , 
 leoflic on lif , ðam wesan loth noma . 
 þe magorincas metod geþingan , 
 abraham and loth , unforcuðlice , 
 swa him from yldrum æðele wesan 
 on woruldrice ; forðam hi wid nu 
 dugeðum demað drihtfolca birnan . 
 þu se mæl wesan mearc agongen 
 þæt him abraham ides bringan , 
 wif toh ham , þær he wiс agan , 
 fæger and freolic . seon fæmne wesan 
 sar hatan , se þu we secgeað bec . 
 hi þu wintra fela weorold bryttedon , 
 sincan ætsomne , sibb healdan 
 gear mengeo . nohwæðre gifeðe wearð 
 abrahame þu git þæt him yrfeweard 
 wlitebeorht ides on weorold bringan , 
 sar abrahame , sunu and dohtor . 
 gewitan him þu mid cnosl ofer caldea folc 
 feran mid feorm fæder abrahames ; 
 snotor mid gesibbum secean willan 
 cananea land . he cneowmægas , 
 metod gecorene mid siðedon 
 of þære eðeltyrf , abraham and loth . 
 him þu cynegode on carran 
 æðelinga birnan eard geniman , 
 wer mid wif . on þæm wiсe hit 
 fæder abrahames feorh gesellan , 
 wærfæst hæle ; wintra habban 
 twegen hundteontig , geteled riman , 
 and fife eacan , þu he forþ gewitan 
 missere frod metodsceaft seon . 
 þe se halig sprecan , heofonrices weard , 
 toh abrahame , ece drihten : 
 " gewitan þu nu feran and þin faru lædan , 
 ceap toh cnosl . carran ofgif , 
 fæder eðelstol . faran , swa ic þu hatan , 
 mann leofost , and þu minum wel 
 lar hyrian , and þæt land gesec 
 þu ic þu ælgrene ywan willan , 
 brad folde . þu gebletsad sculan 
 on mundbyrde minre lifigan . 
 gif þu ænig eorðbuendra 
 mid wea greteð , ic he wergðo on 
 min settan and modhete , 
 longsum nið ; lisse sellan , 
 wilnian wæstm þæm þu wurðiað . 
 þurh þu eorðbuende ealle onfoð , 
 folcbearn freoðo and freondscipe , 
 bliss minre and bletsunge 
 on woruldrice . wriðende sculan 
 mægþ þinne monrim wese 
 swiðe under swegl sunu and dohtor , 
 oðþæt fromcyme folde weorðeð , 
 þeodlond manig þin gefyllan . " 
 him þu abraham gewitan æht lædan 
 of egipta eðelmearce , 
 gumcystum god , gold and seolfor 
 swiðfeorm and gesælig , swa him sigorian weard , 
 waldend usser þurh hit word abeodan , 
 ceap from carran ; sœ̄сan cananea 
 land and leodgeard . þu cuman leof god 
 on þu eðelturf ides lædan , 
 swæs gebedda and hit suhtrian 
 wif on willan . wintra habban 
 fif and hundseofontig þe he faran sculan , 
 carran ofgifan and cneowmagas . 
 him þu feran gewitan fæder ælmihtig 
 lar gemyndig land sceawian 
 geond þu folcsceare be frea hæs 
 abraham wid , oðþæt ellenrof 
 toh sicem cuman siþ spedig , 
 cynn cananeis . þu he cyning engel 
 abrahame iewan selfa , 
 domfæst wereda and drihten cweðan : 
 " þes wesan seon eorþ þu ic ælgrene 
 tudor þin torht willan 
 wæstm gewlo on geweald don , 
 rum romana . " þu se rinc god 
 wibed wyrсean and þu waldende 
 lifes leohtfruman lacan onsægde 
 gast helm . him þu git gewitan 
 abraham eastan eage wlitan 
 on land cyþan , ( lisse gemunan 
 heofonweardes gehatan , þu him þurh halig word 
 sigorian selfcyning soð gecyðde ) , 
 oðþæt drihtweras duguþ geforan 
 þær wesan botlwela bethlem hatan . 
 beornan bliðemod and hit broðor sunu 
 forþ oferforan folcmæro land 
 eastan mid æht , æfæst mann 
 weallsteapan hleoðu , and him þu wiс сeosan 
 þær him wlitebeorht wongas geþuhton . 
 abraham þu oðere siþ 
 wibed wyrсean . he þær word god 
 torht cigan , tiber onsægde 
 hit liffrea , ( him se lean agifan 
 nalles hneawlice þurh hit hand metend ) , 
 on þæm gledstyde gumcystum til . 
 þær ræsbora þrage siððan 
 wiсe wunian and wilnian brucan , 
 beornan mid bryd , oðþæt brohþrea 
 cananea wearð cynn getenge , 
 hunger se heardian , hamsittendum , 
 wælgrim wer . him þu wishydig 
 abraham gewitan on egypte , 
 drihten сeosan , drohtað sec , 
 fleon wærfæst wea ; wesan þæt wite toh strang . 
 abraham maðelode , geseon egypta 
 hornsele hwit and heah burh 
 beorht blican ; onginnan þu hit bryd frea , 
 wishydig wer , word læran : 
 " siððan egypte eage motan 
 on þinne wlite wlitan wlanc manig , 
 þonne æðelinga eorl wenað , 
 mæg ælfscieno , þæt þu min wesan 
 beorht gebedda , þu willan beorn sum 
 him geagnian . ic me onegan mæg 
 þæt me wrað sum wæpn ecge 
 for freondmynde feorh beneotan . 
 secgan þu , sar , þæt þu wesan sweostor min , 
 lices mæge , þonne þu leodweras 
 fremde fricgen hwæt#2 wesan freondlufu 
 ellðeodigra uncer twega , 
 feorran cumenra . þu him fæstan helan 
 soð sprecan ; swa þu minum sculan 
 feorh gebeorgan , gif me freoðo drihten 
 on woruldrice , waldend usser , 
 on ælmihtig , swa he ær dydan , 
 lengra lifes . se we þes lad sceop , 
 þæt we on egiptum are sculan 
 freme friclan and we freme sec . " 
 þu cuman ellenrof eorl siðian , 
 abraham mid æht on egypte , 
 þær him folcweras fremde wesan , 
 wine uncuðe . word sprecan 
 ymb se wif wlite wlonce manig , 
 dugeðum dealle ; him drihtlicu mæg 
 on wlite , modig mænegum ðuhte , 
 cyning þegn . hi þæt cuð don 
 hira folcfrean and fægerra lutan 
 for æðelinge ides sinnan , 
 acan hi sarran swiðe micel , 
 wynsum wlite word herian , 
 oðþæt he lædan hatan leoflic wif toh 
 hit selfes sellan . sinc brytta , 
 æðelinga helm hatan abrahame 
 duguðum stepan . hwæðere drihten wearð , 
 frea faraone fah and yrre 
 for wifmyne ; se wrað ongeald 
 heard mid hiwan hægstealdra wyn . 
 ongæt hwæðere guma aldor 
 hwæt#2 him waldend wræc witeswingum ; 
 hatan him abraham toh egesa geðreadne 
 breogo egipto , and hit bryd agifan , 
 wif toh geweald ; hatan him wine ceosan , 
 ellor æðelingas , oðer dugeðe . 
 abeodan þu þeodcyning þegn sin , 
 ombihtscealcum , þæt hi he arlice 
 eall onsundne eft gebrohten 
 of þære folcsceare , þæt he on friðe wære . 
 þe abraham æht lædan 
 of egypta eðelmearce ; 
 hi ellenrofe ides ferian , 
 bryd and begas , þæt hi toh bethlem 
 on cuðe wiс ceap lædan , 
 eadig eorðwelan oðer siþ , 
 wif and willan and hira woruldgestreon . 
 onginnan him þu bytlian and hira burh ræran , 
 and sellan settan , salu niwian . 
 wer on wonge wibed settan 
 neah þæm þu abraham æror ræran 
 hit waldende þu weste cuman . 
 þær se eadig eft ecan drihten 
 niwe stefn noman weorðade ; 
 tilmodig eorl tiber onsægde 
 þeodne engel , þancian swiðe 
 lifes leohtfruman lisse and arian . 
 wunedon on þæm wiсe , habban wilnian geniht 
 abraham and loth . eadan bryttedon , 
 oðþæt hi on þæm land nesan magan lengan somed 
 blæd brucan and hira begra þær 
 æht habban , acan sculan arfæst , 
 þu rinc þywan rumor sec 
 ellor eðelseld . oft wesan teonan 
 wærfæstra wer weredum gemæne , 
 heard hearmplega . þu se halig onginnan 
 arian gemyndig abraham sprecan 
 fæger toh lothe : " ic wesan fædera þu 
 sibgebyrdum , þu min suhterga . 
 nesan sceolon wit betweonan teonan weaxan , 
 wroht wriðian— nesan þæt willan god ! 
 acan witan synt gemagas ; wit gemæne nesan sculan 
 elles awiht , nymþe eall tela 
 lufu langsum . nu þu , loth , geþenc , 
 þæt wit modig ymb mearc sittað , 
 þeod þrymfæste þegn and gesiððum , 
 folc cananea and feretia , 
 rof rinc . nesan willað rumor wit 
 landriht hira ; forðam witan lædan sculan , 
 teonwit of þes stow , and wit staðolwangas 
 rumor sec . ic rædan sprecan , 
 birnan arones , begra uncer , 
 soð secg . ic þu selfes don 
 lif , libban . leornian þu seolfa 
 and geþancmeta þin mod 
 on hwilce healf þu willan hwyrft don , 
 cyrran mid ceap , nu ic þu cyþan abeodan . " 
 him þu loth gewitan land sceawigan 
 be iordane , grene eorþ . 
 seon wesan wæter weaht and wæstm þeccan , 
 lagostreamum sunnan , and gelic god 
 neorxnawang , oðþæt nergend god 
 for wer synn wylme gesellan 
 sodoman and gomorran , sweart liсgan . 
 him þu eard geceosan and eðelsetl 
 sunu arones on sodoma burh ; 
 æht sinnan ealle lædan , 
 beah from bethlem and botlgestreon , 
 wela , windan gold . wunian siððan 
 be iordane gear mænego . 
 þær folcstede fæger wesan , 
 mann arleas , metod laðe . 
 wesan sodomisc cynn synn þriste , 
 dæd gedwolen ; dreogan hira selfra 
 eсe unræd . æfre nesan willan 
 þæm leodþeawum loth onfon , 
 acan he þære mægþ monwisan fleon , 
 þiсgan þu he on þæm land lifian sculan , 
 facen and fyren , and he fæger healdan , 
 þeawfæst and geþyldig on þæm þeodscipe , 
 emn þon gelicost , lar gemyndig , 
 þu he nesan cuðe hwæt#2 þu cynn don . 
 abraham wunian eðeleardum 
 cananea forþ . he cyning engel , 
 metod moncynnes mundbyrde healdan , 
 wilnian wæstm and worulddugeðum , 
 lufu and lissum ; forðam hit lof secgað 
 wid under wolcn wer cneoris , 
 fullwona birnan . he frea hyrdan 
 est on eðle , ðenden he eardes brucan , 
 halig and higefrod ; næfre hleowlora 
 æt edwihtan æfre weorðeð 
 feorhberendra forht and acol , 
 mann for metod , þu him æfter wifcynn 
 þurh gemynd spedan mod and dæd , 
 word and gewitt , wise þance , 
 oþ hit ealdorgedal oleccan willan . 
 þe ic aldor gefrignan elamitarna 
 from folctogan , fyrd gebeodan , 
 orlahomar ; him ambrafel 
 of sennar side worude 
 for on fultuman . gewitan hi feower þu 
 þeodcyningas þrymm micel 
 sec suþ þanan sodoman and gomorran . 
 þu wesan guðhergum be iordane 
 wer eðelland wid geondsendan , 
 folde feond . sculan forht manig 
 blachleor ides bifian gan 
 on fremde fæðm ; feollan wergend 
 bryd and beah , bennum seoc . 
 him þu togeanes mid guðþræce 
 fife foran folccyningas 
 sweota suðon , willan sodome burh 
 wrað werian ; þu wintra twelf 
 norðmonnum ær nied sculan 
 gombon gieldan and gafol sellan , 
 oðþæt þu leode lengan nesan willan 
 elamitarna aldor swiðan 
 folcgestreonum , acan him from swican . 
 faran þu tosamne . franca wesan hlud , 
 wrað wælherigas . singan se wann fugel 
 under deoreðsceaftum , deawigfeðera , 
 hræs on wenan . hæleð onettan 
 on mægencorðrum , mod þryðge , 
 oðþæt folcgetrume gefaran habban 
 sid tosamne suðan and norþan , 
 helma þeссean . þær wesan heard plegian , 
 wælgara wrixl , wigcyrm micel , 
 hlud hildesweg . hand bregdan 
 hæleð of scæðum hringmæled sweord , 
 ecgum dihtig . þær wesan eaðfynde 
 eorle orlegceap , se þu ær nesan wesan 
 niðes genihtsum . norðmen wesan 
 suðfolcum swican ; wurdon sodomware 
 and gomorre , gold brytta , 
 æt þæm lindcrodan leof bedrorene , 
 fyrdgesteallum . gewitan feorh hira 
 fram þæm folcstyde fleam nergan , 
 secg ofslegene ; him on swaðe feollan 
 æðelinga birnan , ecgum ofþegde , 
 willgesiððas . habban wigsigor 
 elamitarna ord wisian , 
 wealdan wælstow . gewitan seon wæpnian laf 
 fæsten sec . fynd gold strudan , 
 ahudan þu mid here hordburh wer , 
 sodoman and gomorran , þu sælan ageald , 
 mære ceaster . mægþ siðedon , 
 fæmne and wuduwe , freond beslægene , 
 from hleowstole . hettend lædan 
 ut mid æht abrahames mæg 
 of sodoma burh . we þæt soð magan 
 secgan furður , hwelc siððan wearð 
 æfter þæm gehnæste , herewulfa sið , 
 þær þu lædan loth and leode god , 
 suðmonna sincan , sigor gielpan . 
 him þu secg hraðe gewitan siðian , 
 on gar laf , se þe guðe genesan , 
 abraham sec . se þæt orlegweorc 
 þæm ebriscan eorle gecyðde , 
 forslean swiðe sodoma folc , 
 leode duguðe and lothes sið . 
 þu þæt inwitspell abraham sægan 
 freond sin ; bædan him fultum 
 wærfæst hæleð willgeðoftan , 
 aner and manre , escol þridda , 
 cweðan þæt him wære weorc on mod , 
 sorh sarost , þæt hit suhtriga 
 þeownyd þolian ; bædan him þræcrofe 
 þu rinc se rædan ahicgan , 
 þæt hit hyldemæg ahreded weorþan , 
 beornan mid bryd . him þu broðor þri 
 æt sprecan þære sped micel 
 hælan hygesorge heard word , 
 ellenrofe , and abrahame 
 treowe sellan , þæt hi hit torn mid him 
 gewrecan on wrað , oððe on wæl fealle . 
 þu se halig hatan hit heorðwerod 
 wæpnian onfon . he þær wiga findan , 
 æscberendra , xviii 
 and ccc eacan , þeodenholdra , 
 þær þu he witan þæt magan wel æghwylc 
 on fyrd wegan fealu linde . 
 him þu abraham gewitan and þu eorl þri 
 þu him ær treowe sellan mid hira folcgetrume ; 
 willan hit mæg huru , 
 loth alynnan of laðscipe . 
 rinc waron rof , randas wegan 
 forþ fromlice on foldwege . 
 hildewulfas herewicum neh 
 gefaran habban . þu he hit frumgaran , 
 wishydig wer , word sægan , 
 þares afera , him wesan þurfan micel 
 þæt hi on twegen healf 
 grimman guðgemot gystum eowan 
 heard handplegan ; cweðan þæt him se halig ,
