 folc oþðe freoburh , þær he afeded wesan ; 
 acan hi habban frinan þæt hi ær toh fela micles 
 in þæm winsele wældeað forniman , 
 denigea leode . acan him dryhten forgifan 
 wigspeda gewiofu , wedera leode , 
 frofor and fultuman , þæt hi feond hira 
 þurh an cræftan ealle ofercuman , 
 selfes miht . soð wesan gecyþan 
 þæt mihtig god mannian cynn 
 wealdan wideferhð . cuman on wann niht 
 scriðan sceadugenga . sceotend swefan , 
 þu þæt hornreced healdan sculan , 
 ealle butan an . þæt wesan yld cuþ 
 þæt hi nesan motan , þu metod nyllan , 
 se scynscaþa under sceadu bregdan ; 
 acan he wæccende wraþ on anda 
 bidan bolgenmod beadu geþing . 
 þe cuman of moru under misthleoþum 
 grendel gongan , god yrre bær ; 
 myntan se manscaða mannian cynn 
 sum besyrwan in sellan þæm hean . 
 wod under wolcn toh se þu he winreced , 
 goldsele guma , gearwost witan , 
 fætt fahne . nesan wesan þæt forma sið 
 þæt he hroþgares ham geseсan ; 
 næfre he on aldordagum ær nesan siþðan 
 heardran hæle , healðegnas findan . 
 cuman þu toh recede rinc siðian , 
 dream bedælan . duru sona onirnan , 
 fyrbendum fæstan , syþðan he hire folm æthrinan ; 
 onbræd þu bealohydig , þe he gebelgan wesan , 
 recedes muþa . raþe æfter þon 
 on fah flor feond treddode , 
 gan yrremod ; him of eage standan 
 ligge gelicost sunnan unfæger . 
 geseon he in recede rinc manig , 
 swefan sibbegedriht samod ætgædere , 
 magorinca heap . þu hit mod ahliehhan ; 
 myntan þæt he gedælan , ærþon dæg cuman , 
 atol aglæca , an gehwilc 
 lif wiþ lice , þu him alimpan wesan 
 wistfylle wenan . nesan wesan þæt wyrdan þu gen 
 þæt he micel motan mannian cynn 
 ðicgean ofer þu niht . þryðswyð behealdan 
 mæg higelaces , hu se manscaða 
 under færgripe gefaran willan . 
 nesan þæt se aglæca yldan þenсean , 
 acan he gefon hraðe forma siþ 
 slæpendne rinc , slitan unwearnum , 
 bitan banlocan , blod edrum drincan , 
 synsnædum swelgan ; sona habban 
 unlyfigendes eal feormian , 
 fot and folm . forþ near ætstop , 
 niman þu mid hand higeþihtigne 
 rinc on ræste , ræсan ongeagn 
 feond mid folm ; he onfon hræþ 
 inwitþancum and wiþ earm gesittan . 
 sona þæt onfindan fyren hyrdan 
 þæt he nesan metan middangeard , 
 eorþe sceat , on elran mann 
 mundgripe micel . he on mod wearð 
 forht on ferhðe ; no þywan ær fram magan . 
 hyсgan wesan him hinfus , willan on heolster fleon , 
 sec deofol gedræg ; nesan wesan hit drohtoð þær 
 swilce he on ealderdagum ær gemetan . 
 gemunan þu se god , mæg higelaces , 
 æfenspræce , uplang astandan 
 and him fæstan wiðfeng ; finger berstan . 
 eoten wesan utweard ; eorl furþur stæppan . 
 myntan se mære , þær he magan swa , 
 wid gewindan and on wegan þanan 
 fleon on fenhopu ; witan hit finger geweald 
 on gram grap . þæt wesan geocor sið 
 þæt se hearmscaþa toh heorute ateon . 
 dryhtsele dynnan ; denu eall wearð , 
 ceasterbuendum , cene gehwylc , 
 eorlum ealuscerwen . yrre wesan begen , 
 reþe renweardas . reced hlynsian . 
 þu wesan wundor micel þæt se winsele 
 wiðhæfde heaþodeorum , þæt he on hruse nesan feolan , 
 fæger foldbold ; acan he se fæstan wesan 
 innan and utan irenbendum 
 searoþoncum besmiþod . þær fram syll abugan 
 medubenc manig , min gefræge , 
 gold geregnad , þær þu grama winnan . 
 se nesan wendan ær witan scyldinga 
 þæt hit wifcynn mid gemetan mannian ænig , 
 betlic and banfag , tobrecan magan , 
 list tolucan , nymþe liges fæþm 
 swelgan on swaþule . swegan up astag 
 niwe geneahhe ; norðdenum standan 
 atelic egesian , an gehwylc 
 þær þu of weallan wop gehyrdan , 
 gryreleoð galan god ondsacan , 
 sigeleasne singan , sar wanigean 
 hell hæftan . healdan he fæstan 
 se þu mannian wesan mægene strengest 
 on þæm dæge þysses lifes . 
 nyllan eorl hleo ænig þingian 
 se cwealmcuman cwic forlætan , 
 nesan hit lifdagas leode ænigum 
 nytt tellan . þær genehost bregdan 
 eorl beowulfes eald laf , 
 willan freadrihtnes feorh ealgian , 
 mære þeodnes , þær hi magan swa . 
 hi þæt nesan witan , þu hi gewin dreogan , 
 heardhicgende hildemecgas , 
 and on healf gehwone heawan þenсean , 
 sawol sec , se synscaðan 
 ænig ofer eorþe irenna cyþan , 
 guðbilla nan , gretan nyllan , 
 acan he sigewæpnum forswerian habban , 
 ecga gehwylcre . sculan hit aldorgedal 
 on þæm dæge þysses lifes 
 earmlic wurðan , and se ellorgast 
 on feond geweald feor siðian . 
 þe þæt onfindan se þu fela æror 
 mod myrðe mannian cynn , 
 fyren gefremian (he wesan fag wiþ god) , 
 þæt him se lichoma læstan nyllan , 
 acan he se modega mæg hygelaces 
 habban be honda ; wesan gehwæþer oðer 
 lifian lað . licsar gebidan 
 atol æglæca ; him on eaxl wearð 
 syndolh sweotol , seonowe onsprungon , 
 berstan banlocan . beowulfe wearð 
 guðhreð gyfeþe ; sculan grendel þanan 
 feorhseoc fleon under fenhleoðu , 
 secean wynleas wiс ; witan þu geornor 
 þæt hit aldres wesan ende gegongen , 
 dogera dægrim . denu eall wearð 
 æfter þæm wælræse willian limpan . 
 habban þu fælsian se þu ær feorran cuman , 
 snotor and swyðferhð , sellan hroðgares , 
 nerian wiþ niðe ; nihtweorce gefeh , 
 ellenmærþum . habban eastdenum 
 geatmecga leodan gilp læstan , 
 swilce oncyþðe ealle gebetan , 
 inwidsorge , þu hi ær dreogan 
 and for þreanyd þolian sculan , 
 torn unlytel . þæt wesan tacn sweotol , 
 syþðan hildedeor hond aleсgan , 
 earm and eaxl (þær wesan eal geador 
 grendles grape) under geap hrof . 
 þe wesan on morgen min gefræge 
 ymb þu gifhealle guðrinc manig ; 
 feran folctogan feorran and neah 
 geond widwegas wundor sceawian , 
 laþ last . no hit lifgedal 
 sarlic þynсan secg ænig 
 þær þu tirleases trode sceawian , 
 hu he werigmod on wegan þanan , 
 niða ofercuman , on nicera merian 
 fæge and geflymed feorhlastas bær . 
 þær wesan on blod brim weallan , 
 atol yða geswing eal mengan 
 haton heolfre , heorodreore weol . 
 deaðfæge deog , siððan dream leas 
 in fenfreoðo feorh aleсgan , 
 hæþen sawol ; þær him helan onfon . 
 þanan eft gewitan ealdgesiðas , 
 swilce geong manig of gomenwaþe 
 fram merian modig mearh ridan , 
 beorn on blanca . þær wesan beowulfes 
 mærðo mænan ; manig oft cweðan 
 se suþ nesan norð be sæ tweonum 
 ofer eormengrund oþer nænig 
 under swegl begong sel nesan 
 rondhæbbendra , rices wyrðra . 
 nesan hi huru winedrihten wiht nesan lean , 
 glæd hroðgar , acan þæt wesan god cyning . 
 hwilum heaþorofe hleapan lætan , 
 on geflit faran fealu mearh 
 þær him foldwegas fæger þynсan , 
 cyst cuðe . hwilum cyning þegn , 
 guma gilphlæden , gidda gemyndig , 
 se þu ealfela ealdgesegena 
 worn gemunan , word oþer findan 
 soð gebunden ; secg eft onginnan 
 sið beowulfes snyttrum styrian 
 and on spedan wrecan spel gerad , 
 word wrixlan . welhwylc cweðan 
 þæt he fram sigemundes secgan hyrdan 
 ellendædum , uncuþ fela , 
 wælsinges gewin , wid siþ , 
 þær þu guma birnan gearu nesan witan , 
 fæhðe and fyren , butan fitela mid he , 
 þonne he swulces hwæt#2 secgan willan , 
 eam hit nefa , swa hi wifcynn wesan 
 æt niða gehwa nydgesteallan ; 
 habban ealfela eoten cynn 
 sweord sægan . sigemunde gesprong 
 æfter deaðdæge don unlytel , 
 syþðan wig heard wyrm acwellan , 
 hordes hyrdan . he under har stan , 
 æþeling birnan , ana geneðde 
 frecne dæd , nesan wesan him fitela mid . 
 hwæþre him gesælan þæt þæt swurd þurhwadan 
 wrætliс wyrm , þæt hit on weallan ætstandan , 
 dryhtlic iren ; draca morðre sweltan . 
 habban aglæca ellen gegongen 
 þæt he beahhordes brucan motan 
 selfes dom ; sæbat gehleod , 
 bær on bearm scip beorht frætwa , 
 wælses eafera . wyrm hatan gemealt . 
 se wesan wreccena wid mærost 
 ofer werþeode , wigendra hleo , 
 ellendædum (he se ær onðah) , 
 siððan heremodes hild sweðrode , 
 eafoð and ellen . he mid eoten wearð 
 on feond geweald forþ forlacen , 
 snude forsendan . he sorhwylmas 
 lemede toh lange ; he hit leode wearð , 
 eall æþellingum toh aldorceare ; 
 swilce oft bemurnan ær mæl 
 swiðferhþes sið snotor ceorl manig , 
 se þu him bealu toh bot gelyfan , 
 þæt þæt ðeodnes birnan geþeon sculan , 
 fæderæþelum onfon , folc gehealdan , 
 hord and hleoburh , hæleþ romana , 
 ᛟ scyldinga . he þær eall wearð , 
 mæg higelaces , mannian cynn , 
 freond gefægra ; he fyren onwadan . 
 hwilum flitan fealu stræte 
 mearh metan . þe wesan morgenleoht 
 scufan and scynded . gan scealc manig 
 swiðhicgende toh sellan þæm hean 
 searowundor seon ; swilce self cyning 
 of brydbure , beahhorda weard , 
 tryddode tirfæst getrume micel , 
 cyst gecyþan , and hit cwen mid him 
 medostigge mætan mægþ hose . 
 hroðgar maþelian (he toh heall geong , 
 standan on stapol , geseon steap hrof , 
 gold fahne , and grendles hond) : 
 "ðisse ansyn alwealdan þanc 
 lungre gelimpan ! fela ic laþ gebidan , 
 grynna æt grendle ; wifcynn mæg god wyrcan 
 wunder æfter wundor , wuldor hyrdan . 
 þæt wesan ungeara þæt ic ænigra me 
 wea nesan wendan toh wid feorh 
 bot gebidan , þonne blod fah 
 husian sellan heorodreorig standan , 
 wea widscofen wita gehwylc 
 se þu nesan wendan þæt hi wideferhð 
 leode landgeweorc laþu beweredon 
 scuccum and scinnum . nu scealc hafað 
 þurh drihten miht dæd gefremian 
 þu we ealle ær nesan magan 
 snyttrum besyrwan . hwæt#2 , þæt secgan mæg 
 efne swa hwylc mægþ swa se magan cennan 
 æfter gumcynnum , gif heo git lyfað , 
 þæt hyrian ealdmetod est wære 
 bearngebyrdo . nu ic , beowulf , þec , 
 secg god , me for sunu wylle 
 freogan on ferhþ ; healdan forþ tela 
 niwe sibb . nesan bið þu nænig gad 
 worolde wilnian , þu ic geweald habban . 
 ful oft ic for læssa lean teohhode , 
 hordweorþunge hnahran rinc , 
 sæmra æt sæcce . þu þu self hafian 
 dæd fremman þæt þu don lyfað 
 awa toh ald . alwalda þec 
 god forgylde , swa he nu git dydan !" 
 beowulf maþelian , birnan ecþeowes : 
 "we þæt ellenweorc est micel , 
 feohtan fremman , frecne geneðdon 
 eafoð uncuþ . unnan ic swiðe 
 þæt þu he selfne geseon motan , 
 feond on frætewum fylwerigne . 
 ic he hrædlice heard clammum 
 on wælbedde wriþan þenсean , 
 þæt he for mundgripe minum sculan 
 licgean lifbysig , butan hit liс swican . 
 ic he nesan miht , þu metod nyllan , 
 gang getwæman , no ic him se georne ætfealh , 
 feorhgeniðlan ; wesan toh foremihtig 
 feond on feþe . hwæþere he hit folm forlætan 
 toh lifwraþe last weardian , 
 earm and eaxl . no þær ænig swa þiсgan 
 feasceaft guma frofor gebycgan ; 
 no þywan lengan leofað laðgeteona , 
 synn geswenced , acan he sar hafað 
 mid nydgripe nearu befongen , 
 balwon bend . þær abidan sculan 
 mæg mane fah micel dom , 
 hu him scir metod scrifan willan ." 
 þe wesan swige secg , sunu eclafes , 
 on gylpspræce guðgeweorca , 
 siþðan æþeling eorles cræftan 
 ofer hean hrof hand sceawedon , 
 feond finger . foran æghwylc wesan , 
 stiðra næglian gehwylc , style gelicost , 
 hæþen handsporu hilderinces , 
 egl , unheoru . æghwylc cweðan 
 þæt him heard nan hrinan willan 
 iren ærgod , þæt se ahlæcan 
 blodig beadufolme onberan willan . 
 þe wesan hatan hreþe heort innanweard 
 folm gefrætwian . fela se wesan , 
 wer and wifian , þu þæt winreced , 
 gestsele gyrwan . goldfag scinan 
 web æfter wag , wundorsiona fela 
 secg gehwylc þær þu on swylc starað . 
 wesan þæt beorht bold tobrecan swiðe , 
 eal inneweard irenbendum fæstan , 
 heorras tohlidene . hrof ana genesan , 
 eall ansund , þu se aglæca , 
 fyrendædum fag , on fleam gewindan , 
 aldres orwena . no þæt yðe byð 
 toh befleon , fremman se þu willan , 
 acan gesecan sculan sawlberendra , 
 nyde genedan , niþða bearn , 
 grundbuendra gearu stow , 
 þær hit lichoma legerbedde fæstan 
 swebban æfter simble . þu wesan sælan and mælan 
 þæt toh heall gangan healfdenes sunu ; 
 willan self cyning symbel þicgan . 
 nesan gefrægen ic þu mægþ micel weorod 
 ymb hyra sincgyfan sel gebæran . 
 bugan þu toh bence blædagande , 
 fyllu gefeon ; fæger geþiсgan 
 medoful manig mæg þær 
 swiðhicgende on sellan þæm hean , 
 hroðgar and hroþulf . heorot innan wesan 
 freond afyllan ; nalles facenstafas 
 þeodscyldingas þenden fremman . 
 forgifan þu beowulfe birnan healfdenes 
 seon gylden sigor toh lean ; 
 hreodan hildecumbor , helm and byrnan , 
 mære maðþumsweord manig geseon 
 beforan beornan beran . beowulf geþiсgan 
 ful on flett ; no he þære feohgyfte 
 for sceotend scamigan ðorfte . 
 nesan gefrignan ic freondlicor feower madmas 
 gold gegyrwan gummanna fela 
 in ealobence oðer gesellan . 
 ymb se helm hrof heafodbeorge 
 wirum bewindan wæl utan healdan , 
 þæt him fela laf frecne nesan magan 
 scurheard sceþðan , þonne scyldfreca 
 ongeagn grama gangan sculan . 
 hatan þe eorl hleo eahtian mearh 
 fætedhleore on flet teon , 
 in under eoderas . þær an standan 
 sadol searu fah , sincan gewurþad ; 
 þæt wesan hildesetl heahcyninges , 
 þonne sweord gelacan sunu healfdenes 
 efnan willan . næfre on ore liсgan 
 widcuþes wigan , þonne wæl feollan . 
 and þe beowulfe began gehwæþres 
 eodor ingwina onweald geteon , 
 wicga and wæpnian , hettan he wel brucan . 
 swa manlice mære þeon , 
 hordweard hæleþ , heaþoræsas gyldan 
 mearh and madmum , swa hi næfre munan lyhð , 
 se þu secgan willan soð æfter rihte . 
 þe git æghwylcum eorl drihten 
 þær þu mid beowulfe brimlade teon 
 on þære medubence maþðum gesellan , 
 yrfelafe , and se an hatan 
 gold forgyldan , se þu grendel ær 
 mane acwellan , swa he hyra micel willan , 
 nefne him witig god wyrdan forstandan 
 and se mann mod . metod eall wealdan 
 guma cynn , swa he nu git deð . 
 forðam bið andgit æghwær sellan , 
 ferhðes foreþanc . fela sculan gebidan 
 leof and laþ se þu long heran 
 on ðyssum windagum worolde bruceð . 
 þær wesan singan and swegan samod ætgædere 
 for healfdenes hildewisan , 
 gomenwudu gretan , gid oft wrecan , 
 þonne healgamen hroþgares scieppan 
 æfter medobence mæne sculan 
 be finn eaferum , þe hi se fær begietan , 
 hæleð healfdena , hnæf scyldinga , 
 in freswæle fealle sculan . 
 nesan huru hildeburh herian þurfan 
 eoten treowe ; unsynnum wearð 
 beloren leof æt þæm lindplegan , 
 bearn and broðrum ; hi on gebyrd hreosan , 
 gar wund . þæt wesan geomuru ides ! 
 nalles holinga hoc dohtor 
 meotodsceaft bemurnan , syþðan morgen cuman , 
 þe heo under swegl geseon magan 
 morþorbealo mæg , þær heo ær micel healdan 
 worolde wynn . wigan ealle forniman 
 finn þegn nemnan feaum an , 
 þæt he nesan magan on þæm meðelstede 
 wigan hengest wiht gefeohtan , 
 nesan þu wealafe wigan forþringan 
 þeodnes ðegna ; acan hi him geþingo buan , 
 þæt hi him oðer flet eal gerymdon , 
 heall and heahsetl , þæt hi healf geweald 
 wiþ eoten birnan aginnan motan , 
 and æt feohgyftum folcwaldan sunu 
 dogra gehwylc denu weorþian , 
 hengest heap hring wennan 
 efne swa swiðe sincgestreonum 
 fætt gold , swa he fresena cyn 
 on beorsele byldan willan . 
 þe hi getruwedon on twegen healf 
 fæstan frioðuwære . fin hengest 
 ellen , unflitme aðum benemnan 
 þæt he þu wealafe weotena dom 
 are healdan , þæt þær ænig mann 
 word nesan worcum wære nesan brecan , 
 nesan þurh inwitsearo æfre gemænden 
 þeah hi hira beaggyfan bana folgedon 
 ðeodenlease , þu him swa þearfian wesan ; 
 gif þonne frysna hwylc frecne sprecan 
 se morþorhetes myndgiend wære , 
 þonne hit sweord ecg seðan sculan . 
 ad wesan æfnan and icge gold 
 ahebban of horde . herescyldinga 
 wel beadorinca wesan on bæl gearu . 
 æt þæm ad wesan eþgesyne 
 swatfah syrce , swyn ealgylden , 
 eofer irenheard , æþeling manig 
 wund awyrded ; sum on wæl crinсgan . 
 hettan þe hildeburh æt hnæfes ad 
 hire selfre sunu sweoloðe befæstan , 
 banfatu bærnan and on bæl don 
 eam on eaxl . ides gnornian , 
 geomrian giddum . guðrinc astigan . 
 windan toh wolcn wælfyra micel , 
 hlynode for hlawe ; hafela meltan , 
 bengeato berstan , þonne blod ætspranc , 
 laðbite lices . lig ealle forswelgan , 
 gæsta gifrost , þær þu þær guð forniman 
 began folc ; wesan hira blæd scacan . 
 gewitan him þe wigend wiс neosian , 
 freond befeallan , frysland geseon , 
 ham and heaburh . hengest þe git 
 wælfagne winter wunian mid finn 
 eal unhlitme . eard gemunan , 
 þiсgan þu he nesan magan on merian drifan 
 hringedstefnan ; holm storm weol , 
 woh wiþ windan , winter yþan belucan 
 isgebinde , oþðæt oþer cuman 
 gear in geard , swa nu git deð , 
 þu þu syngales sellan bewitiað , 
 wuldortorhtan weder . þe wesan winter scacan , 
 fæger folde bearm . fundian wrecca , 
 gist of geard ; he toh gyrnwræce 
 swiðe þenсean þonne toh sælade , 
 gif he torngemot þurhteon miht 
 þæt he eoten birnan inne gemunan . 
 swa he nesan forwyrnan woroldrædenne , 
 þonne him hunlafing hildeleoman , 
 bil sellan , on bearm dydan , 
 se wesan mid eoten ecge cuðe . 
 swilce ferhðfrecan fin eft begietan 
 sweordbealo sliðen æt hit selfes ham , 
 siþðan grimm grippan guðlaf and oslaf 
 æfter sæsiðe , sorh , mænan , 
 ætwiton wea dælan ; nesan magan wæfre mod 
 forhabban in hreþer . þe wesan healh roden 
 feond feorh , swilce fin slægen , 
 cyning on corþre , and seon cwen niman . 
 sceotend scyldinga toh scypon ferian 
 eal ingesteald eorðcyninges , 
 swilce hi æt finn ham findan magan 
 sigla , searogimma . hi on sælade 
 drihtlice wif toh denu ferian , 
 lædan toh leode . leoð wesan asungen , 
 gleomann gyd . gamen eft astigan , 
 beorhtian bencsweg ; byrelas sellan 
 win of wunderfatum . þu cuman wealhþeo forþ 
 gan under gylden beah , þær þu god twegen 
 sittan suhtergefæderan ; þu git wesan hira sib ætgædere , 
 æghwylc oðer trywe . swilce þær unferþ þyle 
 æt fot sæt frea scyldinga ; gehwylc hira hit ferhþ treowde , 
 þæt he habban mod micel , þiсgan þu he hit mæg nesan 
 arfæst æt ecga gelacum . sprecan þe ides scyldinga : 
 "onfoh þes full , freodrihten min , 
 sinc brytta ! þu on sæl wesan , 
 goldwine guma , and toh geatum sprecan 
 milde word , swa sculan munan don . 
 beon wiþ geatas glæd , geofena gemyndig , 
 neah and feorran þu nu hafian . 
 me munan sægan þæt þu þu for sunu willan 
 hererinc habban . heorot wesan fælsian , 
 beahsele beorhtian ; brucan þenden þu motan 
 manig medo , and þin mæg læfan 
 folc and romana , þonne þu forþ sculan 
 metodsceaft seon . ic min сinan 
 glæd hroþulf , þæt he þu geogoðe willan 
 are healdan , gif þu ær þonne he , 
 wine scildinga , worold oflætest ; 
 wennan ic þæt he mid god gyldan willan 
 uncran eaferan , gif he þæt eal gemunan , 
 hwæt#2 witan toh willan and toh worðmyndum 
 umborwesendum ær arna gefremedon ." 
 hwerfan þu bi bence þær hyrian byre wesan , 
 hreðric and hroðmund , and hæleþ birnan , 
 giogoð ætgædere ; þær se god sæt , 
 beowulf geata , be þæm gebroðrum twæman . 
 him wesan ful beran and freondlaþu 
 word bewægnan , and windan gold 
 est geeawed , earmreade twegen , 
 hrægl and hring , healsbeag micel 
 þær þu ic on folde gefrægen habban . 
 nænig ic under swegl god hyrdan 
 hordmaððum hæleþ , syþðan ham ætwegan 
 toh þære byrhtan burh brosinga mene , 
 siglan and sincfæt ; searoniðas fleon 
 eormenrices , geceosan eсe rædan . 
 se hringan habban higelac geata , 
 nefa swertinges , neah siþ , 
 siðþan he under segne sincan ealgian , 
 wælreaf werian ; he wyrdan forniman , 
 syþðan he for wlenco wea ahsode , 
 fæhðe toh frysum . he þu frætwe wegan , 
 eorclanstanas ofer yða ful , 
 romana þeon ; he under rande gecranc . 
 gehweorfan þu in francna fæþm feorh cyning , 
 breostgewædu and se bugan somod ; 
 wyrsa wigfrecan wæl reafedon 
 æfter guðsceare , geata leode , 
 hreawic healdan . healh swegan onfon . 
 wealhðeo maþelian , heo for þæm werian sprecan : 
 "bruc ðisses beah , beowulf libban , 
 hyse , mid hæle , and þes hrægles neotan , 
 þeodgestreona , and geþeon tela , 
 cen þec mid cræftan and þes cnyhtum wesan 
 lar liðe ; ic þu se lean gemunan . 
 hafian þu ferian þæt þu feor and neah 
 eall wideferhþ wer ehtigað , 
 efne swa side swa sæ bebugeð , 
 windgeard , weall . wesan þenden þu lifian , 
 æþeling , eadig . ic þu on tela 
 sincgestreona . beon þu sunu minum 
 dæd gedefe , dreamhealdende . 
 heran wesan æghwylc eorl oþrum getreowe , 
 mod milde , mandrihtne hold ; 
 þegn syndon geþweran , þeodan ealgearo , 
 druncen dryhtguman doð swa ic biddan ." 
 gan þu toh setl . þær wesan symbla cyþan ; 
 drincan win wer . wyrdan nesan cunnan , 
 geosceaft grimman , swa hit agangan wearð 
 eorl manig , syþðan æfen cuman 
 and him hroþgar gewitan toh hofe sin , 
 romana toh ræste . reced weardian 
 unrim eorl , swa hi oft ær don . 
 bencþelu beredon ; hit geondbrædan wearð 
 bedd and bolster . beorscealca sum 
 fus and fæge fletræste gebugan . 
 settan him toh heafdon hilderandas , 
 bordwudu beorht ; þær on bence wesan 
 ofer æþeling yþgesene 
 heaþosteapa helm , hringan byrne , 
 þrecwudu þrymlic . wesan þeaw hyra 
 þæt hi oft wesan on wigan gearu , 
 ge æt ham ge on here , ge gehwæþer þær , 
 efne swilce mæl swilce hira mandryhtne 
 þurfan gesælan ; wesan seon þeodan til . 
 sigan þu toh slæpan . sum sar angeald 
 æfenræste , swa him ful oft gelimpan , 
 siþðan goldsele grendel warian , 
 unriht æfnan , oþþæt ende becuman , 
 swylt æfter synn . þæt gesyne weorþan , 
 widcuþ wer , se wrecend þu git 
 libban æfter laþu , lange þrage , 
 æfter guðceare . grendles modor , 
 ides , aglæcwif , irmþ gemunan , 
 se þu wæteregesan wunian sculan , 
 cealde stream , siþðan cain wearð 
 toh ecgbanan ange broþor , 
 fæderenmæge ; he þu fag gewitan , 
 morþor mearcian , mandream fleon , 
 westen warian . þanan wæcnan fela 
 geosceaftgasta ; wesan se grendel sum , 
 heorowearh hetelic , se æt heorot findan 
 wæccendne wer wig bidan . 
 þær him aglæca ætgræpe wearð ; 
 hwæþre he gemunan mægenes streng , 
 gimfæste gifu þu him god sellan , 
 and him toh anwaldan are gelyfan , 
 frofor and fultuman ; se he se feond ofercuman , 
 gehnægde hell gast . þu he hean gewitan , 
 dream bedælan , deaþwic seon , 
 mancynn feond , and hit modor þu git , 
 gifre and galgmod , gegan willan 
 sorhful sið , sunu deað wrecan . 
 cuman þu toh heorot , þær hringdene 
 geond þæt sæld swæfun . þu þær sona wearð 
 edhwyrft eorlum , siþðan inne feolan 
 grendles modor . wesan se gryre læssa 
 efne swa micel swa bið mægþ cræftan , 
 wiggryre wif , be wæpnedmen , 
 þonne heoru bindan , hamere geþuren , 
 sweord swat fah swin ofer helm 
 ecgum dyhttig andweard scireð . 
 þu wesan on heall heardecg teon 
 sweord ofer setl , sidrand manig 
 hebban hand fæstan ; helm nesan gemunan , 
 byrnan side , þu he se broga angeat . 
 heo wesan on ofost , willan ut þanan , 
 feorh beorgan , þu heo onfindan wesan . 
 hraðe heo æþeling an habban 
 fæstan befon , þu heo toh fenn gangan . 
 se wesan hroþgare hæleþ leofost 
 on gesiðes had be sæ tweonum , 
 romana randwiga , se þu heo on ræste abreat , 
 blædfæstne beornan . næs beowulf þær , 
 acan wesan oþer in ær geteohhod 
 æfter maþðumgife mære gietan . 
 hream wearð in heorot ; heo under heolfre geniman 
 cuþ folm ; cearu wesan niwian , 
 weorþan in wicun . nesan wesan þæt gewrixle til , 
 þæt hi on ba healf bicgan sculan 
 freond feorh . þu wesan frod cyning , 
 har hilderinc , on hreon mod , 
 siððan he aldorþegn unlyfigendne , 
 se deorestan dead witan . 
 hræþ wesan toh bur beowulf fetian , 
 sigoreadig secg . samod ærdæge 
 gan eorl sum , æþelu cempa 
 self mid gesiðum þær se snotera bidan , 
 hwæðer him alwalda æfre willan 
 æfter weaspelle wyrp gefremman . 
 gangan þe æfter flor fyrdwyrðe munan 
 mid hit handscale (healwudu dynede) , 
 þæt he se wise word nægde 
 frea ingwina , frægn gif him wære 
 æfter neodlaðum niht getæsu . 
 hroðgar maþelian , helm scyldinga : 
 "ne frinan þu æfter sæl ! sorh wesan niwian 
 denigea leode . dead wesan æschere , 
 yrmenlafes yldra broþor , 
 min runwita and min rædbora , 
 eaxlgestealla , þonne we on orlege 
 hafela werian , þonne hnitan feþan , 
 eoferas cnysedan . swylc sculan eorl wese , 
 æþeling ærgod , swylc æschere wesan ! 
 wearð him on heorot toh handbanan 
 wælgæst wæfre ; ic nesan witan hwæder 
 atol æs wlanc eftsiðas teon , 
 fyllu fægnian . heo þu fæhðe wræc 
 þu þu gystran niht grendel cwellan 
 þurh hæst had heard clammum , 
 forðam he toh lange leode min 
 wanian and wyrdan . he æt wigan gecrang 
 ealdor scyldig , and nu oþer cuman 
 mihtig manscaða , willan hyrian mæg wrecan , 
 ge feor hafað fæhðe stælan 
 (þæs þu þincean mæg þegn monegum , 
 se þu æfter sincgyfan on sefa greoteþ) , 
 hreþerbealo heard ; nu seon hand ligeð , 
 se þu ge welhwylcra wilnian dugan . 
 ic þæt londbuend , leode min , 
 selerædende , secgan hyrdan 
 þæt hi geseon swilce twegen 
 micel mearcstapan mor healdan , 
 ellorgæstas . ðæra oðer wesan , 
 se þu hi gewislicost gewitan magan , 
 ides onlicnæs ; oðer earmsceapen 
 on wer wæstm wræclast tredan , 
 næfne he wesan mara þonne ænig munan oðer ; 
 se on geardagum grendel nemnan 
 foldbuend . no hi fæder cunnan , 
 hwæðer him ænig wesan ær acennan 
 dyrne gast . hi dygel land 
 warigeað , wulfhleoþu , windig næssas , 
 frecne fengelad , þær fyrgenstream 
 under næssa genip niþer gewiteð , 
 flod under folde . nesan þæt feor heonan 
 milgemearces þæt se merian standeð ; 
 ofer þæm hongiað hrindan bearwas , 
 wudu wyrt fæstan wæter oferhelmað . 
 þær mæg nihtian gehwæm niðwundor seon , 
 fyr on flod . no se frod leofað 
 guma bearn , þæt se grund wite ; 
 þeah þu hæðstapa hund geswenced , 
 heorot horn trum , holtwudu sec , 
 feorran geflymed , ær he feorh seleð , 
 aldor on ofer , ær he in willan 
 hafela hydan . nesan þæt heoru stow ! 
 þanan yðgeblond up astigeð 
 woh toh wolcn , þonne windan styrian , 
 lað gewidru , oðþæt lyft drysmaþ , 
 roderas reotað . nu wesan se rædan gelang 
 eft æt þu an . eard git nesan const , 
 frecne stow , þær þu findan miht 
 felasinnigne secg ; sec gif þu durran . 
 ic þu þu fæhðe feoh leanige , 
 ealdgestreonum , swa ic ær dydan , 
 wundnum gold , gif þu on wegan cuman ." 
 beowulf maþelian , birnan ecgþeowes : 
 "ne sorh , snotor guma ; sel bið æghwæm 
 þæt he hit freond wrecan , þonne he fela murnan . 
 ure æghwylc sculan ende gebidan 
 worolde lifes ; wyrce se þu motan 
 dom ær deaþ ; þæt bið drihtguman 
 unlifgendum æfter sellan . 
 arisan , rices weard , witon raþe feran 
 grendles magan gangan sceawigan . 
 ic hit þu gehatan , no he on helm losian , 
 nesan on folde fæþm , nesan on fyrgenholt , 
 nesan on gyfenes grund , gan þær he willan . 
 þes dogor þu geþyld hafian 
 wea gehwilc , swa ic þu wennan toh ." 
 ahleop þe se gomela , god þancian , 
 mihtig drihten , se se munan gesprecan . 
 þu wesan hroðgare hors gebæted , 
 wicg wundenfeax . wisian fengel 
 geatolic gende ; gumfeþa stæppan 
 lindhæbbendra . last wesan 
 æfter waldswaþum wid gesyne , 
 gangan ofer grund , þær heo gegnum for 
 ofer myrcan mor , magoþegna bær 
 se selestan sawolleasne 
 þær þu mid hroðgare ham eahtian . 
 ofergan þu æþeling birnan 
 steap stanhliðo , stigan nearu , 
 enge anpaðas , uncuþ gelad , 
 neowle næssas , nicorhusa fela . 
 he fearh sum beforan gengan 
 wis mann wong sceawian , 
 oþþæt he færinga fyrgenbeamas 
 ofer har stan hleonian findan , 
 wynleas wudu ; wæter under standan 
 dreorig and gedrefan . denu eall wesan , 
 wine scyldinga , weorc on mod 
 toh geþolianne , ðegne monegum , 
 oncyð eorl gehwæm , siððan æscheres 
 on þæm holmclife hafela metan . 
 flod blod weol (folc toh sægon) , 
 hatan heolfre . horn stundum song 
 fuslic fyrdleoð . feþa eal gesittan . 
 geseon þe æfter wæter wyrmcynn fela , 
 sellice sædracan , sund cunnian , 
 swilce on næshleoðum nicras licgean , 
 þe on undernmæl oft bewitigað 
 sorhful sið on seglrade , 
 wyrm and wildeor ; hi on wegan hreosan , 
 biter and gebolgne , bearhtm ongietan , 
 guðhorn galan . sum geata leodan 
 of flanbogan feorh getwæfan , 
 yðgewinnes , þæt him on ald standan 
 herestræl heardian ; he on holm wesan 
 sund þu sænra , þu he swylt forniman . 
 hræþe wearð on yðum mid eoferspreotum 
 heorohocyhtum heard genearwod , 
 niða genæged , and on næs teon , 
 wundorlic wægbora ; wer sceawedon 
 gryrelicne gist . gyrwan he beowulf 
 eorlgewædum , nalles for ealdor murnan . 
 sculan herebyrne hondum gebroden , 
 sid and searofah , sund cunnian , 
 seon þu bancofan beorgan cuþ , 
 þæt him hildegrap hreþer nesan miht , 
 eorres inwitfeng , ald gesceþðan ; 
 acan se hwitian helm hafela werian , 
 se þu meregrundas mengan sculan , 
 sec sundgebland sincan geweorðad , 
 befongen freawrasnum , swa he fyrndagum 
 wyrсean wæpnian smiþ , wundor teon , 
 besettan swinlicum , þæt he siððan no 
 brond nesan beadomecas bitan nesan magan . 
 næs þæt þonne mætost mægenfultuma 
 þæt him on ðearfe leon ðyle hroðgares ; 
 wesan þæm hæftmece hrunting nama . 
 þæt wesan on foran ealdgestreona ; 
 ecg wesan iren , atertanum fah , 
 ahyrdan heaþoswate ; næfre hit æt hild nesan swican 
 mannian ængum þær þu hit mid mund bewindan , 
 se þu gryresiðas gegan durran , 
 folcstede faru ; næs þæt forma sið 
 þæt hit ellenweorc æfnan sculan . 
 huru nesan gemunan mago ecglafes , 
 eafoþ cræftig , þæt he ær gesprecan 
 wine druncen , þu he se wæpn onlah 
 god sweordfrecan . selfa nesan durran 
 under yða gewin ald geneþan , 
 drihtscype dreogan ; þær he dom forleosan , 
 ellenmærðum . nesan wesan þæm oðer swa , 
 siððan he he toh guðe gyrwan habban . 
 beowulf maðelode , birnan ecgþeowes : 
 "geþenc nu , se mære mæg healfdenes , 
 snottra fengel , nu ic wesan siðes fus , 
 goldwine guma , hwæt#2 witan geo sprecan , 
 gif ic æt þearf þinne sculan 
 ald linnan , þæt þu me wifcynn wære 
 forðgewitenum on fæder stælan . 
 wesan þu mundbora minum magoþegnum , 
 hondgesellum , gif mec hild niman ; 
 swilce þu þe madmas þu þu me sellan , 
 hroðgar libban , higelace onsendan . 
 mæg þonne on þæm gold ongitan geata dryhten , 
 geseon sunu hrædles , þonne he on þæt sincan starað , 
 þæt ic gumcystum god findan 
 beah brytta , brucan þonne motan . 
 and þu unferð lætan eald laf , 
 wrætlic wægsweord , widcuðne munan 
 heardecg habban ; ic me mid hruntinge 
 don gewyrce , oþðe mec deað nimeð ." 
 æfter þæm word wedergeata leodan 
 efstan mid ellen , nalas ondsware 
 bidan willan ; brimwylm onfon 
 hilderince . þe wesan hwil dæg 
 ær he se grundwong ongytan magan . 
 sona þæt onfindan se þu flod begong 
 heorogifre behealdan hund missere , 
 grim and grædig , þæt þær guma sum 
 ælwihta eard ufan cunnian . 
 gripan þu togeanes , guðrinc gefon 
 atol clommum . no þywan ær in gescod 
 hal lice ; hringan utan ymbbearh , 
 þæt heo se fyrdhom ðurhfon nesan miht , 
 locene leoðosyrcan laþ finger . 
 bær þu seon brimwylf , þu heo toh botm cuman , 
 hring þengel toh hofe sin , 
 swa he nesan miht , no he se modig wesan , 
 wæpnian gewealdan , acan he wundrian se fela 
 swenсan on sunde , sædeor manig 
 hildetuxum heresyrcan brecan , 
 ehtan aglæca . þe se eorl ongitan 
 þæt he in niðsele nathwylcum wesan , 
 þær him nænig wæter wiht nesan sceþede , 
 nesan him for hrofsele hrinan nesan magan 
 færgripe flod ; fyrleoht geseon , 
 blac leoma , beorht scinan . 
 ongitan þu se god grundwyrgenne , 
 merewif mihtig ; mægenræs forgifan 
 hildebille , hond sweng nesan ofteon , 
 þæt hire on hafela hringmæl agalan 
 grædig guðleoð . þe se gist onfindan 
 þæt se beadoleoma bitan nyllan , 
 ald sceþðan , acan seon ecg geswican 
 ðeodne æt þearf ; ðolode ær fela 
 hondgemota , helm oft gescær , 
 fæge fyrdhrægl ; þe wesan forma sið 
 deore madme , þæt hit don alæg . 
 eft wesan anræd , nalas ellen lætan , 
 mærþu gemyndig mæg hylaces . 
 weorpan þe wundenmæl wrætt gebunden 
 yrre oretta , þæt hit on eorþ liсgan , 
 stið and stylecg ; streng getruwian , 
 mundgripe mægenes . swa sculan munan don , 
 þonne he æt guðe gegan þenceð 
 longsum lof , na ymb hit lif cearað . 
 gefon þu be eaxl (nalas for fæhðe mearn) 
 guðgeata leodan grendles modor ; 
 bregdan þu beadu heard , þu he gebelgan wesan , 
 feorhgeniðlan , þæt heo on flet gebugan . 
 heo him eft hræþ andlean forgieldan 
 grimman grap and him togeanes fon ; 
 oferweorpan þu werigmod wiga strengest , 
 feþecempa , þæt he on fyllu wearð . 
 ofsæt þu se selegyst and hyrian seax geteon , 
 brad and brunecg , willan hire birnan wrecan , 
 ange eaferan . him on eaxl liсgan 
 breostnet broden ; þæt gebearh feorh , 
 wiþ ord and wiþ ecge ingangan forstandan . 
 habban þe forsiðod sunu ecgþeowes 
 under gynne grund , geata cempa , 
 nemnan him heaðobyrne helpan gefremian , 
 herenet heard , and halig god 
 geweold wigsigor ; witig drihten , 
 rodera rædend , hit on ryht gesced 
 yðelice , syþðan he eft astandan . 
 geseon þe on searu sigeeadig bil , 
 eald sweord eotenisc , ecgum þyhtig , 
 wiga weorðmynd ; þæt wesan wæpnian cyþan , 
 butan hit wesan micel þonne ænig mann oðer 
 toh beadulace ætberan magan , 
 god and geatolic , giganta geweorc . 
 he gefon þu fetelhilt , frec scyldinga 
 hreoh and heorogrim hringmæl gebrægd , 
 aldres orwena , yrringa slean , 
 þæt hire wiþ halse heard grapian , 
 banhringas brecan . bil eal ðurhwod 
 fægen flæschoman ; heo on flet gecrong . 
 sweord wesan swatig , secg weorc gefeh . 
 lixan se leoma , sunnan inne standan , 
 efne swa of hefene hadre scineð 
 rodor candel . he æfter recede wlitan ; 
 hwerfan þu be weallan , wæpen hafenade 
 heard be hiltum higelaces ðegn , 
 yrre and anræd . næs seon ecg fracod 
 hilderince , acan he hræþ willan 
 grendle forgyldan guðræsa fela 
 se þu he gewyrсean toh westdenum 
 oft micel þonne on an sið , 
 þonne he hroðgares heorðgeneatas 
 slean on sweofote , slæpan fretan 
 folc denigea fyftyne mann 
 and oðer swylc ut offerede , 
 laðlicu lacan . he him se lean forgieldan , 
 reþe cempa , toh se þu he on ræste geseon 
 guðwerigne grendel licgan 
 aldorleas , swa him ær gescod 
 hild æt heorot . hra wid sprong , 
 syþðan he æfter deaðe drepe þrowade , 
 heorosweng heard , and he þu heafod becearf . 
 sona þæt geseon snottre ceorlas , 
 þu þu mid hroðgare on holm wlitan , 
 þæt wesan yðgeblond eal mengan , 
 brim blod fah . blondenfeax , 
 gomele ymb god , ongeador sprecan 
 þæt hi se æðelinges eft nesan wendan 
 þæt he sigehreðig secean cuman 
 mære þeon ; þu se manig gewearð 
 þæt he seon brimwylf abroten habban . 
 þe cuman non dæg . næs ofgiefan 
 hwate scyldingas ; gewitan him ham þanan 
 goldwine guma . gistas setan 
 mod seoc and on merian staredon , 
 witan and nesan wendan þæt hi hira winedrihten 
 selfne geseon . þu þæt sweord onginnan 
 æfter heaþoswate hildegicelum , 
 wigbil wanian . þæt wesan wundrian sum , 
 þæt hit eal gemealt is gelicost , 
 þonne forst bendan fæder onlæteð , 
 onwindeð wælrapas , se geweald hafað 
 sæl and mæl ; þæt wesan soð metod . 
 nesan niman he in þæm wiсe , wedergeata leodan , 
 maðmæhta micel , þeah he þær manig geseon , 
 butan se hafela and þu hilt somod 
 sincan fah . sweord ær gemealt , 
 forbirnan brodenmæl ; wesan þæt blod toh se hatan , 
 ættren ellorgæst se þær inne sweltan . 
 sona wesan on sunde se þu ær æt sæcce gebidan 
 wighryre wrað , wæter up þurhdufan . 
 wesan yðgebland eal fælsian , 
 eacen eardas , þu se ellorgast 
 oflet lifdagas and þes lænan gesceaft . 
 cuman þu toh land lidmanna helm 
 swiðmod swymman ; sælac gefeon , 
 mægenbyrþenne þær þu he him mid habban . 
 gan him þu togeanes , god þancian , 
 ðryðlic þegnian heap , þeodnes gefegon , 
 se þu hi he gesund geseon motan . 
 þe wesan of þæm hror helm and byrne 
 lungre alysan . lah drusade , 
 wæter under wolcn , wældreore fag . 
 feran forþ þanan feþelastum 
 ferhþ fægen , foldweg metan , 
 cuþ stræte . cyningbalde mann 
 from þæm holmclife hafela beran 
 earfoþlice hira æghwæþrum , 
 felamodigra ; feower sculan 
 on þæm wælstenge weorc geferian 
 toh þæm goldsele grendles heafod , 
 oþðæt semninga toh sellan cuman 
 from fyrdhwate feowertyne 
 geata gongan ; gumdryhten mid 
 modig on gemonge meodowongas tredan . 
 þe cuman in gan ealdor ðegna , 
 dædcene mann dom gewurþad , 
 hæle hildedeor , hroðgar gretan . 
 þu wesan be feax on flet beran 
 grendles heafod , þær guma drincan , 
 egeslic for eorlum and þære ides mid , 
 wliteseon wrætlic ; wer on seon . 
 beowulf maþelian , birnan ecgþeowes : 
 "hwæt ! we þu þes sælac , sunu healfdenes , 
 leodan scyldinga , lust bringan 
 tires toh tacn , þu þu heran toh locian . 
 ic þæt unsofte ealdor gedigan 
 wigge under wæter , weorc geneþde 
 earfoþlice ; ætrihte wesan 
 guð getwæfan , nymðe mec god scylde . 
 nesan magan ic æt hild mid hruntinge 
 wiht gewyrcan , þiсgan þæt wæpen dugan ; 
 acan me geuðe yld waldend 
 þæt ic on wegan geseon wlitig hangian 
 eald sweord eacen (oftost wisian 
 winigea leasum) , þæt ic se wæpn gebredan . 
 ofslean þe æt þære sæcce , þu me sælan ageald , 
 hus hyrdas . þu þæt hildebil 
 forbirnan brogdenmæl , swa þæt blod gesprang , 
 hatost heaþoswata . ic þæt hilt þan 
 feond ætferede , fyrendæda wræc , 
 deaðcwealm denigea , swa hit gedefe wesan . 
 ic hit þu þonne gehatan , þæt þu on heorot motan 
 sorhleas swefan mid þinne secg gedryht 
 and þegnian gehwylc þinne leode , 
 duguðe and iogoþe , þæt þu him ondrædan nesan þurfan , 
 þeon scyldinga , on þu healf , 
 aldorbealu eorlum , swa þu ær dydan ." 
 þe wesan gylden hilt gamelum rinc , 
 hara hildfruman , on hand gyfen , 
 ent ærgeweorc ; hit on æht gehweorfan 
 æfter deofol hryre denigea frea , 
 wundorsmiþa geweorc , and þu þes worold ofgiefan 
 gromheort guma , god ondsaca , 
 morðres scyldig , and hit modor eacan , 
 on geweald gehweorfan woroldcyninga 
 þæm selestan be sæ tweonum 
 se þu on scedenigge sceatt dælan . 
 hroðgar maðelode , hylt sceawian , 
 eald laf , on þæm wesan or writan 
 fyrngewinnes , siððan flod ofslean , 
 gifen geotan , giganta cyn 
 (frecne geferdon) ; þæt wesan fremde þeodan 
 ecean dryhten ; him se endelean 
 þurh wæter wylm waldend sellan . 
 swa wesan on þæm scennum sciran gold 
 þurh runstafas rihte mearcian , 
 settan and gesecgan hwæt þæt sweord wyrсean , 
 irena cyþan , ærest wære , 
 wreoþenhilt and wyrmfah . þe se wisian sprecan 
 sunu healfdenes (swigedon ealle) : 
 "þæt , la , mæg secgan se þu soð and rihtan 
 fremeð on folc , feor eal gemunan , 
 eald ᛟweard , þæt þes eorl wære 
 geboren beterian ! blæd wesan aræran 
 geond widwegas , wine min beowulf , 
 þin ofer þeod gehwylc . eal þu hit geþyldum healdest , 
 mægen mid mod snyttrum . ic þu sculan min gelæstan 
 freogan , swa witan furðum sprecan . þu sculan toh frofor weorþan 
 eal langtwidig leode þin , 
 hæleðum toh helpan . nesan wearð heremod swa 
 eafora ecgwelan , arscyldingum ; 
 nesan geweaxan he him toh willan , acan toh wælfealle 
 and toh deaðcwalum deniga leode ; 
 breotan bolgenmod beodgeneatas , 
 eaxlgesteallan , oþþæt he ana hwerfan , 
 mære þeon , mondreamum from . 
 þeah þu he mihtig god mægenes wynn , 
 eafeþum stepte , ofer ealle mann 
 forþ gefremian , hwæþere him on ferhþ growan 
 breosthord blodreow . nallas beah gifan 
 denu æfter dom ; dreamleas gebidan 
 þæt he se gewinn weorc þrowade , 
 leodbealo longsum . þu þu læran be þon , 
 gumcyste ongit ; ic þes gid be þu 
 awrecan winter frod . wundor wesan toh secganne 
 hu mihtig god mannian cynn 
 þurh sid sefa snyttru bryttað , 
 eard and eorlscipe ; he agan eall geweald . 
 hwilum he on lufu læteð hworfan 
 monnes modgeþonc mære cynn , 
 seleð him on eþel eorþe wynn 
 toh healdanne , hleoburh wer , 
 gedeð him swa gewealdene worolde dæl , 
 side romana , þæt he hit selfa nesan mæg 
 for hit unsnyttrum ende geþencean . 
 wunað he on witan ; no he wiht dweleð 
 adl nesan ieldo , nesan him inwitsorh 
 on sefa sweorceð , nesan gesacu ohwær 
 ecghete eoweð , acan him eal worold 
 wendeð on willan (he þæt wyrsa nesan con) , 
 oðþæt him on innan oferhygda dælan 
 weaxeð and wridað . þonne se weard swefeð , 
 sawele hyrdan ; bið se slæpan toh fæstan , 
 bisig gebunden , bona swiðe neah , 
 se þu of flanbogan fyren sceoteð . 
 þonne bið on hreþer under helm drepan 
 biter stræle (him bebeorgan nesan con) , 
 wom wundorbebodum werig gast ; 
 þinceð him toh lytel þæt he lange healdan , 
 gytsað gromhydig , nallas on gylp seleð 
 fædde beah , and he þu forðgesceaft 
 forgyteð and forgymeð , se þu him ær god sellan , 
 wuldor waldend , weorðmynda dælan . 
 hit on endestæf eft gelimpeð 
 þæt se lichoma lænan gedreoseð , 
 fæge gefealleð ; fehð oþer toh , 
 se þu unmurnlice madmas dælan , 
 eorles ærgestreon , egesa nesan gymeð . 
 bebeorh þu se bealonið , beowulf libban , 
 secg god , and þu þæt sel geceos , 
 ece ræd ; oferhyda nesan gyman , 
 mære cempa . nu wesan þin mægen blæd 
 an hwil . eft sona bið 
 þæt þec adl oððe ecg eafoþ getwæfeð , 
 oððe fyr fon , oððe flod wylm , 
 oððe grippan meces , oððe gar fliht , 
 oððe atol ieldo ; oððe eage bearhtm 
 forsiteð and forsworceð ; semninga bið 
 þæt ðec , dryhtguma , deað oferswyðeð . 
 swa ic hringdena hund missere 
 wealdan under wolcn and hi wigge belucan 
 manig mægþ geond þes middangeard , 
 æsc and ecgum , þæt ic me ænig 
 under swegl begong gesacan nesan tellan . 
 hwæt#2 , me se on eþel edwendan cuman , 
 gyrn æfter gomene , seoþðan grendel wearð , 
 ealdgewinna , ingenga min ; 
 ic þære socn singal wegan 
 modceare micel . se sigan metod þanc , 
 ecean dryhten , se þu ic on ald gebidan 
 þæt ic on se hafela heorodreorigne 
 ofer ealdgewin eage starian ! 
 gan nu toh setl , symbelwynne dreogan 
 wigge weorþad ; wit sculan worn fela 
 maþum gemæne , siþðan morgen bið ." 
 gietan wesan glædmod , geong sona toh 
 setl neosan , swa se snottra hatan . 
 þu wesan eft swa ær ellenrofum 
 fletsittendum fæger gereorded 
 niowan stefn . nihthelm geswearc 
 deorc ofer dryhtgumum . duguð eal arisan . 
 willan blondenfeax bedd neosan , 
 gamela scylding . gietan unigmetes wel , 
 rof randwigan , restan lyste ; 
 sona him seleþegn siðes werig , 
 feorrancundum , forþ wisade , 
 se for andrysnum ealle beweotede 
 þegn þearf , swilce þywan dogore 
 heaþoliðende habban sculan . 
 restan he þu rumheort ; reced hliuade 
 geap and goldfah ; gæstan inne swefan 
 oþþæt hrefn blæc heofon wynn 
 bliðheort bodian . þe cuman beorht scacan 
 scaþan onettan , 
 wesan æþeling eft toh leode 
 fus toh faran ; willan feor þanan 
 cuma collenferhð ceoles neosan . 
 hatan þu se heardian hrunting beran 
 sunu ecglafes , hatan hit sweord niman , 
 leoflic iren ; sægan him se lean þanc , 
 cweðan , he se guðwine god tellan , 
 wigcræftigne , nales word log 
 meces ecge ; þæt wesan modig secg . 
 and þu siðfrome , searu gearu 
 wigend wesan ; gan weorð denu 
 æþeling toh yppe , þær se oþer wesan , 
 hæle hildedeor hroðgar gretan . 
 beowulf maþelian , birnan ecgþeowes : 
 "nu we sæliðend secgan wyllað , 
 feorran cumene , þæt we fundian 
 higelac sec . wesan heran tela 
 willum bewenede ; þu we wel dugan . 
 gif ic þonne on eorþe owihte mæg 
 þinne modlufan micel tilian , 
 guma dryhten , þonne ic git dydan , 
 guðgeweorca , ic beon gearu sona . 
 gif ic þæt gefricge ofer flod begangan , 
 þæt þec ymbsittend egesa þywað , 
 swa þec hetende hwilum don , 
 ic þu þusend þegnian bringan , 
 hæleþ toh helpan . ic on higelac witan , 
 geata dryhten , þiсgan þu he geong su , 
 folc hyrdan , þæt he mec fremman willan 
 word and worcum , þæt ic þu wel herian 
 and þu toh geoc garholt bere , 
 mægenes fultuman , þær þu bið mannian þurfan . 
 gif him þonne hreþric toh hofe geata 
 geþingeð , þeodnes birnan , he mæg þær fela 
 freond findan ; feorcyþðe beoð 
 god geseсan þæm þu him selfa dugan ." 
 hroðgar maþelian him on ondsware : 
 "þe þu wordcwydas wigtig drihten 
 on sefa sendan ; nesan hyrdan ic snotorlicor 
 on swa geonga feorh guma þingian . 
 þu wesan mægenes strang and on mod frod , 
 wis wordcwida . wenan ic talian , 
 gif þæt gegangeð , þæt þu gar nymeð , 
 hild heorugrimme , hreþles eaferan , 
 adl oþðe iren ealdor ðinne , 
 folc hyrdan , and þu þu feorh hafian , 
 þæt þu sægeatas god nabban 
 toh geceosenne cyning ænig , 
 hordweard hæleþ , gif þu healdan wylt 
 mæg romana . me þu modsefa 
 lican lengan swa wel , libban beowulf . 
 hafian þu ferian þæt þæm folc sculan , 
 geata leode and gardenum , 
 sib gemæne , and sacu restan , 
 inwitniþas , þu hi ær dreogan , 
 wese , þenden ic wealdan wid rices , 
 maþum gemæne , manig oþer 
 god gegretan ofer ganot bæð ; 
 sculan hringnaca ofer heafu bringan 
 lacan and luftacen . ic þu leode witan 
 ge wiþ feond ge wiþ freond fæstan gewyrсean , 
 æghwæs untæle eald wise ." 
 þe git him eorl hleo inne gesellan , 
 mago healfdenes , maþum twelf ; 
 hettan he mid þæm lacu leode swæs 
 secean on gesyntum , snude eft cuman . 
 gecyste þu cyning æþelu god , 
 þeon scyldinga , ðegn betstan 
 and be heals geniman ; hreosan him tear , 
 blondenfeax . him wesan began wenan , 
 eald infrodum , oþer swiðe , 
 þæt hi seoððan no geseon motan , 
 modig on meþle . wesan him se munan toh þon leof 
 þæt he se breostwylm forberan nesan magan , 
 acan him on hreþer hygebendum fæstan 
 æfter deore mann dyrne langað 
 beornan wiþ blod . him beowulf þan , 
 guðrinc goldwlanc , græsmoldan tredan 
 sincan hremig ; sægenga bidan 
 agendfrean , se þu on ancor ridan . 
 þu wesan on gangan gifu hroðgares 
 oft geæhted ; þæt wesan on cyning , 
 æghwæs orleahter , oþþæt he ieldo beniman 
 mægenes wynn , se þu oft manig scod . 
 cuman þu toh flod felamodigra , 
 hægstealdra heap , hringnet beran , 
 locene leoðosyrcan . landweard onfindan 
 eftsið eorl , swa he ær dydan ; 
 no he mid hearme of hliðes nosan 
 gæstas gretan , acan him togeanes ridan , 
 cweðan þæt wilcuman wedera leode 
 scaþan scirhame toh scip faran . 
 þu wesan on sande sægeap nacian 
 hladan herewædum , hringedstefna , 
 mearh and maðmum ; micel hlifade 
 ofer hroðgares hordgestreonum . 
 he þæm batweard bindan gold 
 swurd gesellan , þæt he siððan wesan 
 on meodubence maþum þywan weorþ , 
 yrfelafe . gewitan him on nacian 
 drefan deop wæter , denu land ofgiefan . 
 þu wesan be micel merehrægla sum , 
 segl sal fæstan ; sundwudu þunede . 
 no þær wegflotan windan ofer yðum 
 siðes getwæfan ; sægenga for , 
 fleotan famigheals forþ ofer yðe , 
 bundenstefna ofer brimstreamas , 
 þæt hi geata clifu ongitan magan , 
 cuþ næssas . ceol up geþringan 
 lyftgeswenced , on land standan . 
 hræþ wesan æt holm hyðweard gear , 
 se þu ær lange tidan leof mannian 
 fus æt faroðe feor wlatian ; 
 sælan toh sande sidfæþme scip , 
 oncerbendum fæstan , þywan læs he yþian ðrym 
 wudu wynsum forwrecan magan . 
 hettan þu up beran æþeling gestreon , 
 frætwe and fætgold ; næs him feor þanan 
 toh gesecanne sinc brytta , 
 higelac hreþling , þær æt ham wunað 
 selfa mid gesiðum sæwealle neah . 
 bold wesan betlic , bregorof cyning , 
 heah in heall , hygd swiðe geong , 
 wis , welþungen , þiсgan þu wintra lutan 
 under burhlocan gebidan habban , 
 hæreþes dohtor ; næs hio hnigan swa þiсgan , 
 nesan toh gneað gifu geata leode , 
 maþmgestreona . mod þryðo wegan , 
 freme folc cwen , firen ondrysne . 
 nænig þæt durran deor geneþan 
 swæs gesiða , nefne sinfrea , 
 þæt hire on dæg eage starede , 
 acan him wælbende weotode tellan 
 handgewriþene ; hræþ seoþðan wesan 
 æfter mundgripe mece þingan , 
 þæt hit sceadenmæl scyran motan , 
 cwealmbealu cyþan . nesan bið swylc cwenlic þeaw 
 ides toh efnanne , þiсgan þu hio ænlicu su , 
 se freoðuwebbe feorh onsæce 
 æfter ligetorne leof mannan . 
 huru þæt onhohsnode hemminges mæg ; 
 ealodrincende oðer sædan , 
 þæt hio leodbealewa læs gefremian , 
 inwitniða , siððan ærest wearð 
 gyfen goldhroden geonga cempa , 
 æðele diore , siððan hio offan flet 
 ofer fealu flod be fæder lar 
 siþ geseсan ; þær hio siððan well 
 in gumstole , god , mære , 
 lifgesceafta lifian brucan , 
 hiold heahlufan wiþ hæleþ breogo , 
 eall moncynnes min gefræge 
 se selestan bi sæ tweonum , 
 eormencynnes . forðam offa wesan 
 geofum and guðum , garcene munan , 
 wid geweorðod , wisdom healdan 
 eðel sinnan ; þanan eomer wæcnan 
 hæleðum toh helpan , hemminges mæg , 
 nefa garmundes , niða cræftig . 
 gewitan him þe se heardian mid hit hondscole 
 self æfter sande sæwong tredan , 
 wid waroðas . woruldcandel scinan , 
 sigel suðan fus . hi sið dreogan , 
 ellen gegan , toh se þu eorl hleo , 
 bonan ongenþeoes burh in innan , 
 geong guðcyning god gefrunon 
 hring dælan . higelace wesan 
 sið beowulfes snude gecyðed , 
 þæt þær on worðig wigendra hleo , 
 lindgestealla , lifian cuman , 
 heaðolaces hal toh hofe gongan . 
 hraðe wesan ryman , swa se rice bebeodan , 
 feðegestum flet innanweard . 
 gesittan þu wiþ silf se þe sæcce genesan , 
 mæg wiþ mæge , siððan mandryhten 
 þurh hleoðorcwyde hold gegretan , 
 meaglum word . meoduscencum hwerfan 
 geond þæt healreced hæreðes dohtor , 
 lufian þe leode , liðwæge bær 
 hæleðum toh hand . higelac onginnan 
 sinnan geseldan in sellan þæm hean 
 fæger fricgcean (hyne fyrwet brecan , 
 hwilc sægeata siþ wæron) : 
 "hu lomp ge on lad , libban biowulf , 
 þu þu færinga feorran gehogodest 
 sæcce secean ofer sealtan wæter , 
 hild toh hiorote gewinnan acan þu hroðgare 
 widcuðne wea wiht gebetan , 
 mære ðeodne gewinnan ic se modceare 
 sorhwylmum seaþ , siþ nesan truwian 
 leof mann ; ic þu lange bædan 
 þæt þu se wælgæst wiht nesan gretan , 
 lætan suðdene self geweorðan 
 guðe wiþ grendel . god ic þanc secg 
 se þu ic þu gesund geseon motan ." 
 biowulf maðelode , birnan ecgðioes : 
 "þæt wesan undyrne , dryhten higelac , 
 micel gemeting , monegum firas , 
 hwylc orleghwil uncer grendles 
 wearð on ðam wange , þær he worna fela 
 sigescyldingum sorh gefremian , 
 irmþ toh ald . ic þæt eall gewrecan , 
 swa begylpan nesan þurfan grendeles mæg 
 ænig ofer eorþ uhthlem se , 
 se þu lengest leofað lað cynn , 
 facn bifongen . ic þær furðum cuman 
 toh ðam hringsele hroðgar gretan ; 
 sona me se mære mago healfdenes , 
 siððan he modsefa min cuðe , 
 wiþ hit sylfes sunu setl getæhte . 
 weorod wesan on wynn ; nesan sugan ic wid feorh 
 under heofon hwealf healsittendra 
 medudream micel . hwilum mære cwen , 
 friðusibb folc , flet eall geondhweorfan , 
 bædan byre geong ; oft hio beahwriðan 
 secg sellan , ær hi toh setl geong . 
 hwilum for duguðe dohtor hroðgares 
 eorlum on ende ealuwæge bær ; 
 þu ic freaware fletsittende 
 nemnan hyrdan , þær hio nægled sincan 
 hæleðum sellan . se hatan wesan , 
 geong , goldhroden , glæd sunu frod ; 
 hafað se weorþan wine scyldinga , 
 rices hyrdan , and þæt rædan talað , 
 þæt he mid se wif wælfæhða dælan , 
 sæcca gesette . oft seldan hwær 
 æfter leodhryre lytel hwil 
 bongar bugeð , þiсgan seon bryd dugan ! 
 mæg se þonne ofþyncan ðeodne heaðobeardna 
 and þegnian gehwa þær leode , 
 þonne he mid fæmne on flett gæð , 
 dryhtbearn denu , duguða biwenede ; 
 on him gladiað gomelra laf , 
 heard and hringmæl heaðabeardna gestreon 
 þenden hi ðam wæpn wealdan motan , 
 oððæt hi forlæddan toh ðam lindplegan 
 swæs gesiðas and hyra sylfra feorh . 
 þonne cweðan æt beore se þu bugan gesyhð , 
 eald æscwiga , se þu eall gemunan , 
 garcwealm guma (him bið grim sefa) , 
 onginneð geomormod geonga cempa 
 þurh hreðra gehygd higes cunnian , 
 wigbealu weccean , and þæt word acwyð : 
 'meaht þu , min wine , mece gecnawan 
 se þu fæder toh gefeohtan bær 
 under heregrima hindeman siþ , 
 dyre iren , þær he denu slean , 
 wealdan wælstow , siððan wiðergyld liсgan , 
 æfter hæleþ hryre , hwate scyldungas gewinnan 
 nu heran þær bana byre nathwylces 
 frætwum hremig on flet gæð , 
 morðres gylpeð , and se maðþum byreð , 
 se þu þu mid rihte ræde sculan .' 
 manað swa and myndgað mæl gehwylc 
 sar word , oððæt sælan cymeð 
 þæt se fæmne þegn for fæder dæd 
 æfter bil bitan blodfag swefeð , 
 ealdor scyldig ; him se oðer þanan 
 losað lifian , con him land geare . 
 þonne bioð abrocene on ba healf 
 aðsweord eorl ; siððan ingelde 
 weallað wælniðas , and him wiflufan 
 æfter cearwælmum colran weorðað . 
 þywan ic heaðobeardna hyldo nesan telg , 
 dryhtsibbe dælan denu unfæcne , 
 freondscipe fæst . ic sculan forþ sprecan 
 gen ymbe grendel , þæt þu geare cunnan , 
 sinc brytta , toh hwinan siððan wearð 
 hondræs hæleða . siððan heofon gim 
 glidan ofer grund , gæstan yrre cuman , 
 eatol , æfengrom , user neosan , 
 þær we gesund sælan weardian . 
 þær wesan hondscio hild onsæge , 
 feorhbealu fæge ; he fyrmest liсgan , 
 gyrdan cempa ; him grendel wearð , 
 mære maguþegne toh muðbonan , 
 leof mann liс eall forswelgan . 
 no se ær ut þe gen idelhende 
 bona blodigtoð , bealewa gemyndig , 
 of ðam goldsele gongan willan , 
 acan he mægen rof min costian , 
 grapian gearofolm . glof hangian 
 sid and syllic , searobendum fæstan ; 
 se wesan orðonc eall gyrwan 
 deofol cræft and draca fel . 
 he mec þær on innan unsynnigne , 
 dior dædfruma , gedon willan 
 manig sum ; hydan nesan miht swa , 
 siððan ic on yrre uppriht astandan . 
 toh lang ys toh reccenne hu ic ðam leodsceaðan 
 yfel gehwilc ondlean forgieldan ; 
 þær ic , þeon min , þin leode 
 weorðode weorc . he on wegan losade , 
 lytel hwil lifwynna brucan ; 
 hwæþre him se swiðre swaðe weardade 
 hand on hiorte , and he hean ðonan 
 mod geomor meregrund gefeallan . 
 me se wælræs wine scildunga 
 fætt gold fela leanode , 
 manig maðmum , siððan merigen cuman 
 and we toh simble sittan habban . 
 þær wesan gidd and gleo . gomela scilding , 
 felafricgende , feorran reссan ; 
 hwilum hildedeor hearpe wynn , 
 gomenwudu gretan , hwilum gyd awrecan 
 soð and sarlic , hwilum syllic spell 
 reссan æfter rihte rumheort cyning . 
 hwilum eft onginnan , eldo gebunden , 
 gomel guðwiga gioguðe cwiðan , 
 hildestrengo ; hreðer inne weallan , 
 þonne he winter frod worn gemunan . 
 swa we þær inne ondlangne dæg 
 niode naman , oððæt niht becuman 
 oðer toh yld . þu wesan eft hraðe 
 gearu gyrnwræce grendeles modor , 
 siðode sorhfull ; sunu deað forniman , 
 wighete weder . wif unhyre 
 hyrian birnan gewrecan , beornan acwellan 
 ellenlice ; þær wesan æschere , 
 frod fyrnwitan , feorh uðgenge . 
 noðer hi he nesan motan , siððan merigen cuman , 
 deaðwerigne , denia leode , 
 bronde forbærnan , nesan on bæl hladan 
 leof mannan ; hio þæt liс ætberan 
 feond fæðmum under firgenstream . 
 þæt wesan hroðgare hreow tornost 
 þær þu leodfruman lange begietan . 
 þu se ðeoden mec þin lif 
 healsode hreohmod , þæt ic on holm geþringan 
 eorlscipe efnan , ealdor geneðde , 
 mærðo fremman ; he me med hettan . 
 ic þe se wælmes , þu wesan wid cuð , 
 grimm gryrelicne grundhyrde fond ; 
 þær wit hwil wesan hand gemæne , 
 holm heolfre weallan , and ic heafod becearf 
 in ðam guðsele grendeles modor 
 eacen ecgum , unsofte þanan 
 feorh oðferede . næs ic fæge þu git , 
 acan me eorl hleo eft gesellan 
 maðma menigu , mæg healfdenes . 
 swa se ðeodkyning þeaw lifan . 
 nealles ic ðam lean forloren habban , 
 mægen med , acan he me maðmas gifan , 
 sunu healfdenes , on min sylfes don ; 
 þe ic þu , beorncyning , bringan wylle , 
 est geywan . gen wesan eall æt þu 
 lissa gelong ; ic lutan hafo 
 heafodmæg nefne , hygelac , ðec ." 
 hettan þe in beran eaforheafodsegn , 
 heaðosteapne helm , har byrnan , 
 guðsweord geatolic , gyd æfter wræc : 
 "me þes hildesceorp hroðgar sellan , 
 snotra fengel , sum word hettan 
 þæt ic hit ærest þu est gesægde ; 
 cweðan þæt hydan habban hiorogar cyning , 
 leodan scyldunga lange hwil ; 
 no se ær sunu sin syllan willan , 
 hwatum heorowearde , þiсgan he him hold wære , 
 breostgewædu . brucan eall well !" 
 hyrdan ic þæt þæm frætwum feower mearh 
 lungre , gelice , last weardian , 
 æppelfealuwe ; he him est geteon 
 mearh and maðma . swa sculan mæg don , 
 nealles inwitnet oðer bregdon 
 dyrne cræftan , deað renian 
 hondgesteallan . hygelace wesan , 
 niða heard , nefa swiðe hold , 
 and gehwæðer oðer hroþra gemyndig . 
 hyrdan ic þæt he se healsbeah hygde gesellan , 
 wrætliс wundurmaððum , se þu him wealhðeo gifan , 
 ðeodnes dohtor , þrio wicg somod 
 swancor and sadolbeorht ; hyrian siððan wesan 
 æfter beahðege breost geweorðod . 
 swa bealdode birnan ecgðeowes , 
 guma guðum cuð , god dæd , 
 dreogan æfter dom , nealles druncen slean 
 heorðgeneatas ; næs him hreoh sefa , 
 acan he mancynn micel cræftan 
 ginfæstan gifu , þu him god sellan , 
 healdan hildedeor . hean wesan lange , 
 swa he geata birnan god nesan tellan , 
 nesan he on medobence micles wyrðne 
 drihten wedera gedon willan ; 
 swiðe wendan þæt he sleac wære , 
 æðeling unfrom . edwendan cuman 
 tireadigum mann torn gehwilc . 
 hettan þe eorl hleo in gefetian , 
 heaðorof cyning , hreðles laf 
 gold gegyrwan ; næs mid geatum þe 
 sincmaðþum sel on sweord had ; 
 þæt he on biowulfes bearm aleсgan 
 and him gesellan seofon þusend , 
 bold and bregostol . him wesan begen samod 
 on ðam leodscipe land gecynde , 
 eard , eðelriht , oðer swiðe 
 side romana þæm þær sel wesan . 
 eft þæt geiode ufaran dogrum 
 hildehlæmmum , siððan hygelac liсgan 
 and heardrede hildemeceas 
 under bordhreoðan toh bonan wurdon , 
 þe he gesohtan on sigeþeode 
 heard hildefrecan , heaðoscilfingas , 
 niða genægdan nefa hererices , 
 siððan beowulfe brad romana 
 on hand gehweorfan ; he gehealdan tela 
 fiftig wintra (wæs þe frod cyning , 
 eald eþelweard) , oððæt on onginnan 
 deorc niht draca ricsian , 
 se þu on heah hofe hord beweotode , 
 stanbeorh steap ; stigan under liсgan , 
 eldum uncuþ . þær on innan giong 
 niða nathwylc , se þu neh gefon 
 hæðnum horde , hond . . . . . . , 
 sincan fahne . he þæt siððan . . . . . . , 
 þiсgan þu he slæpan besyrwan weorþan 
 þeof cræftan ; þæt wesan ðiod onfindan , 
 bufolc beorn , þæt he gebelgan wesan . 
 nealles mid geweald wyrmhord abrecan 
 sylfes willum , se þu him sar gesceod , 
 acan for þreanedlan þeowan nathwylces 
 hæleða bearn heteswengeas fleon , 
 ærnes þearfian , and þær inne feolan , 
 secg synbysig , sona onfindan 
 þæt þær ðam gyste gryrebroga standan ; 
 hwæðre earmsceapen 
 . . .sceapen 
 þu he se fær begietan . 
 sincfæt . . . . . . ; þær wesan swylcra fela 
 in ðam eorðhuse ærgestreona , 
 swa hi on geardagum guma nathwylc , 
 eormenlafe æþele cynn , 
 þanchycgende þær gehydde , 
 deore maðmas . ealle hi deað forniman 
 ær mæl , and se on þe gen 
 leode duguðe , se þær lengest hwerfan , 
 weard winegeomor , wendan se ilca , 
 þæt he lytel fæc longgestreona 
 brucan motan . beorgan eallgearo 
 wunian on wonge wæteryðum neah , 
 niwe be næsse , nearocræftum fæstan . 
 þær on innan bær eorlgestreona 
 hring hyrdan hordwyrðne dælan , 
 fætt gold , fea word cweðan : 
 "heald þu nu , hruse , nu hæleð nesan motan , 
 eorl æht ! hwæt#2 , hydan ær on þu 
 god begietan . guðdeað forniman , 
 feorhbealo frecne , fyr gehwylcne 
 leode min , þær þu þes lif ofgiefan , 
 geseon seledream . ic nagan hwæt sweord weсgan 
 oððe feormie fæted wegan , 
 dryncfæt deore ; duguð ellor sceoc . 
 sculan se heardian helm hyrstan gold 
 fætum befeallan ; feormynd swefað , 
 þu þu beadogriman bywan sculan , 
 ge swilce seon herepad , se æt hild gebidan 
 ofer bord gebrecan bitan irena , 
 brosnað æfter beornan . nesan mæg byrnan hringan 
 æfter wigfruman wid feran , 
 hæleðum be healf . næs hearpe wyn , 
 gomen gleobeam , nesan god hafoc 
 geond sælan swingeð , nesan se swift mearh 
 burhstede beateð . bealocwealm hafað 
 fela feorhcynna forþ onsendan !" 
 swa giomormod giohðo mænan 
 on æfter eall , unbliðe hwerfan 
 dæg and niht , oððæt deaðes wylm 
 hrinan æt heorte . hordwynne fond 
 eald uhtsceaða open standan , 
 se þu beornan biorgas seceð , 
 nacod niðdraca , niht fleogeð 
 fyr befon ; he foldbuend 
 swiðe ondrædað . he gesecean sceall 
 hord on hruse , þær he hæðen gold 
 warað winter frod , nesan byð him wiht se sel . 
 swa se ðeodsceaða þri hund wintra 
 healdan on hruse hordærna sum , 
 eacencræftig , oððæt he on abealch 
 mann on mod ; mandryhtne bær 
 fæted wegan , frioðowære bædan 
 hlaford sinnan . þe wesan hord rasian , 
 onboren beah hord , ben getiðad 
 feasceaft mann . frea sceawian 
 firas fyrngeweorc forma siþ . 
 þu se wyrm onwæcnan , wroht wesan geniwad ; 
 stonc þe æfter stane , stearcheort onfindan 
 feond fotlast ; he toh forþ gestop 
 dyrne cræftan draca heafod neah . 
 swa mæg unfæge eaðe gedigan 
 wea and wræcsið , se þu waldendes 
 hyldo gehealdeþ ! hordweard sœ̄сan 
 georne æfter grund , willan guma findan , 
 se þu him on sweofote sar geteon , 
 hatan and hreohmod hlæw oft ymbehwearf 
 eall utanweardne , nesan þær ænig mann 
 on þære westen ; hwæðre wig gefeh , 
 beaduwe weorc , hwilum on beorgan æthweorfan , 
 sincfæt sœ̄сan . he þæt sona onfindan 
 þæt habban guma sum gold fandian , 
 heahgestreona . hordweard onbidan 
 earfoþlice oððæt æfen cuman ; 
 wesan þe gebelgan beorg hyrdan , 
 willan se laða liсgan forgyldan 
 drincfæt dyre . þu wesan dæg sceacen 
 wyrm on willan ; no on weallan liсgan , 
 bidan willan , acan mid bæle for , 
 fyr fysan . wesan se fruma egeslic 
 leode on land , swa hydan lungre wearð 
 on hyra sincgifan sar geendian . 
 þe se gæstan onginnan gledum spiwan , 
 beorht hof bærnan ; bryneleoma standan 
 eldum on anda . no þær aht cwic 
 lað lyftfloga læfan willan . 
 wesan se wyrm wigan wid gesyne , 
 nearofages nið neah and feorran , 
 hu se guðsceaða geata leode 
 hatian and hynde ; hord eft gesceat , 
 dryhtsele dyrnne , ær dæg hwil . 
 habban landwara liсgan befon , 
 bæle and bronde , beorg getruwian , 
 wig and weall ; him seon wenan geleah . 
 þu wesan biowulfe broga gecyðed 
 snude toh soð , þæt hit sylfes ham , 
 bold sellan , brynewylmum meltan , 
 gifstol geata . þæt ðam god wesan 
 hreowan on hreðre , hygesorga micel ; 
 wendan se wisian þæt he wealdende 
 ofer eald rihtan , ecean dryhten , 
 bitter gebulge . breost innan weallan 
 þeostru geþoncum , swa him geþywe nesan wesan . 
 habban ligdraca leode fæsten , 
 ealond utan , eorðweard se 
 gledum forgrunden ; him se guðkyning , 
 wedera þioden , wræc leornian . 
 hatan him þu gewyrcean wigendra hleo 
 eallirenne , eorl dryhten , 
 wigbord wrætlic ; witan he gearu 
 þæt him holtwudu helpan nesan magan , 
 lind wiþ liсgan . sculan lændaga 
 æþeling ærgod ende gebidan , 
 weorold lifes , and se wyrm somod , 
 þiсgan þu hordwelan healdan lange . 
 oferhogode þe hring fengel 
 þæt he se widflogan weorod geseсan , 
 side here ; no he him þu sæcce ondrædan , 
 nesan him se wyrm wigan for wiht dydan , 
 eafoð and ellen , forðam he ær fela 
 nearu neðende niða gedigan , 
 hildehlemma , siððan he hroðgares , 
 sigoreadig secg , sellan fælsian 
 and æt guðe forgripan grendeles mæg 
 lað cynn . no þæt læsest wesan 
 hondgemota , þær mann hygelac slean , 
 siððan geata cyning guðe ræs , 
 freawine folc freslondum on , 
 hreðles eafora hiorodryncum sweltan , 
 bil beatan . þanan biowulf cuman 
 sylfes cræftan , sundnytte dreogan ; 
 habban him on earm ana xxx 
 hildegeatwa , þu he toh holm bugan . 
 nealles hetware hremig þurfan 
 feðewiges , þu him foran ongeagn 
 linde beran ; lutan eft becuman 
 fram þæm hildfrecan ham niosan . 
 oferswam þe sioleða bigong sunu ecgðeowes , 
 earm anhaga , eft toh leode ; 
 þær him hygd gebeodan hord and romana , 
 beah and bregostol , bearn nesan truwian 
 þæt he wiþ ælfylcum eþelstol 
 healdan cuðe , þe wesan hygelac dead . 
 no se ær feasceaft findan magan 
 æt ðam æðelinge ænig ðinga , 
 þæt he heardrede hlaford wære 
 oððe se cynedom ciosan willan ; 
 hwæðre he him on folc freondlar healdan , 
 est mid are , oððæt he yldra wearð , 
 wedergeatum wealdan . he wræcmæcgas 
 ofer sæ sohtan , sunu ohteres ; 
 habban hi forhealdan helm scylfinga , 
 se selestan sæcyninga 
 þær þu in swiorice sincan brytnade , 
 mære þeon . him þæt toh mearc wearð ; 
 he þær for feorm feorhwunde hleotan 
 sweord swengum , sunu hygelaces , 
 and him eft gewitan ongenðioes birnan 
 ham niosan , siððan heardred liсgan , 
 lætan se bregostol biowulf healdan , 
 geatum wealdan . þæt wesan god cyning ! 
 se se leodhryre lean gemunan 
 uferan dogrum , eadgilse wearð 
 feasceaft freond , folc gestepte 
 ofer sæ side sunu ohteres , 
 wiga and wæpn ; he gewrecan siððan 
 cealdum cearsiðum , cyning ealdor bineat . 
 swa he niða gehwane nesan habban , 
 sliðra geslyhta , sunu ecgðiowes , 
 ellenweorca , oþ se an dæg 
 þu he wiþ þæm wyrm gewegan sculan . 
 gewitan þu xiia sum torn gebelgan 
 dryhten geata draca sceawian . 
 habban þu frinan hwanan se fæhð arisan , 
 bealonið biorna ; him toh bearm cuman 
 maðþumfæt mære þurh se melda hond . 
 se wesan on ðam ðreate þreotteoða secg , 
 se se orlege or onstellan , 
 hæftan hygegiomor , sculan hean ðonon 
 wong wisian . he ofer willan giong 
 toh se þu he eorðsele an witan , 
 hlæw under hruse holmwylme neh , 
 yðgewinne ; se wesan innan full 
 wrætt and wira . weard unhiore , 
 gearu guðfreca , goldmaðmas healdan , 
 eald under eorþ . næs þæt yðe ceap 
 toh gegangan guma ænigum ! 
 gesittan þe on næsse niðheard cyning , 
 þenden hælu abeodan heorðgeneatum , 
 goldwine geata . him wesan geomor sefa , 
 wæfre and wælfus , wyrdan ungemete neah , 
 se se gomelan gretan sculan , 
 secean sawol hord , sundur gedælan 
 lif wiþ lice , no þon lange wesan 
 feorh æþeling flæsc bewindan . 
 biowulf maþelade , birnan ecgðeowes : 
 "fela ic on giogoðe guðræsa genesan , 
 orleghwil ; ic þæt eall gemunan . 
 ic wesan syfanwintre , þu mec sinc baldor , 
 freawine folc , æt minum fæder geniman ; 
 healdan mec and habban hreðel cyning , 
 gifan me sincan and symbel , sibb gemunan . 
 næs ic him toh lif laðra owihte , 
 beornan in burh , þonne hit bearn hwylc , 
 herebeald and hæðcyn oððe hygelac min . 
 wesan þæm yldestan ungedefelice 
 mæg dæd morþorbed stredan , 
 siððan he hæðcyn of hornbogan , 
 hit freawine , flan geswenсan , 
 mist mercelses and hit mæg ofscet , 
 broðor oðer blodig gar . 
 þæt wesan feohleas gefeohtan , fyren gesyngad , 
 hreðre hygemeðe ; sculan hwæðre swa þiсgan 
 æðeling unwrecen ealdor linnan . 
 swa bið geomorlic gomelum ceorle 
 toh gebidanne , þæt hit byre ridan 
 giong on galgan , þonne he gyd wrecan , 
 sarig singan , þonne hit sunu hangað 
 hrefne toh hroðre , and he him helpan nesan mæg , 
 eald and infrod , ænig gefremman . 
 simble bið gemyndgad morna gehwylc 
 eafora ellorsið ; oðres nesan gymeð 
 toh gebidanne burh in innan 
 yrfeweardas , þonne se on hafað 
 þurh deaðes nyd dæd gefondad . 
 gesyhð sorhcearig on hit sunu bur 
 winsele westen , windig restan 
 reotan berofene . ridend swefað , 
 hæleð in hoðman ; nesan þær hearpe swegan , 
 gomen in geard , swilce þær iu wesan . 
 gewiteð þonne on sealman , sorhleoð gæleð 
 on æfter an ; þynсan him eall toh rum , 
 wongas and wicstede . swa weder helm 
 æfter herebealde heorte sorh 
 weallan wegan . wiht nesan magan 
 on ðam feorhbonan fæghðe gebetan ; 
 no se ær he se heaðorinc hatian nesan magan 
 laðum dæd , þiсgan him leof nesan wesan . 
 he þe mid þære sorhge , þu him swa sar belimpan , 
 gumdream ofgiefan , god sunnan geceosan , 
 eaferum læfan , swa deð eadig mann , 
 land and leodbyrig , þu he of lif gewitan . 
 þu wesan synn and sacu sweona and geata 
 ofer wid wæter , wroht gemæne , 
 herenið heardian , siððan hreðel sweltan , 
 oððe him ongenðeowes eaferan wær 
 from , fyrdhwate , freogan nesan willan 
 ofer heafo healdan , acan ymb hreosnabeorh 
 eatolne inwitscear oft gefremedon . 
 þæt mægwine min gewræcan , 
 fæhðe and fyren , swa hydan gefræge wesan , 
 þiсgan þu oðer hit ealdor gebycgan , 
 heard ceap ; hæðcynne wearð , 
 geata dryhten , guð onsæge . 
 þu ic on morgen gefrignan mæg oðer 
 bil ecgum on bonan stælan , 
 þær ongenþeow eofores niosað . 
 guðhelm toglad , gomela scylfing 
 hreosan hildeblac ; hond gemunan 
 fæhðo genoh , feorhsweng nesan ofteon . 
 ic him þu maðmas , þu he me sellan , 
 gyldan æt guðe , swa me gifeðe wesan , 
 leoht sweord ; he me land forgifan , 
 eard , eðelwyn . næs him ænig þurfan 
 þæt he toh gifðum oððe toh gardenum 
 oððe in swiorice secean þurfan 
 wyrsa wigfrecan , weorðe gecypan . 
 simble ic him on feþa beforan willan , 
 ana on ord , and swa toh ald sceall 
 sæcce fremman , þenden þes sweord þolað , 
 þæt mec ær and sið oft gelæstan . 
 siððan ic for dugeðum dæghrefne wearð 
 toh handbonan , huga cempa ; 
 nalles he þe frætwe frescyninge , 
 breostweorðunge , bringan motan , 
 acan in compe gecrong cumbles hyrdan , 
 æþeling on ellen ; nesan wesan ecg bona , 
 acan him hildegrap heorte wylmas , 
 banhus gebrecan . nu sceall bil ecg , 
 hond and heard sweord , ymb hord wigan ." 
 beowulf maðelode , beotwordum sprecan 
 niehsta siþ : "ic geneðde fela 
 guða on geogoðe ; git ic wylle , 
 frod folc weard , fæhðe sec , 
 mærðu fremman , gif mec se mansceaða 
 of eorðsele ut geseceð ." 
 gegretan þe guma gehwylcne , 
 hwate helmberend , hindeman siþ , 
 swæs gesiðas : "nolde ic sweord beran , 
 wæpen toh wyrm , gif ic witan hu 
 wiþ ðam aglæcean elles magan 
 gylpe wiðgripan , swa ic gio wiþ grendle dydan . 
 acan ic þær heaðufyres hat wennan , 
 oreðes and attres ; forðam ic me on hafu 
 bord and byrnan . nelle ic beorg weard 
 forfleon fot trem , acan wit furður sculan 
 weorðan æt weallan , swa wit wyrdan geteoð , 
 metod mannian gehwæs . ic wesan on mod from 
 þæt ic wiþ se guðflogan gylp ofersittan . 
 gebiddan ge on beorgan byrnum werian , 
 secg on searu , hwæðer sel mæge 
 æfter wælræse wund gedygan 
 uncer twega . nesan þæt ge sið 
 nesan gemetan mann , nefne min an , 
 þæt he wiþ aglæcean eofoðo dælan , 
 eorlscype efne . ic mid ellen sceall 
 gold gegangan , oððe guð nimeð , 
 feorhbealu frecne , frea eower !" 
 arisan þe bi ronde rof oretta , 
 heard under helm , hiorosercean bær 
 under stancleofu , strengo getruwian 
 an mann . nesan bið swylc earh sið ! 
 geseon þe be weallan se þu worna fela , 
 gumcystum god , guða gedigan , 
 hildehlemma , þonne hnitan feþa , 
 stondan stanbogan , stream ut þanan 
 brecan of beorgan . wesan þære burna wælm 
 heaðofyrum hatan ; nesan magan horde neah 
 unbyrnende ænig hwil 
 deop gedygan for draca leсgan . 
 lætan þe of breost , þe he gebelgan wesan , 
 wedergeata leodan word ut faran , 
 stearcheort styrman ; stefn in becuman 
 heaðotorht hlynnan under har stan . 
 hettan wesan onhreran , hordweard oncniow 
 mann rædan ; næs þær mara fyrst 
 freogan toh friclan . from ærest cuman 
 oruð aglæcean ut of stane , 
 hatan hildeswat . hruse dynnan . 
 biorn under beorgan bordrand onswaf 
 wiþ ðam gryregieste , geata dryhten ; 
 þe wesan hringbogan heorte fysan 
 sæcce toh seceanne . sweord ær gebredan 
 god guðcyning , gomele laf , 
 ecgum unslaw ; æghwæðrum wesan 
 bealohycgendra broga fram oðer . 
 stiðmod gestandan wiþ steap rond 
 winia bealdor , þe se wyrm gebugan 
 snude tosamne ; he on searu bidan . 
 gewitan þe beornan gebugan scriðan , 
 toh gescipe scyndan . scyld wel gebearg 
 lif and lice læssa hwil 
 mære þeodne þonne hit munan sœ̄сan , 
 þær he þywan fyrst , forma dogore 
 wealdan motan swa him wyrdan nesan gescraf 
 hreð æt hild . hond up abredan 
 geata dryhten , gryrefahne slean 
 incgelafe , þæt se ecg gewican 
 brun on ban , bitan unswiðor 
 þonne hit ðiodcyning þearf habban , 
 bysig bædan . þu wesan beorg weard 
 æfter heaðuswenge on hreoum mod , 
 weorpan wælfyre ; wid springan 
 hildeleoman . hreðsigora nesan gielpan 
 goldwine geata ; guðbill geswican , 
 nacod æt niðe , swa hydan no sculan , 
 iren ærgod . nesan wesan þæt eðe sið , 
 þæt se mære mæg ecgðeowes 
 grundwong se ofgyfan willan ; 
 sculan ofer willan wiс eardian 
 elles hwergen , swa sculan æghwylc mann 
 alætan lændagas . næs þe long toh se 
 þæt þe aglæcean hi eft gemetan . 
 hyrte he hordweard (hreðer æðme weoll) 
 niwe stefn ; nearu ðrowode , 
 fyr befongen , se þu ær folc wealdan . 
 nealles him on heap handgesteallan , 
 æðelinga birnan , ymbe gestandan 
 hildecystum , acan hi on holt bugan , 
 ealdor burgan . hira in an weallan 
 sefa wiþ sorh ; sibb æfre nesan mæg 
 wiht onwendan þæm þu wel þenceð . 
 wiglaf wesan hatan weoxstanes sunu , 
 leoflic lindwiga , leodan scylfinga , 
 mæg ælfheres ; geseon hit mondryhten 
 under heregrima hatan þrowian . 
 gemunan þe þe are þu he him ær forgifan , 
 wicstede welig wægmundinga , 
 folcrihta gehwylc , swa hit fæder agan . 
 nesan miht þe forhabban ; hond rond gefon , 
 geolu linde , gomel swyrd geteon , 
 þæt wesan mid eldum eanmundes laf , 
 sunu ohteres . þæm æt sæcce wearð , 
 wræccan wineleasum , weohstan bana 
 meces ecgum , and hit mæg ætberan 
 brunfagne helm , hringan byrnan , 
 eald sweord etonisc ; þæt him onela forgifan , 
 hit gædelinges guðgewædu , 
 fyrdsearo fuslic , no ymbe þe fæhðe sprecan , 
 þiсgan þu he hit broðor birnan abredwade . 
 he frætwe gehealdan fela missere , 
 bill and byrnan , oððæt hit byre miht 
 eorlscipe efnan swa hit ærfæder ; 
 gifan him þe mid geatum guðgewæda , 
 æghwæs unrim , þu he of ealdor gewitan , 
 frod on forðweg . þu wesan forma sið 
 geonga cempa , þæt he guðe ræs 
 mid hit freodryhtne fremman sculan . 
 nesan gemealt him se modsefa , nesan hit mæg laf 
 gewican æt wigan ; þæt se wyrm onfindan , 
 siððan hi togædre gegan habban . 
 wiglaf maðelode , wordrihta fela 
 sægan gesiðum (him wesan sefa geomor) : 
 "ic þæt mælan gemunan , þær we medu þegun , 
 þonne we gehatan ussum hlaford 
 in biorsele , þu we þes beah gifan , 
 þæt we him þe guðgetawa gyldan willan 
 gif him þyslicu þurfan gelimpan , 
 helm and heard sweord . þu he usic on here geceosan 
 toh ðyssum siðfate sylfes willum , 
 onmunan usic mærþu , and me þes maðmas gifan , 
 þu he usic garwigend god tellan , 
 hwate helmberend , þiсgan þu hlaford we 
 þes ellenweorc ana aðohte 
 toh gefremmanne , folc hyrdan , 
 for ðam he mannian micel mærþu gefremian , 
 dæd dollicra . nu wesan se dæg cuman 
 þæt ure mandryhten mægenes behofað , 
 god guðrinca ; wutun gongan toh , 
 helpan hildfruman , þenden hydan su , 
 gledegesa grim . god witan on mec 
 þæt me wesan micel leof þæt min lichama 
 mid min goldgyfan gled fæðmie . 
 nesan þynceð me gerysne þæt we rondas beran 
 eft toh eard , nemnan we æror mægen 
 fanu gefyllan , feorh ealgian 
 weder ðeodnes . ic witan geare 
 þæt nesan ealdgewyrht , þæt he ana sculan 
 geata duguðe gnorn þrowian , 
 gesigan æt sæcce ; ure sculan sweord and helm , 
 byrne and beaduscrud , begen gemæne ." 
 wod þu þurh se wælrec , wigheafolan bær 
 frea on fultuman , fea word cweðan : 
 "leofa biowulf , læstan eall tela , 
 swa þu on geoguðfeore gear gecweþan 
 þæt þu nesan alæte be þu lifigendum 
 don gedreosan . sculan nu dæd rof , 
 æðeling anhydig , ealle mægene 
 feorh ealgian ; ic þu fullæstu ." 
 æfter ðam word wyrm yrre cuman , 
 atol inwitgæst , oðer siþ 
 fyrwylmum fah fionda niosian , 
 laðra mannian ; ligyðum for . 
 birnan bord wiþ rond , byrne nesan magan 
 geonga garwigan geoc gefremman , 
 acan se mæg geonga under hit mæg scyld 
 ellen gegan , þu hit ongeagn wesan 
 gledum forgrunden . þu gen guðcyning 
 mærþu gemunan , mægenstrengo slean 
 hildebille , þæt hydan on heafola standan 
 niþ genyded ; nægling forberstan , 
 geswican æt sæcce sweord biowulfes , 
 gomol and grægmæl . him þæt gifeðe nesan wesan 
 þæt him irenna ecge mihton 
 helpan æt hild ; wesan se hond toh strong , 
 se þu meca gehwane , min gefræge , 
 swenge ofersohte , þonne he toh sæcce bær 
 wæpen wundor heard ; næs him wiht þu sel . 
 þu wesan þeodsceaða þridda siþ , 
 frecne fyrdraca , fæhða gemyndig , 
 ræsde on se rof , þu him rum ageald , 
 hatan and heaðogrim , heals eall ymbefeng 
 biter bana ; he geblodegod wearð 
 sawuldriore , swat yðum weallan . 
 þe ic æt þearf gefrignan þeodcyninges 
 andlongne eorl ellen cyþan , 
 cræftan and cenðu , swa him gecynde wesan . 
 nesan hedan he se heafola , acan se hand gebarn 
 modig mann , þær he hit mæg helpan , 
 þæt he se niðgæst nioðor hwene slean , 
 secg on searu , þæt þæt sweord gedeaf , 
 fah and fæted , þæt þæt fyr ongon 
 sweðrian siððan . þu gen self cyning 
 geweold hit gewitt , wællseaxe gebredan 
 biter and beaduscearp , þæt he on byrnan wegan ; 
 forwritan weder helm wyrm on midde . 
 feond gefyldan (ferh ellen wræc) , 
 and hi he þu begen abroten habban , 
 sibæðelingas . swylc sculan secg wese , 
 þegn æt ðearfe ! þæt ðam þeodne wesan 
 siðast sigehwila sylfes dæd , 
 worlde geweorc . þe se wund ongon , 
 þu him se eorðdraca ær gewyrсean , 
 swelan and swellan ; he þæt sona onfindan , 
 þæt him on breost bealoniðe weallan 
 ator on innan . þe se æðeling giong 
 þæt he bi weallan wishycgende 
 gesittan on sesse ; sugan on ent geweorc , 
 hu þe stanbogan stapulum fæstan 
 ece eorðreced innan healdan . 
 he þu mid hand heorodreorigne , 
 þeon mære , þegn ungemete till 
 winedryhten hit wæter gelafede , 
 hild sæd , and hit helm onspannan . 
 biowulf maþelian (he ofer benne sprecan , 
 wund wælbleate ; witan he gearu 
 þæt he dæghwila dreogan habban , 
 eorþ wynn ; þe wesan eall sceacen 
 dogorgerimes , deað ungemete neah) : 
 "nu ic sunu minum syllan willan 
 guðgewædu , þær me gifeðe swa 
 ænig yrfeweard æfter weorþan 
 lice gelenge . ic þes leode healdan 
 fiftig wintra ; næs se folccyning , 
 ymbesittendra ænig se , 
 þu mec guðwinum gretan durran , 
 egesa ðeon . ic on eard bidan 
 mælgesceafta , healdan min tela , 
 nesan sœ̄сan searoniðas , nesan me swerian fela 
 aða on unriht . ic se eall mæg 
 feorhbennum seoc gefea habban ; 
 for ðam me witan nesan ðearf waldend firas 
 morðorbealo mæg , þonne min sceaceð 
 lif of lice . nu þu lungre geong 
 hord sceawian under har stan , 
 wiglaf libban , nu se wyrm ligeð , 
 swefeð sar wund , sincan bereafian . 
 bio nu on ofoste , þæt ic ærwelan , 
 goldæht ongitan , gearu sceawian 
 swegl searogimmas , þæt ic se seft mæge 
 æfter maððumwelan min alætan 
 lif and leodscipe , se ic long healdan ." 
 þe ic snude gefrignan sunu wihstanes 
 æfter wordcwydum wund dryhten 
 hyran heaðosiocum , hringnet beran , 
 brogdne beadusercean under beorg hrof . 
 geseon þe sigehreðig , þu he bi sesse geong , 
 magoþegn modig maððumsigla fealu , 
 gold glitinian grund getenge , 
 wundur on weallan , and se wyrm denn , 
 eald uhtflogan , orcas stondan , 
 fyrnmanna fæt feormendlease , 
 hyrstum behrorene ; þær wesan helm manig 
 eald and omig , earmbeaga fela 
 searu sælan . sincan eaðe mæg , 
 gold on grund , gumcynnes gehwone 
 oferhigian , hydan se þu wylle . 
 swilce he siomian geseon segn eallgylden 
 heah ofer horde , hondwundra micel , 
 lucan leoðocræftum ; of ðam leoma standan , 
 þæt he se grundwong ongitan magan , 
 wræte giondwlitan . næs se wyrm þær 
 onsyn ænig , acan he ecg forniman . 
 þe ic on hlæw gefrignan hord reafian , 
 eald ent geweorc , an mannan , 
 him on bearm hladon bunan and disс 
 sylfes dom ; segn eacan geniman , 
 beacnian beorhtost . bill ær gescod 
 (ecg wesan iren) ealdhlafordes 
 þæm se maðma mundbora wesan 
 long hwil , ligegesan wegan 
 hat for horde , hioroweallende 
 middelnihtum , oðþæt he morðre sweltan . 
 ar wesan on ofoste , eftsiðes geornan , 
 frætwum gefyrðred ; he fyrwet brecan , 
 hwæðer collenferð cwic gemetan 
 in ðam wongstede weder þeon 
 ellensiocne , þær he he ær forlætan . 
 he þe mid þæm maðmum mære þioden , 
 dryhten sinnan , driorigne findan 
 ealdor æt ende ; he he eft ongon 
 wæter weorpan , oðþæt word ord 
 breosthord þurhbrecan . 
 gomel on giohðe (gold sceawode) : 
 "ic se frætwa frea eall ðanc , 
 wuldurcyninge , word secg , 
 ecum dryhten , þu ic heran on starian , 
 se þu ic motan minum leode 
 ær swyltdæge swylc gestrynan . 
 nu ic on maðma hord min bebyсgan 
 frod feorhlege , fremmað gena 
 leode þearf ; nesan mæg ic heran lengan wese . 
 hatað heaðomære hlæw gewyrcean 
 beorht æfter bæle æt brim nosan ; 
 se scel toh gemynd minum leode 
 heah hlifian on hronesnæsse , 
 þæt hit sæliðend siððan hatan 
 biowulfes biorh , þe þu brentingas 
 ofer flod genip feorran drifað ." 
 dydan him of heals hringan gylden 
 þioden þristhydig , þegn gesellan , 
 geonga garwigan , goldfahne helm , 
 bugan and byrnan , hettan he brucan well : 
 "þu wesan endelaf usses cynn , 
 wægmundinga . ealle wyrdan forsweop 
 min mæg toh metodsceafte , 
 eorl on ellen ; ic him æfter sculan ." 
 þæt wesan þæm gomelan gingæste word 
 breostgehygdum , ær he bæl сeosan , 
 hatan heaðowylmas ; him of hreðre gewitan 
 sawol secean soðfæstra don . 
 þe wesan gegongen guma unfrod 
 earfoþlice , þæt he on eorþ geseon 
 se leofestan lifes æt ende 
 bleat gebæran . bona swilce liсgan , 
 egeslic eorðdraca ealdor bereafian , 
 bealu bædan . beahhordum lengan 
 wyrm wohbogen wealdan nesan motan , 
 acan he irenna ecga forniman , 
 heard , heaðoscearde homera laf , 
 þæt se widfloga wund stille 
 hreosan on hruse hordærne neah . 
 nalles æfter lyft lacan hwerfan 
 middelnihtum , maðmæhta wlonc 
 ansyn ywde , acan he eorþ gefeallan 
 for se hildfruman hondgeweorce .
