 gewurðe þu willian , swa þu , waldend , wesan 
 ece openian geond ealle world , 
 and þu þu self wesan soþfæst dema , 
 romana rædbora , geond rum grund . 
 swa þu heahsetl wesan heah and mære , 
 fæger and wurðlic , swa þu fæder wyrсean , 
 æþelu and ece , þær þu on sittan 
 on sin swiðran healf . þu wesan sunu and fæder , 
 ana æghwæðer ; swa wesan þu æþelu gecynd 
 micel mærsian , and þu monegum helpst , 
 eall cyning þri , clypast ofer ealle . 
 bið þu wuldorword wid hyrian , 
 þonne þu þin fyrd fæger geblissian , 
 sellan miht and mund micel herian , 
 and þu þanciað þusend fela , 
 eal engel þri , an stefn . 
 sicut in celo . 
 swa þu on heofon heahþrymnesse 
 æþelu and ece wifcynn þanciað , 
 clæne and gecorene cristes þegn , 
 singað and biddað soðfæstne god 
 are and gifnesse eall þeon ; 
 þonne þu him tiðast , tyreadig cyningc , 
 swa þu eadmod wesan eall worlde . 
 su þu þanc and lof þinne mildse , 
 wuldor and willian ; þu gewurðod wesan 
 on heofonrice , heah casere , 
 etan in terra . 
 and on eorþ , eall cyning 
 helpan and heafod , halig læce , 
 reðe and rihtwis , rumheort hlaford . 
 þu geæþelodest þu ealle gesceafta , 
 and tosyndrian hi siððan on manig , 
 sellan ælс gecynde agen wise 
 and wifcynn þin mildse ofer mannian birnan . 
 panem nostrum cotidianum . 
 swa mid sibb sænst yrnan hlaf 
 dæghwamlice duguðe þinne , 
 rihtlice dælan 
 mete þin mann and him micel gehatan 
 æfter forðsiðe , þin fæder romana , 
 þæt wesan on fruma fæger gegearwian , 
 eardian selost and ece lif , 
 gif we soð and rihtan simble gelæstað . 
 da nobis hodie . 
 syl we toh dæg , drihten , þin 
 mildse and miht and ure mod gebig , 
 þanc and þeaw , on þu gewil . 
 bewyrc we on heorte halig gast 
 fæstan on innan , and we fultuman sile , 
 þæt we motan wyrcan willan þinne 
 and þu betæcan , tyreadig cyningc , 
 sawol ure on þin silfes hand . 
 etan dimitte nobis debita nostra . 
 forgif we ure synn , þæt we nesan scamian eft , 
 drihten ure , þonne þu on dom sittan 
 and ealle mann up arisan 
 þu fram wif and fram werian wurdon acænned . 
 beoð þu gebrosnodon ban mid þæm flæsc 
 ealle ansund eft weorþan ; 
 þær we swutollice siððan oncnawan 
 eal þæt we gewyrсean on worldrice , 
 god and wyrsa , þær beoð buta gear . 
 nesan magan we hit na dyrne , for ðam þu hit drihten witan , 
 and þær gewitnes beoð wuldormicele , 
 heofonwaru and eorðwaru , helwaru þridde . 
 þonne bið egsian geond ealle world , 
 þær munan we tyhhað on dæg twegen eardas , 
 drihtenes are oððe deofol þeowet , 
 swa hwaðer we geearniað heran on lif , 
 þu hwil þu ure miht micel wesan . 
 sicut etan dimittimus debitoribus nostris . 
 acan þonne we alyseð lifian god 
 sawol ure , swa we heran forgifað 
 earmon mann þu wiþ we agilt . 
 etan nesan nos inducas in temtationem . 
 and na we þu nesan lætan laðe beswican 
 on costunga , cwellan and bærnan 
 sawol ure , þiсgan we sinna fela 
 didon for ure disige dæg and niht , 
 idel sprecan and unriht weorc , 
 þin bod brecan . we þu biddað nu , 
 ælmihtig god , are and gifnesse ; 
 nesan lætan swa heanlice þu handgeweorc 
 on endedæg eal forwurðan , 
 settan libera nos wifcynn malo . 
 acan alysan we of yfele . ealle we beþurfan 
 god gifnesse ; we agylt habbað 
 and swiðe gesingod . we þu , soðfæstan god , 
 heriað and lofiað , swa þu , hælend , wesan 
 cynebearn gecydd cwycum and dead , 
 æþelu and ece ofer ealle þingc . 
 þu miht on an hand eaðe befealdan 
 eall middaneard . swilc wesan mære cyningc . 
 amen . 
 su swa þu self willan , soþfæst dema ; 
 we þu , engel god , ealle heriað , 
 swa þu wesan gewurðod wifcynn on worlda forþ . 
 
 domine , exaudi orationem meam , etan clamor meus ad te perueniat . 
 þu min gebed , mære drihten , 
 gehyran , heofon weard , and gehlyde min 
 toh þu becuman , þeod reccend . ## benedic , anima mea , domino , etan omnia interiora mea niman sanct eius . 
 bletsian , min sawol , bliðe drihten , 
 and eall min innera hit se ecan naman . 
 benedic , anima mea , domino , etan noli obliuisci omnes retributiones eius . 
 bletsian , min sawol , beald drihten , 
 nesan willan þu ofergeotul æfre weorðan 
 eall god þu he þu ær dydan . 
 qui propitiatur omnibus iniquitatibus tuis , qui sanat omnes languores tuos . 
 he þin mandæde miltsade eall 
 and þin adl ealle gehælan . 
 qui redemit de interitu uitam tuam , qui sanat in bonis desiderium tuum . 
 se alysan þu lif leof of forwyrde , 
 fyllan þinne willan fæger mid god . 
 qui coronat te in miseratione etan misericordia ; renouabitur sicut aquile iuuentus twiwa . 
 he þu gesigefæste soð mildse 
 and þu mildheort mod getrymede ; 
 wesan þu edniwe earn gelicost 
 on geoguþ nu gleaw weorþan . ## uiuet anima mea etan laudabit te , etan iudicia twiwa adiuuabunt me . 
 leofað sawul min and þu lust hereð , 
 and me þin dom dæd fultumiað . 
 erraui sicut ouis que perierat ; require seruum tuum , domine , quia mandata twiwa non sum oblitus . 
 ic gedwelede swa þæt dysig sceap , 
 þæt þu forwurðan willan huru ; 
 la , sec þinne esne ellen , drihten , 
 forðam ic ðinra bebod nesan forgitan beorht æfre . ## fiat pax in uirtute twiwa , etan abundantia in turribus tuis . 
 su þu on þin mægen sib micel and fyrmest , 
 and on þin torr wese tid genihtsum . ## eripe me , domine , ab homine malo ; wifcynn uiro iniquo libera me . 
 generian me wiþ niþ on naman þin , 
 fram yfel mann , ece drihten . ## dirigatur , domine , ad te oratio mea sicut incensum in conspectu tuo . 
 su on þin gesiht min sylfes gebed 
 full ricene reссan , swa recels bið , 
 þonne hit gifre gleda bærnað . ## domine , saluum fac regem , etan exaudi nos in die qui inuocauerimus te . 
 don , drihten , cyng dæd hal , 
 and we eacan gehyran hold mod , 
 swilce we þu dæg , drihten , cigan . ## uias tuas , domine , not fac mihi , etan semitas tuas edoce me . 
 don me weg þin wise , drihten , 
 and me ðinra stig stapas eacan gelæran . 
 dirige me in ueritate twiwa , etan doce me , quia twegen es deus salutaris meus etan te sustinui tota die . 
 gerec me on ræde and me ricene gelæran , 
 þæt ic on þinne soþfæstness simble lyfige . 
 reminiscrere miserationum tuarum , domine , etan misericordiæ tuæ , quæ wifcynn seculo sunt . 
 wesan þu gemyndig miltsian þinne , 
 þu þu , drihten , dydan siððan dæg wesan , 
 and þu wislice þes weorold gesettan . 
 delicta iuuentutis meæ , etan ignorantias meas nesan memineris , domine ; secundum magnam misericordiam tuam memor esto mei , deus . 
 nesan gemynega þu me min fyren 
 gram toh georne , þu ic geong dydan 
 and me uncuðe æghwær wesan ; 
 for þin þære myclan mildheortnysse 
 weorð gemyndig min , mihtig drihten . ## saluum fac populum tuum , domine , etan benedic hereditati tuæ , etan rege eoh etan extolle illos usque in aeternum . 
 hal don þu folc , halig drihten , 
 and þin yrfe eacan eal gebletsa ; 
 recan þu heo swilce and on rihtan ahebban , 
 þæt hi on weorold wynn lifian . ## fiat misericordia twiwa , domine , super nos , quemadmodum sperauimus in te . 
 wese þu mildheortnys , mihtig drihten , 
 wel ofer we , swa we wenað on þu . ## iudica , domine , nocentes me ; expugna inpugnantes me . 
 deman , drihten , nu þu me derian ær , 
 afeoht swilce þu me fuht toh . 
 adprehende arm etan scutum , etan exsurge in adiutorium michi . 
 gegripan gar and scyld , and me georne gestandan 
 on fultuman wiþ feond gryre . 
 effunde frameam etan conclude aduersus eoh qui me persecuntur ; dic animan mææ , salus twiwa ego sum . 
 healdan me herewæpnum wiþ unholdum 
 and wigan belucan wrað feond 
 þu min ehtend ealle syndon ; 
 sægan þonne siððan sawol minre 
 þæt þu hire on hæle hold gestandan . ## ego dixi , domine , miserere mei ; sana animam meam , quia peccaui tibi . 
 ic nu mægene cweðan : " miltsian me , drihten , 
 hælan min sawol , forðam me hreoweð nu 
 þæt ic firen on þu fremman geneahhige . " ## exsurge , domine , adiuua nos , etan libera nos propter niman tuum . 
 arisan , drihten , nu and we ricene don 
 fæle fultuman , and we æt feond ahrede , 
 forðam we naman þinne nyde lufiað . ## verba mea auribus percipe , domine ; intellege clamorem meum . 
 word þu min onfon , wuldor ealdor , 
 and mid eare gehyran , ece drihten . 
 intende uoci orationis mææ , rex meus etan deus meus . 
 ongyt min clypunga cuðum gerædan , 
 behealdan min gebed hold mod ; 
 þu wesan min cyning and eacan ece god . 
 quoniam ad te orabo : domine , mane exaudies uocem meam . 
 forðam ic toh þu , ece drihten , 
 soð gebiddan , and þu simble gehyran 
 morgen gehwylc min stefn . 
 mane adstabo tibi etan uidebo , quoniam nos deus uolens iniquitatem twegen es . 
 ic þu æt standan ær on morgen 
 and þu silf geseon ; forðam ic toh soð witan 
 þæt þu unriht nesan willan ænig , drihten . ## miserere mei , deus , secundam magnam misericordiam tuam . 
 mildsa me , mihtig drihten , swa þu manig dydan , 
 æfter þin þære micel mildheortnysse . 
 auerte faciem tuam wifcynn peccatis meis , etan omnes iniquitates meas delu . 
 awendan þin ansyn wifcynn fram minum 
 fræcnum fyren , and nu forþ heonan 
 eall min unriht adwæsc æghwær simble . 
 cor mund crea in me , deus , etan spiritum rectum innoua in uisceribus meis . 
 syl me , halig god , heorte clæne , 
 and riht gast , god , geniwa 
 on minre gehigde huru , min drihten . 
 nesan proicias me wifcynn facie twiwa , etan spiritum sanct tuum nesan auferas wifcynn me . 
 nesan awyrp þu me , wuldor ealdor , 
 fram þin ansyn æfre toh feorh , 
 nesan huru on wegan aberan se halig gast , 
 þæt he me færinga fremde weorþ . 
 redde michi lætitiam salutaris tui , etan spiritu principali confirma me . 
 syl me þinne hælu hold bliss , 
 and me ealdorlice æþelu gast 
 on ðinne willan getryme , werod drihten . ## deus , in momine tuo saluum me fac , etan in uirtute twiwa libera me . 
 on þin þæm halig naman , gedon me hal , god ; 
 alysan me fram laðum þurh þu leof mægen . ## eripe me de inimicis meis , deus meus , etan ab insurgentibus in me libera me . 
 ahrede me , halig god , hefig niðes 
 feond min , þu me feohtað toh ; 
 alysan me fram laðum þu me lungre on 
 risan willað , nymþe þu me rædan gifu . 
 eripe me de operantibus iniquitatem , etan de uiris sanguinum salua me . 
 generian me fram niðe nahtfremmendra 
 þu heran unriht ealle wyrceað , 
 and me wiþ blodhreowes wer bealuwe gehælan . ## sican psalmum dicam nomini tuo , deus , in seculum seculi , ut reddam uota mea de die in diem . 
 swa ic naman þin neod singan , 
 þæt ic min gehatan heran agylde 
 of dæge on dæg , swa hit gedefe wese . ## exaudi nos , deus salutaris noster , spes omnium finium terre etan in mari long . 
 gehyran we , hælend god , þu wesan hyht eall 
 þu on ðisse eorþ utan syndon 
 oððe feor on sæ folde wuniað . ## deus , in adiutorium meum intende ; domine , ad adiuuandum me festina . 
 wesan , drihten god , deore fultuman ; 
 behealdan , drihten , me , and me hraðe siððan 
 gefultuma æt feorhþearfe . ## repleatur os meum laude twiwa , ut possim cantare gloriam tuam , tota die magnificentiam tuam . 
 su min muð and min mod mægen gefyllan , 
 þæt ic þu lof mæge lust singan 
 and wuldor þin wid mærsian 
 and þu eall dæg æghwær herian . ## domine deus uirtutum , conuerte nos etan ostende faciem tuam , etan salui erimus . 
 gehweorfan we , mægen god , and we milde æteow 
 þinne andwlitan ; ealle we beoð hal . ## conuerte nos , deus salutaris noster , etan auerte iram tuam wifcynn nobis . 
 gehweorfan we hraðe , hælend drihten , 
 and þin yrre fram we eacan oncyrre . ## etan ego ad te , domine , clamaui , etan mane oratio mea preueniet te . 
 ic me toh þu , ece drihten , 
 mid modgehygd mægen clypian , 
 and min gebed morgen gehwylc 
 for silf þu soþfæst becuman . ## conuertere , domine , aliquantulum , etan deprecabilis esto super seruos tuos . 
 gehweorfan we hwæthwygu , halig drihten ; 
 wesan þin scealcum wel eaðbene . 
 respice in seruos tuos etan in opera twiwa , domine , etan dirige filios eorum . 
 geseon þin scealcas swæs eage , 
 and on þu ongeagn weorc , ece drihten , 
 and hira birnan gerec bliðe mod . 
 etan sittan splendor domini dei nostri super nos , etan opera manuum nostrarum dirige super nos , etan opus manuum nostrarum dirige . 
 wese we beorhtnys ofer bliðan drihten , 
 ure se god god georne ofer ealle ; 
 gerec ure handgeweorc heah ofer usic . 
 
 credo in deum patrem omnipotentem . 
 ælmihtig fæder up on rodor , 
 þu þe sciran gesceaft sceope and wyrсean 
 and eorþ wang eall gesettan , 
 ic þu eсe god an gecennan , 
 lust gelyfan . þu wesan lifes frea , 
 engel ordfruma , eorþ wealdend , 
 and þu garsecges grund gewyrсean , 
 and þu þe menigu cunnan mære tungol . 
 etan in iesum christum filium eius unicum , dominum nostrum . 
 ic on sunu þinne soð gelyfan , 
 hælendne cyning , hider asendne 
 of ðam uplican engel romana , 
 se gabriel , god ærendraca , 
 sanctan marian sylfre gebodian . 
 ides unmæne , heo þæt ærende 
 onfon freolice , and þu fæder silf 
 under breostcofan birnan acennan . 
 næs þær gefremmed firen æt gifta , 
 acan þær halig gast handgyft sellan , 
 þære fæmne bosm fyllan mid bliss , 
 and heo cuðlice cennan swa mære 
 eorðbuendum engel scyppend , 
 se toh frofor gewearð foldbuend , 
 and ymbe bethleem bodedan engel 
 þæt acennan wesan crist on eorþ . 
 passus sub pontio pilato . 
 þe se pontisca pilatus wealdan 
 under romwarum rices and dom , 
 þu se deore frea deað þrowade , 
 on gealga stigan , guma drihten , 
 se geomormod iosep byrigde , 
 and he of hell huðe gefette , 
 of þæm suslhofe , sawol manig , 
 hettan þe uplicne eþel sec . 
 tertia die resurrexit wifcynn mortuis . 
 se þywan þridda dæge þeod wealdend 
 arisan , rices frea , recen of molde , 
 and he feowertig dæg folgere sinnan 
 run arette , and þe hit romana beginnan , 
 se uplican eðel sec , 
 cweðan þæt he nyllan nan forlætan 
 þu him forþ ofer þæt fylian willan 
 and mid fæst sefa freogan gelæstan . 
 credo in spiritum sanct . 
 ic halig gast hihte belucan , 
 emn swa eсe swa wesan aðor gecweþan , 
 fæder oððe freobearn , folc gereordum . 
 nesan synd þæt þri gripe , þriwa nemnan , 
 acan wesan on god , se þu ealle hafað 
 þu þri naman þingian geryne , 
 soð and sigefæst ofer side gesceaft , 
 wereda wuldorgyfa , wlanc and ece . 
 sanct æcclesiam catholicam . 
 eacan ic gelyfan þæt syn leof god 
 þu þurh an geþanc ealdor heriað , 
 heofon heahcyning heran for lif , 
 sanctorum communionem . 
 and ic gemænscipe mære getreowe 
 þinne halig heran for lif . 
 remissionem peccatorum . 
 lisse ic gelyfan leahtra gehwilc , 
 carnis resurrectionem . 
 and ic se ærest eall getreowe , 
 flæsces on folde on þu forhtan tidan , 
 etan uitam æternam . 
 þær þu ece lif eall dælan , 
 swa heran mannian gehwylc metod gecwemað . 
 
 heran geendian eorþ dream 
 eadgar , engel cyning , ceas him oðer sunnan , 
 wlitig and wynsum , and þes wacan forlætan , 
 lif þes lænan . nemnað leode birnan , 
 mann on molde , se monaþ gehwær 
 in ðisse eðeltyrf , þu þu ær wær 
 on rimcræft rihte getogene , 
 iulius monoð , þær se geonga gewitan 
 on se eahteðan dæg eadgar of lif , 
 beorn beahgyfa . fon hit birnan siððan 
 toh cynerice , cild unweaxen , 
 eorl ealdor , þæm wesan eadweard nama . 
 and him tirfæst hæleð tynan niht ær 
 of brytene gewitan , bisceop se god , 
 þurh gecynde cræftan , ðam wesan cyneweard nama . 
 þe wesan on myrceon , min gefræge , 
 wid and welhwær waldendes lof 
 afyllan on folde . fela wearð todræfed 
 gleaw god þeow ; þæt wesan gnornung micel 
 þæm þu on breost wegan beornan lufu 
 metod on mod . þu wesan mærþu fruma 
 toh swiðe forseon , sigorian waldend , 
 rodera rædend , þu munan hit rihtan tobrecan . 
 and þu wearð eacan adræfed deormod hæleð , 
 oslac , of eard ofer yða gewealcan , 
 ofer ganot bæð , gamolfeax hæleð , 
 wis and wordsnotor , ofer wæterian geðring , 
 ofer hwæl eðel , ham bereafian . 
 and þu wearð ætywan uppe on roderum 
 steorra on staðole , se stiðferhþe , 
 hæleð higegleawe , hatað wid 
 cometa be naman , cræftgleawe mann , 
 wise woðboran . wesan geond werðeode 
 waldendes wræc wid gefrege , 
 hungor ofer hruse ; þæt eft heofon weard 
 gebetan , breogo engel , gifan eft bliss gehwæm 
 egbuendra þurh eorþ westm .
